T02TD1346E:1b-1: pa ra ma a'a di buddha auddhri ta shr'i k'a la tsakra n'a ma tantra r'a dz'a /
T02TD1346E:1b-3: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor [dd] lo zhes bya ba /
T02TD1346E:1b-4: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1346E:1b-5: thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku dang nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste padma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan //
T02TD1346E:1b-6: sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa lha mchog rnams kyis btud la rgyal po zla ba bzang po yis //
T02TD1346E:1b-7: mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal lag pa'i padma sbyar ba yan lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa ni //
T02TD1346E:1b-8: rnal 'byor dpal ldan dus 'khor ka phreng ldan pa'i aa 'dus la ste mi rnams dgrol ba'i don du'o /
T02TD1346E:1b-9: 1 / stong pa ye shes kyang ste thig le mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang //
T02TD1346E:1b-10: phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams la skyes bu nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang //
T02TD1346E:1b-11: lus la sna tshogs tshad dang srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi longs spyod dang //
T02TD1346E:2a-0: @2a * // dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol /
T02TD1346E:2a-1: 2 / zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rab mchog lha rnams dang ;
T02TD1346E:2a-2: / mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags bral thub mchog rigs rnams dag gis shes pa min pas so //
T02TD1346E:2a-3: mya ngan 'das pa la sogs 'dzin ma'i mthar thug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dag ni ;
T02TD1346E:2a-4: / lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par bya yis mi yi bdag po bzang po nyon /
T02TD1346E:2a-5: 3 / dus kyis stong pa rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin ma gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang //
T02TD1346E:2a-6: rgyu skar dang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang //
T02TD1346E:2a-7: dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang sna tshogs sa dang 'og tu mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang //
T02TD1346E:2a-8: stong pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste chu la lan tshva dang ni sgo nga'i dbus su sgong skyes bzhin /
T02TD1346E:2a-9: 4 / lus dang ye shes nam mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang brtan dang g-yo ba dang //
T02TD1346E:2b-0: lha ni mthong ba skyed min dag dang srid pa rnam bcur gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni @2b lus dag las //
T02TD1346E:2b-1: sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te //
T02TD1346E:2b-2: de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs min sems kyis kun du rtog pa dag las grol /
T02TD1346E:2b-3: 5 / g-yon gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po 'bar ba 'gro ba'i bdud rtsi'i cha dang g-yas su dmar po'i mdog / sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma dang //
T02TD1346E:2b-4: mjug rings dman pa char dang glog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar ba rnams ni zung bdun po //
T02TD1346E:2b-5: 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o /
T02TD1346E:2b-6: 6 / rgyab tu ser po yang ni skar ma lha gzhu sa ste de ni rnam bzhi gnyis kyi dbye bas so //
T02TD1346E:2b-7: srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o //
T02TD1346E:2b-8: dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa 'og tu gnas //
T02TD1346E:2b-9: kun du ye shes dang ni stong pa'o zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol /
T02TD1346E:2b-10: 7 / aa sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed kyang //
T02TD1346E:2b-11: ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me yi tshad kyis spyod par byed //
T02TD1346E:2b-12: ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha min gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa //
T02TD1346E:2b-13: aa sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar khams gsum dag ni nges par skyed 'gyur mi yi bdag 8 / dbyangs ni ka tsa ta pa tar ldan [?] ka la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas //
T02TD1346E:2b-14: mgrin rkan steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung bsreg bya las skyes mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dag go //
T02TD1346E:2b-15: aa sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste //
T02TD1346E:2b-16: sna tshogs gnag dmar ri bong can dang gser 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o /
T02TD1346E:2b-17: 9 / rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis //
T02TD1346E:3a-0: lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza' yi tshogs @3a * //
T02TD1346E:3a-1: kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga //
T02TD1346E:3a-2: mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i go 'phang g-yo med dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga //
T02TD1346E:3a-3: de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o /
T02TD1346E:3a-4: 10 / rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams //
T02TD1346E:3a-5: bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis //
T02TD1346E:3a-6: dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste //
T02TD1346E:3a-7: cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes /
T02TD1346E:3a-8: 11 /'jig rten khams kyi kun nas 'khor yug tu ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:3a-9: sa yi 'khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:3a-10: mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa //
T02TD1346E:3a-11: de ni sa yi steng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang ngo /
T02TD1346E:3a-12: 12 / phra rab brgyad rnams dag gis phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse mo phra mo ste //
T02TD1346E:3a-13: 'di rnams kyis ni ske tshe shig dang nas te ltos 'gro nas kyis sor te ser mo nyi ma ni //
T02TD1346E:3a-14: zung gis khru'o khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:3a-15: rgyang grags bzhi rnams dag gis dpag tshad de yis lha yul sa dang nam mkha' dag la tshad yin no /
T02TD1346E:3a-16: 13 / dang por chos bzang bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang //
T02TD1346E:3a-17: dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go //
T02TD1346E:3a-18: gzugs med dag ni aa sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te ai la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs //
T02TD1346E:3a-19: ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig pa ka sa'o /
T02TD1346E:3b-0: 14 / srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye @3b bas khams gsum mo //
T02TD1346E:3b-1: srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te aa sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so //
T02TD1346E:3b-2: rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod de bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1346E:3b-3: 'dam gyi chu dang mi bzad du ba dag dang me dang mun pa dang ni du 'bod bdun pa dang /
T02TD1346E:3b-4: 15 / lan tshva chang dang chu dang 'o ma zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun te ri bo ni //
T02TD1346E:3b-5: 'od sngon manda ra ri ni sha ta dang nor bu'i 'od dang dro na bsil ri rdo rje'o //
T02TD1346E:3b-6: gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag na rab mchog ku sha dang ni mi'am ci dang khrung khrung dang //
T02TD1346E:3b-7: drag po yang ni longs spyod sa ste bdun pa 'dzam bu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyi sa /
T02TD1346E:3b-8: 16 / shar du rlung ni shin tu zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lho ru me ni gru gsum mo //
T02TD1346E:3b-9: byang du chu ni phyed kyi zla ba dag dang nub tu gser mchog sa ni chu yi gter gyi zur //
T02TD1346E:3b-10: ri rab lhun po stod pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste //
T02TD1346E:3b-11: sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni ri dang klu dang gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:3b-12: 17 / lhun po yi ni steng gi rgya dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams kyi stong phrag ni //
T02TD1346E:3b-13: lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la 'khor yug dag gi yang dag ste //
T02TD1346E:3b-14: rva ni lnga po rnams dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun du ni khor yug go //
T02TD1346E:3b-15: de yi phyi rol gling dang ri bo dag dang chu gter rnams te phyogs rnams kun du me dang rlung /
T02TD1346E:3b-16: 18 / chu gter drug po thams cad dag kyang zla ba zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste //
T02TD1346E:3b-17: gling rnams dang ni ri rgyud mchog rnams dag kyang de lta'i stong phrag stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni //
T02TD1346E:3b-18: 'dzam bu'i gling gi yangs pa dag dang lan tshva'i chu yi gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad yin te //
T02TD1346E:3b-19: srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi ni mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag de bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:3b-20: 19 / tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste //
T02TD1346E:3b-21: lhun po la ni tshig mda'i tshogs dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams dag ni rigs lnga'o //
T02TD1346E:4a-1: lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun du sa yi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas //
T02TD1346E:4a-2: zhing dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas ni me dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar /
T02TD1346E:4a-3: 20 / shar du brgya byin mer ni me lha gshin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu //
T02TD1346E:4a-4: rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu yang //
T02TD1346E:4a-5: tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshon ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung zhing skyong ba ste //
T02TD1346E:4a-6: de dag dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku /
T02TD1346E:4a-7: 21 / lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor //
T02TD1346E:4a-8: gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod dus 'jug pa de dang der ni rab tu bgrod par byed //
T02TD1346E:4a-9: kla klo rnams kyang g-yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu //
T02TD1346E:4a-10: rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:4a-11: 22 / dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can de rab tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de //
T02TD1346E:4a-12: rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no //
T02TD1346E:4a-13: dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste //
T02TD1346E:4a-14: re re dag gi tshad ni dus dang mda' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams dag gi lo brgya gang yin pa'o /
T02TD1346E:4a-15: 23 / phra dbugs dhru dang chu tshod nyin zhag dhru dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang //
T02TD1346E:4a-16: drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
T02TD1346E:4a-17: nus dang gtso bo'i nyin zhag gcig gi tshad de sa gzhi dag la dus bzhi nus pa'i tshad du 'jug / dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo can bgrod nyin zhag gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so /
T02TD1346E:4a-18: 24 / phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis //
T02TD1346E:4a-19: rgyal po lo ni mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srad rnams te //
T02TD1346E:4b-0: 'di @4b rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
T02TD1346E:4b-1: nus dang gtso bo'i zhag re la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:4b-2: 25 / lo 'di nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa shambha la zhes bya bar 'byung //
T02TD1346E:4b-3: de nas klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par ma kha'i yul du kla klo'i chos dag rab tu 'jug / de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams dag gis rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:4b-4: mtha' dag sa gzhi la ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:4b-6: 26 / me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i lor ni rab tu grub //
T02TD1346E:4b-7: kla klo'i dbang po'i lo ni lag pa gdengs can zla bas dman pa'i lhag ma dag kyang nyi mas bsgyur //
T02TD1346E:4b-8: nag pa la sogs zla ba bsres te 'og tu dus kyis bsgyur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam bar dbye //
T02TD1346E:4b-9: rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:4b-10: 27 / zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis bsgyur //
T02TD1346E:4b-11: rtsa ba dag la drug gi chas rnyed de yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la ni sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1346E:4b-12: steng 'og dag las mig dang sum cu'i nor ni bsres pa gsal bar bya ste drug cu'i cha dag gis //
T02TD1346E:4b-13: rnyed pa steng du rab bsres thub pa mchog rnams dag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag ni gza' ru 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:4b-14: 28 / gnas gnyis nyi zla bsres pa dag las dus dang nyi mas thob la 'byung ba bsres pa mtha' dag ni //
T02TD1346E:4b-15: de yi steng gi phung por sbyin te dang po lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyad dang gnyis kyis phye ba tshogs //
T02TD1346E:4b-16: gnas gsum dbu ma dag ni dbang phyug gis bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis cha thob par //
T02TD1346E:4b-17: gnyis bsres dman pa'i dbu mar chu tshod dag gis thob pa nor te steng gi phung por gnyis kyis ni /
T02TD1346E:4b-18: 29 / bsgyur nas byin la skar mas bgos lhag mi bdag nyi ma'i skar ma la sogs longs spyod dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:4b-19: gza' la gza' ni rab sbyin mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams te 'og tu tshogs dag la yang gnyis //
T02TD1346E:5a-0: skar mar gnyis dang chu tshod drag po nor du rab gsal @5a * //
T02TD1346E:5a-1: nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la rab tu sbyin //
T02TD1346E:5a-2: 'di dag zla ba'i nges par 'gyur te slar yang zla ba zla ba dag la rab tu sbyin par gsungs /
T02TD1346E:5a-3: 30 /[?] chos rnams sbyin dang dor dang slar yang sbyin pa dag ni gza' dang chu tshod rkang pa rnams su ste //
T02TD1346E:5a-4: tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob pa dag la sbyin dor rkang pa'i don //
T02TD1346E:5a-5: stong la stong pa rnam dag bcu gsum zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste mig dang nyi ma dag la phyogs //
T02TD1346E:5a-6: bcu gcig me la tshes zhes bya ste bcu dang chu gter rkang par nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o /
T02TD1346E:5a-7: 31 / lnga dang bug par nyi shu rtsa gnyis dus dang nor la rgyal ba bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga ste //
T02TD1346E:5a-8: de la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas gsal byas nyi ma'i rkang pa dag ni sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:5a-9: 'byung dang 'byung ba mda' dang rig byed me lag ri bong can ni snga ma'i cha dang gzhan la yang //
T02TD1346E:5a-10: tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob la rgyu ba rnams ni sbyin dang dor /
T02TD1346E:5a-11: 32 / rgyu zhing yod pas lhag ma bsgyur ba las ni dus dang nyi mas cha thob dag kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD1346E:5a-12: de nyid la ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas nyi ma'i rkang pa'i chu tshod sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:5a-13: gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis tshes bsgyur gsal bar nor te de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa'o //
T02TD1346E:5a-14: dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu lon dag ste nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya /
T02TD1346E:5a-15: 33 / bya ba lhag ma mig dmar ji bzhin ro dus ri bong can rnams dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste //
T02TD1346E:5a-16: longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur nas mda' dang yon tan zla bas cha thob longs spyod dang bcas pa //
T02TD1346E:5a-17: bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis nyi ma la ni sbyin dang dor te gzhan du dag pa yod ma yin //
T02TD1346E:5a-18: nyi ma la ni dus ro sprul dang bcu dang 'phrog byed 'phrog byed drag po phyogs dang klu dang drug /
T02TD1346E:5a-19: 34 / me dang nam mkha' dag kyang bgrod pa'i mthar te byang dang lho ru nor dang bu lon dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:5a-20: zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye [?] ba dag las phyogs kyi dbye bas zla ba drug ni nyin mor byed pas spyod //
T02TD1346E:5b-0: nyi ma la byin tshes grangs dag kyang 'og tu ro yis bsgyur la gza' yi longs spyod bsres pa dag / dman par gyur pa @5b ri bong mtshan mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po nyi zla bsres pa sbyor ba'o /
T02TD1346E:5b-1: 35 / byed pa dag ni tshes la mig gis bsgyur ba zla bral gang zhig bdun gyi cha yi lhag ma'o //
T02TD1346E:5b-2: dag pa'i lo la klu bsres mkha' dang nam mkha' chu gter gyis bsgyur klu bsres rnams kyis sbyangs [?] pa dag / ri zla me yis rab tu phye ste nam mkha' ros bsgyur ri la sogs pas bgos pa chu tshod de //
T02TD1346E:5b-3: gnyis dang sum cu'i gza' dang chu tshod nges pa 'dir ldan zla ba dag la lo yis 'pho ba'o /
T02TD1346E:5b-4: 36 / lug sogs rnams kyis snon byed dag la gza' dang chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste //
T02TD1346E:5b-5: zla ba ri 'byung rig byed dag dang yon tan mda' ste ri bong can dang ri zla gsum pa la'o //
T02TD1346E:5b-6: rig byed me 'byung zla ba mig dang lag pa dus dang rig byed mig ni drug pa dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:5b-7: drug dang zla ba mda' dang zla ba ri dus me dang drug zla rig byed ri dang 'jig rten dang /
T02TD1346E:5b-9: 37 / drug dang rig byed stong pa dag ste stong pa mig mda' nyi ma'i go 'phang nya yi khyim la'o //
T02TD1346E:5b-10: zla drug 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur te nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang nyi ma rab tu rgyu bas so //
T02TD1346E:5b-11: chu gter srog dang chu srang me ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i yan lag gis //
T02TD1346E:5b-12: lho phyogs su ni mtshan mo dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te kha ba'i ri yi byang du nyin mo'o /
T02TD1346E:5b-13: 38 / zla ba dag la mig dang nyi ma bsres pa mig gi rnam bsgyur zla ba'i tshigs la gcig bsres te //
T02TD1346E:5b-14: mkha' dus chu yis rab phye thub pa lag pas bsgyur ba las kyang mkha' sogs cha yis skar ma'o //
T02TD1346E:5b-15: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba gang yin de las chu tshod slar yang de bsgyur ba las chu srang ste //
T02TD1346E:5b-16: thob pas dman pa'i 'khor lo gdong du 'gyur te mun can mjug ma dag kyang rgyu skar phyed bsres pa'o /
T02TD1346E:5b-17: 39 / zla ba sum cus bsgyur ba nyin zhag so so dag dang bcas pa las ni ri mkha' ris thob pa //
T02TD1346E:5b-18: gnas gsum dbus su rnam bar bsres pa las kyang chu gter ros thob dman pa mi gsal nyin zhag go //
T02TD1346E:5b-19: ri dus gcig gis bsres pa dag kyang gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs te ri klu dus kyis bgos pa yi //
T02TD1346E:6a-0: lhag ma skar mas bsgyur thob slar yang nam mkha' ro yis bsgyur las ri @6a * //
T02TD1346E:6a-1: la sogs pas bgos pa chu tshod do /
T02TD1346E:6a-2: 40 / mig dmar la ni phyed bcas dgu sbyang gal te bu lon lhag na 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang //
T02TD1346E:6a-3: phyed pas lhag par gyur na'ang 'khor lo phyed ni dor bar bya ste dor ba'i lhag ma rim min 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:6a-4: skar ma drug cus bsgyur te chu tshod dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa 'byung me zla bas bgo / gang thob dal ba'i las dag la yang nor dang bu lon dag ni rim pa min dang rim pas so /
T02TD1346E:6a-5: 41 / de nyid bco brgyad ri ni rab tu gsal bar ro rkang 'khor lo phyed la steng dang 'og tu ste //
T02TD1346E:6a-6: longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur las mda' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa //
T02TD1346E:6a-7: snga ma phyed la gzung byar 'dod de rkang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:6a-8: zos pa tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu tshod la'o /
T02TD1346E:6a-9: 42 / de nas nyi mar sa skyes rnam par sbyang ste bla ma nyi skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o //
T02TD1346E:6a-10: zla skyes dkar po la yang nyi ma dag ste myur ba'i las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:6a-11: sbyangs pa'i lhag mas 'dir ni rkang pa dag ste bza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshod bsgyur //
T02TD1346E:6a-12: drug cu'i cha yis thob pa bza' rgyu rkang pa dag las gzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhin nyid /
T02TD1346E:6a-13: 43 / zos pa dag ni tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dag ste //
T02TD1346E:6a-14: sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal ba sogs te rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la mtha' dag gzhag par bya //
T02TD1346E:6a-15: de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su brtsi ba rig par bya'o mi yi dbang //
T02TD1346E:6a-16: zla skyes dkar po las ni nyin mor byed pas rnam dag zla skyes dkar po dag tu yang dag 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:6a-17: 44 / stong dang nam mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha' dag nyin zhag tshogs la me dang nyi ma ri yis dman //
T02TD1346E:6a-18: ri nas phug pa ri dang klu yis bgo ste slar yang lhag ma skar ma la sogs dbye bas bsgyur //
T02TD1346E:6a-19: rab brjod cha yis rgyu skar dag dang slar yang chu tshod rnams ni zla skyes longs spyod dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:6a-20: zla skyes dor te nyi ma'i dbus nas mi bdag bzang po mi bdag skar ma phyed kyang yang dag spangs /
T02TD1346E:6b-0: 45 / lhag ma'i bya ba nor dang @6b bu lon dal dang myur ba'i las kyang mig dmar ji lta bzhin du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:6b-1: zla skyes rkang pa dal ba'i las la bcu ri me ste myur ba'i las la mi bdag la sogs so //
T02TD1346E:6b-2: nyin zhag tshogs ni mkha' mkha' ro dang mig gis dman par byas nas so me chu gter dag gis bgo / lhag ma skar mas bsnun las skar ma slar yang chu tshod bla ma yi yang dal ba'i las la'o /
T02TD1346E:6b-3: 46 / rgyu skar nyi ma sbyang ste 'phrog byed dgu dang rtse mo can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa'o //
T02TD1346E:6b-4: slar yang myur ba dag la rkang pa rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la phyogs rkang la sogs de dag go //
T02TD1346E:6b-5: nyin zhag mkha' dang zla bas bsgyur nas chu gter nor gyis dman pa ri dang rgyal ba mig gis bgo / skar mas bsgyur ba las kyang skar ma'i longs spyod slar yang chu tshod myur ba'i las la pa sangs kyi /
T02TD1346E:6b-6: 47 / rgyu skar dus ni nyi ma la sbyang [?] mda' dus ri bong can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste //
T02TD1346E:6b-7: myur la de nyid la sogs dbye bas rab gsal ma nu'i gnas dag las te sbyin nor mig dmar bzhin //
T02TD1346E:6b-8: mkha' mig klu dang rig byed kyis dman gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs ni drug ro ri mkha' zla ba yis //
T02TD1346E:6b-9: bgo zhing skar mas bsgyur las skar mar 'gyur te spen pa yi ni dor bya dag kyang bco brgyad do /
T02TD1346E:6b-10: 48 / rkang pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis chos dus rab gsal ro yi gnas la'o myur ba'i las la ro la sogs //
T02TD1346E:6b-11: myur dal rgyu ba dag kyang rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa la ste 'khyog po nyid ni rim min gyis //
T02TD1346E:6b-12: phyed snga ma dang phyed phyi mar yang nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis gza' rnams kyi ni 'byung ba yang //
T02TD1346E:6b-13: sum cu rtsa bdun lag pas bsgyur ba'i zla ba rnams kyis [?] mjug rings dag ni myur dang 'khyog por 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:6b-14: 49 / gang dag su zhig nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab zhugs gza' de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:6b-15: nyi ma btang nas 'char bar 'gyur te de yi lam yang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye bas so //
T02TD1346E:6b-16: g-yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis g-yon nas 'gro ba ste //
T02TD1346E:6b-17: g-yas la gnas pa dag ni g-yas kyis slar yang gsal bar 'dir ni phan tshun 'thab ste dgra yin phyir /
T02TD1346E:7a-0: 50 / rang gi zhing la yang dag gnas rnams gal te de la @7a * //
T02TD1346E:7a-1: dgra dag 'gyur na nges par 'thab pa'o //
T02TD1346E:7a-2: skar ma la ste gzhan la 'thob pa min par nges shing 'dir ni phan tshun mtshungs pa dag tu ldan //
T02TD1346E:7a-3: gal te nyi ma yi ni g-yon du zla ba rab zhugs gyur cing 'byung ba yang ni g-yon pa yis //
T02TD1346E:7a-4: byang gi rva ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig tu ni bgrod pa'i dbang gis lho ru g-yas pa yang /
T02TD1346E:7a-5: 51 / tshigs mtshams su yang sgra gcan gdong dang mnyam par 'gro ste mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho na'o //
T02TD1346E:7a-6: g-yon du rgyu ba dag la g-yas min du ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis g-yas la g-yas pa'i char //
T02TD1346E:7a-7: de ltar sgra gcan gyis ni phyogs mtshams su 'dzin ri bong 'dzin pa 'byung ba dag ni rgyab tu mang //
T02TD1346E:7a-8: tha skar la sogs nag pa phyed du nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dbus su go la'i [?] ri mo'o /
T02TD1346E:7a-9: 52 / rgyu skar g-yas dang g-yas min dag la nges par srid pa'i gnas su khyim gyi dbye bas yang dag gnas /
T02TD1346E:7a-10: gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la go la'i dbus nas lhor ni me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing //
T02TD1346E:7a-11: byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri ste pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o //
T02TD1346E:7a-12: me nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams su dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mda' ri'o /
T02TD1346E:7a-13: 53 / dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri mo nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag kyang mtshan mo gcig ni mnyam pa la'o //
T02TD1346E:7a-14: phyi nas g-yas dang g-yas min dag tu rgyu ste nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu skar dbye bas rim pa yis //
T02TD1346E:7a-15: lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba 'dor zhing nyin dang mtshan mo [?] dag kyang ji srid bkod pa dag gi mthar //
T02TD1346E:7a-16: nyi ma ri bong can gyi nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug chas so /
T02TD1346E:7a-17: 54 / gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o //
T02TD1346E:7a-18: de phyir gnyis brgyad dum bu dag la nges par glang la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin no //
T02TD1346E:7a-19: bug pa zhes bya me grangs dag la 'khrig pa gzhur gnas phyogs kyi tshad dang bzhi pa dag la ni //
T02TD1346E:7a-20: nyi ma ka rka ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas lnga pa bcu gcig pa la yang /
T02TD1346E:7a-21: 55 / seng ge bum par rab bzhugs bcu gnyis ro yi sar ni nya dang bu mor gnas pa dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:7b-0: 'dir ni @7b g-yon bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma chu srin gnas pa la ste bum par nyi mas gnyis pa la //
T02TD1346E:7b-1: nya la dum bu gsum par mi rnams kyi ni bgrod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas bzhi par ro //
T02TD1346E:7b-2: 'byung ba zhes byar nyi ma glang la gnas pas 'khrig par nyi gnas sa ni drug pa bdun par yang /
T02TD1346E:7b-3: 56 / nyi ma ka rka ta la gnas pas 'gyur te seng ge la gnas sa yi dum bu brgyad par ro //
T02TD1346E:7b-4: bu mos bug par srang gi nyi mas bcu par 'gyur te sdig pa yis kyang drag po'i dum bu la'o //
T02TD1346E:7b-5: gzhu la gnas pas bcu gnyis par 'gyur mi rnams bgrod pa dag kyang bcu gnyis rtsibs kyis la'o //
T02TD1346E:7b-6: de bzhin lhor bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma bgrod pa'i dbang gis ka rka ta sogs khyim rnams dag la'o /
T02TD1346E:7b-7: 57 / steng du drug dang klu yi grangs ni nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod pa dag gi mthar //
T02TD1346E:7b-8: de nas g-yas phyogs su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs //
T02TD1346E:7b-9: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig mda' ni brgya dang bral bar gyur pa dbus nas go la'i ri mo ste //
T02TD1346E:7b-10: de las gang zhig 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur ba mkha' mkha' mda' dang mda' ni byang dang lhor yang ngo /
T02TD1346E:7b-11: 58 / lan tshva'i rgya mtsho 'gongs nas nyin mor byed [?] pa dag ni lho ru me yi bar du 'gro bar byed //
T02TD1346E:7b-12: kee la sha yi byang du 'gro ste gangs kyi ril [?] byang du yang ni byang la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1346E:7b-13: [?] mda' rnams tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni phyogs kyis bgrod pa dag la 'gro bar byed //
T02TD1346E:7b-14: phyed bcas mig klu zlas thob nyin dang nyin las 'dor ba lnga dang sa 'dzin stong phrag dag las so /
T02TD1346E:7b-15: 59 / khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed //
T02TD1346E:7b-16: dum bu dum bu dag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:7b-17: tshad gang dum bu gang du nyin mo'i dbang gis yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan mo la'o //
T02TD1346E:7b-18: lam phyed 'bum phrag gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du nyin mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan mo'o /
T02TD1346E:7b-19: 60 / ri yi rgyal po dag ni skye bo thams cad kyi yang byang na gnas par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag / nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur te ri dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang de ni nub pa nub //
T02TD1346E:8a-1: bzhi dang thun tshod nyin dang mtshan mo dus kun tu ni yang dag rgyu ba rnams //
T02TD1346E:8a-2: dus sbyor dbye bas phye bar gyur pa lhun po'i phyogs rnams su ni rab gsal nyi ma'i sa la 'khor /
T02TD1346E:8a-3: 61 / chu tshod dus la dpag tshad stong phrag drug ni rkang pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste //
T02TD1346E:8a-4: drug cu la ni me 'bum dag dang lnga dang ri bo'i stong phrag nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu 'khor //
T02TD1346E:8a-5: nyin dang mtshan mor go la phyed la mkha' me chu tshod bgrod de go la dag la g-yas dang ni //
T02TD1346E:8a-6: g-yas min dag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum /
T02TD1346E:8a-7: 62 / lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu srang du 'gyur mkha' dgu lag ste mkha' dus mig ni glang la 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:8a-8: zung dag la yang mkha' mkha' gnyis te mda' ro'i chu tshod du 'gyur ku l'i ra dang seng ge la'o //
T02TD1346E:8a-9: bu mo la ni phyed bcas drug ste nges par srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:8a-10: dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char [?] bdag kyang de bzhin nyi ma'i rgyu skar dbye bas so /
T02TD1346E:8a-11: 63 / stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya ldan pa dag las so yi cha yis nges par phyung gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:8a-12: lus la dbugs lhag gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung ba ri dang dus rnams dag gi grangs //
T02TD1346E:8a-13: stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyang lo brgya'i tshad du rab tu grags pa ste //
T02TD1346E:8a-14: stong dus me yis rab tu phye ba dag ni chu tshod du 'gyur drug cu'i cha yis nyin zhag kyang /
T02TD1346E:8a-16: 64 / zla ba'i phyogs te nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag dang sa skyes zla ba dgu rnams dag gis mtshan mo'o //
T02TD1346E:8a-17: bla ma'i lo drug tu 'gyur pa sangs kyi yang bgrod par 'gyur te zla skyes kyi yang bgrod pa'o //
T02TD1346E:8a-18: tshes zhes bya ba'i lo ni nyi skyes kyi ste de bzhin mun can gyi dgu rgyal po mjug rings dang //
T02TD1346E:8a-19: de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i dus kyi lo dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum /
T02TD1346E:8a-20: 65 / phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag grangs dag las kyang lo brgyar 'gyur te dus kyi 'khor los dman no 'dir //
T02TD1346E:8b-0: srog ni snying stobs la 'bab rdul gyi bar dang mun pa la @8b yang lus ngag sems kyi dbye bas so //
T02TD1346E:8b-1: lha mi lag 'gro rnams ni de nas lnga pa nyid 'gyur zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mo dag gis kyang //
T02TD1346E:8b-2: grang ni shin tu nges pa 'di dag dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags pa yin no mi yi dbang /
T02TD1346E:8b-3: 66 / ma bcad dus kyi 'khor lo'i bgrod pa dag la bu lon dgu ni bsres par gyur pa mtha' dag rnams //
T02TD1346E:8b-4: bkra shis la sogs gza' ni lnga po rnams kyis myur ba'i las dag la yang rkang pa'i chu tshod de //
T02TD1346E:8b-5: sa skyes la ni rig byed dus mer rab 'gyur srid pa'i gnas rnams dag la rgyu ba'i dbye ba yis //
T02TD1346E:8b-6: snga phyi phyed la mtshungs par bu lon nor gyi bgrod pa dag la gnas kyi dbye bas nges par sbyar /
T02TD1346E:8b-7: 67 / dang por rgyal dbang grangs kyi chu tshod dag ste me dang mig ni rnam gsum dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:8b-8: gnas gnyis dag la gcig dang mig ste bcva brgyad tshes dang drag po me dang rtsa bar drag po dang //
T02TD1346E:8b-9: sum cu rtsa brgyad brgyad cu dag dang brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la 'dir ni gsum bcas lnga bcu'o //
T02TD1346E:8b-10: de yis nyi ma rnam dag gyur la bu lon dag dang nor yang rim pa min dang rim pas so /
T02TD1346E:8b-11: 68 / rig byed dag dang bug pa zla ba'i grangs ni gza' lag myur ba'i las la chu tshod dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:8b-12: gnas gnyis la ni bcu drug gzhan la tshes dang ma nu myos byed drag po ri dang dbang po mkha' //
T02TD1346E:8b-13: rtsa ba dag las rig byed drag po dang ni rab gsal nges par bcu gnyis pa la nyi shu ste //
T02TD1346E:8b-14: nyi shu brgyad dang sum cu rtsa bzhi dag kyang ma nu'i gnas la rgyu ba'i dbye bas yang dag gnas /
T02TD1346E:8b-15: 69 / chu gter nam mkha' dag dang zla ba'i grangs te 'di dag rnams ni bla ma'i chu tshod tshogs su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:8b-16: gnas gnyis dag la phyogs kyi tshad dang dgu nor dus drug lag pa zla ba dag dang rtsa bar ni //
T02TD1346E:8b-17: me drug bug pa dang ni drag po mi bdag thub pa rnams te rgyu ba thams cad rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:8b-18: myur dal 'khyog po la yang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i dbye ba dag gis rgyu bar byed /
T02TD1346E:9a-0: 70 / drug dang zla ba chu gter grangs kyi chu tshod dag ni @9a * //
T02TD1346E:9a-1: pa sangs kyi yang myur ba'i las la 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:9a-2: gnas gsum dag la nyi shu lnga ste gnyis ni rgyal ba zhes dang de bzhin lag mig rnam pa gnyis //
T02TD1346E:9a-3: skyon dang tshes dang brgyad de rtsa bar drug dang nam mkha' yon tan dag dang gcig gis dman pa'i brgya /
T02TD1346E:9a-4: mthar ni me dang ri yi grangs te brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la pa sangs rgyu ba rim pas so /
T02TD1346E:9a-5: 71 / nyi ma'i bu la drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs kyi chu tshod tshogs pa 'di dag tu 'gyur mi yi dbang //
T02TD1346E:9a-6: drug dang 'byung ba dag dang 'byung ba rig byed chu gter mid dang zung dang stong pa rtsa bar ni //
T02TD1346E:9a-7: phyogs dang rig byed dag dang 'byung bar ro dang nor dang rtse mo can ni rim pas gzhag par bya //
T02TD1346E:9a-8: de ltar gza' rnams kyi ni rgyu ba mtha' dag dus kyi 'khor lo dag las shin tu nges par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:9a-9: 72 / sum cu rtsa drug phyed bcas zla ba nges par nor gyis bsgyur ba dag ni bkra shis la sogs pa //
T02TD1346E:9a-10: gza' rnams dag gi dal ba'i las la rkang par 'gyur te mig bug mig gi grangs kyi chu tshod do //
T02TD1346E:9a-11: de nyid bcva brgyad ri dag brtan pa sa yi bu yi phyi ma dang ni snga ma'i cha la ste //
T02TD1346E:9a-12: phyogs ri me ni gza' lhag gi 'o dbang phyug dgu me bla ma'i snga cha dag dang gzhan la yang /
T02TD1346E:9a-13: 73 / dkar po'i mda' dang chu gter zla ba spen pa yi yang mig bcas mig dang nyin zhag dus su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:9a-14: zla ba la ni sa skyes longs spyod chu tshod dgu bcu dag ste lnga dang 'jig rten zla ba'i grangs //
T02TD1346E:9a-15: pa sangs kyi ste de bzhin gza' lag gi yang gcig tu bsdus pa mkha' ro bsreg za dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:9a-16: 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo yi nyin zhag bu lon chu tshod longs spyod 'di ni gsum gyi'o /
T02TD1346E:9a-17: 74 / zla bar bla ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur rab gsal chu tshod drag po'i grangs ni rkang pa dang bcas te //
T02TD1346E:9a-18: chu srang sum cu rnams dang gsal bar dus kyi chu tshod dag ni nyi ma'i bu yi longs spyod do //
T02TD1346E:9a-19: gcig tu gyur pa nyin zhag ces bya gsum gyis bsgyur ba de yang zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mor bcas //
T02TD1346E:9b-0: gtso bo'i longs spyod la ni nyin zhag rnams kyi nyin bzhin bu lon gza' @9b drug gi yang longs spyod do /
T02TD1346E:9b-1: 75 / zla gcig lhag pa gang zhig dal ba'i las la khyab bdag rjes su gza' rnams kyis ni longs ma spyod //
T02TD1346E:9b-2: de las rab tu gsal bar phyed bcas bdun gyi chu tshod dag ni zla ba 'di nyid la spyod de //
T02TD1346E:9b-3: sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bcas zla ba'i rkang pa chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dman //
T02TD1346E:9b-4: nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum zla ba myos byed nyin zhag dag la zla ba'i chu tshod lnga /
T02TD1346E:9b-5: 76 / gang zhig ma spyad phyed kyi chu tshod de ni dus kyi nyin zhag dus la cha dman zla ba ste //
T02TD1346E:9b-6: de ni nyi ma'i lhag par 'gyur te nges par dus kyis bsgyur ba nyi ma'i zla bar nyin zhag de'o //
T02TD1346E:9b-7: sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod mig gis rnam par bsgyur te phyogs kyi longs spyod dag gis bgos pa las //
T02TD1346E:9b-8: thob pa dag ni mjug rings chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod las /
T02TD1346E:9b-9: 77 / chu srang bdun dang phyed phrogs nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1346E:9b-10: mjug rings nyi ma dag dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu ste myur 'khyog dag la mdun dang rgyab nas so //
T02TD1346E:9b-11: rgyu bar chu srang phyed bcas gnyis spyod nyin dang nyin la nyi ma'i longs spyod dag las rim pa ste //
T02TD1346E:9b-12: rang gi zla ba sum cu drug gis de rgyun [?] chu tshod dag kyang 'jig rten gyis ni tshes grangs bsgyur /
T02TD1346E:9b-13: 78 / phyed bcas zla bar chu tshad gnyis ni nyin zhags so sor 'char te myur 'khyog dag la mdun rgyab tu'o //
T02TD1346E:9b-14: phyed bcas zla ba'i bar dag tu ni de yi 'char ba mi yi 'jig rten dag tu mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:9b-15: slar yang dpal dus 'khor lor rab 'jug de ni gang tshe lo yi longs spyod dag la mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:9b-16: de yi 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas dus kyang shes par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:9b-17: 79 / lo yi nyin zhag lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang mdas bsnun bgrod pa'i nyin zhag dag gis rab tu dman //
T02TD1346E:9b-18: bug pa bsres pa rnams ni rang gi bgrod pa'i yon tan dbang gis gza' rnams dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:10a-0: sa skyes la ni ri klu drug gi nyin zhag tshogs su 'gyur te ri bug @10a * //
T02TD1346E:10a-2: lha yi zla ma dag la so me rig byed du 'gyur pa sangs la ni ri dang rgyal ba mig 80 / nyi ma'i bu la drug ri dang nam mkha' gcig gi nyin zhag tshogs ni dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:10a-3: sa skyes la ni ri dus gcig kyang nges par nor du 'gyur te zla ba'i bu la brgyas bsnun pa //
T02TD1346E:10a-4: me dang nyi ma ri yis dman zhing pa sangs dag la nyin zhag bcus bsgyur chu gter brgyad kyis dman //
T02TD1346E:10a-5: stong mkha' dus mig dag dang mkha' lag gdengs can dus rnams blon po nyi skyes dag la bu lon 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:10a-7: 81 / sa skyes la ni phyed bcas dgu ste lag la phyed lhag mi bdag rgyu skar nyi ma bla ma la'o //
T02TD1346E:10a-8: pa sangs la drug nyi skyes la skyon bu lon du 'gyur mtha' dag longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1346E:10a-9: phyi nas de dag rnams ni dag par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po skye ba'i rgyu skar rgyu ba las //
T02TD1346E:10a-10: dma' ba rang gi yan lag dag las dag 'gyur bgrod pa'i dbang gis mthon po nyi ma'i dbus gnas so /
T02TD1346E:10a-11: 82 / zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod bsgyur ba las kyang dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo yi zla ba yis //
T02TD1346E:10a-12: cha thob dag kyang bu lon du 'gyur nyi ma ri bong can gyi rjes su ma spyad chu tshod phyed ;
T02TD1346E:10a-13: / slar yang mjug rings kyi ni gang zhig lhag pa nyin zhag so so'i dus su zla ba'i nyin gyis bsgyur //
T02TD1346E:10a-14: drug cu'i cha yis chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su myur dang 'khyog por 'char ba dag la yang /
T02TD1346E:10a-15: 83 / zla skyes blon po myur [?] bdag la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te sa skyes mjug rings 'khyog po la //
T02TD1346E:10a-16: dman pa pa sangs dal ba la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rgyu ba lhag ma la stobs med //
T02TD1346E:10a-17: myur la shar du la phyogs 'gyur te slar yang 'khyog por rgyu la rab zhugs gzhan du mngon par phyogs //
T02TD1346E:10a-18: dal la lho ru bzhin phyogs 'gyur te rang bgrod yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba la yang byang du gdong /
T02TD1346E:10a-19: 84 / zla ba'i nyin zhag sum cu gang dag chu gter gyis bsgyur mkha' mig zla ba zla ba'i rkang pa ste //
T02TD1346E:10a-20: khyim ni bcu gnyis po rnams su kyis bsgyur ba brgyad dang rig byed dag kyang nyi ma'i rkang pa'o //
T02TD1346E:10b-0: de @10b yi nang du 'grib dang 'phel bdag kyang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis rim min rim pa ste //
T02TD1346E:10b-1: 'khor lo phyed phyed dag la mtha' dag nor dang dus kyi grangs rnams rig par bya'o mi yi dbang /
T02TD1346E:10b-2: 85 / tshigs mtshams su ni ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang //
T02TD1346E:10b-3: rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzin te ri bong ldan pa'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshod drug cu'o //
T02TD1346E:10b-4: phyed dag gyur na phyed 'dzin ri bong can gyi dbang gis chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste //
T02TD1346E:10b-5: gnag dang dkar ba'i tshigs mtshams dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin /
T02TD1346E:10b-6: 86 / mi rnams kyi ni lo brgya dag kyang gza' rnams dag gi lo yi longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya //
T02TD1346E:10b-7: gnas gnyis phyogs kyi chas thob de ni bu lon du 'gyur steng gi phung po dag la sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1346E:10b-8: 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyi phyed la'o /
T02TD1346E:10b-9: slar yang phung po gnyis kyis nges par bzhi po rnams kyi lo yi grangs dag tu ni rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:10b-10: 87 / stong pa stong pa nam mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams rdzogs ldan dus kyi tshad //
T02TD1346E:10b-11: gsum ldan la ni nam mkha' mkha' stong ro dang dgu dang nyin byed lo yi grangs su rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:10b-12: stong pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa gnyis ldan lor ni yang dag ste //
T02TD1346E:10b-13: stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mig yon tan chu gter rnams kyi lo yi grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:10b-14: 88 / lo ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyu ba khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas //
T02TD1346E:10b-15: slar yang tha skar la sogs dag dang rab byung zhes dang de bzhin nag pa'i zla ba la sogs dang //
T02TD1346E:10b-16: gza' dang sbyor ba tshes dang byed par rnams kyang de bzhin dang po dag ste de yi dus su ni //
T02TD1346E:10b-17: lha rnams dag dang lha min rnams kyi 'khrug pa drag po sa gzhi'i gnas rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:10b-18: 89 / sde pa drug ni nyi ma'i dbyangs bcas nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur lo gsum nyi ma dag la ste //
T02TD1346E:11a-1: nyin zhag ces bya sum 'gyur ri bong can cha phyed bcas zla ba zla ba la //
T02TD1346E:11a-2: chu tshod ha sogs dbyangs bcas sum 'gyur gang yin de dag rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni mtshan mo gsum //
T02TD1346E:11a-3: dpal ldan stong pa gzhom med la sogs sum 'gyur gang de rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni dus sbyor gsum /
T02TD1346E:11a-4: 90 /'byung ba nyi ma zla ba'i grangs ni mi yi bdag po phyed bcas zla ba dag dang lo gsum mo //
T02TD1346E:11a-5: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor nas thub mchog rnams kyis bcad pa dag ni dus kyi 'khor lor 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:11a-6: zla bar bsre ba gza' gcig dang ni mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod tshogs la gnyis dang rkang pa mda' //
T02TD1346E:11a-7: 'khor lo dag las nges par lha mo drug cu rnams kyis rnam par phye [?] bdag ni gzar 'gyur ro /
T02TD1346E:11a-8: 91 / sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang chu tshod thub pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i lha mo rnams las tshogs la gnyis //
T02TD1346E:11a-9: sbyin dor sbyin pa dag dang ri bong can gyi rkang pa dang po lnga ste 'dir ni drug gis so //
T02TD1346E:11a-10: zla ba'i phyogs gsum nyin zhag rnams ni sum 'gyur dag kyang nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:11a-11: drug cus phye ba'i skar ma gnyis dang nyi ma'i nyin zhag dang por spyod ldan dbang phyug chu tshod do /
T02TD1346E:11a-12: 92 / dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa 'di dag phyi dang lus la dbyer med par //
T02TD1346E:11a-13: bsdu ba dang ni spro ba'i slad du srid pa gsum gyi gnas su nyi ma dus kyi gzugs dang ni //
T02TD1346E:11a-14: shes rab thabs kyi rab dbye dang ni mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba ste //
T02TD1346E:11a-15: chags bral dang ni thub mchog rigs dang tshangs dang drag po la sogs lha rnams kyis ni shes ma yin /
T02TD1346E:11a-16: 93 / aa sogs lnga yis dbyangs gang dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis dga' ba la sogs lnga dang ldan gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:11a-17: de dag 'dir ni 'char byed mi bdag gal te de las skyes la sogs gza' dag ma gyur na'o //
T02TD1346E:11a-18: sa skyes mi shis shar bar gyur cing gal te slar yang smin drug dag dang ldan pa nyid gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:11a-19: de la gal te g-yul dang nad du gyur na mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur te dang po'i dbyangs kyi'o /
T02TD1346E:11b-0: 94 @11b bzang po zla skyes dag gi gza' 'di la ni gal te mchu nyid ldan na gnyis pa 'chi bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:11b-1: rgyal ba bla ma dag la gal te skag tu gyur na gsum [?] pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1346E:11b-2: stong pa'i tshes dang pa sangs dag la gal te mon grur gyur na bzhi pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:11b-3: rdzogs pa spen pa dag dang lhan cig tu ni bra nye gyur na lnga pa 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:11b-4: 95 / nyi ma dag la dga' ba 'char ba rnams kyis rmar yang 'gyur te gzir ba rnams ni nyon mongs nyid //
T02TD1346E:11b-5: zla ba la ni bzang po 'char ba rnams kyis nges par g-yul dang nad [?] dag la yang de bzhin 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:11b-6: bden par 'char ba lnga po rnams kyi 'bras bu mang por 'chi ba'i sbyor bas dman pa dag la 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:11b-7: nad dang g-yul dang yul du bgrod dang bag ma dag la dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu shes par bya /
T02TD1346E:11b-8: 96 / de ltar rgyu skar gza' ste dbyangs tshogs tshes rnams dag ni de nyid lnga yi rab tu dbye ba yis //
T02TD1346E:11b-9: phyogs dang zla ba bgrod pa dag dang lo dang drug cu'i lo rnams la yang 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:11b-10: nag pa sogs la 'dir ni yan lag bcu gnyis dag gis 'char 'gyur phyogs kyi dbye ba de nyid do //
T02TD1346E:11b-11: nyin zhag dbyangs rnams bdun cu rtsa gnyis dag gis 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te zla ba'i dbye ba la'o //
T02TD1346E:11b-12: 97 / zla ba drug gis bgrod pa'i yan lag dag ste rab byung la sogs bcu gnyis lo rnams dag gis lo //
T02TD1346E:11b-13: de ltar dbyangs ni lnga po rnams dag 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te de ni phyi nas nub pa'o //
T02TD1346E:11b-14: dang po la ni dbyangs rnams byis pa rang tshes yon tan dbang gis dpal ldan gzhon nu gnyis pa la //
T02TD1346E:11b-15: dar bab rgan po rim pas me dang chu gter nyin zhag la ste lnga pa la ni nub par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:11b-16: 98 / aa sogs dbyangs lnga gang dag nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur de dag rnams ni rnams gnyis sum cu nyid //
T02TD1346E:11b-17: ka sogs sde [?] pa'i yi ge rnams la rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis mtha' dag sbyar bar bya ba ste //
T02TD1346E:11b-18: thung ngu rnams ni 'dir yang dkar po'i phyogs la 'char bar 'gyur te de nyid lnga yi dbye bas so //
T02TD1346E:12a-0: @12a * // ring po rnams ni nag po'i phyogs la shin tu nges par 'gyur te spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so /
T02TD1346E:12a-1: 99 / nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar de la gsal bar mda' yi chu tshod nyi ma'i dus sbyor cha dgu pa //
T02TD1346E:12a-2: lug gi dus sbyor la sogs 'di dag rnams kyang 'dir ni rang bzhin gsum ste brtan g-yo shin tu mnyam //
T02TD1346E:12a-3: lug dang ka rka ta srang chu srin 'dir ni g-yo ba dag ste de las gnyis pa brtan pa'o //
T02TD1346E:12a-4: lhag ma gzhan ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin de dag nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su rtag pa nyid du 'char /
T02TD1346E:12a-5: 100 / de la yud tsam sum cu rnams dang nyin zhag dus la chu tshod dag kyang drug cu kho na ste //
T02TD1346E:12a-6: dang por sum cu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur ba nyid de yud tsam yud tsam dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:12a-7: sde pa'i yi ge sum cu chu tshod rnams la rab tu 'gyur te thung dang ring po rab dbye bas //
T02TD1346E:12a-8: zla ba'i dbus su tshes kyi cha la 'char bar brjod de de dag nub pa dag kyang de nyid la'o /
T02TD1346E:12a-9: 101 / stong pa rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag kyang aa la sogs par dbyangs ni lnga po rnams kyi rigs //
T02TD1346E:12a-10: sgra gcan me dang zla nyi zla skyes mig dmar pa sangs bla ma mjug rings spen pa 'dir lhag lha //
T02TD1346E:12a-11: sngar brjod dus sbyor re re de la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis chu tshod rnams ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:12a-12: de yi dbus su dbyangs gang byung ba'i gza' zhes bya ba stobs ldan de yis dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:12a-13: 102 / g-yon pa dag nas thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te g-yas pa nas kyang gzhan dag go //
T02TD1346E:12a-14: g-yon la stong pa la sogs de nyid dag dang gza' tshogs rgyu ba sgra gcan la sogs mtha' dag ste //
T02TD1346E:12a-15: g-yas la de nyid 'dzin ma sogs dang gza' yi [?] tshogs ni [?] nges par nyi ma'i bu la sogs pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:12a-16: phyi rol tu yangs dus kyi chu tshod gza' yi gnas dang mnyam pa dbyangs bcas dag ni bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:12a-17: 103 / dris na g-yul gyi slad du 'chi bar 'gyur te stong pa la ni dus dag shar bar gyur pa na'o //
T02TD1346E:12a-18: rlung du nyi ma dag la 'pham zhing me la sa skyes shar ba dag la rma ru 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1346E:12b-0: chu dang bla ma la ni 'dum @12b par 'gyur te sa la spen pa shar la 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:12b-1: 'chi dang nyon mongs rmar 'gyur [?] bde ba dag dang mnyam pa nyid ni 'dri byed nad pa rnams kyi'o /
T02TD1346E:12b-2: 104 / g-yul du dgra ni nges par rab tu nyams par 'gyur te sgra gcan stong pa dag la shar na yang //
T02TD1346E:12b-3: rlung dang zla ba dag la 'pham dang g-yul du rma yang zla skyes me la shar ba dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:12b-4: chu la pa sangs la ni don rnyed sa la mjug rings shar ba dag la dgra yang dbang du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:12b-5: de bzhin bgrod pa bag ma dag la g-yon gyi lam la gza' rnams kyis ni dge ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ;
T02TD1346E:12b-6: 105 / pho nyas brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams gang dag nges par bcu yis bsgyur te khyim gyi 'khor lo dag gis bsre //
T02TD1346E:12b-7: slar yang de dag 'byung bas bsnun te nye ba'i skye bo dang ldan bdun gyi cha yi lhag ma ni //
T02TD1346E:12b-8: zla me mda' dang ri bo mi mnyam gnas su gyur na mi rnams la ni rnyed pa yod ma yin //
T02TD1346E:12b-9: mig dang rig byed ro ste shin tu mnyam pa'i gnas su gyur na bya ba dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:12b-10: 106 / lo dang zla ba phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan mo 'dus ni dus sbyor dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste //
T02TD1346E:12b-11: dus sbyor gcig ni lnga yi dbye bas gza' tshogs dang ldan dbyangs dang bcas pa'i de nyid tha dad do //
T02TD1346E:12b-12: de nyid gcig ni dbugs rnams drug cu mngon lhag yon tan brgya yi dus kyi chu tshod dag la gnas //
T02TD1346E:12b-13: chu tshod cha shas chu srang drug cu de yi cha shas shes pa dbugs drug rnams so mi yi dbang /
T02TD1346E:12b-14: 107 / dbugs 'byung 'jug pa'i dbus su mi dge dge ba'i 'bras bu dag kyang rnal 'byor ldan pas shes par byed //
T02TD1346E:12b-15: lha shes rnams kyis nyin zhag 'das pa'i dbang gis nyi ma zla ba bsgrubs nas dus kyi chu tshod do //
T02TD1346E:12b-16: da ltar byung ba shes pa min par dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'jig rten 'dir ni gang brjod pa //
T02TD1346E:12b-17: de ni long ba yis kyang long ba bzung nas glang chen seng ges gtams pa'i thib por rab tu 'jug 108 / phra mo'i rnal 'byor mi shes pa la gza' yi stobs dang bcas pa'i dus sbyor sbyor ba sbyin pa ni //
T02TD1346E:13a-0: skye dang bdun par gnas pa'i khyim @13a * //
T02TD1346E:13a-1: la dus me nyi ma sa skyes nyin mor byed pa'i bu rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:13a-2: de la 'chi dang nad dang rma dang nges par mtha' dag nor ni rnam par nyams pa dag kyang byed //
T02TD1346E:13a-3: de phyir spang bar bya ste nges par bdag gi tshig gis dus sbyor gzhan ni rab tu sbyin par bya /
T02TD1346E:13a-4: 109 / skyes dang bdun par gnas pa'i khyim la sgra gcan zla ba zla skyes bla ma pa sangs dang bcas pas //
T02TD1346E:13a-5: dgra nyams rang nyid rgyas shing g-yul du rnam par rgyal te dga' ma dang bcas nor dag thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:13a-6: yang dag dus sbyor thams cad kyis te slar yang gal te rang lus g-yon gyi rtsa las gyur pa na //
T02TD1346E:13a-7: des par don ni thams cad 'grub ste mtha' dag sa yi steng du dag pa'i gza' dang tshes la'o /
T02TD1346E:13a-8: 110 / rgyu skar rnams ni dgu dang dgu dang dgu yis cha gsum byas te skyes pa'i rgyu skar dang po las //
T02TD1346E:13a-9: gdug pa rnams ni zla ba dag dang lhan cig mi mnyam gnas gyur nad pa rnams ni 'chi ba nyid //
T02TD1346E:13a-10: tha skar la sogs rnams kyis rtsa gsum sbrul yang spras par gyur pa nam gru nyid kyi bar du ste //
T02TD1346E:13a-11: sdig zla skyes pa'i rgyu skar gal te rtsa gcig dag la gyur na mi rnams dag ni rnam par nyams /
T02TD1346E:13a-12: 111 / drug dang tshes dang brgyad dang ri zla bcu dang bcu dgu nyi ma nyi shu gcig gi lo bzang rnams //
T02TD1346E:13a-13: nyi zla mig dmar gza' lhag nyi skyes bla ma lag 'gro dkar po rnams kyis de dag rim pas spyod //
T02TD1346E:13a-14: de dang nang gi gnas skabs la yang de las sde ba brgyad po rnams kyis yi ge dag la ni //
T02TD1346E:13a-15: drag po rnams kyis zhi ba min pa byed cing mchog tu bde byed zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' gang dag 112 / rgyal gyi zla bar nyi ma chu srin la son ma rig pa ste bum par nyi ma mchu la yang //
T02TD1346E:13a-16: 'du byed du 'gyur mi yi bdag po nya ru nyi ma dbo ngag la ni rnam par shes pa ste //
T02TD1346E:13a-17: lug tu nyi ma nag pa la ni ming dang gzugs so glang 'khrig la son sa ga snron dag la //
T02TD1346E:13a-18: mis sogs dang ni reg pa dag ste nyi ma ka rka tar ra gnas chu zla la ni tshor bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:13a-19: 113 / seng ge nyi ma gro bzhin la yang sred pa bu mo dang ni srang du son pa khrums dang ni //
T02TD1346E:13b-0: tha skar zla ba dag la @13b len pa nyid dang srid par 'gyur te smin drug sdig par nyi ma la //
T02TD1346E:13b-1: skye ba dang ni gzhu la nyi ma gnas pa mgo dag la yang de bzhin rga shi rim pa ste //
T02TD1346E:13b-2: de ltar nyi zla'i dbye ba dag las gnyis ka bgrod pa'i dbang gi rgyal po yan lag bcu gnyis so //
T02TD1346E:13b-3: 114 / rgyal dang mchu yi mtshams su chu srin dag la nyi ma gnas pa'i gza' de la ni ma rig pa //
T02TD1346E:13b-4: de nas gnyis pa la ni shi bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin skye ba gsum pa la'o //
T02TD1346E:13b-5: de bzhin srid pa la sogs thams cad yan lag bcu gnyis bar du rim pa dag gis yongs su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:13b-6: de nas me dang chu gter [?] mnga' ste chu srin bgrod pa'i dbang gis res 'ga' yan lag drug pa'o /
T02TD1346E:13b-7: 115 / tshes zhes bya ba'i gza' yis phyogs te nyi ma rgyu ba'i dbang gis res 'ga' yan lag bcu drug gis //
T02TD1346E:13b-8: 'du byed mchu yi mtshams dag tu ste bum par nyi ma son pa de la 'du byed kho na'o //
T02TD1346E:13b-9: de nas gnyis pa la ni rnam par shes par 'gyur te nyin zhag gsum pa la ni ming dang gzugs //
T02TD1346E:13b-10: de ltar zla ba gnyis la yan lag tu 'gyur nyi ma'i dbang gis spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so /
T02TD1346E:13b-11: 116 / de la ma rig la sogs yan lag mi mnyam pa yang bya ba kun la dge bar 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:13b-12: gang zhig 'du byed la sogs mnyam pa dag kyang rtag tu dbang bgrod bag ma dag la dge ba min //
T02TD1346E:13b-13: de bzhin phyogs kyi dbye ba dag la ri bong can gyis bgrod pa'i dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis gang //
T02TD1346E:13b-14: dkar dang nag po'i phyogs la dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis [?] spyo dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba dag gis so /
T02TD1346E:13b-15: 117 / nyi ma mig dmar mjug rings spen pa g-yas sam rgyab tu yang dag gnas pas dgra ni 'chi bar byed //
T02TD1346E:13b-16: g-yon dang mdun du zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' tshogs mtha' dag g-yul gyi sar ni de bzhin kho na'o //
T02TD1346E:13b-17: rnal 'byor ma dang bi shti drag po rlung dang bcas pa g-yas dang rgyab tu bde ba sbyin pa ste //
T02TD1346E:13b-18: g-yon dang mdun du 'chi ba'i rang bzhin mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pas gnyis ka'i dpung ni 'joms par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:14a-0: 118 / tshangs ma drag mo gzhon nu ma dang mkha' 'gro'i bdag gis @14a * //
T02TD1346E:14a-1: 'gro ma phag mo rdo rje lag ma dang //
T02TD1346E:14a-2: ts'a mu nd'a nyid dpal mo dag ni nor gyi tshes la 'gyur te dang po'i tshes dang dgu pa la //
T02TD1346E:14a-3: brgya byin du ste gnod sbyin me zur lha min gshin rje chu lha rlung dang dbang ldan sa la'o //
T02TD1346E:14a-4: 'di ni 'char ba dag tu byed de slar yang tshes rnams la ni brgyad gnyis dbye bas tha dad do /
T02TD1346E:14a-5: 119 / bi shti rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs la brgya byin gshin rje chu dang gnod sbyin du yang 'dir 'char 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:14a-6: slar yang nag po'i phyogs la rtse mo can dang lha min rlung dang dbang ldan zur du rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:14a-7: drag po shar nas gzhan phyed du 'gro nyin zhag dbang gis byang du yang ste byang gi nyi ma la'o //
T02TD1346E:14a-8: chu nas me ldan dag tu de ni nges par 'gro ste lho ru lho yi nyi ma dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:14a-9: 120 / shar nas thun phyed dag la rlung du rab tu 'jug ste de bzhin du ni lho ru 'gro bar byed //
T02TD1346E:14a-10: dbang ldan chu dang me dang gnod sbyin lha min grong khyer du 'gro rlung du nyi ma nub par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:14a-11: dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan dor nas rlung dag las kyang rnam par rgyal 'gyur 'gran pa'i 'thab mo dang //
T02TD1346E:14a-12: 'khrug pa dag la rtsa ba'i sgra gcan gyis ni dgra yi stobs 'joms de dang mtshungs pa gzhan yod min /
T02TD1346E:14a-14: 121 / dbyangs dman 'thab mo pa ni mnyam dang mi mnyam g-yul la lhag pa dag gis 'joms par byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:14a-15: dbugs la gnyis kyi ming gang snying la rab tu 'jug na de ni 'khrug pa dag las rgyal bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:14a-16: pho nyas brjod pa dang po'i ming de rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te phyis kyi ming ni 'pham par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:14a-17: 'du ba kha dog dbyangs la sogs pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pa rnams kyi 'bras med ston pa nyid /
T02TD1346E:14a-18: 122 / dus ni 'thab mo'i sa la mi bdag rnams kyi g-yas dang gal te g-yas min dag la mun can gyur //
T02TD1346E:14a-19: g-yul du lha yi mgon po dag ni 'phrog byed drag po dang bcas mi rnams kyis kyang 'joms par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:14a-20: de phyir dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan 'khyog po drag po lha min rnams las srid gsum rnam rgyal ba //
T02TD1346E:14a-21: g-yul gyi dus su sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shes par bya ste gzhan du dgra ni nyams pa med /
T02TD1346E:14b-0: 123 / sa la @14b rgyu skar byas nas thub pa dus kyis bsgyur ba dbang po gnod sbyin chu dang gshin rjer ni //
T02TD1346E:14b-1: de yi 'khor lo 'khor bar byed de nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis mtha' dag rnams ni rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:14b-2: rgyu skar gang la dus dang mun can du yang rab gyur lta ba lhung na gnyis po dag la yang /
T02TD1346E:14b-3: g-yul du sgra yi sde rnams dag ni 'phral la nges par lhung ste lto yi dbus su rgyal bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:14b-4: 124 / sgra gcan dus la gnas pa rnams ni 'chi dang bcas par 'gyur zhing dpung rnams mnyam du ltung ba ni //
T02TD1346E:14b-5: lta ba'i cha la nges song rnams te brang 'gro 'gro ba'i dbang gis der ni sde rnams bcom par gyur //
T02TD1346E:14b-6: lta ba'i cha ni spangs pa rnams dag rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te lto bar zhugs la gnyis po yang //
T02TD1346E:14b-7: de ltar dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya /
T02TD1346E:14b-8: 125 / rnal 'byor ma dang bi shti drag po gza' tshogs dang bcas dbyangs ni 'char ba dag dang bcas gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:14b-9: de dag thams cad btang nas rgyal rigs rnams kyis srid gsum rnam rgyal gcig pu gzung bar bya ba ste //
T02TD1346E:14b-10: gang gis zla ba nyi ma za zhing skabs gsum pa dag 'jigs byed drag po'i gzugs can mig sman mdog /
T02TD1346E:14b-11: sa la gang zhig nyin dang mtshan mor shar dang nub dang lho dang byang du yang ni 'khor ba'o /
T02TD1346E:14b-12: 126 / g-yul du 'pham pa'i dgra bo dag ni gal te 'phral la rdzong gi nang du zhugs par gyur pa na //
T02TD1346E:14b-13: phyi rol du ni 'khrul 'khor bya ste rgyun chad med par rdo dang me mda' rab tu 'bab pa dang /
T02TD1346E:14b-14: ral gri la sogs gcod pa'i 'khrul 'khor dag dang sa gzhi'i gnas la gur dang cog ni dbye ba yis //
T02TD1346E:14b-15: de yi rdzong ni phye mar byas te nyin zhag nyung zad dag gis gdug pa de ni bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:14b-16: 127 / ka ba bzhi ni brgyad gnyis khru ldan mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas nas gnas brgyad du ni phug gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:14b-17: tha dad rnams ni sdong bu chu gter dus dang dus rnams kyis te rgyab tu yang ni gcig gis so //
T02TD1346E:14b-18: rtsa bar 'khrul 'khor tshad ni lag pa bcu ru 'gyur te steng gi cha dag la ni de yi phyed //
T02TD1346E:15a-0: sgyogs mda' khru gnyis dag gis dman par 'gyur te ao log bcu @15a * //
T02TD1346E:15a-1: yi steng gi cha ni lhag pa'o /
T02TD1346E:15a-2: 128 / zlum por phyed bcas khru gnyis dag ste sor mo thub pa ma nur nges pa'i bug pa gcig tu ni //
T02TD1346E:15a-3: khru gang dor nas sgyogs mda' rab tu gzhug ste ao log bcu yi rgyab kyi cha la gzer gyis gdab //
T02TD1346E:15a-4: mgo bor aa long dag la theg pa lnga bcu gdags par bya ste steng gi tshad ni zlum po phyed //
T02TD1346E:15a-5: sgyogs mda'i mthar ni mdzub mo dang bcas rab tu 'jug ste gnya' non zlum po dag ni mtho gang ngo /
T02TD1346E:15a-6: 129 / sgyogs mda'i mdzub mo la ni 'ur mthil thag par bcas pa dag las nges par khru gsum dag tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:15a-7: de yi nang du rdo ba rab tu bcug ste stobs ldan 'then byed rnams kyis 'then par gyur pa dag / btang ba myur du nam mkhar 'gro ste 'phral la nges par ltung zhing khang steng sogs dang lam srang du //
T02TD1346E:15a-8: mtha' dag phye mar byas nas sa yi 'og tu 'gro ste rdo rje 'bab pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin /
T02TD1346E:15a-9: 130 / de yi mdzub mo zla ba phyed pa sa gzhi'i gnas su tshangs pa'i ri mo ngos gnyis dag tu ni //
T02TD1346E:15a-10: brgyad gnyis btang ba'i gnas rnams dag ste lag pa gnyis ka'i khu tshur bcings pa las ni gtang bar bya //
T02TD1346E:15a-11: gtong ba sa la reg pa nyid de mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa 'khrul 'khor nang du gnas pas ni //
T02TD1346E:15a-12: rang 'dod rdo ba ltung ste rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis rdzong [?] ni rnam par gzhom pa'i don du'o /
T02TD1346E:15a-13: 131 / gang zhig bsnun pas glang chen 'phral la nges par ltung ba de la srog chags phra mo dag ni ci //
T02TD1346E:15a-14: rdzong gi steng khang la gnas dgra [?] dpung ma lus gang dag phyi rol gnas par ltung bar byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:15a-15: sa steng nas su rdzong gi 'thab mo la ni gzhu 'dzin rnams kyis de dang lhan cig su zhig 'gran //
T02TD1346E:15a-16: gang du 'khrul 'khor rab bsnun rdzong der dgra bo [?] su zhig zhugs pa dag ni gshin rje'i kha ru'o /
T02TD1346E:15a-17: 132 / ka ba [?] dbung pa drug drug dag gis gnyi ga'i nang ni mnyam pa khru ni zung gi bar dag la //
T02TD1346E:15a-18: snying po re re nyi ma'i khru ru 'gyur te gnyi ga nang ni mnyam pa lhag chad med pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:15a-19: so so'i re mig kun la spang leb dag dang pags pa spra tshil gos rnams kyis kyang g-yogs pa ste //
T02TD1346E:15b-0: snying po dus dang brgyad dang skyon @15b dang sum 'gyur nyin byed kyis kyang 'khrul 'khor gcig ni rab tu bya /
T02TD1346E:15b-1: 133 / gnyis gnyis snying po'i bar du 'khrul pa dag kyang dpung pa rnams kyis rgya yis btab pa'am kun nas so //
T02TD1346E:15b-2: rgyab tu skye ba 'dzin pa drug ste mdun nas dpung pa gnyis ka mnyam pa 'khrul 'khor 'dren pa'am //
T02TD1346E:15b-3: ka ba'i khung bur rab tu btsugs pa'i g-yo ba'i rlung gi dar rnams kyis ni rlung gis bskyod pa ste //
T02TD1346E:15b-4: de la zhon pa rang gi sde ni chu yi rdzong dag nyams pa'i don du chu yi gter la 'gro /
T02TD1346E:15b-5: 134 / chu gter zur ldan stegs bu gcig la g-yo ba'i rlung gi dar dang rgyal mtshan bcas pa ka bar gdags //
T02TD1346E:15b-6: rgyab kyi phyogs nas mi rnams dag gis drangs shing sa las thag pa dag gis steng du 'gro ba ni //
T02TD1346E:15b-7: rlung gis rab tu bskyod par gyur pa nges par brag gi rdzong gi steng du mkha' la 'gro ba ste //
T02TD1346E:15b-8: de nas me yi 'bru mar 'phangs pas dgra yi dpung dang rdzong ni thams cad kun nas sreg par byed /
T02TD1346E:15b-9: 135 /'khor lo'i rtsa bar gnam gdan rtse gcig pa ni gzhug cing steng du yang ni 'khor lo dag la ni //
T02TD1346E:15b-10: sor mo gnyis gnyis bar du rtsibs su 'gyur te zlum po'i mtha' ma ma lus par ni dgod par bya //
T02TD1346E:15b-11: 'khor lo khru ni phyed dang gsum par 'gyur zhing gnam gdan steng du gzhan yang der ni srog shing ste //
T02TD1346E:15b-12: srog shing steng du ral gri rnon po myur bar 'khor te 'khrul 'khor gyi ni rtsa ba 'khor bas so /
T02TD1346E:15b-13: 136 / thag pa yis ni rlung gi 'khrul 'khor nam mkha' dag la 'gro ste rang gi phyogs nas rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:15b-14: rdzong gi steng dang dgra yi khyim du so sor 'gro bar nges pa nyid du thag pa drangs byas nas //
T02TD1346E:15b-15: sa la tshad kyang de yis brjod par 'gyur te dgra rnams kyi ni rdzong gi rtse mo 'byed pa yis //
T02TD1346E:15b-16: rtse la bkod de dgra yi khang pa'i gzhi dang 'dun sa dag la me ni rab tu sbyin par bya /
T02TD1346E:15b-17: 137 /'khor lo rnams kyi steng gi cha la lcags dang shing rnams dag gis khang pa chen po bkod pa ni //
T02TD1346E:15b-18: spang leb dang ni ma he'i pags pa rnams kyis kun nas g-yogs par gyur pa zlum po'i rnam pa ste //
T02TD1346E:16a-0: mi rnams dag gis bskyod par gyur pa mnyam pa'i [?] sa @16a * //
T02TD1346E:16a-1: la 'obs ni ji srid nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:16a-2: 'obs de bkang nas mkhar gyi rtsig pa dang ni lam [?] srang dag tu 'phral la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:16a-3: 138 / stegs bur phur pa gnyis la nges par rgyud dang bcas pa'i gzhu ni g-yo ba med par btags byas nas //
T02TD1346E:16a-4: rgyab tu lcags kyi phur pa gnyis la legs bkod 'khrul shing la ni sor mo lta bu phyed 'khyog rnams //
T02TD1346E:16a-5: sor mo'i rtse mo dag la gzhu rgyud kyis ni mang zhing mnyam pa'i mda' 'am lcags mda' rnon po rnams //
T02TD1346E:16a-6: g-yul gyi dus su 'phangs pas go cha dang bcas glang chen lus po phug nas rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:16a-7: 139 / ka ba gnyis ni sa yi nang du brtan par btsugs pa thag pa rnams kyis dkris par gyur pa ste //
T02TD1346E:16a-8: thag pa'i dbus su ral gri'i chang gzung tshud pa zlum po dang bcas bskor ba du mas bskor gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:16a-9: de yi dbus su ral gri'i chang gzung nges par g-yo ba med par gzer gyis btab par rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:16a-10: gzer dang thag par bcas pa g-yog par bya zhing ral gri'i so yi rtse mo'i cha yang mnan bar bya /
T02TD1346E:16a-11: 140 / de yi steng du bug pa'i re kh'a can gyi spang leb las ni bskul bar 'gyur ba 'thon pa'o //
T02TD1346E:16a-12: ral gri'i steng du zla ba'i dbus kyi chal lcags las byas pa chung ngu gcig kyang gzhag par bya //
T02TD1346E:16a-13: zla ba'i steng du gang gi rkang pa gzhag pa de ni 'phral la ral gri yis kyang gcod par byed //
T02TD1346E:16a-14: mkhar gyi sgo yi mtha' rnams dang ni mi yi bdag po'i khang par 'khrul 'khor kho na mtshon cha'o /
T02TD1346E:16a-15: 141 / srog shing steng du nyi ma'i lag pas rtsa ba'i gnas su 'gyur te 'khor lo'i tshad la dgu cha'o //
T02TD1346E:16a-16: zur du ka ba 'phred gdang mnyam dang mi mnyam shing rta gnas las gnyis dang phyed kyi tshad kyis so //
T02TD1346E:16a-17: cha phyed dag la 'thab mo pa yis ste mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dren [?] byed rta'am glang po rnams //
T02TD1346E:16a-18: de nas 'khor lo'i phyed kyi [?] sa la steng du me long do shal rgyal mtshan la sogs bkod pa'o /
T02TD1346E:16a-19: 142 / gcig phyed cha gnyis dag ste zla ba lag pa rtse mo can rnams rtsa ba'i gnas dang gdan rnams kyi //
T02TD1346E:16b-0: zlum po phyed bcas gcig cha padma'i shing rta'i sa ni dga' ba'i dbye @16b [?] bdag la mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:16b-1: rten dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i tshad ni rta dang glang po'i dbang gis phyed dang bcas pa rnams gnyis kyang //
T02TD1346E:16b-2: lha rnams kyi ni padma'i rigs te lha yi bu yis bkod pa dga' ba'i rigs ni mi rnams kyi /
T02TD1346E:16b-3: 143 / brgyad dang chu gter srog shing 'khor lo rnams kyis rnams gsum 'dir ni shing rta chen po phyed dang mnyam //
T02TD1346E:16b-4: nyi ma'i shing rta mchog ni 'khor lo gcig pa mi mnyam rta yang lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms //
T02TD1346E:16b-5: g-yul du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba mi mnyam mnyam pa'i shing rta chen po rgyal rigs rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1346E:16b-6: steng dang mngon du phyogs pa 'joms te mnyam dang mi mnyam g-yul du rgyab ni 'joms pa mnyam par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:16b-7: 144 / drug lnga chu gter me yi cha rnams dag gis ka ba'i rtse mor bug pa mnyam par rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:16b-8: rtsa ba dag las steng du phyed kyi cha ni rtseg ma'i dbang gis 'gyur te lha rnams gzhal med khang //
T02TD1346E:16b-9: de bzhin sa la mi bdag rnams kyi rnam gsum rtseg ma'i dbang gis yul gyi ltad mo dga' ston la //
T02TD1346E:16b-10: khru nas khru yi bar dag gis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'khor ba dang ldan chen por rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:16b-11: 145 /'khor lo'i steng du ka ba'i rtse mo dag la rnam gsum rtseg ma'i dbang gis khyogs rnams phyogs kun du //
T02TD1346E:16b-12: brgyad gnyis brgyad dang de nas phyed de phyogs dang dus dang dus dag lag pa rten nyid sa gsum la //
T02TD1346E:16b-13: steng dang 'og tu 'khor bar byed pa lag pas gzung ba'i 'khrul shing la ni bu mo rnams kyis sten //
T02TD1346E:16b-14: nang dang phyi rol dag tu gnas pa 'og dang steng du son cing phyogs brgyad du ni 'khyog pa rnams /
T02TD1346E:16b-15: 146 / steng dang 'og tu sbubs ni 'khyog por 'gyur te kun nas sbubs kyi rnam pa dag gis 'khrul 'khor ro //
T02TD1346E:16b-16: sbubs kyi rtse mor bum pa'i gzugs la bug pa yang ni sbubs kyi bug pa dag gi tshad du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:16b-17: chu ni 'dren par byed cing drangs pa'i chu ni btang bar gyur pa dag kyang bum pa'i bu ga [?] nas //
T02TD1346E:16b-18: skyed mos tshal dang ldum ra dag gi mnyam pa'i sa la gang du drangs pa der ni 'gro bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:17a-0: 147 / rab mchog sa gzhi dag la gdug pa can rnams sgrub pa'i don dang @17a * //
T02TD1346E:17a-1: chos dang ldan pa rgyal don du //
T02TD1346E:17a-2: dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srid gsum bla mas zla ba bzang la thams cad sngon du gsungs pa gang //
T02TD1346E:17a-3: de yi nang nas cung zad tsam zhig 'dir ni de ring yul 'dir khyod la bdag gis gsal bar bstan //
T02TD1346E:17a-4: rang gnas bsrung ba'i don du 'di dag mtha' dag gyis shig zhe sdang chags pas min no nyi ma kye /
T02TD1346E:17a-5: 148 / chang dang lan tshva'i chu gter dbus su thub pa sa yi dkyil 'khor la ni las sa yang dag gnas //
T02TD1346E:17a-6: dpag tshad 'bum phrag gsum la nyi ma'i dum bu rnams su mi yi bdag po rim pas 'khor bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:17a-7: dum bu gcig la dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu lnga ste nor gyi 'dab ma dag dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1346E:17a-8: de yi dbus na kee la sha ste mchog gi gangs ri yis ni phyogs rnams kun tu bskor ba'o /
T02TD1346E:17a-9: 149 / sa la kee la sha yi dum du gangs kyi ri dang bcas pa de ni kun nas sum cha ste //
T02TD1346E:17a-10: phyi rol du ni 'dab ma re re dag kyang nyin byed yul dang gling gi yul rnams dag gis brgyan //
T02TD1346E:17a-11: g-yas kyi phyed na sham bha lar grags thub mchog gi gnas grong ni bye ba lhag par gnas pa ste //
T02TD1346E:17a-12: bye ba'i grong gis nges par bcings pa yul du 'gyur te rgyal khams grong ni 'bum phrag rnams kyis so /
T02TD1346E:17a-13: 150 / gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter dbye ba mda' ro thub pa lnga dang 'jig rten la sogs dbye ba yis //
T02TD1346E:17a-14: phye ba mi dbang 'khor lo can ni sa gzhi dag la 'khor te rnam shes ldan pas btsal bar bya //
T02TD1346E:17a-15: 'khor lo can dang phyed can dum bu can ni yul gyi mi bdag phyag rgya'i lag ni de las gzhan //
T02TD1346E:17a-16: phyi rol du ni dus kyi dbye ba nges par 'gyur te ji ltar 'jig rten mgon gyi de bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:17a-17: 151 /'od zer bdun dang ri gza' thub rnams 'dir ni de bzhin snying stobs ldan pa lha yi skye gnas te //
T02TD1346E:17a-18: nya dang rus sbal phag pa mi yi seng ge dang bcas mi'u thung dang dz'a mad [?] aag ni dang //
T02TD1346E:17a-19: r'a ma nag po de ltar brgyad ni lha min rigs la 'jigs ster rdul gyi 'byung po'i skye gnas so //
T02TD1346E:17a-20: sum cu rtsa gnyis gdan gyi mthar ni lha min dgra bo tshe lo brgya pa phyag na 'khor lor 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:17b-0: 152 / a'a dra aa no gha dang phag ldan lha min lag 'gro'i @17b rigs la mun pa can ni gzhan yang lnga //
T02TD1346E:17b-1: byi ba dbang po gos dkar can dang sbrang rtsi'i blo gros 'joms byed brgyad pa gang de mun pa can //
T02TD1346E:17b-2: gsal bar mkha'i yul gyi b'a ga da sogs grong khyer du ni bdun pa yang dag skyes pa ste //
T02TD1346E:17b-3: gang du 'jig rten lha min yan lag stobs dang ldan par gnas shing brtse ba med pa kla klo'i gzugs /
T02TD1346E:17b-4: 153 / rnga mo rta dang ba lang bsad nas khrag dang bcas pa'i sha ni cung zad btsos pa 'ba' zhig dang //
T02TD1346E:17b-5: ba lang sha dang dngul chu chu dang mar dang tsha ba mnyam pa 'bras dang lo ma bsres pa ni //
T02TD1346E:17b-6: gcig tu me la btsos pa nags kyi 'bras bu dag dang bcas pa gang du mi rnams dag gi zas //
T02TD1346E:17b-7: btung ba bya rnams dag gi sgo ngar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po de ni lha min rnams kyi gnas /
T02TD1346E:17b-8: 154 / thig le nus ma mig sman dag dang mkha' lding lha yi chu bo mi sbyin dang ni 'dod 'jo dang //
T02TD1346E:17b-9: rdzong dang glog dang rig pa bzang po 'gyur med mchog gi cha dang lha yi skad dang lus med de //
T02TD1346E:17b-10: yang dag rgyu ba'i gzugs 'di rnams kyis sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro rgyal ba yi ni ye shes sku //
T02TD1346E:17b-11: byung bar gyur dang byung dang 'byung 'gyur rig byed rtog ge la sogs bstan bcos mtha' dag rab tu smra /
T02TD1346E:17b-13: 155 / dpal ldan rgyal po nyi ma 'ga' zhig dag gis shambha la zhes rab tu grags pa'i ka l'a pa //
T02TD1346E:17b-14: phyogs bzhi dag ni ri yis bskor zhing mda' yis bsgyur ba brgya yi dpag tshad rnams kyi tshad du ni //
T02TD1346E:17b-15: lha yi dbang po rab mchog mi yi bdag por bzhag nas khyod ni rang gi gnas su 'gro bar gyis //
T02TD1346E:17b-16: dpal ldan sh'akya'i rigs la rab gsal mi yi bdag po bdun te brgyad pa dpal ldan grags pa yang /
T02TD1346E:17b-17: 156 /'di ni dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje lha yi mchog gis btud pa rdo rje'i rigs kyis rigs ldan te //
T02TD1346E:17b-18: rdo rje'i dbang bskur byin nas mtha' dag thub pa'i rigs rnams dag ni rigs gcig dag tu byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:17b-19: yang dag theg par mngon 'dzegs lha min rigs la 'jigs ster dpal ldan grags pa phyag na mdung thung can //
T02TD1346E:17b-20: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du sa la dus kyi 'khor lo rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:18a-1: dbus su gdan ni nyi shu rtsa lnga rim par yongs su bgrangs pa dag gi dus kyi mthar //
T02TD1346E:18a-2: rigs ldan rigs la lha yi dbang po lha yi mchog gis btud pa drag po'i rigs ldan 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:18a-3: dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs te bde ster zhes pa de bzhin kla klo'i rigs la mthar byed nyid //
T02TD1346E:18a-4: rdo yi rta bcibs 'khor lo can gyi phyag na mdung thung mtha' dag dgra la snun byed nyi ma'i gzi /
T02TD1346E:18a-5: 158 / rigs ldan rigs kyi dbus su lag pas bsgyur ba'i dus kyi bu dang tsha bo dag ni 'das gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:18a-6: de yi dus su nges par mkha'i yul du kla klo'i chos ni rab tu 'jug pa dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:18a-7: ji snyed kla klo'i dbang po gdug pa ji snyed lha yi mchog gis btud pa drag po'i sngags ldan yang //
T02TD1346E:18a-8: de yi dus su gnyis po dag kyang sa yi steng gi gnas su 'khrug pa drag po 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:18a-9: 159 / g-yul du kla klo dag la snun byed mtha' dag sa yi steng du rang gi dbung ni yan lag bzhi //
T02TD1346E:18a-10: dus 'dir kee la sha yi ri bo lha yis bkod pa'i grong nas 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:18a-11: drag po phung po tshogs kyi dbang po 'phrog byed dag kyang rigs ldan la ni grogs dag sbyin 'gyur te //
T02TD1346E:18a-12: rdo rta glang po'i dbang po gser gyi shing rta mi bdag phyag na mtshon ldan dpa' bo rnams kyang ngo /
T02TD1346E:18a-14: 160 / rdo yi rta ni rlung gi shugs can yon tan gyis bsgyur yon tan bye ba kha dog sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1346E:18a-15: chang gis dregs pa'i glang chen rig byed ces pa'i 'bum phrag grangs dang shing rta 'bum phrag 'byung ba dang //
T02TD1346E:18a-16: aa kshoo hi n'i drug dang mi yi dbang po cod pan bcings pa'i rigs ni ro dang dgu bcu ste //
T02TD1346E:18a-17: rigs ldan khyab 'jug 'phrog byed dag dang bcas pa sde 'di dag gis kla klo rlag par byed par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:18a-18: 161 / mchog tu tsha ba'i dpa' bo rnams kyis kla klo'i tshogs la bsnun bya glang po'i dbang pos glang po la //
T02TD1346E:18a-19: rdo yi rta yis rta rnams la ste mnyam dang mi mnyam g-yul du sa skyong rnams kyis sa skyong la //
T02TD1346E:18a-20: rta la gnas pa zla ba chen po'i bu ni ha nu m'a na [?] da rnon po'i mtshon gyis bsnun par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:18b-0: drag po kla klo'i dpa' mgon mtha' dag lha min bdag po byas @18b pa'i blo la drag po'i rigs ldan gyis /
T02TD1346E:18b-1: 162 / dpung ni thams cad dag gis g-yul du kla klo bcom nas khyab 'jug drag po dang bcas rigs ldan ni //
T02TD1346E:18b-2: kee la sha yi ri bo lha yis bkod pa'i grong khyer gang du 'khor lo can dag gnas par 'gro //
T02TD1346E:18b-3: de yi dus su 'dzin ma dag la mtha' dag skye bo'i rigs ni chos dang 'dod pa nor rnams rdzogs //
T02TD1346E:18b-4: 'bru rnams dgon par skye ba dang ni shing rnams 'bras bu brtan pos dud [?] pa de dag 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:18b-5: 163 / kla klo'i tshogs ni 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rab tu bcad nas mi yi lo ni brgya phyed na //
T02TD1346E:18b-6: rigs ldan grub par 'gyur te lha yis bkod pa'i pho brang mtho ba kee la sha yi rgyab tu'o //
T02TD1346E:18b-7: lha dang mi yi bla ma'i sras ni tshangs pa lha yi dbang po zung gi chos la 'byung ba dag / tshangs pa rgyab tu dum bu gcig la mi yi bdag por 'gyur te sa kun la ni lha yi dbang /
T02TD1346E:18b-8: 164 / rdzogs ldan mtshams su kla klo'i chos rnams mtha' dag srid pa gsum gyi bla ma dag gis bcad byas te //
T02TD1346E:18b-9: bcad nas lo ni brgyad brgya rnams su tshangs pa gzhag pa mdzad nas bde ba'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:18b-10: slar yang de nyid dbus su mi yi bdag po sras rnams dag gi rigs kyi dbye ba dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:18b-11: de rnams dbus su lha min dbang po mi bdag thub pa rnams ni phal pa gzhan rnams 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:18b-12: 165 / kla klo rnams ni gzhom pa'i slad du lha yi bdag po dbang po bcu gnyis dag dang ldan par 'gro //
T02TD1346E:18b-13: dum bu dum bu dag tu kla klo'i chos ni bcom nas 'khor lo can yang bde ba'i gnas su 'gro //
T02TD1346E:18b-14: skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla ma'i sras ni tshangs dang lha yi dbang po rgyab dang mdun du ste //
T02TD1346E:18b-15: rgyab tu tshangs pa la sogs rigs rnams rnam pa sna tshogs sa yi steng du dbye ba du mar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:18b-16: 166 / tshangs pa sogs la mi rnams lo ni brgya phrag bco brgyad dang ldan 'di dag mi rnams dag gi tshe //
T02TD1346E:18b-17: de yi phyed ni 'od srung gi'o rab mchog sa yi steng du dpal ldan mi yi seng ge'i phyed //
T02TD1346E:18b-18: drug cus dman pa de bzhin nyid du dus bzhi so so'i dus su mi thung sogs la 'phrog byed kyi //
T02TD1346E:19a-1: mthar ni ji srid brgya phrag gcig gi lo yi grangs kyi skye bo'i tshe ru rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:19a-2: 167 / de ltar dum bu thams cad du yang dus bzhi'i dus su kla klo'i chos ni rab tu 'jug pa ste //
T02TD1346E:19a-3: lo ni brgyad dang brgya phrag gcig tu nges par gnas te de nas kla klo'i chos ni nyams pa'o //
T02TD1346E:19a-4: de nas lo ni stong phrag nyi shu lag pa brgya dang bral ba sangs rgyas chos ni rab tu 'jug / rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan rtsod pa'i dus ni nus pa'i tshad kyis sa gzhi dag la nges par rgyu /
T02TD1346E:19a-5: 168 /'jig rten khams ni bskyed pa dag dang gza' yi rgyu ba mnyam pa 'khor lo can ni 'byung ba dang //
T02TD1346E:19a-6: kla klo rnams kyi chos ni nyams shing mchog gi bde ba'i gnas la rigs ldan gyis ni lam sbyin pa //
T02TD1346E:19a-7: 'di dag thams cad bdag gis khyod la don ni ji bzhin bshad do zla ba bzang po dus gsum las //
T02TD1346E:19a-8: slar yang khyod ni skye bo kun la phan pa'i don dang thar pa'i slad du bdag la ci zhig 'dri /
T02TD1346E:19a-9: 169 / dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung pa /
T02TD1346E:19a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o /
T02TD1346E:19a-13: // / mi shes sna tshogs tshad ni gang dag rgyal ba skyed mdzad khyod kyis bstan pa dag kyang bdag gis te //
T02TD1346E:19a-14: slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lo srid pa gsum po mtha' dag lus kyi dbus su ji ltar lags //
T02TD1346E:19a-15: zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas bde bar gshegs pas legs zhes bya ba byin nas rab gsungs pa ;
T02TD1346E:19a-16: / sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du mchog gi thugs rjes sna tshogs tshad rnams dag kyang lus la'o /
T02TD1346E:19a-17: 1 / sa dang chu me rlung dang rdo rje lha yi gzhu dang rlung rnams dang ni khyim gyi 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1346E:19a-18: zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan lhun po gdengs can mi dang lta yi gnas dang 'khyog po skar mar bcas //
T02TD1346E:19a-19: 'pho ba zla ba dag dang phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan mo tshes rnams mtha' dag lus kyi dbus su ni //
T02TD1346E:19a-20: rang rang yi ges shes bya rnam gsum khyab bdag bgrod pa rnal 'byor pa yis stong pa'i dbye bas so /
T02TD1346E:19b-0: 2 / lus 'di la ni khams kyi tshogs su mtha' dag ro drug zos shing @19b 'thungs pa dag las 'gyur pa ste //
T02TD1346E:19b-1: ro drug rnams kyang 'byung las te rab gsal nges par 'byung ba'i tshogs kyang rnam mkha'i khams las so //
T02TD1346E:19b-2: stong pa la ni ye shes rnam par bsres pa ro mnyam 'gyur med rtag par yang ni 'gyur pa ste //
