T02TD1346E:19b-3: de ltar 'byung ba la gnas zhi ba rnam gsum srid pa la gnas rang gi lus la rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:19b-4: 3 / sa bon padmar gnas pa dag ni 'dzin mas 'dzin te de las chu yis sdud do phyi nas ni //
T02TD1346E:19b-5: me yis smin par byed cing ro dang ro ni za bar byed de 'di yi 'phel ba rlung gis so //
T02TD1346E:19b-6: nam mkha' dag kyang 'phel ba'i go skabs sbyin byed mi yi bdag po dus las de ltar grub pa ste //
T02TD1346E:19b-7: btsa' bar gyur pa'i dus dang byis pa la sogs dus dag tu yang lha yi gnas skabs rnams byed do /
T02TD1346E:19b-8: 4 / sa bon dag gis ni gsal bar lci zhing srab [?] nyid byed chu ni de bzhin gsher ba nyid //
T02TD1346E:19b-9: mes ni smin par byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi rlung rnams dag ni 'di yi 'phel ba'o //
T02TD1346E:19b-10: 'phel ba dag la slar yang nam mkha' nyid ni go skabs sbyin byed dus las de ltar bskyed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:19b-11: sna tshogs dngos po du [?] ma dag gis lus bcas sgra dang yid dang nus pa rnams ni spro bar byed /
T02TD1346E:19b-12: 5 / gsang ba'i padmar khrag gi nang du gang tshe lhung ba'i byang chub sa bon srog dang bcas pa dag / nya dang rus sbal phag par 'gyur te mi yi seng ge mi thung r'a ma r'a ma dag dang ni //
T02TD1346E:19b-13: nag po sangs rgyas mi dbang rnam bcur 'gyur te 'di dag rnams kyang gnas skabs rnam pa bcu yin no //
T02TD1346E:19b-14: mngal du gsum ste de bzhin btsa' ba'i dus su gcig dbang byis pa'i dus dag tu yang rnam pa gnyis /
T02TD1346E:19b-15: 6 / gzhon nu lang tsho dag la gzhan du rab tu 'gyur te rgyas pa gcig dang yang dag de bzhin gcig / rgan po nyid la zhi ba gcig ste mngal skyes rnams kyi srid pa 'chi ba nyid ni tha ma'o //
T02TD1346E:19b-16: nya la nya yi rnam par 'gyur ba nyin zhag 'ga' ste rus sbal la ni rus sbal dngos po yang //
T02TD1346E:19b-17: phag pa la yang de yi skye mched nyi ma 'byung ste mi yi seng ge la ni rab tu skye /
T02TD1346E:20a-0: 7 / mi thung la ni byis pa'i dngos po r'a ma la @20a * //
T02TD1346E:20a-1: yang mi bdag nyid kyi so rnams 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:20a-2: slar yang r'a ma la ni ltung bar 'gyur te de nyid nag po la ni gsal bar sgyu dag byed //
T02TD1346E:20a-3: sangs rgyas la yang zhi ba dang ni brtul zhugs nges pa byed de rigs ldan la ni 'chi bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:20a-4: khu ba las ni rkang dang rus pa rgyus par 'gyur te rdul las pags pa khrag dang sha nyid do /
T02TD1346E:20a-5: 8 / mngal gyi nang du zla ba gcig ni khrag dang sa bon bdud rtsi'i ror gyur rab tu skye ba ste //
T02TD1346E:20a-6: phyi nas sa bon myu gu rang gi snying khar rnam pa bcu yi rtsa ni shin tu phra ba'o //
T02TD1346E:20a-7: lte ba la yang brgyad pa brgyad [?] ni gzhan te rkang lag gdong rnams la ni gyen du skyod par byed //
T02TD1346E:20a-8: zla ba gnyis po rdzogs par gyur pa dag la 'dir ni rkang lag gdong gi mtshon pa cung zad do /
T02TD1346E:20a-9: 9 / zla ba gsum pa rdzogs pa na ni lag pa rkang pa mgrin pa dag gi mgo po mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:20a-10: phra mo'i rtsa rnams zla ba bzhi pa la ni rkang lag gdong dang mgrin pa dag gi phyogs su ste //
T02TD1346E:20a-11: lnga pa la ni sha dang khrag dang rus pa mkha' ro bsreg za dag ste tshigs rnams dag kyang ngo //
T02TD1346E:20a-12: zla ba drug pa la yang sha dang khrag tu 'gyur te tshor ba bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal yang /
T02TD1346E:20a-13: 10 / smin ma skra dang sbu dang bug pa rnams kyang thub mchog la ste rtsa ni lhag mar gyur pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:20a-14: zla ba'i mjug tu nyin zhag so so'i dbang gis stong pa stong pa mig gi grangs ni skye ba ste //
T02TD1346E:20a-15: gnang dang rus pa rkang du 'gyur te ro 'dzin dang ni gci ba bshang ba brgyad pa dag la yang //
T02TD1346E:20a-16: bug pa zhes la btsa' ba'i dus su skye gnas kyis ni btsir ba dag gis sdug bsngal drag po'o /
T02TD1346E:20a-17: 11 / mngal du mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal btsa' ba'i dus dang byis pa'i dngos po la yang sdug bsngal te //
T02TD1346E:20a-18: gzhon nu dang ni lang tsho dag la bud med nor dang 'byor nyams nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen po gang //
T02TD1346E:20a-19: rgan po nyid la 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal slar yang 'gro ba drug tu 'jigs ster du 'bod la sogs te //
T02TD1346E:20a-20: sgyu mas rmongs par byas pa'i mtha' dag 'gro ba 'di ni sdug bsngal dag las sdug bsngal 'dzin par byed /
T02TD1346E:20b-0: 12 /'khor bar mi @20b nyid du ni 'gyur ba dag kyang 'ga' zhig tu ste chos kyi blo ni res 'ga' na //
T02TD1346E:20b-1: de bas sangs rgyas la ni rjes chags dge ba'i dbang gis 'gyur zhing dang po'i theg par rab tu 'jug / de bas dpal ldan rdo rje theg pa sgom pa la ni blo gros ma lus brgya lam dag ni 'jug / de las sangs rgyas nyid 'dod mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la 'jug pa ae ma shin tu dka'/
T02TD1346E:20b-2: 13 / mngal du yang dag dag pa'i sku ste btsa' ba'i dus nas so ni skyes pa dag kyang chos kyi'o //
T02TD1346E:20b-3: so rnams rab tu lhung bar 'gyur ba mi yi bdag po rgyal ba yi ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:20b-4: de nas sprul pa'i sku ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par 'chi ba'i mtshams te mi rnams dag gi'o //
T02TD1346E:20b-5: mngal dang phyi rol dag tu slar yang 'di ni ye shes rnam shes dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:20b-6: 14 / rnam shes zla ba nyi ma dag kyang padmar gnas pa de ni mngal du dag pa'i sku yin te //
T02TD1346E:20b-7: khams dang phung po rab tu 'byung ba rnam pa bcu po gang yin rgyal ba yi ni chos kyi sku //
T02TD1346E:20b-8: de nas yon tan dbang gis rna ba sgra sogs skyes pa dag ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:20b-9: de nas skra la sogs pa skyes te rab tu btsa' ba'i dus kyang 'dir ni sprul pa dag gi sku /
T02TD1346E:20b-11: 15 / skyes pa na ni nges par dbugs dag gang zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de nyid dag pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:20b-12: de nas so ni rab 'byung gang zhig tshig ni gsal min dag kyang de bzhin nyid du chos kyi sku //
T02TD1346E:20b-13: de nas gnyis skyes rnams ni ltung bar 'gyur ba mi yi bdag po rgyal ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:20b-14: so rnams dag las 'chi ba'i mtshams ni phyi ru rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:20b-15: 16 / mngal du 'dir ni dang po dpal ldan sku yi rdo rjer 'gyur te gsung gi rang bzhin skyes pa na'o //
T02TD1346E:20b-16: thugs ni so dag rab tu skyes pa nyid na'o slar yang ltung nas ye shes rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:20b-17: ye shes rnam shes bsres shing nyi ma ri bong can dang bcas pa ye shes rdo rje la sogs kun //
T02TD1346E:20b-18: mngal na gnas pa dag ni sku yi rdo rje la sogs rim pa yis kyang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:21a-0: 17 / sa yi snying po dag ni bsreg zar 'gyur te @21a * //
T02TD1346E:21a-1: 'dzin ma dang ni rlung dag stong pa'i snying po'o //
T02TD1346E:21a-2: rlung dang sa yi snying po dag ni chu nyid du 'gyur rang bzhin med pa dang ni rang bzhin no //
T02TD1346E:21a-3: sa yi rten ni chu ste 'bar byed dag kyang chu yi rlung ni dag par byed pa dag gi'o //
T02TD1346E:21a-4: rlung gi stong par rab tu 'gyur te [?] mi yi dbang po 'byung ba'i rten dang brten pa ji lta bzhin /
T02TD1346E:21a-5: 18 / phung po'i rten ni 'byung ba rnams su 'gyur te lus mchog dag la 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rtsa rnams so //
T02TD1346E:21a-6: rtsa rnams kyi ni srog rlung rnam pa bcu por 'gyur te srog gi rlung rnams dag gi sems yin no //
T02TD1346E:21a-7: sems de gnyis kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur yon tan dbang gis rang bzhin can dang rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02TD1346E:21a-8: de dag gi yang rten ni gtso bo srid pa gsum gyis btud cing gzhom med kun tu 'gro pa gang /
T02TD1346E:21a-9: 19 / dri ni 'dzin ma dag las 'byung ste ro yang rtse mo can las gzugs kyi khams ni chu las so //
T02TD1346E:21a-10: rlung las reg par 'gyur te zhi ba las kyang sgra dang chos kyi khams ni nam mkha' dag las so //
T02TD1346E:21a-11: stong pa sgra ni 'dzin par byed de nges par rgyal ba skyed mdzad chos kyi khams dang rlung dag ni //
T02TD1346E:21a-12: dri dang me yang gzugs te chu dag kyang ni ro'o de bzhin 'dzin ma dag ni reg bya'o /
T02TD1346E:21a-13: 20 / grub pa gzugs ni 'dzin ma la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su chu la yang ni 'du shes grub //
T02TD1346E:21a-14: me la nges pa nyid du tshor bar 'gyur te rlung la yang ni phung po 'du byed kho na'o //
T02TD1346E:21a-15: rnam shes ye shes bsres pa nam mkha' dang bcas rdo rje dag la grub pa nyid de lus 'di la //
T02TD1346E:21a-16: khams dang phung po la sogs thams cad 'gyur ba dag kyang rngul dang byang chub sems sogs sbyor bas so /
T02TD1346E:21a-17: 21 / rna ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems ni nam mkha' dag gi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1346E:21a-18: sna ni sa yi rang bzhin dag ste de bzhin kho na lce ni me yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:21a-19: mig ni chu yi rang bzhin dag ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su lus kyang rlung gi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1346E:21a-20: de ltar rna ba la sogs thams cad yon tan dbang gis 'gyur te ye shes rnam shes sbyor bas so /
T02TD1346E:21b-0: 22 / ser sna ye shes khams la 'gyur te lus mchog @21b dag la nam mkha' la ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02TD1346E:21b-1: rlung la phrag dog rdo rje me la chags pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsal mdzad de bzhin nyid du ni //
T02TD1346E:21b-2: chu la dpal ldan nga rgyal rdo rje sa la gti mug rdo rje rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so //
T02TD1346E:21b-3: ngag dang lag pa rkang pa bshang lam thams cad rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag las 'byung par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:21b-4: 23 / thur sel ye shes khams la rnam gsum zhes par 'gyur te srog gi rlung yang stong pa dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:21b-5: rlung gi dbus su mnyam gnas rtse mo can la slar yang gyen rgyu chu la khyab par byed pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:21b-6: sa la klu ste de nas rus sbal rtsangs pa dang ni lha sbyin nor las rgyal ba dag gi rlung //
T02TD1346E:21b-7: bzhi po rlung dang me dag dang ni chu dang sa rnams dag la rim pa yis ni yang dag 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:21b-8: 24 / gtsug tor stong pa'i khams la 'gyur te lha dang mi rnams kyi ni ye shes khams la gsang pa'o //
T02TD1346E:21b-9: snying gi padma rlung gi khams la rab gsal rtse mo can la mgrin pa'i 'khor lo gsal bar ro //
T02TD1346E:21b-10: chu la smin ma'i nang gi padma nor ni nor gyi 'dab ldan lte ba'i padma sa la'o //
T02TD1346E:21b-11: rkang pa lag pa dag gi tshigs drug sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung rnams dag la gsum gyi grangs /
T02TD1346E:21b-12: 25 / sa sogs khams lnga dag la rnam gsum yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba rkang pa lag pa dag gi ni //
T02TD1346E:21b-13: mthe bong la sogs sor mo bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i tshigs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa mtha' dag ste //
T02TD1346E:21b-14: de dag sen mo'i mthar thug yang dag gzung bya slar yang so rnams de nyid rab tu dbye bas so //
T02TD1346E:21b-15: gzhan yang spu yi mthar ni lus mchog la 'gyur de dang de ni de bzhin du yang khams la'o /
T02TD1346E:21b-16: 26 / gsang ba gtsug tor lte ba la yang lhan cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ste rang bzhin med rang bzhin //
T02TD1346E:21b-17: snying ga'i chu skyes la ni chos skur 'gyur te mgrin pa'i chu skyes la yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:21b-18: thig le la yang sprul pa'i sku ni yon tan dbang gis lhag pa'i lha ru rim pa dag gis 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:21b-19: snying ga'i 'khor lo mgrin pa'i 'khor lo spyi bo'i padma chos dang longs spyod rdzogs dang dag pa'o /
T02TD1346E:22a-1: dag dang gsang ba spyi bo dang ni snying ga de bzhin gtsug tor dbus su ni //
T02TD1346E:22a-2: yum dang gtso bo'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:22a-3: 'khor lo rin chen mkha' yi padma chu skyes ral gri mchog dang rdo rje dang ldan rigs drug go //
T02TD1346E:22a-4: de dag steng 'og rtsa gsum rnam gsum lam la gnas pa rnams te nyi zla me yi dbye bas so /
T02TD1346E:22a-5: 28 / lus la bsam pa rab tu zhugs pa nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam bsam pa'i dbus su lus dag kyang //
T02TD1346E:22a-6: rnal 'byor ldan pas shes bya rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyi kha dog la sogs dbye ba ste //
T02TD1346E:22a-7: ser po nag po dag dang kha dog dmar po zhes dang dkar po sa rlung me dang chu la'o //
T02TD1346E:22a-8: ye shes nam mkha' la yang sngon po ljang gur 'gyur te lus dang bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas so /
T02TD1346E:22a-9: 29 / shes rab thabs ni rus pa sha dang chu dang bcas pa'i khrag dang me dag dang ni gci ba nyid //
T02TD1346E:22a-10: rlung dang bshad pa stong pa khu ba mchog gi lus la dpal ldan rdul dang sems nyid dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:22a-11: rna ba sgra sogs gzhan rnams rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis ngag gi rang bzhin la sogs kyang //
T02TD1346E:22a-12: de ltar lha mo sangs rgyas dang bcas yul dang yul can rnams ni dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:22a-13: 30 / rtsa rnams stong phrag drug ni nyin mor byed pas bsgyur ba mngal gyi dbus dag tu yang 'phel ba ni //
T02TD1346E:22a-14: byas nas lo ni rdzogs pa na yang gtong ste ri bong 'dzin pa nyi ma dag kyang 'phel bar byed //
T02TD1346E:22a-15: lo ni bcu gnyis dag na nyin byed khams ni 'phel ba gtong ste rang gi lus po dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:22a-16: rtsa ni 'chad pa rab tu skyes nas nyin zhag nyin zhag dag la rim pas zung gi grangs su 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:22a-17: 31 / dpal ldan 'byung ba dang ni dbang po rnams dag bcu ru rab 'gyur las kyi dbang po lnga rnams dang //
T02TD1346E:22b-0: de tsam lnga ru brjod pa rnams dang yon tan bcas pa dag kyang yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin mchog /'di dag de nyid rnams te lus dang srid pa gsum gyi gnas su 'di ni longs spyod gtso bo dag / phung po lnga yi bdag nyid @22b rnam gsum srid pa la gnas bdag gi las ni bsags pa dag gi'o /
T02TD1346E:22b-1: 32 / sa ni sra ba chu ni gsher ba me yang tsha ba rlung ni yang ba nyid de bug pa ni //
T02TD1346E:22b-2: stong pa dag ste brtan pa'i rus pa 'chi med ri bo mchog dang char pa 'dir ni bdud rtsir 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:22b-3: rdo rje sgra dang gzhu yang bshang ba dag ste chu tshod rnams ni dbugs dang dbugs 'byung zung dag go //
T02TD1346E:22b-4: zung rnams dgu brgya nyis 'gyur dag gis 'pho ba gcig ste skar rtsis pa rnams bug pa'i dbye ba'o /
T02TD1346E:22b-5: 33 / rgyu skar dag ni so yi phreng ba rjes su nyin zhag chu tshod rnams ni tshigs kyi dbye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:22b-6: rtsa rnams chu bo rgyu ma sprin te ri bong can gyi cha gzhan khams rnams gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1346E:22b-7: spu dang shig dang khu ba srin bu'i rigs dang bcas pa rnams ni 'byung po skye gnas rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1346E:22b-8: dga' ba la sogs mthe bong tshigs rnams spyi bo'i padma lte ba'i padma dag kyang nus pa'o /
T02TD1346E:22b-10: 34 / tshangs pa'i yul sa mtho ris 'jig rten lag mchog rkang pa dag ni mi yul sa 'og 'jig rten no //
T02TD1346E:22b-11: chu gter gling dang ri bo rnams ni gsher dang 'jam pa sra ba gsum gyi rang bzhin khams rnams so //
T02TD1346E:22b-12: lan tshva'i chu gter gci ba 'di dag rnams kyi me rlung dkyil 'khor rgyal po khrag dang pags pa'o //
T02TD1346E:22b-13: skra rnams grub pa mtha' dag srid pa gsum gyi gnas su du ma'i dbye ba [?] ngag gis grub pa'o /
T02TD1346E:22b-14: 35 / snying mgrin lte ba'i padma dag la rdo rje nyi ma rtse mo can rnams rab 'phro rim pa yis //
T02TD1346E:22b-15: gzhu yi rnam pa zlum po dang ni nyin bzhin sreg byed chu gter zur gyi thab khung dag la yang //
T02TD1346E:22b-16: de dag gang na me gzhan dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes gzugs ni mun pa dag gi mthar //
T02TD1346E:22b-17: gang zhig nyi ma glog gis mi gdung ri bong 'dzin pa gza' dang skar ma la sogs med pa na'o /
T02TD1346E:22b-18: 36 / gza' ni snying ga'i padma la ste rab tu gsal byas chu tshod drug cu lte ba'i padma la //
T02TD1346E:22b-19: smin ma'i dbus su nyin zhag rkang pa ma nu slar yang mi bdag longs spyod 'khor lor skar ma'o //
T02TD1346E:22b-20: slar yang lte ba'i padmar rgyu skar rnams kyi chu tshod rnal 'byor ldan pa dag gis rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:23a-0: chu tshod chu srang gsal bar mtha' dag lus la lag pa @23a * //
T02TD1346E:23a-1: rkang pa la sogs dag gi tshigs la'o /
T02TD1346E:23a-2: 37 / lte ba'i chu skyes nyi ma'i 'dab ma dag la 'khor te mchog gi cha ni 'pho ba rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:23a-3: srog zung dgu brgya nyis 'gyur dag gis 'pho bar 'gyur te dus sbyor ka rka ta nas mi yi dbang //
T02TD1346E:23a-4: dus sbyor gang la nyi ma gnas pas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba de la de ni rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:23a-5: dus sbyor tshad dang nor dang bu lon mnyam pa dag kyang bgrod pa g-yas dang g-yon la shes par bya /
T02TD1346E:23a-6: 38 / re re padma'i 'dab ma dag la rab tu 'bab ste nub tu 'dzin ma dang ni byang du chu //
T02TD1346E:23a-7: lho ru me dang shar du rlung ni rab tu 'bab ste 'dab ma'i dbus dag tu yang stong pa'o //
T02TD1346E:23a-8: dbye ba lnga yis 'pho bar 'gyur te mnyam pa rab tu 'bab pa dman pa'i dbugs ni drug cu'o //
T02TD1346E:23a-9: de ltar 'pho ba'i dbye pa rnams ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su dus sbyor dbye ba dag gis 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:23a-10: 39 / stong pa la sogs de nyid lnga ni nges par byang du rab 'bab sa la sogs pa g-yas su'o //
T02TD1346E:23a-11: sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma dag dang gza' lag sa skyes lha min blon po bla ma dang //
T02TD1346E:23a-12: mjug rings spen pa 'di bcu dag ni nam mkha' la sogs dkyil 'khor rnams la bdag po zhing can no //
T02TD1346E:23a-13: zla ba drug la zla ba dbang phyug tu 'gyur byang dag tu ste mi bdag lho ru nyi ma'o /
T02TD1346E:23a-14: 40 / de steng snying ga'i phyogs su padma nor gyi 'dab ma dag la rtsa yi 'khor lo yang dag gnas //
T02TD1346E:23a-15: srog la sogs pa rlung gi tshogs te zla ba nyi ma me rnams g-yon dang g-yas dang dbus su'o //
T02TD1346E:23a-16: g-yon du rtsa ni ri bong mtshan ma 'bab ste nges par dkar po g-yas su dmar po nyi ma'o //
T02TD1346E:23a-17: dbus su dus me'i gzugs ni rab tu 'bab ste mnyam pa dag la dman pa'i dbugs ni drug cu'o /
T02TD1346E:23a-18: 41 / srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas padma nor gyi 'dab ma dag la rlung ni gyen du rgyu ba dang //
T02TD1346E:23a-19: khyab byed klu dang rus sbal dag dang rtsangs pa'i rlung dang lha sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal zhes pa //
T02TD1346E:23a-20: rlung ni rnam pa bcu po 'di rnams lte ba'i 'khor lo la ni las kyi dbye bas yang dag gnas //
T02TD1346E:23a-21: dung can mtha' yang ai da la sogs rang gi snying ga'i padma rtsa yi 'khor lo mtha' dag go /
T02TD1346E:23b-0: 42 / @23b srog ni nyi ma zla ba'i lam na gnas pa dag kyang srog byed bza' dang btung ba ma lus pa //
T02TD1346E:23b-1: de dag thur sel gyis ni 'og tu 'dren te mtha' dag ro mnyam lus la mnyam gnas dag gis 'thob //
T02TD1346E:23b-2: lus la gyen rgyus g-yo bar byed de kha dang lag pa rkang pa rnams kyi glu dang zlos gar byed //
T02TD1346E:23b-3: khyab byed kyis ni nang dag byed de rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus 'di 'jig pa de lta nyid /
T02TD1346E:23b-4: 43 / klu yang sgregs pa nyid de gsal bar lag pa rkang pa bskum pa dag ni rus sbal rlung gis so //
T02TD1346E:23b-5: khro dang g-yeng ba mtha' dag de ni rtsangs pa'i rlung dag gis te glal [?] ba dag kyang lha sbyin gyis //
T02TD1346E:23b-6: lus ni lnga pa nyid gyur gtong bar mi byed mi yi bdag po rlung gcig nor las rgyal ba'o //
T02TD1346E:23b-7: de ltar srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis gnas yon tan dag ni gtong mi byed /
T02TD1346E:23b-8: 44 / dmar ser phra mo dag kyang ai da la sogs rnam gsum lam bgrod snar ma dang ni lag ldan lce //
T02TD1346E:23b-9: drug pa rgyal dang ri yang rgyal ba nor dang dgu pa aa li bu sha dpal ldan ku h'a'o //
T02TD1346E:23b-10: phyogs kyi grangs ni dung can ma gang mi yi bdag po byang chub sa bon bde ba'i mthar zag byed //
T02TD1346E:23b-11: dpal ldan rtsa yi 'khor lo 'di ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te tshigs kyi dbye ba du mas so /
T02TD1346E:23b-12: 45 / dbang po me dang gshin rje lha min chur bcas rlung dang gnod sbyin dang ni drag po dag gi dbus //
T02TD1346E:23b-13: gnas ni 'di dag rnams su de yi rang bzhin brten zhing nus pa nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor bar byed //
T02TD1346E:23b-14: de yi steng gi mgrin pa'i phyogs su gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar 'khor lo yang dag gnas //
T02TD1346E:23b-15: tshangs pa'i yul sa dpal ldan [?] dbral ba dag gnas dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i thig le dkar po zag 46 / rtsa bar sa ste g-yon du chu dang g-yas su bsreg za dag ni rab tu 'bab ste steng du rlung //
T02TD1346E:23b-16: gnyis kyi dbus su nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa rab tu 'bab ste sna bug dag las rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:23b-17: 'di dag rnams ni 'bugs te nus pa mchog gi gnas dang bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mtha' ru 'gro //
T02TD1346E:24a-0: zhing la sogs pa lag pa rkang pa lag pad sbyar bdag la chen @24a * //
T02TD1346E:24a-1: po'i mthar thug mtha' dag go /
T02TD1346E:24a-2: 47 /'khor lo can ni rang gi lus la rdo rje can te lha mchog bdag rnams yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog / rigs ldan dag ni yang dag ye shes glang po rta dang shing rta mngag gzhug 'phags pa'i tshad med rnams //
T02TD1346E:24a-3: drag po rang rgyal ming can dag tu 'gyur te ha nu m'an ni nyan thos gdug pa kla klo'i dbang //
T02TD1346E:24a-4: srog chags rnams kyi sdig pa dag ste gang zhig byed pa'i blo gros sdug bsngal sbyin byed mi dge'i lam /
T02TD1346E:24a-5: 48 / rta la gnas pa ma rig pa ste lha min dpung rnams mtha' dag bdud kyi phyogs ni rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1346E:24a-6: de yi g-yul la sdud pa srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dag ste dpal ldan rgyal ba thar pa'i lam //
T02TD1346E:24a-7: kee la shar ni chos dag sbyin pa srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog yin te sa ni rdzas kyis gang ba yang //
T02TD1346E:24a-8: skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla ma'i sras po tshangs dang lha dbang dag ni rgyab dang mdun du gang /
T02TD1346E:24a-9: 49 /'jam dpal 'jig rten mgon po srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dpal ldan rdul dang byang chub sems //
T02TD1346E:24a-10: rgyab tu sa gzhi dag la tshangs pa la sogs sna tshogs rigs rnams du ma'i sangs rgyas rnam dag pa'o //
T02TD1346E:24a-11: de ltar kla klo dbang po'i 'khrug par 'gyur te nges par lus can rnams kyi lus kyi dbus su'o //
T02TD1346E:24a-12: sgyu ma'i gzugs kyang phyi rol tu ni nges par mkha'i yul du kla klo 'khrug ste 'khrug pa min /
T02TD1346E:24a-13: 50 / dus kyi lo ni me grangs lo yi nyin zhag tshogs kyis bsgyur te rigs drug bgrod pa'i yan lag gis //
T02TD1346E:24a-14: zla ba'i dbye bas sum cu drug ste ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs //
T02TD1346E:24a-15: gza' yis bcad pas thob pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par dus kyi 'khor lo dag gi lha rnams so //
T02TD1346E:24a-16: phyogs kyis bcang [?] pa dag gi lha dang lha mo rnams kyis mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag 51 / sgyu 'phrul dra ba rnam pa gsum yang nyin zhag yan lag las 'gyur yang dag bug par rig byed dang //
T02TD1346E:24a-17: slar yang 'byung ba rgya mtsho me dang chu gter gyis 'gyur dpal ldan 'dus pa dus kyi dbye ba ni //
T02TD1346E:24b-0: de nyid ces bya gzhan yang drug gis rnam dman @24b de dag phyed kyi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste //
T02TD1346E:24b-1: slar yang bsres pa dag ni dbye ba gnyis te bcu gsum bcu dgu dang ni bug pa de nyid bcas /
T02TD1346E:24b-2: 52 / zla ba'i cha shas su nges nyin zhag tshogs las gza' yi cha yis thob pa gang dag nyin zhag drug / de dag rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya drug ste gzhan pa'i nyin zhag tshogs ni sku gsung thugs kyi rgya //
T02TD1346E:24b-3: shes rab sku la dus sbyor gsum rnams nges par gsal byas rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud la'o //
T02TD1346E:24b-4: nus ma khro bo rnams ni rim pas bcu ru rab tu 'gyur te lnga ni sangs rgyas lha mo rnams /
T02TD1346E:24b-6: 53 / gzugs sogs mig la sogs pa drug ste slar yang mi yi bdag po lha yi tshogs ni drug gnyis so //
T02TD1346E:24b-7: rnal 'byor ma dang klu dang gtum mo brgyad ces bya ste srid pa 'di dag thams cad nyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:24b-8: 'di dag dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo bzhi lhag brgya ste de yi phyed kyang khams gsum dag tu'o //
T02TD1346E:24b-9: nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag so sor chu tshod 'byung ba gang zhig zla ba'i dbus su drug cu ste /
T02TD1346E:24b-10: 54 / de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dus sbyor bsres pa'o nyis 'gyur rnams //
T02TD1346E:24b-11: nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag rab phye nyis 'gyur dag kyang gang zhig 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs //
T02TD1346E:24b-12: mtha' dag bsdus par gyur pa mngon brjod rnams dang bcas pa dag ni nyi ma'i nyin zhag sum 'gyur 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:24b-13: nyi ma lo yi rab dbyer 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin pa la ni mtha' dag phyogs kyi dbye ba'o /
T02TD1346E:24b-14: 55 / de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud la mkha' lag mi bdag rnams te lha dang lha mo rnams kyi ni //
T02TD1346E:24b-15: shes rab thabs dag mtshan mo nyin mor 'gyur ba mnyam pa'i cha ste mtshan mo phyed dang nyin phyed la'o //
T02TD1346E:24b-16: gang gis rang gi lus la nyin mtshan dus dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag gis shes gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:24b-17: de ni dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms sangs rgyas skye ba 'di nyid dag la'o /
T02TD1346E:24b-18: 56 / sum cu'i cha yis de las thob pa gsum gyis bsgyur ba nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD1346E:25a-0: phyi rol gyi ni phyag rgya drug ste slar yang de las 'khor lo @25a * //
T02TD1346E:25a-1: dag gi rtsa rnams de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:25a-2: gtsug tor la ni chu gter snying gar brgyad de spyi bor mi bdag mgrin pa la yang so yi grangs //
T02TD1346E:25a-3: lte bar brgyad ni brgyad kyis bsgyur ba dag ste nyis 'gyur mi bdag gsang pa'i dbus su rab tu grags /
T02TD1346E:25a-4: 57 / rtsa drug rnams ni 'khor lo 'gog cing bcu ni yul rnams 'phrog pa 'dus pa dag gi rang bzhin te //
T02TD1346E:25a-5: slar yang yang nas yang du nyis 'gyur bsgyur ba dag kyang bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa dag gi cha //
T02TD1346E:25a-6: 'di dag nges par 'chi ba ster byed bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis tshe dang nang med dag kyang ster //
T02TD1346E:25a-7: 'khor lo drug la dus kyi rtsa rnams 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog rnal 'byor rnams kyi 'di la ngo mtshar med /
T02TD1346E:25a-8: 58 / gtsug tor la ni chu gter dpral bar rgya mtshos bsnun pa'i dus rnams bad kan khams ni rab 'khrug pa'o //
T02TD1346E:25a-9: mgrin pa so dang snying ga'i chu skyes dag la mig gis bsgyur ba'i dus rnams mkhris pa'i khams rab 'khrug / lte ba gsang ba dag la chu gter drug cu mi bdag dag kyang de bzhin rlung gi khams rab 'khrug / gsang bar gzhan ni phyogs dang drug kyang rab tu gsal byas nges par 'dus pa dag ste 'gog pa'o /
T02TD1346E:25a-10: 59 / drug gi rtsa ni 'khor lo 'gog pa zla nyi me yi dbye bas rnam gsum lam la gnas pa gang //
T02TD1346E:25a-11: srog chags rnams la 'chi ba star [?] ba de ni bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis lus la bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1346E:25a-12: drug la gal te srog ni rab zhugs gyur na de tshe mi rnams kyi ni 'chi pa 'joms par nges //
T02TD1346E:25a-13: phra mo la ni ma zhugs pa na rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'chi ba'i yul ni gang du gcod par byed /
T02TD1346E:25a-14: 60 / srog ni gal te rtsa gcig nyid la nyin dang mtshan mor 'bab na 'tsho ba dag ni dus kyi lo //
T02TD1346E:25a-15: gal te phyogs gcig rnam par ma chad 'bab na mi rnams kyi ni 'tsho ba phyed dang bcas pa'i lo //
T02TD1346E:25a-16: zla ba gcig tu rnam par ma chad 'bab na mi yi bdag po 'tsho ba dag kyang zla ba gsum //
T02TD1346E:25a-17: de ltar rnal 'byor bas ni rang lus dag la zla bgrod 'chi ba'i dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya /
T02TD1346E:25b-0: 61 / lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i nyin zhag bgrod pa @25b skye ba lnga ni 'phel ba dag gis skye ba ste //
T02TD1346E:25b-1: de nas re re lhag pas bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba dag kyang gsum ni lhag pa ji srid nyid //
T02TD1346E:25b-2: dus ni rdzogs na'o lo rnams gsum mig zla ba de dag rnams dang drug gsum zung dang zla ba gang //
T02TD1346E:25b-3: zla ba de dag rnams dang nyin zhag tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan gnyis zla 'tsho ba'i lhag ma'o /
T02TD1346E:25b-4: 62 / rang gi gnas nas mchog gi cha yis khyim gyi 'khor lo 'dor te nyams dang lhag ma mtshungs pa yi //
T02TD1346E:25b-5: lo dang zla ba zhag gis kyang ste gsum mig ri bong can dang drug gsum zung dang zla bas kyang //
T02TD1346E:25b-6: rdzogs pa nas ni lhag ma mtshungs pa'i tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan rnams dang lte bar rab zhugs pa'i //
T02TD1346E:25b-7: sum cu rtsa drug gis te nyin zhag mthar ni nyin mor byed pa'i 'chi ltas sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:25b-8: 63 / sngon du nyi ma'i lo gsum dag gi nyin zhag tshogs ni mda' dang me dang 'jig rten 'dor bar byed //
T02TD1346E:25b-9: de nas rgyu ba dang bcas mda' dus rtse mo can dang mkha' ri zla ba dag ni gsum pa la'o //
T02TD1346E:25b-10: mig sbrul ri bo mda' dang nor dang lag pa gzhan te bdun pa la ni rgyu ba dag kyang ngo //
T02TD1346E:25b-11: de nas tshes la sogs pa'i nyin zhag tshogs pa thams cad dag kyang gang zhig lte ba ji srid nyid /
T02TD1346E:25b-12: 64 / dus kyi lo yi bar du nges par nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'pho zhing rgyu bar byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:25b-13: zla ba zhes dang nyi ma'i lam la mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag re re 'phel pas rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:25b-14: slar yang 'pho ba'i dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag rnams kyis bcu gnyis rtsibs la byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:25b-15: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba ji srid gzhan ni sum cu dag dang 'tsho ba dag gis mtshan mo gsum /
T02TD1346E:25b-16: 65 / dbugs dang chu srang dang ni chu tshod nyin mtshan dus rnams de ni rim pa dag gis rgyu ba ste //
T02TD1346E:25b-17: bgrod pa'i yan lag las ni lo bdun dag gis bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang las lo ni drug cus kyang //
T02TD1346E:25b-18: zla ba gsum las sum cu'i lo yis nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi lo dang phyogs kyis kyang //
T02TD1346E:26a-0: dus kyi 'khor lo dag la phyed bcas sum cu gnyis kyis bgos pa'i nyin zhag tshogs kyis rgyu bar @26a * //
T02TD1346E:26a-3: 66 // phyogs dang phyogs la rtsa ni dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la gcod par byed //
T02TD1346E:26a-4: las kyi 'khor lo bya ba zhes pa'i tshigs las nyin zhag rtse mo can gyis rtsa ni re re 'dor //
T02TD1346E:26a-5: mgrin pa dag las rgyu skar rtsa ni nyin dang nyin la zla ba'i nang du rim pas 'dor ba ste //
T02TD1346E:26a-6: thig ler gnas pa zla ba'i rkang pa phyogs kyi nang du 'dor te gza' yi rtsa dang gsang bar gnas /
T02TD1346E:26a-7: 67 / sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams las nyin mor byed pa khyim gyi dbye bas bgrod par rgyu ba ste //
T02TD1346E:26a-8: phyi nas re re lhag pas nyin dang nyin la ldog par 'gyur te dus kyi lo ni ji srid nyid //
T02TD1346E:26a-9: lo ni chad na phyogs kyi nang du dbyangs kyi nyin zhag dbang gis rgyu ba dang ni zad pa yang //
T02TD1346E:26a-10: nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa nyams pa 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gcig 68 / lte ba mgrin pa [?] dpral ba rang gi snying ga'i padma dag la rtsa ni lhag ma dang bcas pa //
T02TD1346E:26a-11: nyi ma ro dang me dag gnas te rang gi snying ga'i padmar phyed bcas rtsa ni de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:26a-12: lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dus rnams nyin zhag drug ni ji srid nyid du ste //
T02TD1346E:26a-13: mthar ni kun tu phra mo rab tu 'bab ste nyin zhag snying gi chu skyes yang dag gtong bar byed /
T02TD1346E:26a-14: 69 / sum cu drug gi stong phrag dhru brgya'i nyin zhag tshogs rnams dag gis dus kyi rtsa ni rgyu ba ste //
T02TD1346E:26a-15: nyin mtshan dus la nyi ma zla bas rang rang rgyu ba dag gis gang gang rdzogs par mi nus pa //
T02TD1346E:26a-16: nyi ma'i nyin zhag nyi ma rgyu ba la yang bu lon du 'gyur de phyed zla ba'i rgyu ba la //
T02TD1346E:26a-17: rgyu skar nyin zhag rab tu dbye bas 'chi ba'i nyi zla rgyu ba stong pa'i zla ba dag la'o /
T02TD1346E:26a-18: 70 / srog ni lus la lhag pa gang zhig rab gsal mtshams su rig byed rkang chad kyis dman drug cu ste //
T02TD1346E:26a-19: 'pho ba'i dbye [?] ba dag gis thams cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su rtsa ni zung dag nges par 'joms //
T02TD1346E:26a-20: yang dang yang du lo yi dbus su nyi zla rgyu ba dag las stong pa mig dang ri yi grangs //
T02TD1346E:26a-21: de ltar rang rang tshad kyi lo brgya dag gis lha mi rnams kyi rang gi tshe la dus bgrod do /
T02TD1346E:26b-0: 71 / @26b [?] zos dang nad dang bsnun pa gal te res 'ga' mi rnams la ni dus kyi rtsa la gyur pa na //
T02TD1346E:26b-1: gzhi de yis ni 'phral la myur bar rtsa yi 'khor lo dag la dus ni rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:26b-2: 'khor lo dag gi rtsa 'di 'gog ste nyi ma ri bong can gyi bgrod pa bcad nas rim pa yis //
T02TD1346E:26b-3: dbu mar phra mo la ni brten pa gang zhig 'phrog pa mi bdag srog chags rnams kyi 'tsho ba'o /
T02TD1346E:26b-4: 72 / snying ga'i padma dpal ldan dpral bar 'byung ba phyogs dang nyin zhag ces bya zla ba'i rkang pa rgyu //
T02TD1346E:26b-5: longs spyod lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la dgu ldan bcu dang drag po zung dang rgyal ba zhes bya dang //
T02TD1346E:26b-6: de nyid ces bya zhag bdun dag nis [?] slar yang ri bong mtshan ma gang 'di rim pa min pas 'dor //
T02TD1346E:26b-7: thig le dag la rdzogs par byas nas snying gar rab 'jug dkar po'i phyogs la nor gyi slad du'o /
T02TD1346E:26b-8: 73 / slar yang nag po dag la de bzhin 'gro ste rkang pa'i dbang gis lte ba'i padma dag gi bar //
T02TD1346E:26b-9: snying ga de bzhin mgo bor rtsibs brgyad rtsibs bcu drug la gnag dang dkar ba dag gi chu skyes ming //
T02TD1346E:26b-10: mgrin pa lte ba dag la sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsibs dang nyis 'gyur gzhan te dmar dang ser po'o //
T02TD1346E:26b-11: brgyad pa gnyis ni lte ba mgrin pa la ste mgo dang snying ga la yang dkar nag rdzogs pa'o /
T02TD1346E:26b-12: 74 / aa sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha yar wa lar ldan thig le dpal ldan rnam par bcad pa yis //
T02TD1346E:26b-13: phye ba drug cur 'gyur te de dag dus dang mi bdag nor dang so rnams ge sar rtse mo la'o //
T02TD1346E:26b-14: thig le'i rnam pa dang ni rnam par bcad pas pad 'dab mchog la ka sogs sde rnams rnam phye ba //
T02TD1346E:26b-15: nyi shu dang ni brgya phrag gcig kyang thun gyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis nyi ma rgyu zhing nyams par byed /
T02TD1346E:26b-16: 75 / phyogs la zla ba rang gi rgyu bas nyin zhag ces bya'i rkang pa dag kyang bu lon dag tu byed //
T02TD1346E:26b-17: slar yang zla ba gnyis kyis gzhan pa dag kyang nyin zhag lo yi sbyor ba dag las 'phel ba ni //
T02TD1346E:26b-18: rdzogs pa'i lo la nyin zhag drug tu 'gyur te gzhan yang de bzhin 'chi [?] bdag gis mtshams su 'phel //
T02TD1346E:27a-0: rgyal po de ltar nyi ma'i bu lon nyis 'gyur 'di ni lo [?] @27a * //
T02TD1346E:27a-1: yi sbyor [?] ba dag gis 'phel bar byed /
T02TD1346E:27a-2: 76 / dbugs drug gis ni chu srang gcig tu rab tu 'gyur te chu srang drug cu yis kyang chu tshod do //
T02TD1346E:27a-3: chu tshod drug cu nyin zhag tu 'gyur gsum gyis bsgyur ba bcu yi nyin zhag dag gis zla ba gcig / zla ba drug gis kyang ni bgrod [?] par 'gyur te gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i bgrod pa lo gcig tu rab grags //
T02TD1346E:27a-4: skyes bu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya las bu lon bgrod par son pa dus kyi rtsa yi dbang gis so /
T02TD1346E:27a-5: 77 /'jig rten gsum na lha min lha mi rnams las gang zhig rang gi lus la zla ba nyi ma dag / rdzogs par nus pa'i rnal 'byor ldan pa min de zla bas rang gi rgyu bas nyin mtshan rgyu ba dang //
T02TD1346E:27a-6: srid par lo yi nang du rim pas nyi mas kyang ni rgyu skar thams cad rgyu ba min pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:27a-7: lo dang lor ni bu lon dag gis de ni srid pa za ste dus kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo gcig 78 / chad pa gal te rtsa gcig yin na mi yi bdag po gci ba dag ni skyur ba nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:27a-8: de tsam rnams ni nyin zhag lnga nas mchog gi cha yis 'dor te gong bu 'chad pa'i dus su'o //
T02TD1346E:27a-9: sgra ni rna ba las te ro yang nges par kha las 'dor zhing mig 'bras mig gi dbus nas so //
T02TD1346E:27a-10: dri ni sna las mi rnams dag gi lag pa rkang pa'i lus las dro ba'i dngos po rim pa yis /
T02TD1346E:27a-11: 79 / sna yi rtse mo 'phyang ba dang ni spyi bor lag pa bzhag pa de yi rang bzhin dag tu mthong //
T02TD1346E:27a-12: lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil la rgya skyegs tshon gyis rab tu byugs kyang dmar po nyid du byed ma yin //
T02TD1346E:27a-13: nyi ma kha dog nag po dang ni yongs su gyur pa'i ri bong 'dzin pa kha dog ser por mthong //
T02TD1346E:27a-14: gcin dang lus kyang bsil bar gyur na mi yi bdag po de yi nyin zhag la ni 'chi ba nyid /
T02TD1346E:27a-15: 80 / lce 'og nag po'i thig tu rab tu 'gyur te mig la tshangs pa'i ri mo shin tu phra mo dang //
T02TD1346E:27a-16: dbugs ni zla ba nyi ma'i lam du 'phro ste mi yi bdag po mkhur tshos gnyis po de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:27a-17: nu ma'i steng ni mchan khung du zhugs gza' yi tshogs rnams mtha' dag me stag dag dang bcas par mthong //
T02TD1346E:27b-0: mgrin pa lus dang bcas pa rengs shing 'khor ba yang ni lus la 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid dag tu @27b 'dod /
T02TD1346E:27b-1: 81 / skye ba dang ni bca' ba'i dus dang byis pa gzhon nu dag gi gzugs ni byed pa gang yin pa //
T02TD1346E:27b-2: de nyid 'jig rten dag tu slar yang sdud par byed pa dus kyi 'khor lo can te nyi ma min //
T02TD1346E:27b-3: zla ba nyi ma la sogs lha rnams 'byung ba dang bcas mtshan mo'i cha la bcom ldan de yis zos //
T02TD1346E:27b-4: slar yang nyin mo'i dus su mtha' yas rnams kyang gtong bar byed de skyed pa'i rgyur ni rim pas so /
T02TD1346E:27b-5: 82 / sgra la sogs pa drug po rnams ni las su 'gyur te dbang po drug po dag kyang byed pa'o //
T02TD1346E:27b-6: lo dang zla ba phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan mo tshes dang zla ba nyi ma dag kyang byed pa po //
T02TD1346E:27b-7: de dag sdud pa'i byed po gzhan du 'dir 'gyur skyed pa'i byed pa po ni byed pa po ma yin //
T02TD1346E:27b-8: mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje can de yul dang rnam bral yon tan med la rang bzhin med pa'o /
T02TD1346E:27b-9: 83 / dri dang kha dog dang ni ro dang reg pa zhes dang 'dzin ma dang ni chu dang me dang rlung //
T02TD1346E:27b-10: nges par gzugs can brgyad po rnams ni mtha' dag yul gyi tshogs pa dag ste gcig ni gtso bor 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:27b-11: 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag 'di ni spro ba dag dang sdud par 'gyur te dus kyi mthu las so //
T02TD1346E:27b-12: sgra dang stong pa dang ni chos kyi dbyings dang yid kyang mi yi bdag po gzugs med du 'gyur ro /
T02TD1346E:27b-13: 84 / bdag nyid 'ching ste rang bzhin la gnas yon tan rnam rtog rnams kyis ngar gyi srin bu ji bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:27b-14: bdag nyid bdag gis nges par slar yang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid dag las ni gtong bar byed //
T02TD1346E:27b-15: de phyir rgyal po rang las rang bzhin yon tan la gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:27b-16: rang bzhin rnam par bral ba su zhig byed po ci zhig byed de mi shes 'jig rten rmongs par byed /
T02TD1346E:27b-17: 85 / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang ni yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin dag gi sems //
T02TD1346E:27b-18: rags dang phra mo gzhan yang rnam gsum yon tan la gnas yi ge thig le la sogs dbye ba yis //
T02TD1346E:27b-19: rags pa rags pa'i dbang po rnams la rang bzhin gyis kyang gnas te phra mo'i sems la phra mo yang //
T02TD1346E:28a-0: ye shes la yang ye shes sku ste rang bzhin rnam 'gyur med pa'i 'tsho ba 'byung ba @28a * //
T02TD1346E:28a-2: 86 / aa sogs stong pa lnga ni rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur min dpal ldan cha dang thig le n'a da dang //
T02TD1346E:28a-3: dus dang sems dang blo ste rang bzhin dag kyang de bzhin gzhan pa'i dbyangs ni rlung la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1346E:28a-4: rags pa sde pa'i yi ge rnams ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu ste bcu drug gzhan ni rnam 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:28a-5: de dag dbus su rdo rje can ni rang bzhin min cing rnam 'gyur min te khyab byed rang bzhin med /
T02TD1346E:28a-6: 87 /'khor bar bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin yon tan la gnas las las skyes pa de ni za ba ste //
T02TD1346E:28a-7: mi rnams kyi ni las 'di dag kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te rags dang phra mo zhi ba'o //
T02TD1346E:28a-8: bdag ni byed pa po yang khyad par las te gzhan pa phyugs bdag kyang yod byed po zhes pa las //
T02TD1346E:28a-9: byed po bdag gam gzhan pa min te rang bzhin rnam par bral bar shes pa de ni las ma yin /
T02TD1346E:28a-11: 88 / de phyir byed po 'ga' yang srog chags rnams kyi bde dang sdug bsngal dag ni mi sbyin mi 'phrog ste //
T02TD1346E:28a-12: 'khor ba dag tu rnam pa gsum po gang byas sngon gyi las ni 'bras bu rab tu sbyin par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:28a-13: skyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa po 'di ster zhing de ni 'phrog pa rmongs pa rnams kyi blo gros te //
T02TD1346E:28a-14: lus la dpag med dge ba 'phrog par byed pa'i bug pa rang gi dbang po dag gis mthong ma yin /
T02TD1346E:28a-15: 89 /'dod pa'i nus dang bya ba dang ni gsum pa ye shes nus pa 'gro ba rang gi yid la ste //
T02TD1346E:28a-16: dngos po gsal ba dang ni 'jug pa dag dang ro mnyam rgyur ni don la nye bar dmigs par byed //
T02TD1346E:28a-17: slar yang gtong ba dag ni bzhi pa srid gsum gyis btud gnyis med kyis kyang nges par rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:28a-18: de dag nang nas rdo rje can ni mi yi bdag po cung zad mi za gtong ba min pa nyid /
T02TD1346E:28a-19: 90 / bdag ni byed po sdug bsngal bde ba rab tu sbyin por mi yi bdag po der ni 'gyur ba min //
T02TD1346E:28a-20: 'ga' yang bcings dang grol bar 'gyur min mi yi bdag po sems kyi nus pa rnam par spangs nas so //
T02TD1346E:28a-21: nam mkha' bum pa'i dbus nas chu ni len par byed pa na yang 'gro ba min pa ji lta ba //
T02TD1346E:28b-0: mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje can ni yul dang rnam @28b bral lus kyi dbus dag tu yang de bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:28b-1: 91 / de ltar las ni yod par smra ba por 'gyur bcom ldan ston pa gcig pu de ni byed po min //
T02TD1346E:28b-2: kun mkhyen dang po'i sangs rgyas srid gsum gyis btud dus kyi 'khor lo can te 'khor lo can ma yin //
T02TD1346E:28b-3: tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dag kyang gang gi zhabs kyi chu skyes drung du lhag par skyabs 'gro ba //
T02TD1346E:28b-4: dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog skyed yon tan med cing rnam rtog med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo /
T02TD1346E:28b-5: 92 / zhi ba'i bsam pa la ni lha nyid du 'gyur mi yi bdag po mun pa la ni dmyal ba nyid //
T02TD1346E:28b-6: rdul dag la yang dud 'gro nyid de rab mchog sa yi steng du mi nyid dag ni 'dres pa la //
T02TD1346E:28b-7: 'byung po nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste rdul dang mun pa dang ni snying stobs phan tshun 'dres pa la'o //
T02TD1346E:28b-8: 'chi ba'i dus su yid kyi bsam pa gang zhig dran par gyur pa der ni skye bo yang dag skye /
T02TD1346E:28b-10: 93 / lha nyid brgyad kyi dbye ba dag gis lha yi mchog gi gnas su mi nyid gcig ni ji lta ba //
T02TD1346E:28b-11: dud 'gro dag kyang chu gter rnam pa nges par dmyal ba'i 'gro bar dmyal ba nyid ni de bzhin gcig / gnas 'di rnams su ro yi 'gro bar skye bo 'khor te las kyi zhags pas nges par bcings pa dag / skye ba 'bum phrag du mas thar pa mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang du ni 'gro zhing grol ba min /
T02TD1346E:28b-12: 94 / phung po khams dang dbang po dang ni rnam gsum srid pa 'jigs pa las kyi dbang po lnga dag dang //
T02TD1346E:28b-13: de tsam dang ni las kyi skyon dang yon tan dang bcas yid dang blo dang [?] ngar 'dzin la sogs te //
T02TD1346E:28b-14: 'di dag gis bcings 'tsho ba dag ni ro yi 'gro bar 'khor te phra mo'i dngos po dag gis slar //
T02TD1346E:28b-15: dngos po btang na mi zad mchog gi gnas su rab tu 'gro ste gang du slar yang skye ldan min /
T02TD1346E:28b-16: 95 / yan lag dang bcas rig byed dran pa'i gzhung dang bcas dang rtog ge grub pa'i mthar ldan 'jig rten du //
T02TD1346E:28b-17: snyan dngags mkhan po rgyas pa me la sogs pa rnams kyis byas pa'i bstan bcos gzhan yang rig pa min //
T02TD1346E:29a-0: rig pa zhes pa nang rig 'gyur med kyang ste 'jig rten 'dir ni thub pa rnams kyis rab @29a * //
T02TD1346E:29a-2: gang du 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag tu 'gyur mi yi bdag po slar yang gang du thim pa'o /
T02TD1346E:29a-3: 96 / rnal 'byor dbang po rnal 'byor ma thob rab tu g-yo ba'i yid kyis gal te shi bar gyur pa na //
T02TD1346E:29a-4: dpal ldan mi yi 'jig rten du ni rab mchog thub pa'i rigs su rnal 'byor ldan pa skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:29a-5: sngon gyi goms pa de yis slar yang ye shes rnal 'byor yangs pa dag ni kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:29a-6: ye shes thob na mi zad mchog gi gnas su rab 'gro gang du slar yang skye ba ldan pa min /
T02TD1346E:29a-7: 97 / ye shes skye ste rgyal ba rnams kyi nyi ma nyin mo'i dus su mtshan mo phyed dang mtshan mo'i mthar //
T02TD1346E:29a-8: lha min rnams kyi zla ba mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma phyed dang nyin mo dag gi mjug tu'o //
T02TD1346E:29a-9: yang dag ye shes rnam nyams dag la tshig ni legs sbyar tha mal dag tu rab tu 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:29a-10: zhi dang drag po las skye srid pa gsum gyi gnas su skyes bu nyid dang tha mal dag kyang ngo /
T02TD1346E:29a-11: 98 / nyi ma gung dang mtshan mo phyed nas nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su de dag gi ni za ba'i dus //
T02TD1346E:29a-12: bza' ba zan dang ba lang sha ste btung ba rnam mang bcud ster dag dang sgo nga'i khu ba'o //
T02TD1346E:29a-13: gos ni dmar dang dkar po dag dang nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa bzhin du mtho ris sa 'og gnas //
T02TD1346E:29a-14: chos ni 'tshe med 'tshe ba yang ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis rdo rje lha min gdan yang ngo /
T02TD1346E:29a-15: 99 /'byung po rnams kyi las ni 'dren mar rab tu 'gyur te tshig kyang 'dres pa sha za dag gi'o //
T02TD1346E:29a-16: chos ni 'tshe med 'tshe ldan nges par bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis srog gcod la sogs skyon dag la //
T02TD1346E:29a-17: mchod sbyin la sogs don du rab tu 'jug 'gyur mi yi bdag po res 'ga' dag ni ldog pa 'am //
T02TD1346E:29a-18: bza' ba btung ba dag kyang 'dres pa nyi zla'i bgrod pa dag las lam ni 'dren ma gzhan du'o /
T02TD1346E:29a-19: 100 /'od zer lam ni nyi ma'i snang ba dkar po nyin mo bgrod pa byang dang lho yi phyed dag kyang //
T02TD1346E:29a-20: zla ba'i snang ba mtshan mo dag dang dkar min bgrod pa 'di ni lho ste du ba dag gi lam //
T02TD1346E:29b-0: 'od zer lha rnams mtho ris su ste dkar min dag kyang de bzhin lha min klu yi 'jig rten @29b du ;
T02TD1346E:29b-1: / kun tu 'dres pa mi bdag mi yi 'jig rten du ni yi dags dud 'gro mi rnams dag gir 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:29b-2: 101 / gang zhig gang gi dbus su rab zhugs brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' las kyi zhags pas nges bcings pa //
T02TD1346E:29b-3: de yi dbus su rang rang bsam pas mi bdag de yi rigs su de yi 'dzin pa dag gir 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:29b-4: ji srid sems kyi rang bzhin dag ni rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis tshor ba bde dang sdug bsngal ba //
T02TD1346E:29b-5: de srid 'jigs rung 'khor ba 'dir 'khyam mi yi bdag po mtho ris mi yul dag dang 'og tu yang /
T02TD1346E:29b-6: 102 / ka sogs sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa dag kyang yon tan gyis bsgyur gang yang phyogs gsum dag gi dbyangs //
T02TD1346E:29b-7: nges par sum cu'i gsal byed de dag rnams las rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'chi bas rgyu ba ste //
T02TD1346E:29b-8: gza' lnga'i rkang pa nyi ma ri bong can gyi rkang pa dag dang sgra gcan mjug rings rkang pa dang //
T02TD1346E:29b-9: sum cu rtsa gnyis lo dang phyogs kyang yon tan gyis bsgyur zla ba nyi ma me yis phye ba'o /
T02TD1346E:29b-10: 103 / lo gsum gyis ni phyogs rnams dag dang ri bong can gyi yon tan dus kyi me yi phyogs gnyis dag / lo brgya las ni dman gyur lhag ma'i phyogs ni nyi zla dag gi mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa la //
T02TD1346E:29b-11: 'jig rten mig dang me mig grangs te nyin mtshan dus rnams gtso bo dag gis dman pa mtha' dag ste //
T02TD1346E:29b-12: gsal byed la sogs ste pa dbyangs rnams dag ni nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'chi bas zos /
T02TD1346E:29b-14: 104 / phyed bcas 'khor lo'i chu tshod ri bong can gyi rkang pa dang bral gza' yi chu tshod rnams dman pa //
T02TD1346E:29b-15: de dag rnams kyang shes rab thabs kyi rab tu dbye pa dag gis nyin mtshan dus kyis 'chi bas zos //
T02TD1346E:29b-16: de ltar sde pa dbyangs bcas dbyangs kyi tshogs dang bcas pa gsal byed rnams nyid dag dang rkang pa ni //
T02TD1346E:29b-17: dman dang bar ma dus 'chi zla ba nyi ma'i 'chi ba dang ni gsal byed lhag pa'i lha la'o /
T02TD1346E:29b-18: 105 / sum cu gnyis dang nyin zhag gcig kyang ri bong can bcas nyi ma'i bgrod la rtsa ni gcod pa 'di //
T02TD1346E:30a-0: slar yang sum cu mtshan mo gsum gyis rdo @30a * //
T02TD1346E:30a-1: rje dang bcas phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs 'dor //
T02TD1346E:30a-2: zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag dor nas dung can mar ni srog gi rlung dag nyin gcig rab 'jug ste //
T02TD1346E:30a-3: sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par chad pa ji srid nyid du'o /
T02TD1346E:30a-4: 106 / dang por mtha' dag rgyal ba'i lus ni dngos grub rgyu ru sngags pa dag gis yang dag bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1346E:30a-5: lus med na ni dngos grub med cing skye ba 'di la mchog gi bde ba thob par 'gyur ba'ang med //
T02TD1346E:30a-6: de phyir lus kyi don gyi rgyur ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su rtsa yi sbyor ba bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:30a-7: lus ni grub na gzhan pa'i dngos grub srid pa gsum gyi gnas su mngag gzhug nyid du rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:30a-9: 107 / stong pa la ni du ba sogs lam bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis gzugs brnyan mtshams su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:30a-10: de nas rtsa yi 'khor lo rnams su srog dang thur sel rlung ni brtan pa dag kyang byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:30a-11: phyi nas zla pa [?] des par 'gog pa gza' bzhin byed de byang chub sems ni rnal 'byor pa yis so //
T02TD1346E:30a-12: de nas gang zhig cung zad 'dod pa dag ni nyin zhag 'ga' yis skye ba 'di la thob par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:30a-14: 108 / nyi ma zla ba 'gog pa mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa la ste dbu ma me la rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1346E:30a-15: srog dang thur sel gnyis po dag kyang nyin zhag dang po sod [?] na dus min 'chi ba slu pa ste //
T02TD1346E:30a-16: lag pa dang bcas rkang pa'i sor mo'i tshigs dang sen mo'i mthar ni srog gis kun tu gang byas nas //
T02TD1346E:30a-17: 'khor lo drug la sangs rgyas lha mo 'jigs med lag pa'i padma rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:30a-18: 109 / thur sel bskum na 'dod par 'gyur te lus mchog dag la rlung gi nad ni ma lus dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:30a-19: srog rtsol dag ni bad kan la 'gyur slar yang de dag gtong ba mkhris pa dag gi skyon la'o //
T02TD1346E:30a-20: steng dang 'og ni yang dag 'gog pa bde ba byed par 'gyur te 'dus pa dag dang rims la'o //
T02TD1346E:30a-21: lte ba'i steng du srog gi rlung ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog lte ba'i rtsa bar gzhan pa dag kyang ngo /
T02TD1346E:30a-22: 110 / bskum ste thur sel rlung ni rnam pa gsum gyi lam du bgrod pa dag dang srog nyid steng nas kyang //
T02TD1346E:30b-0: ji @30b srid yang dag phrad de me ni stobs dang ldan zhing lus kun la ni khyab par rab 'gyur ba //
T02TD1346E:30b-1: dmu chu skran dang gzhang 'brum nad rnams dag kyang lto bar son pa zla ba'i sbyor bas 'joms pa ste //
T02TD1346E:30b-2: dbugs lud dang ni glo dang rnam pa gsum gyi dug dang mig gi nad la sogs pa dag kyang ngo /
T02TD1346E:30b-4: 111 / mchan khung g-yas dang g-yas min las ni nu ma dag kyang stobs ldan mnan te srog ni bkag pa las //
T02TD1346E:30b-5: g-yas nas g-yon pa'i rtsar ni 'phral la rab tu 'bab ste g-yon pa'i mchan khung las kyang g-yas su'o //
T02TD1346E:30b-6: zla ba phyed kyis kyang ni 'chi ster 'chi ltas 'phrog ste rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis so //
T02TD1346E:30b-7: rdo rje skyil krung du gnas rkang pa gzung pa lag pa'i padmo dag ni rgyab kyi zug rngu 'joms /
T02TD1346E:30b-8: 119 / steng du rkang pa dag dang 'og tu mgo bo lus la bad kan nad rnams mtha' dag 'phrog par byed //
T02TD1346E:30b-9: srog 'gog pa las nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gis ni rab 'khru gci ba'i nad dag nges par 'joms par byed //
T02TD1346E:30b-10: tho rangs ming med dag gis chu dang bral ba'i khar ni so yi phreng ba dag la rab bdar ba //
T02TD1346E:30b-11: mig rnams dag gi mig sman du 'gyur slar yang nad ni 'phrog pa chu yis gtor ba dag kyang ngo /
T02TD1346E:30b-12: 113 / gan rkyal nyal nas lte ba lag pa'i padmas gzung ba dag ni ma zhu ba yi zug rngu 'joms //
T02TD1346E:30b-13: 'bras rnams 'byung ba la ni nges par mar dang bcas pa'i tshva yis bdugs na 'phel ba 'joms par byed //
T02TD1346E:30b-14: de nas aa rka'i 'o ma byugs pas kyang ngo 'ga' zhig tshe na so srin zug rngu bcas 'gyur na //
T02TD1346E:30b-15: stag ldan gyi ni sa bon du ba sbubs la sogs pa dag gis 'dir bzung srin bu la sogs 'joms /
T02TD1346E:30b-16: 114 / lo phyed kyis ni sngags pa rnams kyi mchog gi lus la dkar ba'i mdze 'phrog de las gzhan lta ci //
T02TD1346E:30b-17: shes rab 'dus la rang sems lhung ba dag kyang rtag tu srog gi rlung gis 'gog pa dag las te //
T02TD1346E:31a-0: bdun cu'i lo yi rga pa skra dkar bcas pa dag kyang lo gnyis rab tu rdzogs na nges par 'phrog / nyi ma 'ga' yis lam dang sems ni rab tu 'grogs pa dag las de steng phyag @31a * //
T02TD1346E:31a-2: 115 / srog rtsol rab tu bya ste snying ga de bzhin mgo bo dag ni ji srid me yis gdung 'gyur ba //
T02TD1346E:31a-3: de las steng dag tu ni bzang po'i padmar brgyal bar 'gyur te ma bsdams pa'am stobs dag gis //
T02TD1346E:31a-4: gtsug tor phug cing phung po dag dang khams rnams rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba nyid du 'gro 'gyur te //
T02TD1346E:31a-5: phyag rgya 'grogs pa rab nyams skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la ni bde 'bras ster ba med /
T02TD1346E:31a-6: 116 / phyag rgya bsgom pa'i don du gsungs te nyin mtshan dus su chags pa zad pa'i don ni min pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:31a-7: gsung gi rdo rje mchod pa'i don te nges par sngags pa rnams la myos byed gsungs pa nyid ma yin //
T02TD1346E:31a-8: kha zas thams cad bde ba'i don te nyin zhag so so'i dus su ma zhu'i rgyur yang ma gsungs so //
T02TD1346E:31a-9: dpal ldan spyod pa dngos grub rgyur te mtshan ma dur khrod 'khyam pa dag kyang rtsed mo'i don ma yin /
T02TD1346E:31a-10: 117 / mi bskyod pa ni cung zad dro ba kha nad zhi bar byed de so yi zug rngu nyid kyi yang //
T02TD1346E:31a-11: tho rangs mi bskyod rngubs pa dag ni mgo yi nad 'phrog de bzhin nyid du chu ni rngubs pas so //
T02TD1346E:31a-12: rna ba dag dang mig tu gcin ni dro dang grang mo rab blugs gnyis ka dag gi nad 'phrog go //
T02TD1346E:31a-13: 'byung pos gzir la tsha ba gsum bcas mi bskyod rngubs na bde ba ster te zos pa nyid la yang /
T02TD1346E:31a-14: 118 / bshang ba gcin dang khu ba khrag ni mi yi sha dang bcas pa zos pas tshe ni ster bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:31a-15: bsam gtan bcas par me tog rngubs na skra dkar dang bcas rga ba dang ni lus skyes rnams kyang 'phrog / sgron ma lnga po sbrang bu'i skyugs pa dag dang bsres pa zos pas mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa ste //
T02TD1346E:31a-16: bud med me tog khu ba dag dang bsres pa lo gcig zos na rga ba nges par sel bar byed /
T02TD1346E:31a-17: 119 / rlung 'joms lan tshva skyur bdag tu rab tu 'gyur te mngar dang bska ba dag ni mkhris pa'i dgra //
T02TD1346E:31a-18: bad kan 'joms pa kha ba kun dang de bzhin tsha ba dag kyang sman rnams sam ni khu ba'am //
T02TD1346E:31a-19: bad kan 'joms pa [?] ra yi 'o ma tsha ba gsum bcas dag ste ma he'i 'o ma mkhris pa'i dgra //
T02TD1346E:31b-0: rlung 'joms dag @31b kyang rnga mo'i 'o ma rnam gsum nad 'phrog pa yi 'o ma dang ni de bzhin mar /
T02TD1346E:31b-1: 120 / dz'a ti bskol ba'i chu ni dro ba kha nad zhi bar byed de so yi zug rngu nyid kyang ngo //
T02TD1346E:31b-2: til mar dngos po'i chu bskol tsha ba gsum dang lan tshva dag gis rna ba yi ni nad dag 'joms //
T02TD1346E:31b-3: mar dang 'o ma bskol bar gyur pa klu dang dmar po dag gis rtag tu sna yi nad dag 'joms //
T02TD1346E:31b-4: ka rko t'i dang l'a ng+ga li dang ai ndr'i bong bu'i chur bcas byugs pas 'bras kyi phreng ba 'phrog 121 / lag pa dag ni rab 'phyang rkang pa'i padma mnyam pa dag dang srog gi rlung ni 'gog bya ste //
T02TD1346E:31b-5: ji srid lus ni sa la rab tu lhung bar ma gyur pa dang tsha ba dag ni grol bar yang //
T02TD1346E:31b-6: yang dang yang du ting nge 'dzin la'o 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i tsher ma can ni nges 'joms te //
T02TD1346E:31b-7: snying ga'i padmar zla ba'i gzugs can dri med ri bong can mtshungs sna tshogs yum ni bsgoms pas so /
T02TD1346E:31b-8: 122 / sran chung btags nas 'thungs pas tsha bas rnam par bsnun pa'i mi rnams kyi ni tsher ma 'joms par byed //
T02TD1346E:31b-9: tsha ba'i mthar ni thod pa bdar ba mi bskyod bsres pa yis kyang 'jigs par byed pa 'phrog pa ste //
T02TD1346E:31b-10: sngags kyang chu me rlung rnams dag gi sngon du aom yig dang ni ba dzra snga ma dag gi ming //
T02TD1346E:31b-11: de nyid kyis ni bsrung bar bya ste mgo mgrin snying ga lte ba gsang ba la sogs rnams su'o /
T02TD1346E:31b-12: 123 / mnyam pa dh'a tri dh'a n+ya dang ni gzhan yang de bzhin ti nti ri yi 'dab ma'i phye ma dag / nyi zla reg pa'i chu ni nges par dri ma bral ba dag la rkang pa'i lhag mar bskol bar bya //
T02TD1346E:31b-13: de yi khu ba ka ra dang bsres gzhan pa'i nyin zhag dag nas zhag gsum 'thungs pa de yis ni //
T02TD1346E:31b-14: sog nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis bsregs pa 'chi ster 'phrog ste khams bdun song ba dag kyang ngo /
T02TD1346E:31b-15: 124 / gser la nyi ma khab len lcags dang pa ta las skyes lcags ni m'a kshi ka yis gdab par bya //
T02TD1346E:31b-16: sa bon phyed kyis kyang ni dri ma dag dang bral ba'i dngul chu bsgongs pa srang ni drug tu bya //
T02TD1346E:31b-17: ba yi dar ba drag po'i rtse mo can gyis bsad nas 'dir ni [?] dangs ma gzung bar bya ba nyid //
T02TD1346E:32a-1: ldan gong bu khab len snod du slar yang bskol ba dag kyang ji srid phyed kyi tshad du'o /
T02TD1346E:32a-2: 125 / rab tu blangs te dag pa'i ka ra srang brgyad yang na dgu ni de la bsre ba nyid du bya //
T02TD1346E:32a-3: de ni thams cad dus su bza' bar bya ste kha zas rnam spangs bgrod pa ji srid nyid du'o //
T02TD1346E:32a-4: zla ba drug gis lha yi lus te skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral 'di yis 'chi med nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:32a-5: de phyir de nyid nyi ma so so'i dus su bza' bar bya ste 'on kyang gong bus rnam par dman /
T02TD1346E:32a-6: 126 / sngar brjod sa bon rgyal po mnyam pa dag ste gzhan yang dngul chu la ni blugs pa phyed tsam mo //
T02TD1346E:32a-7: lan tshva skyur po dag gis mnyes nas rnam pa mang po'i sman gyis ji srid gcig nyid du 'gyur ba //
T02TD1346E:32a-8: mkhris pa skyur pos mu zi sogs dang dar [?] da dang shil [?] dag kyang dngul chu mtshungs par mnye //
T02TD1346E:32a-9: de yis dngul gyi 'dab ma byugs pa gser nyid du 'gyur smin pa dag kyang phyed dang ldan pas so /
T02TD1346E:32a-10: 127 / rnon po nam mkha' las skyes aa la lan tshva ya ba ksha ra dang ni sa rdza rim pa yis //
T02TD1346E:32a-11: 'phel ba dag kyang nyi ma nyis 'gyur ro mnyam byed pas nyi ma'i lhag ma dag ni bsreg par bya //
T02TD1346E:32a-12: slar yang lan tshvas dag pa dang ni de bzhin ba las byung ba la sogs kyis bran 'jam par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:32a-13: dngul la sum cha byin zhing bkang ste bsnun pa dag kyang dag pa yi ni me tog nyid du 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:32a-14: 128 / ae la ga bur phreng ba dang ni g-yo ba gha na 'bras bu can dang bya rog ri skyes dang //
T02TD1346E:32a-15: ka kko la dang si dha m'u tra autpala 'bras bu ri dags skyes dmar dee tya p'u ti dang //
T02TD1346E:32a-16: klu dang bsil ba ra na 'dab ma pa la chu dang 'khri shing nam mkha' 'khyog po 'di dag ni //
T02TD1346E:32a-17: rdzas lnga dag gis dri mdzod ri dags ri bong can sogs bdug pa me tog chang la sogs pas so /
T02TD1346E:32a-18: 129 / mig zla me [?] dang rgya mtsho mda' dang yon tan chu gter ro dang lag pa zla ba mda' dang mig / zla me rgya mtsho zla ba dus dang dus mda' mig dang chu gter mda' mig zla ba 'jig rten rnams //
T02TD1346E:32a-19: ae la la sogs cha shas grangs rnams rim pas yongs su bkod pa re mig lnga lnga dag la ste //
T02TD1346E:32b-0: rdzas ni le tshe sbyar ba'i grong khyer la gnas dag pa'i @32b cha shas nyin zhag ces byas drir 'gyur ro /
T02TD1346E:32b-1: 130 / dz'a ti la sogs ae la 'khri shing 'dab ma kee la sha yi grong du rim pas dgod bya ba //
T02TD1346E:32b-2: rgya skyegs sa rdza 'o ma pu ra si ta dag ste bdug pa'i bya ba rnams la bdug par bya //
T02TD1346E:32b-3: ga bur ka ra me tog ro dang ldan pa dag dang sen mo dag ni me yi cha shas kyis //
T02TD1346E:32b-4: de dag sbrang rtsi dang bral dri yi chu yis sbyar ba dag kyang spos kyi reng bur rab tu bya /
T02TD1346E:32b-5: 131 / lte ba dang po sidha m'u tra ri bong can dang mkha' yi grong du khrus sbyor la dgod bya //
T02TD1346E:32b-6: gra nthi stag dang ha re nu dang ha ta gzhan yang de bzhin dung ltar shun pa dag gi cha ;
T02TD1346E:32b-7: / dh'a n+ya mu rb'i brgya yis mtshan dang da ma ma dhu ri ni de bzhin dril phyis dag la yang //
T02TD1346E:32b-8: sngar brjod ma bzlog pa la chu skyes bzhin du lus dang gra nthi pa rna dag kyang til mar la'o /
T02TD1346E:32b-9: 132 / phye ma dag la gra nthi de bzhin 'gyur te lus dang ha ta btung ba bsgo dang kha la yang //
T02TD1346E:32b-10: shun pa po la gri ntha dung ni 'bras bu 'dab ma sbyar ba'i smin dang dang ba sogs la yang //
T02TD1346E:32b-11: de ltar rab dbye sum cu dag gis legs spras rnam mang dri dang spos la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya //
T02TD1346E:32b-12: rdzas ni rnam par dag cing 'bras bu sbyar bas smin dang bsgos pa dag ni phug pa dag gis kyang ;
T02TD1346E:32b-13: 133 / dang por brgyad cha 'dab ma'i dbang gis bska bar 'gyur te de yi nyis 'gyur dag ni drag po'i spos //
T02TD1346E:32b-14: phyi nas rdzas kyi tshad kyi bu ram dag kyang bsreg par bya ste so ga'i sbyor ba dag las 'phel //
T02TD1346E:32b-15: rkang pa'i cha shas dung gi bdug pa sbrang rtsi dkar po dag kyang rdzas dang mnyam pa nges par bsreg / gong bu dung gi tshad de ma la ya dang yang dang g-yo ba zla ba ldan pa de bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:32b-16: 134 / smin pa'i dri ni me tog bzang po rnams kyis nyin zhag 'ga' zhig ji srid 'dod par bsgo bar bya //
T02TD1346E:32b-17: phyi nas 'bugs pa brgya yi cha shas 'bras bu gsum dang zla ba ma de chad [?] dang bcas pas bya //
T02TD1346E:32b-18: shi gru'i chu dang tsh'a ga mu tra me tog bcud mnyam me tog las skyes mthar ni bskol bar bya //
T02TD1346E:32b-19: zla ba gcig ni so ba'i smin par 'gyur te ri dags dang mnyam chang dang lte ba 'bigs pa'o /
T02TD1346E:33a-0: 135 / gsang ba dri la p'u ti ra sa sen mo g-yo ba spos kyi sbyor ba @33a * //
T02TD1346E:33a-2: de bzhin bsil ba tu ru ka dang gu ru ri bong can yang bsgo ba'i bya bar me tog go //
T02TD1346E:33a-3: 'bugs pa la ni ga bur lte ba 'bras bu gsum dang [?] ma da'i chang ste yang dag khrus sbyor la //
T02TD1346E:33a-4: gsang ba shun pa gra nthi pa rna nags su rgyu ba dang bcas gra nthi dril phyis dag la yang /
T02TD1346E:33a-5: 136 / chu skyes dag pa rdzas kyis dman zhing mngar ba dag dang rnam pa bral bar dri yi chu yis btags //
T02TD1346E:33a-6: spos kyi smin pa bska ba drag po sbrang rtsi dang bcas lag skyes dag gis kham bu rim pas 'phel //
T02TD1346E:33a-7: kham bu gnyis ni ka ra bsres pa dag ste ma la ya dang g-yo ba lcags dang ga pur yang //
T02TD1346E:33a-8: kham bu'i thog ma tha mar sbrang rtsi dag dang dkar po nges par bsreg ste dang po spos las so /
T02TD1346E:33a-9: 137 / nyin zhag 'ga' zhig me tog bzang po rnams kyis bsgo ba byas nas dri yi chu yis bsres pa dag /'jim pa'i thad pa 'dzag pa min pa spra tshil dang ni gos kyis bcings te brtan par kha bcad la //
T02TD1346E:33a-10: shin tu che ba'i snod dam yang na sa 'og tu ste bye ma dag gis gang bar byas nas ni //
T02TD1346E:33a-11: zla ba drug gi sbyor bas smin par 'gyur te chu la gnas pa de ni lte ba'i gtso bo'i dri /
T02TD1346E:33a-12: 138 / til rnams 'dab ma bskol ba'i chu dag dang ni spos dang byug pa la sogs rnams kyis dag byas nas //
T02TD1346E:33a-13: phyi nas dz'a ti la sogs me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag 'ga' zhig ji srid 'dod par bsgo bar bya //
T02TD1346E:33a-14: 'khrul 'khor dag las til mar blangs nas mi yi bdag po mkhas pas mching bu'i snod du gzhag par bya //
T02TD1346E:33a-15: khrus sam yan lag byug pa dag las myos byed me tog til mar nyid ni smin pa min par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:33a-16: 139 / sa 'dzin nyi ma zla ba ma nu mig dang 'dod pa nor dang drag po rgyal po me dag dang //
T02TD1346E:33a-17: phyogs dang 'byung ba bug pa drug dang [?] tshes dang chu gter dag ni mtha' yi re mig la gzhag bya //
T02TD1346E:33a-18: grangs ni re mig bzhi yis chu yi gter dang rtse mo can te dpal ldan 'khor lo mtha' dag ni //
T02TD1346E:33a-19: tshad kyi rgyab tu bris nas rab tu btsa' bar 'gyur ba'i dus su sbrum ma rnams la bstan par bya /
T02TD1346E:33b-0: 140 / rnal 'byor ma rnams gang dag rab gsal @33b sa gzhi dag la brgyad pa brgyad kyi ma mor rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:33b-1: mngal zhes bya dang nyin zhag ces bya sum 'gyur dgu dang bcu ste bcu gcig gzhan ni lnga pa gsum //
T02TD1346E:33b-2: zla ba zhes dang lo zhes bya ste mtha' dag sa yi steng du de dag byis pa rab tu 'dzin //
T02TD1346E:33b-3: mngal du zug rngu dang ni rab tu btsa' ba'i dus su skye gnas la yang zug gzer byed pa nyid /
T02TD1346E:33b-4: 141 / skyes pa rnams la byis pa'i rgyud du 'gyur te nyin zhag dbang dang zla ba lo yi rab dbye las //
T02TD1346E:33b-5: ma rungs gzhon nu lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tshigs mtshams dag la yang dag gnas gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:33b-6: thams cad rang gi tshes la 'jigs gyur byis pa 'dzin par byed de rgyal po nges par gtong mi byed //
T02TD1346E:33b-7: de dag zhi ba'i don du 'dir ni rnam mang dkyil 'khor khrus dang sbyin sreg dag tu rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:33b-8: 142 / ru rta au s'i ra dang ka se ru ste ta ka ra dang autpala 'dam skyes ge sar ni //
T02TD1346E:33b-9: bsil ba'i chu yis btags shing rdo rje yis ni bsngags pa dag kyang mngal gyi zug rngu la rab sbyin //
T02TD1346E:33b-10: mngal ni rengs na na ku la dang gtsug phud can gyi spu brgyad btags nas rab tu sbyin par bya //
T02TD1346E:33b-11: 'o ma mar dang thug pa zan ni zho dang bu ram bcas pa nyin zhag ma rnams dag la sbyin /
T02TD1346E:33b-12: 143 / smin pa'i zas lnga tha dad zho dang bu ram dang bcas po li ka dang mo da ka dag dang //
T02TD1346E:33b-13: dri dang me tog mar me bkru ba dag kyang 'dab ma rnams kyis mtshan mo lnga ni rab tu bya //
T02TD1346E:33b-14: ba lang so dang lug gi rva dang ri dags sen mo skra dang sbrul gyi shun pa dag gi spos //
T02TD1346E:33b-15: byis pa zla skyes rnams ni rgyas pa'i don du mtha' dag brjod pa rnams kyang gtor ma dag la'o /
T02TD1346E:33b-16: 144 / bza' ba lnga dang bca' ba lnga dang chu la rgyu ba sha dang dri dang me tog mar me dang //
T02TD1346E:33b-17: chang dang sngar brjod [?] sbos dang bkru [?] bdag dang de bzhin phyogs kyi gtor ma dag ni phyogs kyi char //
T02TD1346E:33b-18: byis pa lor ni skyes pa rnams dag rab tu gsal bar sa la rgyas pa'i slad du mi yi dbang //
T02TD1346E:33b-19: mngal nas lo ni lnga pa gsum du nges par rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu mchod pa dag tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:34a-1: dag na ste kha dang lag pa rkang pa ser po nyid du yang dag 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:34a-2: gcin ni kha dog ser po dag dang tsha ba zhes pa dang ni skyug dang skam dang brgyal bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:34a-3: mtshan ma rnams ni shes par gyur nas de rnams kyi yang mi bdag rgyur ni dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bya ;
T02TD1346E:34a-4: / ma byin na ni gtong bar mi 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba las skyes ma mos kyang /
T02TD1346E:34a-5: 146 / gang gi yan lag thams cad dkar por 'gyur dang mi yi bdag po 'brum pa shin tu phra mo dang //
T02TD1346E:34a-6: mgrin pa lus dang bcas pa 'khyog cing kha dang gsang ba bshang lam dag las khrag ni zag gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:34a-7: de la mchod pa bya ba min te sngags pa rmongs pa rnams ni chung ngu nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:34a-8: de ni 'chi bar 'gyur te nges par lha dang mi dang lag 'gro rnams kyis bsrung bar nus pa min /
T02TD1346E:34a-9: 147 / klu dang gnod sbyin gang yang gza' dang lha min rigs skyes srin po dag dang sha za rnams dang ni //
T02TD1346E:34a-10: s'i kam n+ya dang bdug pa'i l'a ma mi khrag la dga' mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can ma dag dang //
T02TD1346E:34a-11: grul bum dag dang zhing skyong rnams dang tshogs kyi bdag po yi dags ro langs dag dang grub pa dang //
T02TD1346E:34a-12: brjed byed dang bcas mkha' 'gro'i dbang rnams dkyil 'khor dag la mchod pa byas na mchog bde byed par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:34a-13: 148 / ma rungs pa rnams mchod pa'i don du dkyil 'khor du 'gyur mi yi bdag po grong gi phyi rol du //
T02TD1346E:34a-14: shing gi gnas dang dur khrod dang ni lha mchog khang pa dag gam chu bo 'dus pa rnams su ste //
T02TD1346E:34a-15: khru gang dag gam gnyis dang bzhi ni dgu dang bcu gsum mi bdag lha rnams dag gi tshad kyis so //
T02TD1346E:34a-16: dbus su rtsibs brgyad 'khor lor 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor dag las phyed kyi cha shas so /
T02TD1346E:34a-17: 149 / sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad char 'gyur te nges par de yi phyed kyis kha khyer dag dang do shal lo //
T02TD1346E:34a-18: ra ba dag ni kha khyer phyed de rta babs dag kyang sgo yi tshad las sum 'gyur dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:34a-19: zlum po'i thab ni cha gsum padma dkar po'i rang bzhin dkar ba'i tshon rnams dag gis bkang ba ste //
T02TD1346E:34b-0: @34b dpal ldan tshon lnga dag gis lha rnams kyi ni rang phyogs rigs kyi dbang gis rang gi mtshan ma bya /
T02TD1346E:34b-1: 150 / rdo rje dbus dang ral gri dbang por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lhor ni rin chen dmar po'o //
T02TD1346E:34b-2: g-yon du 'dab ma brgya dang bcas pa'i padma dkar po dag dang nub tu 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang //
T02TD1346E:34b-3: mer ni gri gug nges par padma'i 'dab ma la gnas lha min zur du lcags kyu dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:34b-4: rlung du rdo rje zhags par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po drag po'i 'dab ma dag la rtse gsum mo /
T02TD1346E:34b-5: 151 / shar gyi sgor ni ral gri nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pa dag ste lhor ni rdo rje'i dbyug pa'o //
T02TD1346E:34b-6: chu ru dpal ldan be con dag tu rab tu 'gyur te nges par byang du tho ba dag kyang ngo //
T02TD1346E:34b-7: sems kyi rjes 'brang shes nas shin tu rnam pa mang po dus kyi 'khor lo dag ni ji srid par //
T02TD1346E:34b-8: mo gsham rnams kyi bu yi don dang gdon gyis bcom pa'i mi rnams zhi rgyas don du 'di dag mdzod /
T02TD1346E:34b-9: 152 / bum pa brgyad ni rin chen dang bcas 'dab ma padma'i kha dang so ma btang ba'i kham phor ni //
T02TD1346E:34b-10: bdun gyis chu dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas bkrus te slar yang nyungs kar sogs kyis nges par brab //
T02TD1346E:34b-11: dri dang bdug pa mar me rnam mang 'bras bu ro dang me tog dkar po dag dang gos rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:34b-12: rnam par bkra ba'i mchod pa byas te slar yang de nas zhi ba'i bsreg bya dag ni sbyin sreg bya /
T02TD1346E:34b-13: 153 /'o ma so ba til la sogs dang 'o ma'i rkang 'thung lnga rnams dag gi yam shing 'dab brgya dang //
T02TD1346E:34b-14: mchod yon dag dang spyan drang zhal bsil dang ni de bzhin nyid du rjed dang mchod pa 'di dag ni //
T02TD1346E:34b-15: rab mchog sa yi steng du ma mo rnams kyis gzir ba rnams dag zhi ba'i don du bya ba ste //
T02TD1346E:34b-16: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams mi yi bdag po dus kun tu ni mchod pa nyid du 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:34b-17: 154 / bdag med las kyi rnam smin srid pa gsum dang dus kyi 'gro ba yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel las //
T02TD1346E:34b-18: yang dag byung dang rig byed bden pa gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i dgu ni ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos rnams te //
T02TD1346E:35a-0: phung po lnga dang sku gsum lhan skyes shes dang de @35a * //
T02TD1346E:35a-1: bzhin nyid du blun pa ma yin stong pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:35a-2: 'di dag gang du brjod pa de ni nges par rdo rje can gyi bstan pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:35a-3: 155 / gang du rig byed rang byung kha dang lag pa rkang pa la sogs dag kyang skye bo'i skye gnas te //
T02TD1346E:35a-4: aa shva me dha dag las gzhan pa mchog gi chos med ces pa de ni tshangs pa'i bstan par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:35a-5: byed po bdag dang las dang dus dang rang bzhin dang ni yon tan stong pa nyid ni nyams pa'i chos //
T02TD1346E:35a-6: byed po 'bras bu'i rgyu ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par bstan pa de 'dir khyab 'jug dag gi'o /
T02TD1346E:35a-8: 156 / lam drug rnams dang de nyid lnga dang mchog gi go 'phang ma lus pa yang gzhan ni sngags kyi lus //
T02TD1346E:35a-9: rig bdag dam pa'i zhi ba nyid dang rnam gsum gnas na gnas pa dag gi sbyor dang gtong ba'i dngos //
T02TD1346E:35a-10: thig le'i dbye ba zhi ba nyid dang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bcu gnyis mdud pa'i dbye ba ste //
T02TD1346E:35a-11: 'di dag thams cad gang du rab tu gyur pa de ni nges par zhi ba pa yi bstan pa'o /
T02TD1346E:35a-12: 157 / dbang phyug med cing las kyi rnam smin dag kyang yon tan yul rnams 'byung ba'i tshogs ni longs spyod pa //
T02TD1346E:35a-13: de med pa na 'bras bu med pa gsal bar lha yi bla ma dag gis bstan par rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:35a-14: byed pos rgyu dang mi rgyu las skyes mtha' dag bskyed cing stag gzig rnams kyi thar pa dag gi rgyu //
T02TD1346E:35a-15: de mnyes pa las nges par mi rnams mtho ris su 'gyur de ni ra hma na yi bstan pa'o /
T02TD1346E:35a-16: 158 / dus gsum nyid dang rdzas ni drug ste tshig dgus bsgrubs dang srog ni drug gi lus la cha shas so //
T02TD1346E:35a-17: gzhan ni yod pa'i lus lnga brtul zhugs sdom pa 'gro dang ye shes spyod pa dag gi dbye ba rnams //
T02TD1346E:35a-18: srog ni lus kyi tshad de dpag tu med pa'i srid pa dag gis rtag pa'i srog gis thar pa'o //
T02TD1346E:35a-19: gang du thar pa'i tshad ni steng du nges par brjod pa de ni rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan pa'o /
T02TD1346E:35a-20: 159 / rig byed 'di ni rang byung min te srid pa gsum gyi gnas su rig byed sgra ni don rjod byed //
T02TD1346E:35a-21: tshangs pa'i gdong bzhi dag gis sngon ni rig byed sgra dag gis kyang don ni rab tu gsal bar byas //
T02TD1346E:35b-0: ci ste @35b sgra dang don ni tha dad min na me sgra brjod pa dag gis kha ni cis mi sreg / de phyir nges par ston pa po yod rig pa'i yul dang ma 'ongs don dang 'das pa dag la yang /
T02TD1346E:35b-1: 160 / rig byed nam mkha' mtshungs min 'dir ni gnas kyi dbye ba dag las kha yis rab brjod byas pa'o //
T02TD1346E:35b-2: rigs pas gnyis skyes kha yis bklags pas nyi tsho ba ste kun tu 'gro ba gzhan rnams klog pa'o //
T02TD1346E:35b-3: gang phyir dmangs la sogs pa'i rigs ni kun 'gro min pa'i rig byed 'di dag klog dang 'dri ba min //
T02TD1346E:35b-4: de phyir shes ldan mkhas par gyur pa'i mi rnams dag la rig byed dag ni tshang mar mi 'gyur ro /
T02TD1346E:35b-5: 161 / gal te thams cad byed po dbang phyug yod na de yang 'gro ba'i las longs spyod po gzhan ma yin //
T02TD1346E:35b-6: gal te dbang phyug las kyi byed po min na de yang kun nas thams cad byed por mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:35b-7: 'di ni gal te byed po gzhan dag bskul na 'di ni byed po dag gi mchog tu gzhan dbang nyid //
T02TD1346E:35b-8: de phyir dge dang mi dge'i 'bras ster byed po dbang phyug med de srog chags las ni dor nas so /
T02TD1346E:35b-9: 162 / sa dang chu me rlung gi rdul phran 'dir ni gal te mkha' la byed po'i dang por yod pa min //
T02TD1346E:35b-10: rdzas dag med pa la ni yul dang rnam par bral ba'i thams cad byed po sna tshogs mi byed do //
T02TD1346E:35b-11: yul dang rnam par bral ba byed po 'di yi tshad ma mngon sum dang ni lkog tu gyur pa med //
T02TD1346E:35b-12: yang dag sbyor ba nyid las thams cad du 'gyur mi yi bdag po 'dod pas ma yin las kyi gzugs /
T02TD1346E:35b-13: 163 / yang dag sbyor ba las ni chu shel las kyang chu ru 'gyur te me long dag las dngos po'i gzugs //
T02TD1346E:35b-14: [?] sgyur ba'i rgyu las lce 'dzag rang gi sgra las cig shos dag pa'i sa bon las ni myu gur 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:35b-15: khab len las kyang lcags kyi thur ma dag ni g-yo bar 'gyur te 'dod pas 'di la ci yang min ;
T02TD1346E:35b-16: / dngos po rnams kyi nus pa 'di ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su su zhig gis kyang [?] sprul pa min /
T02TD1346E:35b-17: 164 / gal te bdag ni kun tu 'gro na gnyen dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ji ltar nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:36a-0: gal te 'di ni rtag par gyur na 'dod pa'i mda' yis bsnun @36a * //
T02TD1346E:36a-1: pa'i gnas skabs nyid du cis rab 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:36a-2: gal te bya ba dang bcas gyur na gnyid log dus su 'di ni rmongs pa nyid du ji ltar 'gro //
T02TD1346E:36a-3: de ltar nges par bdag 'di kun 'gro khyab bdag dang ni sngon gyi bya ba dag dang bcas pa min /
T02TD1346E:36a-4: 165 / bdag med 'byung ba yod cing dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu yod de byed pa po yis rnam par dman //
T02TD1346E:36a-5: 'gro ba po med ma lus thar pa'i slad du 'gro ba yod cing 'ching ba yod de bcings pa med //
T02TD1346E:36a-6: dngos po dngos med dag kyang yod de skad cig rnam bral rang bzhin med pa dag gi srid pa yod //
T02TD1346E:36a-7: 'di dag bdag gi bden pa'i tshig ste lha dang gdengs can rnams kyi don bcas tshig gis 'joms mi 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:36a-8: 166 / gang zhig de nyid gang zag ces bya lus la gnas par smra ba de ni rang bzhin dag gis nyams //
T02TD1346E:36a-9: kun rdzob dag gis don ni smra ba po yang don dam ma rig med pa dag tu 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1346E:36a-10: srid gsum mtha' dag rnam par shes pa nyid du smra ba po yang rnam par shes pa 'dod par byed //
T02TD1346E:36a-11: gang zhig snying rje stong nyid gnyis su med pa smra bo phyogs nyams de ni ma nyams par 'gyur ro /
T02TD1346E:36a-12: 167 / skye bo sngon gyi las rnams nyams su myong 'gyur 'di la byas pa rnams ni skye ba gzhan la'o //
T02TD1346E:36a-13: gal te de lta yin na lus ni 'jig par mi 'gyur mi rnams skye dang skye ba gzhan dag gis //
T02TD1346E:36a-14: dpag med srid pa dag gis 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur dang thar par 'jug pa med pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:36a-15: 'di dag stag gzig rnams kyang nges par 'dod par 'gyur te gzhan pa'i rigs kyis rab tu dman pa'o /
T02TD1346E:36a-16: 168 / gal te 'byung ba gcig tu gyur pas chang gi nus pa bzhin du dbang bcas sems su rab 'gyur na //
T02TD1346E:36a-17: shing rnams dag la ci phyir mir 'gyur sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' sbyor phyir ro //
T02TD1346E:36a-18: 'di dag rnams la skye bo'i nus pa med na 'byung ba yang dag sbyor ba'i nus pa mchog tu brdzun //
T02TD1346E:36a-19: tshu rol mdzes pa'i tshig 'di dag ni mi rnams dag la bde ba'i 'bras bu ster min lam nyams so /
T02TD1346E:36a-20: 169 / srog ni lus kyi tshad dag yin na gal te lag pa rkang pa bcad pas nyams par 'gyur ram ci //
T02TD1346E:36b-0: rtag bdag ni lus kyi mthu las @36b phra mor 'gyur zhing sbom por yang ni rab tu 'gyur ram ci //
T02TD1346E:36b-1: 'khor ba'i las las grol ba gang zhig 'jig rten steng na gnas pa bde ba dag gi gnas su 'gro //
T02TD1346E:36b-2: 'jig rten gsum gang phra rab dag gis gang zhig bkod pa de ni dus kyis rtag tu rtag pa min /
T02TD1346E:36b-3: 170 / zhes pa la sogs ye shes slad du dus kyi 'khor los sa la bstan pa rab tu gsal mdzad pa //
T02TD1346E:36b-4: 'jam dang sra dang gzhan pa'i bag chags stobs kyis skyes bu rnams kyi sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste //
T02TD1346E:36b-5: sems ni nges par dngos po'i tshon gyis nye bar bzhag pa dag las shel bzhin chan ldan nyid 'gyur ba //
T02TD1346E:36b-6: gang yin de phyir rang gzhan rigs su gyur pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang rnal 'byor ba yis sun mi dbyung /
T02TD1346E:36b-7: 171 / chos ni sems can phan pa yul dang rnam par bral ba dag ste chos min dag kyang gnod pa'o //
T02TD1346E:36b-8: 'tshe ba rig byed tshad ma can ni bde ba'i 'bras bu mi ster dus kun du ni sdug bsngal ster //
T02TD1346E:36b-9: dam pa'i byams ldan rmongs pa'i tshig las mchog gi bde ba byed cing sems can bde la rjes su chags //
T02TD1346E:36b-10: de phyir sems can don ni gcig pu dag dang mi bdag yid kyis rang bzhin med pa bsgom par gyis /
T02TD1346E:36b-12: 172 / lha mi'i bla ma nga ni mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu dbang po sa steng du ni 'khor los sgyur //
T02TD1346E:36b-13: sa 'og dag tu klu yi rgyal po gdengs can rigs kyis btud dang kun tu 'gro dang mchog nga ste //
T02TD1346E:36b-14: ye shes sangs rgyas thub dbang 'gyur med mchog dang khyab bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor dang //
T02TD1346E:36b-15: rig byed aom gyi yi ge gtsang ma dag ste rgyal po dngos po kun gyis bdag la skyabs su song /
T02TD1346E:36b-16: 173 / khyod ni ma dang khyod ni pha ste khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla ma khyod ni gnyen dang grogs bzang yang //
T02TD1346E:36b-17: khyod ni mgon po khyod ni byed po phan dang sdig 'phrog khyod ni go 'phang phun sum tshogs pa yang //
T02TD1346E:36b-18: khyod ni 'ba' zhig gnas dang khyod ni yon tan mchog gi gnas te skyon rnams bcom pa khyod nyid do //
T02TD1346E:36b-19: khyod ni dman pa rnams kyi mgon dang yid bzhin nor bu rgyal ba'i dbang po khyod la bdag skyabs mchi /
T02TD1346E:37a-0: 174 / dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas las @37a * //
T02TD1346E:37a-1: phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo chen po las /
T02TD1346E:37a-2: nang nges pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o /
T02TD1346E:37a-4: // / lus la sna tshogs tshad dang nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams dang ni //
T02TD1346E:37a-5: rtsa rnams kyi ni phra mo'i grangs dang rang bzhin dag la skyes bu mu stegs rnams kyi 'dod pa dang //
T02TD1346E:37a-6: rig byed dang ni byed po la sogs dbye ba bdag gis thos pas dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan du gsol //
T02TD1346E:37a-7: zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas bde bar gshegs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gsungs /
T02TD1346E:37a-9: 1 / dang por yang dag bsten bya bla ma dag kyang dam tshig ldan zhing rdo rje theg par lhag par gnas //
T02TD1346E:37a-10: de nyid bsgoms shing ma chags dri ma dag dang rnam par bral zhing bzod pa'i ngang tshul lam la zhugs //
T02TD1346E:37a-11: slob ma rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog cing de nyid las ni tshangs spyod ldan //
T02TD1346E:37a-12: bdud rnams la ni rdo rje dbyug pa de yang 'dzin ma'i gzhi la rdo rje sems dpar rab grags pa'o /
T02TD1346E:37a-13: 2 / nga rgyal dang ldan khro bas zil mnan dam tshig rnam bral rdzas la brkam zhing thos pa dag kyang med //
T02TD1346E:37a-14: slob ma rnams ni slu ba don du gnyer zhing mchog gi bde ba'i gnas las sems nyams dbang ma bskur //
T02TD1346E:37a-15: longs spyod dag la kun chags bag med rtsub mo'i tshig dang bcas shing dbang po'i don du 'dod ldan pa //
