T02TD1346E:37a-16: de nyid dmyal ba bzhin du slob ma mkhas pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni spang bar bya /
T02TD1346E:37a-17: 3 / zab cing rgya che la sems bla ma'i nges pa la dga' gtong ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan yon tan shes //
T02TD1346E:37a-18: thar pa don gnyer rgyud la gus shing g-yo ba min pa'i sems ldan de nyid thob pa shin tu sbed //
T02TD1346E:37a-19: gdug pa rnams kyi grogs nyams slob ma de nyid bla ma shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyis bsdu bya ba //
T02TD1346E:37a-20: shes rab dbang la sogs pa'i rgyur te gzhan zhes bya ba slar yang 'bring po bsod nams dag gi rgyur /
T02TD1346E:37a-21: 4 / nag po'i mthar ni dkar po'i tshigs la gzhan la phan pa'i bla mas dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs byas nas //
T02TD1346E:37b-0: sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bdun rnams ni bsod nams @37b don du bu rnams dag la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1346E:37b-1: yang na mtha' dag yon tan gter ni bstan pa'i slad du rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la mchod pa bya //
T02TD1346E:37b-2: mchod pa med na lo gcig tu ni rgyud kyi rgyal po dag las bla mas bstan par mi bya'o /
T02TD1346E:37b-3: 5 / dbang gi don du sa ni yongs brtag nags dang grong khyer grong rdal grong gi phyogs kyi cha dag dang //
T02TD1346E:37b-4: thab khung rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang ni bum pa dang bcas rdul tshon sbyin sreg phur bu la sogs dang //
T02TD1346E:37b-5: slob ma rnams ni bsdu ba dag dang gang yang rgyal ba'i bdag po mchog gi dkyil 'khor bri ba dag / shes nas slob dpon gyis ni dge dang mi dge'i 'bras slad zhi ba la sogs mtha' dag rab tu bya /
T02TD1346E:37b-6: 6 / sa yi rigs ni yon tan dbang gis rnam bzhir 'gyur ba dmangs rigs rje'u rgyal po bram ze ste //
T02TD1346E:37b-7: gnag dang ser dang dmar ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa dkar ba'i kha dog rnams kyis rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:37b-8: rul pa chu skyes padma'i dri dang mchog gi dri rnams rim pas nor gyi blo gros dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:37b-9: skyur dang lan tshva dmangs rigs mngar dang tshva ba rje dang mi bdag gzhan pa dag ni gnyis skyes so /
T02TD1346E:37b-10: 7 / dkar po dag ni zhi dang rgyas pa la ste sprin nag dang mtshungs gsad dang bskrad pa dag la yang //
T02TD1346E:37b-11: dmar po dbang dang dgug pa la ste mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa rengs dang rmongs pa la yang 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:37b-12: las kyi cha ni thams cad dag la ljang gur 'gyur te lnga pa dang ni mtha' ma dag gi rigs //
T02TD1346E:37b-13: ro dang dri rnams thams cad dang ldan mtha' dag yon tan gter ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:37b-14: 8 / dbang ldan dang ni byang gis gzhi dag la zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dag tu 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:37b-15: me yi mtshams dang shar gyi char ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par gsad pa dag dang bskrad pa'o //
T02TD1346E:37b-16: bden bral dang ni lho phyogs su yang gsal bar rtag tu dbang du bya dang dgug pa dag kyang ngo //
T02TD1346E:37b-17: rlung gi mtshams dang nub kyi phyogs su nges par mchog gi me bdag rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa'o /
T02TD1346E:37b-18: 9 / thab khung grong gi phyogs brgyad dag tu nges par rab tu 'gyur te zlum po dang ni chu gter zur //
T02TD1346E:38a-0: zla kham zur lnga pa dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zur bdun @38a * //
T02TD1346E:38a-1: pa dang zur ni gsum pa dang //
T02TD1346E:38a-2: zur drug pa dang zur brgyad par 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis de dag rnams kyi snying po'i mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1346E:38a-3: padma 'khor lo gri gug ral gri mda' zhes bya dang rdo rje lcags kyu lcags sgrog dag dang sbrul /
T02TD1346E:38a-4: 10 / gcig gnyis phyed dang gcig na khru ste mkha' dus mkha' mig mkha' me mkha' dus dag ni sor du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:38a-5: phyed kyi yan lag drug gi cha shas nyi ma nyi ma'i cha shas dag gis zabs dang kha khyer dang //
T02TD1346E:38a-6: mchu dang mtshan ma'i phreng bar 'gyur ti kha khyer dag gi steng du rigs kyi dbang gis kun nas so //
T02TD1346E:38a-7: kha khyer phyi rol du yang chu skyes 'dab ma rnams mdzod mi bdag zhi rgyas la ste gzhan la min /
T02TD1346E:38a-8: 11 / yang na las ni thams cad la yang rdo rjer 'gyur te sa la phur pa dag gi dbye ba brgyad //
T02TD1346E:38a-9: nya gro dha dang aa shva dtha ka rus lcags seng ldeng las skyes ts'u ta bil ba aa rka skyes //
T02TD1346E:38a-10: de bzhin shel gyi bum pa dang ni dngul mchog rang bzhin dpal ldan thod pa dag dang lcags kyi dang //
T02TD1346E:38a-11: zangs zhes bya dang gser gyi bum pa rab gsal nges par shing las skyes dang sa yi rang bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:38a-12: 12 / zlum po brgyad gnyis sor du brjod de gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis dpangs dang sor gnyis dag gi mchu //
T02TD1346E:38a-13: drug gi mgrin pa sor brgyad kha ste ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zhi rgyas dag la'o gzhan la min //
T02TD1346E:38a-14: snga dro nas ni thun brgyad po rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhi dang rgyas pa sogs la 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:38a-15: de bzhin de yi thun phyed dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su las brgyad dag ni rab tu bya /
T02TD1346E:38a-16: 13 / nyi ma gung dang mtshan phyed dag ni nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su zhi ba dag la spang bar bya //
T02TD1346E:38a-17: dus sbyor gdug pa'i gza' rnams gnas pa dag ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed de bzhin nyid du rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:38a-18: 'o ma dang bcas yam shing mnga' brgya zhi dang rgyas pa dag la gsad pa la ni mi rus so //
T02TD1346E:38a-19: dbye ba la ni bya rog mjug ma seng ldeng las skyes king [?] shu ka ni dgug dang dbang la'o /
T02TD1346E:38a-20: 14 / bil ba smyo byed dag ni khru phyed mda' brgya'i grangs rnams rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa dag la ste //
T02TD1346E:38b-0: 'o ma mar dang khrag dang zhag dang rngul @38b dang rdo rje'i chu dang mchil ma chang rnams bsreg bya ste //
T02TD1346E:38b-1: d'ur ba 'bru dang sha dang dug dang bcas pa dag dang de bzhin skye tshe me tog dmar po dang //
T02TD1346E:38b-2: bil ba rnyings pa'i phreng ba dang ni gser bzang me tog rnams nyid zhi ba la sogs rnams la'o /
T02TD1346E:38b-3: 15 / gshin rje bden bral zur dang chur bcas rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po dbang po dag dang me ru ni //
T02TD1346E:38b-4: slob dpon dag gi gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:38b-5: tshon ni las gnyis dag la 'gyur te gtso bo'i padma la yang dkar nag nyi ma ser po'o //
T02TD1346E:38b-6: phyi rol tu ni sangs rgyas dbye bas lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang rnams dag tu tshon gyis /
T02TD1346E:38b-7: 16 / thab khung dag gam dkyil 'khor la ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyogs rnams su yang tshon ni gdab par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:38b-8: dgod pa la sogs bsad gtor la sogs rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje dag las lha rnams spro ba'o //
T02TD1346E:38b-9: shel la sogs pa'i mchod yon snod la padma nor gyi 'dab ma mthe bo dag ni bcu gnyis kyang //
T02TD1346E:38b-10: yu ba'i rtse mor snyim pa'i snod de khyor ba dag kyang bsregs blugs sbyin sreg bya ba dag la'o /
T02TD1346E:38b-11: 17 / zhi dang drag po chags dang bcas par 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha ni rengs pa dag gi sku //
T02TD1346E:38b-12: de bzhin las gnyis dag la rab tu gsal zhing nges par dkyil 'khor la yang lhag pa'i lhar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:38b-13: rnam pa lnga ni rgyal ba'i dbang po gang phyir rnam gsum srid pa la gnas phung po khams sogs kyi //
T02TD1346E:38b-14: dbye ba yis te de las kyang ni lha rnams dkyil 'khor dag la rdul tshon rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:38b-15: 18 / thig skud khru ni brgyad par 'gyur te sum sgril slob dpon gyi ni lag pa'i mthe bo'i nas gcig gis //
T02TD1346E:38b-16: sboms su 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum gyi lam na gnas pa'i thig skud gcig ste gzhan pa ma yin no //
T02TD1346E:38b-17: zhi ba la sogs dag la rim par yongs su bkod pa skyil krung rdo rje lha min tsog pu dang //
T02TD1346E:38b-18: skyil krung phyed pa dbye ba gnyis dang bshang lam rkang par gnas pa dag kyang las kyi dbye bas gdan /
T02TD1346E:38b-19: 19 / shel dang mu tig dang ni mi dang bong bu'i so 'am rus pa dag dang po de tse dang ni //
T02TD1346E:39a-1: mig lung tang bde gshegs rigs kyi dbang gis sngags bzlas pa la phreng bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:39a-2: dri zhim me tog dkar po dang ni tsha ba dang bcas nag po dag dang dmar dang ser pos mchod //
T02TD1346E:39a-3: bsil dang bshang ba sha yi spos ni sbrang rtsi khrag ldan dag dang drag po'i spos dang bska ba'o /
T02TD1346E:39a-4: 20 /'khrul 'khor n+ya gro dha 'dab dur khrod ro yi ras dang gro ga'i 'dab dang aa rka'i 'dab ma la //
T02TD1346E:39a-5: shi ri kha nda s'a li btags pa dag dang dur khrod sar gnas sol pa khrag dang dug dang ni //
T02TD1346E:39a-6: kha che tsandan dmar dang 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba yud [?] bab blas bris par 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:39a-7: d'ur ba bsil rus mjug sgro gser dang seng ldeng las skyes bil ba skyes dang aa rka smyu gu'o /
T02TD1346E:39a-8: 21 / kham phor dpal ldan thod par mngar gsum khrag dang spra tshil gong bu so phag dag gi dbus su ni //
T02TD1346E:39a-9: rlan dang bcas pa'i gnas ni gtsang ba dag dang ro khang sa gzhi me yis gdung dang sa dag la //
T02TD1346E:39a-10: 'khrul 'khor gzhag par bya bar 'gyur te dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis sngags pa yis ni rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:39a-11: zla ba glang chen yi dags rnga mo ri dags rta dang phyugs dang rus sbal lus la rim pas so /
T02TD1346E:39a-12: 25 / dpal ldan rdo rje rnams kyis phyogs kun du gnas mtha' dag bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg bya ste //
T02TD1346E:39a-13: phyi nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu dag la phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i tshogs ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:39a-14: 'khor lo'i dbus su gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang [?] das kyi zhal ldan khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs //
T02TD1346E:39a-15: de nas bla ma'i nges pa dang ldan gang zhig cung zad 'dod ba sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:39a-16: 23 / rdo rje gsum gyis sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rab gsum ni ring du mthong ba'i mtha' ru ste //
T02TD1346E:39a-17: tho rangs nas ni grib ma'i mtha' rus gzhi'i gnas las nam mkha' dag la rdo rje brtsegs pa'o //
T02TD1346E:39a-18: dbus su chu skyes nyi ma'i khru ste lte ba gdan dang bcas pa dag kyang dus kyi khrur 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:39a-19: de yi steng du bdag nyid nyes pa dag dang rnam par bral ba rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:39b-0: 24 / sa yi phyogs rnams @39b su 'dir dang po rdo rje gsum gyis zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin bya ste //
T02TD1346E:39b-1: phyi nas rdo rje bzhi yis phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg par bya //
T02TD1346E:39b-2: sa yi lha mo spyan drangs chu dang bcas pa'i me tog dag gis 'di la mchod yon tan tu sbyin //
T02TD1346E:39b-3: de la gsol ba btab ste phyi nas sa yi gnas la dag pa dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa mdzod /
T02TD1346E:39b-4: 25 / rgyal bas lha yi bdag po dang bcas bdud ni bcom pa dag la lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02TD1346E:39b-5: de phyir khyod ni mchod par bya zhing lha mchog gis btud bzhes shig bzhes shig bdag gi mchod yon no //
T02TD1346E:39b-6: ji ltar rgyal bas byang chub slad du bdud kyi sde ni stobs ldan dag kyang rab tu bcom gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:39b-7: de bzhin bdag gis kyang ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur slad du bdud rnams nyams pa dag tu bya /
T02TD1346E:39b-8: 26 / gang dag phyogs rnams kun na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa rnam bral btsun mo dang bcas pa //
T02TD1346E:39b-9: de dag rnams kyis mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur slad du bdag la bskyang du gsol //
T02TD1346E:39b-10: de dag kun la gsol ba btab nas seng ldeng rang bzhin sra ba'i phur bu dag gis sa la gdab //
T02TD1346E:39b-11: phyogs kyi khro bo mtshon cha ldan pa rnams ni phyogs kyi cha ru bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya /
T02TD1346E:39b-12: 27 / zug rngu sol ba dang bcas rva ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed sa yi snying por nges par zhugs gyur na //
T02TD1346E:39b-13: gnas de dag tu yon tan dbang gis rnam par nyams par 'gyur te de yi phyir na sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1346E:39b-14: sa la rin chen dud [?] dang mching bu dag ni rnam rgyal bde byed dkyil 'khor dag gi don du ste //
T02TD1346E:39b-15: khang [?] bzangs [?] don dang khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges par 'dir ni mchod sbyin la sogs slad du'o /
T02TD1346E:39b-16: 28 / rdzogs pa dag la [?] sa ni sbyang dang gzung ba dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag ni yang dag bsdu //
T02TD1346E:39b-17: bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab 'dod pa ma nu'i nyin zhag dag la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye ba nyid //
T02TD1346E:39b-18: dbang la sogs pa nyal mchog gi bla mas sbyin te bdud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang //
T02TD1346E:40a-0: de yi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rigs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas @40a * //
T02TD1346E:40a-2: 29 / dag pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:40a-3: srog dang pa sangs nub par gyur na de tshe nges par bag ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:40a-4: slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ba dag kyang mtha' dag shes nas ni //
T02TD1346E:40a-5: bya ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu sbyin par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:40a-6: 30 / slob ma'i mgo bo snying ga de bzhin gtsug tor lte ba mgrin ba dpal ldan gsang ba'i padmar ni //
T02TD1346E:40a-7: rgyal ba la sogs gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung thugs kyis phye ba dag gis bsrung byas shing //
T02TD1346E:40a-8: de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni rab gsal nges pa'i dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis te //
T02TD1346E:40a-9: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du che ge bdag kyang gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs par bgyid /
T02TD1346E:40a-10: 31 / dag pa'i gnas ni legs par gang zhing shin tu mnyam par bkod pa rus sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba dag khru tshad gcig la sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag de bzhin stong phrag dag gi tshad la ni //
T02TD1346E:40a-11: thig skud rdo rje rdul tshon lha dang gshin rje chu bdag tu ste byang du rdo rje dril bu dag / bkod nas mtshan ma rnyed na dang po dang ni phyi ma'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya /
T02TD1346E:40a-12: 32 / thig skud chad par gyur na bla ma nyams shing yongs 'joms 'gongs par gyur na bu rnams dag kyang ngo //
T02TD1346E:40a-13: gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na 'jigs pa gsal byed yul 'khor dag tu rgyal po 'jigs pa yang //
T02TD1346E:40a-14: mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong nas slar yang gtso bo dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1346E:40a-15: slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis thig ni gdab pa bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:40a-16: 33 / shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus su yongs 'joms su gyur de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya //
T02TD1346E:40a-17: sa la g-yul gyi dus su rtse mo can dang rlung du gnas pa'i sde yi dbus su gdengs can bzhin //
T02TD1346E:40b-0: g-yul du sde ni nyams par 'gyur te sa gzhi dag tu mtshan ma'i 'thab mo la ni @40b bsnun pa'o //
T02TD1346E:40b-1: de phyir g-yul dang dbang dag la yang yongs 'joms shin tu stobs dang ldan par sngags pas rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:40b-2: 34 / aa sogs ka sogs rdo rje ldan pa dag gis rang gi snying ga'i padmar zla nyi me steng du //
T02TD1346E:40b-3: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ri bong can 'dzin 'dod pa mnan pa'i g-yas brkyang zhabs ni bsgoms byas shing //
T02TD1346E:40b-4: shes rab gtso bo'i thugs ka'i padma nyi zla sbyar ldan la ste rang rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis //
T02TD1346E:40b-5: sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam bkod cing thig skud la yang bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:40b-6: 35 / thig ni ro dang dgu bcu 'di dag tshangs pa'i thig las phyogs kyi cha rnams dag tu rab sbyin bya //
T02TD1346E:40b-7: sor phyed brjed [?] pa nor dang dus kyi thig rnams dag gis dbus su snying po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:40b-8: snying po las ni phyi rol mtha' dag rnams kyis bkod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po sgo yi mtshams //
T02TD1346E:40b-9: ra ba rta babs la sogs rtse mo can dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol sa la blta bar bya /
T02TD1346E:40b-10: 36 / gtso bo'i 'khor lo chu skyes lha la sogs pa'i gdan las sum 'gyur dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas su ni //
T02TD1346E:40b-11: nyi ma'i re mig dag gis 'gyur te slar yang ri bong can gyis ka ba rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:40b-12: bzhi yis sangs rgyas la sogs padmar rab 'gyur ri bong can gyis phyi rol rdo rje phreng bar yang //
T02TD1346E:40b-13: lha mo sangs rgyas dag gi bar du bum pa'am ni thod pa'i gdan du re mig gsum gyis 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:40b-14: 37 / gnas de nas 'dir ji srid re kh'a'i bar du nyin mor byed pa dag gis tshon gyi sar 'gyur te //
T02TD1346E:40b-15: phyogs zur rnams su chu gter re mig dag gis dril sogs pa rnams kyis zla nyi padma nyid //
T02TD1346E:40b-16: phyed dang bcas pa'i gcig gis re kh'a gsum ste dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang sgo dang sgo khyud dang //
T02TD1346E:40b-17: de bzhin logs dang 'gram pa dag ste gsum gyis kyang ni kha khyer chen po dag dang ka ba phyed /
T02TD1346E:40b-18: 38 / de nas phyed dang gnyis dang dus kyi nor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang ni do shal sa ru 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:40b-19: sgo yi rtsa ba'i dang po nas ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis rta babs ka bar bcas par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:41a-0: thig phyed steng du dor nas do shal phyed pa dag gi mthar @41a * //
T02TD1346E:41a-1: ni ba ku l'ir yang rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:41a-2: re mig drug gis rta babs 'og tu nor gyi padma dang ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams snam bu'o /
T02TD1346E:41a-3: 39 / de nas ro yis bsgyur ba'i dus kyis dpal ldan tshon gyi sa ste re kh'a lnga yi bar du'o //
T02TD1346E:41a-4: phyogs zur rnams su nyi ma'i padma nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan nyi ma'i re mig dag gis bya //
T02TD1346E:41a-5: snying po'i sgo ni nyis 'gyur rnam pa gsum gyi yon tan dbang gis 'dir ni phyi rol sgo dag kyang //
T02TD1346E:41a-6: ra ba sogs dang de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor gsum bkod rnams ni brgyad pa gsum gyis rab tu bya /
T02TD1346E:41a-7: 40 / de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang ni phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba yang //
T02TD1346E:41a-8: de phyed re mig dag gis bya ste 'khor lo gang yin dkyil 'khor mthar yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1346E:41a-9: ka ba'i 'og tu gdengs can rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang rab tu 'gyur te lha rnams shing rta ni ;
T02TD1346E:41a-10: / nyi ma dag gis sgo yi dbus dang mkha' dang sa gzhi dag la shar gyi cha dang nub la yang /
T02TD1346E:41a-11: 41 / rdo rje la sogs rin chen lnga dang gser dang ma ra ka ta byi ru mu tig la sogs dang //
T02TD1346E:41a-12: [?] dbyi ba lnga yi 'bru'am rnam mang nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa'i tshon dag gis //
T02TD1346E:41a-13: phyogs kyi cha la tshon gyi sar ni mi yi bdag po sangs rgyas dbye bas rdul tshon gdab par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:41a-14: ser dang dkar dang dmar ba sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ni me rlung dag la rim pas so /
T02TD1346E:41a-15: 42 / shar du dpal ldan nag po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru nyi ma mtshungs pa dag ste nub tu yang //
T02TD1346E:41a-16: gser mdog byang du gzhan te ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye bas so //
T02TD1346E:41a-17: dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par yongs su bkod pa'i snam bu dang ni do shal dag gis //
T02TD1346E:41a-18: padma zla nyi'i kha dog gis te dri med ri bong can mtshungs dmar dang nag pa'i ri mo gsum /
T02TD1346E:41a-20: 43 / dbus su padma 'dab brgyad ljang gu dag ste bung ba dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:41a-21: dbang ldan lha min me rlung dag tu zla ba nyi ma'i lus dang nag po ser po rim pa yis //
T02TD1346E:41a-22: dung dang ga nd'i nor bu dag dang ljon pa zhes bya de bzhin bum pa dkar po mtshams brgyad du //
T02TD1346E:41b-0: zla @41b ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng du rab tu 'gyur te nyin byed padma dkar po'i steng du yang /
T02TD1346E:41b-1: 44 / chu skyes dmar po'i lte ba la ni lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa dag gi gdan du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:41b-2: chu skyes dkar po'i lte [?] ba dag la lha rnams kyi yang nyin mor byed par 'gyur te phyogs su'o //
T02TD1346E:41b-3: phyi rol tu ni gtso bo'i padma'i dbang gis rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer kha dog dkar //
T02TD1346E:41b-4: ka ba ser po b'a ku li ni kha ba'i mdog tu rab 'gyur rta babs kha dog sna tshogs so /
T02TD1346E:41b-5: 45 / dkar po'i mdog ste rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi nor gyi padma'i snam bu dag kyang phyogs kun tu //
T02TD1346E:41b-6: phyogs kyi char ni padma dmar por 'gyur te rgyal ba'i dbang gis padma dkar po zur du yang //
T02TD1346E:41b-7: zla ba nyi mas rnam dman de bzhin nyid du 'chi med rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan no //
T02TD1346E:41b-8: mkha' sogs re kh'a lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sum cha bar du gnas /
T02TD1346E:41b-9: 46 / ka ba'i 'og gi sgo yi mtshams su gdengs can rnams kyi rlung sogs dkyil 'khor dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:41b-10: dbang ldan dang ni lha min zur du sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag go mi yi dbang //
T02TD1346E:41b-11: phyi rol sgo yi steng gi char ni ri dags dang bcas chos kyi 'khor lo sprin gyi mdog tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:41b-12: g-yas su bum pa dmar por 'gyur te nor sbyin dang bcas chur ni rnga bo che dang byang chub shing /
T02TD1346E:41b-13: 47 / dril bu me long ba dan ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rta babs dag las 'phyang bar gyur pa dang //
T02TD1346E:41b-14: do shal phyed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis shing rta sgo yi dbus su'o //
T02TD1346E:41b-15: 'khor lo dkar dang dmar po rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis rlung la sgo yi phyi rol tu //
T02TD1346E:41b-16: rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba dag gis mi yi bdag po phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba dag tu'ang 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:41b-17: 48 / sbom pas nad dag byed cing phra dang re kh'a ngan pas rdzas ni nyams pa rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02TD1346E:41b-18: chad pas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong rdal de bzhin nyid du bskyod //
T02TD1346E:41b-19: mtshan ma nyi ma zla ba chad na sngags pa rnams la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dngos grub med //
T02TD1346E:42a-0: rnam par 'dres pas rigs rgyud 'chad de @42a * //
T02TD1346E:42a-1: rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:42a-2: 49 / gang zhig rgyud kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan ma de ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rgyur //
T02TD1346E:42a-3: dkyil 'khor dag la dgod par mi bya de nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la ni ;
T02TD1346E:42a-4: / de phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo yi mtshams nas dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02TD1346E:42a-5: do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi la padma bum sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya /
T02TD1346E:42a-6: 50 / nag po la sogs rkang pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag ni rdul tshon dpangs te nas gcig dag nas kyang //
T02TD1346E:42a-7: rab rnams ni sum 'gyur nyin mor byed pa ri bong can dang chu skyes re kh'a nyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:42a-8: snying po dag las phyi rol dpangs ni nyis 'gyur du 'gyur mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di la ste //
T02TD1346E:42a-9: do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni nas gtsigs chu bsreg za rlung dang rdo rje phreng ba rnams la'o /
T02TD1346E:42a-10: 51 dbus nas sgo yi dang po'i mtshams ni nor gyi blo gros mar 'gyur 'jig rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1346E:42a-11: sgo nas tsa rtsi ka mthar sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis lan tshva'i rin chen gnas su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:42a-12: de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i re mig gis kyang me yi dkyil 'khor de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:42a-13: de yi phyi rol du ni de dag rnam par dag pas sa chu bsreg za rlung rnams blta bar bya /
T02TD1346E:42a-14: 52 / gtsug tor zhal dang mgrin pa sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis dkyil 'khor la ni sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1346E:42a-15: de nas lhun po mtha' dag sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis sa ni ji srid nyid du ste //
T02TD1346E:42a-16: re mig drug drug dag gis rim pas gsal bar klu yi srid pa dang ni sa 'og bdun po nyid //
T02TD1346E:42a-17: de ltar sa la sogs pa thams cad slar yang de bzhin rang gi lus dag la ni sbyang bar bya /
T02TD1346E:42a-18: 53 / gnyis dang chu gter gcig dang chu gter gcig nyi dus ro rtse mo can gnyis dus phyed dus phyed dang //
T02TD1346E:42a-19: dus dang dus ni rab phye dag dang dus dang ro dag kyang ste skyon gyi cha rnams rim pa yis //
T02TD1346E:42b-0: snying por lte ba rtsibs sam padma'i 'dab ma dag dang de nas @42b ka ba rdo rje'i phreng ba dang //
T02TD1346E:42b-1: padma rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur te sa dag dang ni de nas sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs dang /
T02TD1346E:42b-2: 54 / ka ba ra ba kha khyer dag dang slar yang de nas snam bu dang ni do shal sa dag dang //
T02TD1346E:42b-3: me long sa yi snam bur 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po rta babs rab tu gsungs pa'i cha rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:42b-4: phyi rol du ni sgo sogs thams cad nyis 'gyur du 'gyur phyi rol du yang de yi nyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:42b-5: phyi rol du ni padma 'khor lo rnams dang shing rta'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni nyin byed dag gis so /
T02TD1346E:42b-6: 55 / aom yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi padma zla ba nyi ma dag gi gdan steng du //
T02TD1346E:42b-7: aa sogs ka sogs stong par bcas pa dag dang srid gsum skyed par byed pa'i yum ni gzhag par bya //
T02TD1346E:42b-8: stong pa aa yig rnam par bcad pa dbyangs dang bral ba mchog las sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
T02TD1346E:42b-9: yang dag 'byung ba sngags kyi skye gnas mchog gi bde byed ye shes rdo rje dag ni bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1346E:42b-10: 56 / rgyal ba'i bdag po'i padma sna tshogs mdog la zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du h'um yig ste //
T02TD1346E:42b-11: phyogs 'dab rnams la aa sogs stong pa phyogs bral 'dab ma la yang ha sogs stong pa rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1346E:42b-12: dbang ldan bden bral zur dang rtse mo can dang rlung du sku dang gsung dang thugs dang chags pa ste //
T02TD1346E:42b-13: h'i yig la sogs bum pa rnams kyi bcu ru 'gyur te ham ha: zhes pa dag gi mtha' 'dir ro /
T02TD1346E:42b-14: 57 / shar gyi chu skyes steng du ai yig rtse mo can du padma la gnas a'i yig ring po nyid //
T02TD1346E:42b-15: gshin rje lha min du ni ri yig dag ste nor sbyin 'phrog byed du gnas thung ring au yig dag / chu dang rlung gi zur dag tu yang padma la gnas thung ngu ring po dag gi li yig ste //
T02TD1346E:42b-16: nag po dmar po dag dang dkar po gser mchog dang mtshungs zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis dgod par bya /
T02TD1346E:42b-17: 58 / shar gyi sgo yi lho dang me yi padma la gnas thung dang ring ba dag ni de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:42b-18: de bzhin aar yig zung ni gshin rje lha min dag tu gnas te nub tu aal yig zung dag go //
T02TD1346E:42b-19: ao aoo gnod sbyin drag po ru ste lha chu gshin rje gnod sbyin dang bcas sgo yi byang du ni //
T02TD1346E:43a-1: aa: sogs te rim pa yis ni slar yang yar wa la lha sogs sgo yi padma la'o /
T02TD1346E:43a-2: 59 / shar dang byang gi sgor ni ri bong 'dzin pa dag kyang khro bo dag gi gdan du 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:43a-3: lho dang nub tu padmar nyi ma dag ni gnyis po dag gi gdan du nges par rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:43a-4: shes rab thabs kyi rab tu dbye ba dag gis padmar zla ba nyi ma dag kyang gdan du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:43a-5: g-yas dang rgyab tu nyi mar 'gyur te lha yi bdag po nor sbyin du yang zla ba'i gdan du 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:43a-6: 60 / thig le'i rnam pa dag gis rnam phye nges par padma la gnas ka sogs sde yi yi ge yang //
T02TD1346E:43a-7: rtsa ba sdong bu 'dab ma dang ni ge sar lte ba dag la rim pas yongs su bkod pa ste //
T02TD1346E:43a-8: sa sogs nam mkha'i mthar ni ka kha ga gha nga zhes thung ngu ring po rang gi sa la'o //
T02TD1346E:43a-9: thig le zla ba rnam par bcad pa nyin byed du 'gyur gdan yang lte ba dag gi steng du'o /
T02TD1346E:43a-10: 61 / sde drug thung dang ring rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis kha khyer dag la ka ba'i ngos su ni //
T02TD1346E:43a-11: dri [?] la sogs rnams rim pas rang rigs sa la gnas te shar gyi cha nas rang gi phyogs rnams su'o //
T02TD1346E:43a-12: phyi rol du ni thig le la sogs kyis phye sum 'gyur nyi mas kha khyer dag la de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:43a-13: 'dod ma thams cad kun nas rang rigs phyogs su gnas te rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog dbye bas so /
T02TD1346E:43a-14: 62 / thung dang ring ba'i ha yig dag ni lha dang nor sbyin nub dang lho ru tsa rtsi k'a sogs kyi //
T02TD1346E:43a-15: khyab 'jug ma sogs dag gi ksha yig aa sogs kyis phye me dang 'phrog byed rlung dang lha min du //
T02TD1346E:43a-16: hi la sogs dang kshi la sogs pa grangs brgyad padma'i 'dab ma la gnas mdun rgyab rang phyogs su //
T02TD1346E:43a-17: ya sogs thung dang ring ba drug rnams lha yi pad 'dab me yi padma dag la rim pa yis /
T02TD1346E:43a-18: 63 / de bzhin gshin rje lha min padma'i 'dab mar thung ngu ring po'i rab tu dbye bas ra sogs te //
T02TD1346E:43a-19: gnod sbyin drag por wa la sogs dang chu gter dang bcas rlung gi pad 'dab rnams la la la sogs //
T02TD1346E:43a-20: shar gyi sgo yi lho dag tu yang padma'i 'dab ma la gnas dbyangs kyis phye ba tsa yi sde //
T02TD1346E:43a-21: thung [?] du lha min gyi ste ring po rnams kyang me yi zur na gnas pa rlung gi yin par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:43b-0: 64 / de bzhin @43b gshin rjer me dang ro yi gdong pa dag gi ta sde thung dang ring po'i rab dbye yis //
T02TD1346E:43b-1: g-yon dang dbang ldan du yang ba sder 'gyur te chu gter dang ni ring po'i dbye bas tshogs kyi'o //
T02TD1346E:43b-2: brgya byin dang ni tshangs pa dag gi chur bcas rlung du thung ngu ring po ta yi sde pa'o //
T02TD1346E:43b-3: shar gyi sgo yi byang du padma'i 'dab mar lha min dgra yi ka sde thung ngur 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1346E:43b-4: 65 / lho ru gshin rje dag gi ring por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po byang dag dang ni nub tu yang //
T02TD1346E:43b-5: phyugs kyi bdag po dza mbha la yi thung dang ring ba sa sder 'gyur ba nyid do rgyal po kye //
T02TD1346E:43b-6: lha min la sogs rnams kyi rang gi sa bon du 'gyur 'dab ma lha min rang rang sde mtha' dbus //
T02TD1346E:43b-7: 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la yang nyin zhag dbang gis rang rang sde pa dag gi yi ge rnams /
T02TD1346E:43b-8: 66 / y'a r'a w'a l'a ham ha: drug kyang nges par shing rta dag la steng dang rtsa ba lha sogs su //
T02TD1346E:43b-9: sgo las g-yas dang g-yon du gdengs can rnams kyi ya sogs la gnas ha yig dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:43b-10: sde drug brtsegs pa'i gzugs dang slar yang ha ya ra wa la dang ksha sogs ldan pa'i ya sogs ni //
T02TD1346E:43b-11: phyogs kyi 'khor lor ka sogs sde rnams g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas tsa sogs gzhan la lugs mthun te /
T02TD1346E:43b-12: 67 / shar dang gshin rje byang dang chu dang me dang lha min dang ni dbang ldan rlung gi zur du'o //
T02TD1346E:43b-13: aam aa: zla ba nyi ma dag gi dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs kyi sngags rnams so //
T02TD1346E:43b-14: h'um gi yi ge chos kyi 'khor lo dang ni de bzhin a'a: yig bum pa'i sa bon dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:43b-15: aom yig rnga bo che yir 'gyur te chu ru ho yang byang chub shing dag gir ni rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:43b-16: 68 / zhes pa de ltar dbyangs ldan rnams ni rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor dag la sngags kyi dbye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:43b-17: phyag rgya mtshan ma rnams kyi kha dog mtha' dag rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:43b-18: thab tu sbyin sreg dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur te slar yang 'jug ngogs pa rnams spyan drang ba dag dang //
T02TD1346E:43b-19: dpal ldan sa la bsang ba dang ni mchod yon cho ga de bzhin bdud ni gzhom pa dag kyang ngo /
T02TD1346E:43b-20: 69 / sgo rnams bsrung ba'i don du brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan dag pa'i slob ma rnams ni rab dgod bya //
T02TD1346E:44a-1: ldan bum pa dag gi rnal 'byor ma rnams me dang lha min rlung dbang zur du rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:44a-2: slob dpon dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang por 'gyur te mi bdag las kyi rdo rje can dag rab byas nas //
T02TD1346E:44a-3: slob ma med na tshogs kyi dbang po rang gis kyang ni sbyin sreg las la sogs pa dag kyang bya /
T02TD1346E:44a-4: 70 / zlum po 'am ni rig byed zur dag rigs kyi dbang gis zhi dang rgyas pa dag gi thab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:44a-5: byang ngam drag po'i zur dang gzhan yang dkar po'i sa la rtsa ba'i padma dag ni nyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:44a-6: zabs ni padma'i tshad du 'gyur te de yi nang du rtsa ba'i padma mtshan mar bcas pa'o //
T02TD1346E:44a-7: padma phyed la padma'i phyi ru bum pa dang bcas ral gri rin chen sogs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:44a-8: 71 / de yi phyed kyis kyang ni mchu ste de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang kha khyer dag gi brgya yi cha //
T02TD1346E:44a-9: steng du rdo rje phreng ba dag kyang mchu yi phyed kyis dpangs dag tu ni nges par rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:44a-10: phyi rol 'og tu padma'i 'dab ma rnams dang ku sha'i bkod pa phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu bya //
T02TD1346E:44a-11: de yi mthar ni nub phyogs dag tu nges par re kh'a gsum gyi sgo gcig tu ni rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:44a-12: 72 / slob dpon dag gi gdan ni nges par mnyam par 'gyur te snying po'i padma dag las nyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:44a-13: g-yon du mchod yon gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sbyin sreg snod dag gi yang g-yas su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:44a-14: kun gyi rdo rje'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i yang na mkha' yi padma yum gyi'o //
T02TD1346E:44a-15: zhal dang gsang ba dag kyang thab khung rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te rgyal po phyi dang lus la'o /
T02TD1346E:44a-16: 73 / thab kyi phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag la khro bo'i rgyal po lha mor bcas pas bsrung ba byas nas ni //
T02TD1346E:44a-17: dpal ldan rdo rje dag gis bsang ba sogs dang chur bcas me tog rnams kyis me la mchod yon nyid //
T02TD1346E:44a-18: de yi rnal 'byor ldan pas sbyin par bya ste rang snying padmar zla ba'i steng du bsgom nas so //
T02TD1346E:44a-19: zhal gcig kha dog dkar po dus kyi phyag gi padma g-yon na ril ba chu skyes dag dang ni /
T02TD1346E:44a-20: 74 / g-yas na dbyug pa bgrang phreng ral pa shin tu ser skya dmar ser mig ldan gos dang bcas pa ste //
T02TD1346E:44a-21: me yi snying gar zla ba'i steng du dri med 'phro byed dza: las lcags kyu nges par bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:44b-0: de yis bkug pa'i kun 'gro @44b ye shes sems dpa' rang gi lus la shin tu ro mnyam dag tu mdzod //
T02TD1346E:44b-1: de ltar thab la yang ni yang dag 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin me ni spyan drang ngo /
T02TD1346E:44b-2: 75 / mchog sbyin lag pa dag gi mthe bo yis kyang me yi zhal du sbyin sreg dag ni rab tu bya //
T02TD1346E:44b-3: gtso bo'i rdo rje yan lag gis kyang mda' brgya'i yam shing 'bru dang d'ur ba mar dang 'o ma yis //
T02TD1346E:44b-4: skyil krung du gnas rab tu zhi zhing g-yo ba med pa'i sems ldan gsang sngags rig pa sngags kyi sku //
T02TD1346E:44b-5: slob dpon las kyi rdo rje can gyis slar yang me la bsregs blugs dag ni nges par sbyin par bya /
T02TD1346E:44b-6: 76 / rim pa yis ni sbyin sreg byas nas 'thor 'thung dag kyang de bzhin me dang bdag nyid dag la yang //
T02TD1346E:44b-7: dril [?] sogs dang spos dag phul nas rang snying padmar ye she me ni gshegs su gsol bar bya //
T02TD1346E:44b-8: phyi nas slob ma la ni dbang bskur dpal ldan bla ma mtha' dag yon tan gter gyis nges par sbyin //
T02TD1346E:44b-9: dang por bdud rtsi lnga ni rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa dag pa'i slad du'o /
T02TD1346E:44b-10: 77 / rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg grub cing rdul tshon btab ste sngags kyi mtshan ma rab tu bkod pa na //
T02TD1346E:44b-11: zur du shel gyi bum pa dkar po skud pa lnga yis dkris pa rnams ni yang dag gzhag par bya //
T02TD1346E:44b-12: slob dpon shar gyi zhal du rdo rje padma las skyes rab bgrod khro bo'i rgyal po rnams dag gis //
T02TD1346E:44b-13: spyan drangs nas ni ye shes 'khor lo rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam du bya dbang gi don du'o /
T02TD1346E:44b-14: 78 / lha dang lha mo rnams ni thams cad dag gi ming gi sngon du aom zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:44b-15: sbyin sreg la ni sv'a h'a'i mtha' sngags snying po de bzhin nyid de mchod pa dag lan ma:'i mtha' //
T02TD1346E:44b-16: dza: h'um bam ho: lcags kyu la sogs rim pas yongs su bkod rnams spyan drang gzhug dang bcing ba dang //
T02TD1346E:44b-17: mnyes la'o mchod yon sbyin pa la yang ai dam gri hna gri hna aa rgha kam me zhes par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:44b-18: 79 / rgyas pa la ni sv'a h'a'i mtha' yi sngags su 'gyur te mi bdag zhi ba la 'di na ma:'i mtha' //
T02TD1346E:44b-19: dgug pa la ni boo shat [?] mtha' ru 'gyur te boo shat [?] mtha' yang dbang la de bzhin nyid du ni //
T02TD1346E:44b-20: h'um yig mtha' can mngon spyod la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis phat mtha' phur bus gdab sogs la'o //
T02TD1346E:45a-0: dkar dang dmar dang nag po mchog gi gser dang mtshungs @45a * //
T02TD1346E:45a-1: pa dag ste las kyi dbye ba dag gis sngags /
T02TD1346E:45a-2: 80 / shar du dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje [?] dag ni sprin nag dang mtshungs byang du sku yi rdo rje dang //
T02TD1346E:45a-3: lho ru gsung gi rdo rje nub tu yang ni rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa ye shes rdo rje ste //
T02TD1346E:45a-4: dkar dang dmar dang ser po dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis sa yi cha la khyab par byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:45a-5: rlung me chu dang sa yi lha rnams dag gi skye ba'i gnas ni mi bdag ai ri au li'o /
T02TD1346E:45a-6: 81 / aom a'a: h'um ni phyag rgya gsum ste sv'a h'a'i tshig dang bcas pa ring po'i dbye ba las kyang lnga //
T02TD1346E:45a-7: h'um a'a: aom ho: rang gi zhal rnams gzhan pa dag kyang de bzhin gzhom du med pa lnga par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:45a-8: aa sogs dang bcas hram yig drug ste ro rkang na ma: sogs kyi dpal ldan yan lag drug tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:45a-9: phrim gyi yi ge sna tshogs [?] yum gyir 'gyur te rnam bcu brtsegs pa'i sngags ni rgyal ba dag gi'o /
T02TD1346E:45a-10: 82 / h'um yig ye shes sa bon snying po dag kyang brtsegs pa chen po'i sngags ni zhal dang bcas pa ste //
T02TD1346E:45a-11: hr'am yig la sogs yan lag drug po sku yi rdo rje dang por ldan pa 'di ni nye snying ngo //
T02TD1346E:45a-12: lha dang lha mo rnams kyi phreng ba'i sngags ni de bzhin gzhan te las kyi dbye ba du ma yis //
T02TD1346E:45a-13: rnam mang du 'gyur shes par bya ste dus 'khor dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so /
T02TD1346E:45a-15: 83 / rin chen gser zla me tog dang ni rnam pa mang po'i gos dang dri dang spos dang mar me dang //
T02TD1346E:45a-16: dril bu me long bla re dang ni rnam mang 'bras bu ba dan sogs dang gar dang rol mo yis /
T02TD1346E:45a-17: rnam bkra mchod pa byas te gzhan pa rnam bcu dag kyang bdag nyid nus pas ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin //
T02TD1346E:45a-18: slob dpon dag gi zhabs kyi rtsa bar mchog gi bu yis yon ni dag pa'i slad du dbul bar bya /
T02TD1346E:45a-19: 84 / dag pa gsum gyi rdzas dang bdag nyid bu dang bu mo dang bcas rigs las skyes pa'i gzhon nu ma //
T02TD1346E:45a-20: de ring nyid nas mi bzang 'khor bas 'jigs pa bdag ni rgyal ba rnams la skyabs su lhag par mchi //
T02TD1346E:45a-21: khyed kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes nges par srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog dag la lus ngag sems ni dag pas so //
T02TD1346E:45a-22: zhes pa gser bcas me tog dag gis mandala byas nas bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:45a-23: 85 /'dod pa'i rdo rje la ni rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla ma dag spyi bos gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1346E:45b-0: rin chen la ni sbyin pa sbyin @45b bgyi 'khor lo 'di la rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi //
T02TD1346E:45b-1: ral gri la ni mchod pa bgyi ste gsal bar chu skyes rigs la sdom pa dag ni bskyang bar bgyi //
T02TD1346E:45b-2: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la byang chub bdag gis bskyed par bgyi /
T02TD1346E:45b-3: 86 / slob ma khrus byas dri yis rjes byugs brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan shar gyi sar ni bzhag byas te //
T02TD1346E:45b-4: dngos grub don du so shing rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rje dag gis mngon par bsngags pa rab sbyin bya //
T02TD1346E:45b-5: lce la'ang bdud rtsi nges par rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig dag gis spos ni dbab pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1346E:45b-6: sngags ni h'um gi yi ge gcig ste aa ra la dang bcas pa khro bo'i gtso bo bskul ba'o /
T02TD1346E:45b-7: 87 / khro bo'i rgyal po phebs na mtshon chas mdzes pa'i lag pa dag gis bdud kyi tshogs la bsdigs byed cing //
T02TD1346E:45b-8: g-yon brkyang la sogs stabs rnams dang ni rnam mang bcing bdag gis rdo rje'i gar gyi gar byed de //
T02TD1346E:45b-9: bzhad dang h'um gi yi ge 'dres pa dgra la 'jigs pa ster ba dang ni rdo rje'i glu yang byed //
T02TD1346E:45b-10: ngo tsha med cing dogs pa med par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha gzhan dag kyang zhi ba'o /
T02TD1346E:45b-11: 88 / sku phebs pas ni rnal 'byor ldan pa rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sku yi bya ba byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:45b-12: gsung phebs pas ni lha dang 'byung po lha min rnams las rnam par rgyal ba'i smra ba po ru 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:45b-13: thugs phebs pas ni gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa dag dang byung dang 'byung ba thams cad shes par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:45b-14: ye shes phebs pas sangs rgyas bla ma yi yang bla ma rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i ston pa gcig pur 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:45b-16: 89 / sa phebs pas ni rnal 'byor pa dag ri dang mtshungs par 'gyur te chus kyang bsil bar rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:45b-17: me phebs pas ni sreg par 'gyur te rlung gis kyang ni de bzhin skam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:45b-18: stong pa phebs pas mi snang bar 'gyur sa steng du ni mkha' la spyod pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:45b-19: de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rim pa yis ni rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:45b-20: 90 / dbab pa la ni nges par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sngags pa rnams kyi bsgom pa'i stobs dang ni //
T02TD1346E:46a-0: bsnyen pa'i dbye ba dang ni rnam mang dam tshig sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis 'ga' zhig @46a * //
T02TD1346E:46a-2: sangs rgyas ro myong byed pas bdud rtsi'i dbang las dkyil 'khor 'ga' zhig tu ni mchog gi bu la'o //
T02TD1346E:46a-3: rang byin brlabs pas dman pa rnam mang srid pa dag gis sngags pa rnams la dngos grub yod pa min /
T02TD1346E:46a-4: 91 / phebs pa btang ste phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying ga spyi gtsug lte ba dag dang mgrin pa dang //
T02TD1346E:46a-5: gsang bar rgyal ba dang ni rang gi rigs kyi sar gnas rang gi rdo rje gsum gyis bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1346E:46a-6: lus la ser po'i gos dag byin te mig ni bsgribs par gyur pa'i slob ma 'dir ni gzhug par bya //
T02TD1346E:46a-7: kun rdzob don du brtul zhugs rab mchog bgrod pa dag la bgrod pa de dag nyid ni sbyin par bya /
T02TD1346E:46a-8: 92 /'che dang mi bden gzhan gyi bud med spang bya gzhan gyi nor dang chang gi btung ba de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:46a-9: 'khor bar rdo rje'i zhags pa dag ste rang gi dge ba 'joms byed sdig pa lnga po 'di dag go //
T02TD1346E:46a-10: gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi mtshan gyis rab sbyin bya ;
T02TD1346E:46a-11: / sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' 'di srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dag ste khyod kyis kyang ni bskyang bar bya /
T02TD1346E:46a-12: 93 / cho lo kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min dbang po'i chos //
T02TD1346E:46a-13: ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha mi'i bla ma gsod pa lnga ni mi bya'o //
T02TD1346E:46a-14: grogs po rje bo rnams dang lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun yid brtan rnams la 'khu ba yang //
T02TD1346E:46a-15: dbang po rnams ni chags pa dag dang de ltar srid pa'i bdag po dag gi brtul zhugs nyi shu lnga /
T02TD1346E:46a-16: 94 / dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te lag pa'i padma sbyar bar me tog gcig ni rab sbyin bya //
T02TD1346E:46a-17: dang por lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i padma sbyar ba dag las dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor //
T02TD1346E:46a-18: gang gi gnas su me tog bzang po lhung ba de ni mi yi bdag po de yi rigs su nges //
T02TD1346E:46a-19: phyi nas dbang ni bdun po dag dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji bzhin bla med yang dag rab sbyin bya /
T02TD1346E:46a-20: 95 / klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas //
T02TD1346E:46a-21: sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis lha mo rnams kyis khrus bya'o //
T02TD1346E:46a-22: sangs rgyas rab tu dbye bas cod pan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyis dar dpyangs nyid //
T02TD1346E:46b-0: rdo @46b rje dril bu nyi zla las te brtul zhugs dag kyang dbang por bcas pa'i yul gyis sbyar bar bya /
T02TD1346E:46b-1: 96 / khro bo rnams kyis byams sogs ming ste gsal bar rgyal ba'i bdag pos rjes gnang 'dogs bcas rab tu sbyin //
T02TD1346E:46b-2: rdo rje dril bu rab tu byin nas rab mchog snying rje dag gis dag pa'i chos ni bstan par bya //
T02TD1346E:46b-3: nges par rdo rje'i rigs dag [?] la ni srog gcod bya ste ral gri la yang bden pa min pa'i tshig / rin chen la ni gzhan nor dbrog bya mchog gi padma'i rigs nyid la yang gzhan gyi bud med dbrog /
T02TD1346E:46b-4: 97 / chang dang sgron ma sangs rgyas rnams dang bzang po'i yul rnams mtha' dag 'khor lo la ni bsten par bya //
T02TD1346E:46b-5: gdol pa mo sogs mtha' dag bud med rnams ni gri gug la yang mkha' yi padmar smad mi bya //
T02TD1346E:46b-6: sems can don gyi slad du nor dang bcas pa'i lus 'di sbyin par bya ste khyod kyis bsrung mi bya //
T02TD1346E:46b-7: rigs kyi bu kye sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba gzhan du mtha' yas bskal pas min par rgyal bas gsungs /
T02TD1346E:46b-8: 98 / chu ni sgrol ma la sogs lha mo cod pan zhes pa rgyal ba dpa' bo'i dar dpyangs nus ma rnams //
T02TD1346E:46b-9: rdo rje dril bu nyid zla dag dang brtul zhugs dag kyang yul te ming ni byams sogs sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1346E:46b-10: rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal mo srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa ste //
T02TD1346E:46b-11: sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bskur bdun po 'di dag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab sbyin bya /
T02TD1346E:46b-12: 99 / dbang bdun dag gis mngon par dbang bskur dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdun gyi ni dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:46b-13: bum pa gsang bas mngon par dbang bskur slar yang phyir mi ldog pa sogs su nges par rab tu 'jug / shes rab ye shes dag gis mngon par dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:46b-14: gal te g-yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dmyal bar 'gro ste 'di dag sdug bsngal lo /
T02TD1346E:46b-15: 100 / rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnam par dag par 'gyur te yon tan ldan pa dbang bdun la gnas dag gi'o //
T02TD1346E:47a-0: bum pa gsang ba la ni gal te brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang gis gong ma la @47a * //
T02TD1346E:47a-2: rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na gang zhig dag pa'i slad du slar yang dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya ste //
T02TD1346E:47a-3: rjes su gnang ba thob nas slar yang tshogs kyi 'dus par thu bo'i ming ni chung ba nyid du 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:47a-4: 101 / dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs dkrugs pa las bu rnams kyi ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:47a-5: de yi bka' la 'gongs pas gzhan du 'gyur te nges par de bzhin spun la khros pas gsum pa'o //
T02TD1346E:47a-6: byams pa btang bas bzhi par 'gyur te byang chub sems ni rab tu nyams pa las kyang mda' ru 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:47a-7: drug pa grub pa'i mtha' la smod pa ri bo dag kyang ma smin mi la gsang ba byin las so /
T02TD1346E:47a-8: 102 / phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te slar yang dgu pa dag pa'i chos la ma dad gang //
T02TD1346E:47a-9: sgyu yi byams pa dang ni ming sogs bral ba bde ba ster la rtog pa phyogs dang drag po'o //
T02TD1346E:47a-10: dag pa'i sems can dag la skyon brjod pa las nyi ma dam tshig thob pa gtong ba las kyang gzhan //
T02TD1346E:47a-11: bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje'i theg par gnas par rnams la'o /
T02TD1346E:47a-12: 103 / klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal pos yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas //
T02TD1346E:47a-13: sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis gdan gyi dbus su khrus byas te //
T02TD1346E:47a-14: klu dag gis ni dpal ldan cod pan bcings te nor 'dab padmar bzhi yis dar dpyangs bcing bar bya //
T02TD1346E:47a-15: phyag rgya la ni dpal ldan bum pa yis te 'dir ni padma dang bral re kh'a lnga po spangs /
T02TD1346E:47a-16: 104 / dang por chu dag la ni dge bsnyen nyid du 'gyur te bum pa la yang dge tshul dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:47a-17: gsang ba'i dbang la dge slong dang ni gong ma'i byed pa la yang gnas brtan zhes par 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:47a-18: phyag rgya dar dpyangs cod pan dag dang rdo rje mchod phyir thogs ni bla ma mchog gis sbyin par bya //
T02TD1346E:47a-19: de dag slob dpon slad du rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis phyag rgya rnam par dag pa nyid /
T02TD1346E:47a-20: 105 / steng du bla re bkod cing sa yi mthil gyi gnas dag tu yang ri mo gsum ni kun nas so //
T02TD1346E:47a-21: de rnams thur du nor bu gser gyi bum pa chur bcas skud pa dang ldan padma'i kha rnams so //
T02TD1346E:47b-0: dung sogs gser gyi snod dang yang na @47b dngul gyi rang bzhin dag tu dri yi chu ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:47b-1: snying por gser gyi rang bzhin gsal ba'i gdan dag rab tu bkod de de la khrus ni brtsam par bya /
T02TD1346E:47b-2: 106 / me tog sogs dang dri yi til mar nyi ma me yis smin pa dag gis lha la byug par bya //
T02TD1346E:47b-3: phye ma rnams kyis dril phyis byas nas sbrang rtsi mar dang zho dang 'o ma chu yis bkru bar bya //
T02TD1346E:47b-4: don grub rnams dang mar me dag dang rnam mang 'bras bu mchog gis 'di la nges par bya bas nas ni //
T02TD1346E:47b-5: de yi gnas nas bskyod par bya ste sku yang dmar po'i gos dag gis ni yang dag g-yogs pa'o /
T02TD1346E:47b-6: 107 / dpal ldan dkyil 'khor mthar ni mnyam pa'i sa yi gnas la rgyal ba'i cha yis re kh'a lnga byas te //
T02TD1346E:47b-7: dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1346E:47b-8: de yi dbus su gzhag par bya ba zhal gyi padma nub tu phyogs pa'i lha dang lha mo 'am //
T02TD1346E:47b-9: mchod rten sogs dang glegs bam dag gam thang sku zhes pa'ang de bzhin de la mngon phyogs sngags pa'o /
T02TD1346E:47b-10: 108 / rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje stong pa'i rang bzhin dag tu byas nas ni //
T02TD1346E:47b-11: phyi nas sngar brjod sbyor ba dag gis zla nyi rdo rje las skyes dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:47b-12: rig pa'i lha mo sogs dang sangs rgyas a'a li k'a li'i rigs skyes rang rang sa bon gyis bskyed rnams //
T02TD1346E:47b-13: snying mgrin lte ba gsang ba mgo dang gtsug tor 'khor lo dag la rigs kyi dbang gis bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:47b-14: 109 / de ltar nges pa nyid du bsgom par bya ste slar yang mtha' dag lha rnams dag gi lus la yang //
T02TD1346E:47b-15: khro bo'i rgyal po dag gis srid med srid mnyam ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste gzhug pa dag dang ni //
T02TD1346E:47b-16: bcing dang mnyes pa dang ni ro mnyam byed pa dag kyang lha rnams kyi ni rang gi lus la bya //
T02TD1346E:47b-17: de nas slob dpon nyid kyis zhal ni rab tu gsal bar byas pa'i lha la phyag dag 'tshal bar bya /
T02TD1346E:47b-18: 110 / aa sogs ka sogs dag las lha dang lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs yon tan la gnas sa bon gang //
T02TD1346E:47b-19: rang gi sa bon de ni snying gi dbus su zla ni kha sbyor la gnas sku gsung thugs ldan par //
T02TD1346E:48a-0: mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan @48a * //
T02TD1346E:48a-1: gyi yan lag dpe byad mkha' dang brgyad kyis te //
T02TD1346E:48a-2: yi ge rnams kyis phye ba de nyid rab gsal 'dab ma 'dab mar glegs bam rnams la bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:48a-3: 111 / mchod rten snying por dpal ldan 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu padma dag dang byang du ral gri nyid //
T02TD1346E:48a-4: bgrang phreng la ni h'um gi yi ge nor bu yongs su bgrang ba rnams ni mtshan dang dpe byad rnams //
T02TD1346E:48a-5: dril bu'i sku la dbyangs ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu rnams dag dang ka sogs sde rnams rdo rje la //
T02TD1346E:48a-6: de dag kho na mchod phyir thogs la bcu yis bsgyur ba nor gyi dpe byad rnams ni stod g-yogs la /
T02TD1346E:48a-8: 112 / ka sogs sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa mkha' ro yon tan rnams ni pus 'khyud dag la bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:48a-9: ham ha: dpal ldan rna cha la ste aam aa: zhes pa zung ni mgul rgyan ska rags dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:48a-10: de bzhin du yang aa yig zung ni gdu bu dag la 'gyur te rkang gdub dag la ha h'a yang //
T02TD1346E:48a-11: mtha' dag lus la gnas pa stong pa'i rnam pa lnga po dag ni thal bdag la bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:48a-12: 113 / rang lus ye shes rnam pa dag las rdo rje gsum dang bcas pa'i phung po khams la sogs pa kun //
T02TD1346E:48a-13: lha rnams kyi ni rang gi snying ga'i padmar rang rang sa bon dag gi rim pas dgod par bya //
T02TD1346E:48a-14: sa bon bkod na rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mchod rten sku gzugs sogs la'o //
T02TD1346E:48a-15: nye bar bsdu ba'i dus su lag pa'i rdo rje dag gis rang gi lus la sa bon gzhug par bya /
T02TD1346E:48a-16: 114 /'di dang dang po ru yang ri mor bris pa'i thang sku rnams kyi me long la ni khrus su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:48a-17: phyi nas dri dang spos dang shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams dang glu dang rol mo dag dang ni //
T02TD1346E:48a-18: gar dang rnam mang mchog gi gos dang rnga yab dang ni gdugs rnams dag gis lha la mchod par bya //
T02TD1346E:48a-19: de ltar rab gnas byas nas rnam mang mchog gi ro rnams dag gis dge 'dun mchod ston rab tu sbyin /
T02TD1346E:48a-20: 115 / khron pa rdzing dang mtshe 'ur phyogs dang phyogs bral du ni klu yi rgyal po nor rnams dgod par bya //
T02TD1346E:48a-21: chu gter bdun po rang gi sa bon gyis te sbrang rtsi chu dang ldan pa'i dri lnga gzhug par bya //
T02TD1346E:48a-22: sbyin sreg mthar ni rdzing bu la sogs dag la chu lha dkar po phyag na zhags pa bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:48b-0: skyed mos @48b tshal du shing gcig dpag bsam ljon pa mtha' dag shing la gnas par dbang ni bskur nas so /
T02TD1346E:48b-1: 116 / cod pan dar dpyangs dag dang do shal gdu bu dang ni de bzhin rna cha ska rags la sogs pa //
T02TD1346E:48b-2: slob dpon la ni rab tu sbyin byar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po yon yang bdag nyid nus pas so //
T02TD1346E:48b-3: sbyin bdag gis ni bsod nams slad du mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs la gzhan don don du gnyer bya ste //
T02TD1346E:48b-4: bsod nams 'di yis rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni bla med byang chub thob par shog /
T02TD1346E:48b-5: 117 / ji srid phyogs kyi lo ni gcig pu rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te blta ba dang na rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:48b-6: de nas 'khyud par bya ste ro dang bcas pa'i chu gter g-yo ba la sogs rnams ni bsten par bya //
T02TD1346E:48b-7: lo ni nyi shu yan chad phyag rgya mchog tu 'jigs byed ma ste khro bo 'byung po lha min cha //
T02TD1346E:48b-8: dbang gi don du drug dang bzhi ste bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o /
T02TD1346E:48b-9: 118 / dpal ldan shes rab nu ma la yang dang por reg pa gang yin bum pa'i dbang ni de nyid do //
T02TD1346E:48b-10: gsang ba dag las ri bong 'dzin pa myang ba dang ni blta ba dag gis gsang ba'i dbang du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:48b-11: shes rab ye shes dbang la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi yan lag zhal gyi sbyang ba byas nas ni //
T02TD1346E:48b-12: rgyal ba dag kyang 'dir ni bla mas dpang por byas nas slob ma la ni phyag rgya sbyin bar bya /
T02TD1346E:48b-13: 119 / rgyan rnams thams cad dang ldan zhun ma'i gser dang mtshungs shing bcu gnyis lo lon mdzes ma'i bu mo ni //
T02TD1346E:48b-14: khrag dang ldan la shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid dag gis rang gi rdo rje nor bus 'dod spyad nas //
T02TD1346E:48b-15: sa bon dang bcas rdo rje dag kyang slob ma dag par shes nas kha ru 'phang ba byas nas ni //
T02TD1346E:48b-16: phyi nas rang gi phyag rgya sbyin bya de nas slar yang gzhan ni du ba'i lam sogs ldan pa'o /
T02TD1346E:48b-17: 120 / skrag dang rnam par 'phrul ba'i sems ldan g-yo sgyu gzhan dbang 'gro ma nad dang ldan dang bu skyes ma //
T02TD1346E:48b-18: khro khengs nor la sred dang mi bden rtsod pa la dga' rang gi yan lag dman dang rnam dag min //
T02TD1346E:48b-19: shes rab 'di dag dbang la shin tu mkhas pa'i bla ma dag gis spang bar bya'o mi yi dbang //
T02TD1346E:49a-0: sngar brjod sangs rgyas la gus bla ma'i dam tshig @49a * //
T02TD1346E:49a-1: 'dzin ma rnams ni phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya /
T02TD1346E:49a-2: 121 /'dod pa skyod par byed pa 'gro ba rang gi yid la'o gang ba dag ni gang ba nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:49a-3: gang ba yan lag mchog dag las ni ri bong 'dzin pa khu bar byas nas thig le bzang po 'dzag / ao ddas bkug pa mchog gi bde ba rang bzhin gyis ster thig le grol ba dag ni gsum gyi mthar //
T02TD1346E:49a-4: blta dang reg dang 'grogs la 'dzag pa'i bde ba 'di dag dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs dag gis so /
T02TD1346E:49a-5: 122 /'dod pa dga' bar byed de dang po dag kyang mi rnams kyi ni mig gis blta ba dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:49a-6: phyi nas gang ba rab tu sbyar ba la ste slar yang mchog gi dga' ba nyid do rang lus la //
T02TD1346E:49a-7: 'bar ba thig le 'dzag pa dang ni dga' ba yang ste khyad par dga' ba rdo rjes padma la //
T02TD1346E:49a-8: ao dda thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru 'gyur ba la gnas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rdo rje byed /
T02TD1346E:49a-10: 123 / 'dod dang dga' ba dang ni 'dar dang 'gyur med dag dang bzhi po yis ni sbyar ba de gcig ste //
T02TD1346E:49a-11: gang ba dang ni nus dang skye ba dag dang mchog gi dga' ba nyid ni gnyis par nges par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:49a-12: 'bar ba dang ni thig le brgyal ba dag dang slar yang khyad par dga' ba nyid ni gsum pa'o //
T02TD1346E:49a-13: ao dda dang ni n'a da dag dang gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid ni bzhi par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:49a-14: 124 / sems kyi bsam pa yis ni ma ru 'gyur te reg pa dang ni blta ba dag gis srid mo'o //
T02TD1346E:49a-15: rdo rje zhugs pas bu mo byed pa dang bcas shin tu dga' bas tsha mo dag ni de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:49a-16: thig le lhung na chung ma gzhan gyi rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor mar ni 'dod chags nyams las so //
T02TD1346E:49a-17: 'di dag rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ste sa chu bsreg za rlung dang mkha' dang chad pa'i dngos rnams so /
T02TD1346E:49a-18: 125 / chu skyes la ni rdo rje rab zhugs rtse mo can la rlung dang thig le mi lhung gsum pa'o //
T02TD1346E:49a-19: 'di dag rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab tu gsal zhing nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1346E:49a-20: chags dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po mchog bde'i gter ni rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1346E:49a-21: phyag rgya rnams las de ni legs pa'i ma ru 'gyur te rnam bcu dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o /
T02TD1346E:49b-0: 126 / shes @49b rab yum ni mchog gi yum ste srid gsum skyed ma spyan la sogs pa rnams ni sring mo'o //
T02TD1346E:49b-1: rdo rje drug ni tsha mo rnams te phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs ster tsa rtsi k'a sogs yang tsha mo //
T02TD1346E:49b-2: 'khor lo la gnas dus kun tu ni rang rigs sa la gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsten par bya //
T02TD1346E:49b-3: zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o /
T02TD1346E:49b-4: 127 / dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dpal ldan yab ste srid gsum skyed mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad ming po'o //
T02TD1346E:49b-5: spyan la sogs pa ming po'i bu ste gzhan ni rnam mang yang tsha rnams dang yang tsha'i bu rnams so //
T02TD1346E:49b-6: 'khor lo la gnas rang rigs sar gnas rab dga' rnams ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gis bsten par bya //
T02TD1346E:49b-7: zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o /
T02TD1346E:49b-8: 128 / bud med zla ba'i bzhin dang autpala mig can mchog gi dri yis rjes su byugs pa gang su dag / bsod nams dag gi rgyu ru dag pa gsum gyis slob dpon la ni rdo rje'i mchod pa 'bul byed na //
T02TD1346E:49b-9: sa gzhi sbyin dang glang po rta dang shing rta du ma'i bu mo rab tu sbyin las bsod nams gang //
T02TD1346E:49b-10: bsod nams de dag thams cad de las 'gyur te mi bdag mkha' gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtshams su'o /
T02TD1346E:49b-11: 129 / sgrol ma dmangs mo rnam pa bzhi ru sa yi steng du 'gyur te gos dkar mo ni rgyal rigs ma //
T02TD1346E:49b-12: sa ni rje'u rigs ma rnams rnam gsum m'a ma k'i ni gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes rnam bdun 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:49b-13: sgra zhes bya ba 'khor ba mkhan mo nges par ro yi rdo rje chang 'tshong gzugs kyi rdo rje ma //
T02TD1346E:49b-14: yang dag nges par gser mkhan mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po 'dzin ma dag la dri yi rdo rje ni /
T02TD1346E:49b-15: 130 / phreng ba mkhan du rab tu grangs te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis reg bya rdo rje thags mkhan ma //
T02TD1346E:49b-16: rdo rje'i mtha' can chos kyi dbyings ni nor bu mkhan mor 'gyur bar 'jig rten du ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:49b-17: ts'a mu nd'i ni sha 'tshong mar 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khyab 'jug ma ni rdza mkhan ma //
T02TD1346E:49b-18: phag mo khur ba mkhan du nges 'gyur gdong drug ma ni smad 'tshong ma ste dbang mo tshem bu ma /
T02TD1346E:50a-1: mor 'gyur sa gzhi'i gnas dag tu yang dbang phyug ma ni gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:50a-2: dpal mo zla ba gang ba'i zhal ni brgyad pa tshos mkhan mar yang 'gyur te 'byung po'i skye gnas so //
T02TD1346E:50a-3: rmugs byed ma ni rgya skyegs mkhan mor 'gyur te mi bdag rengs byed ma ni srin bal mkhan mo'o //
T02TD1346E:50a-4: khengs ma zhes bya til mar 'tshir ma rab che shin tu stobs ni lcags mkhan mo ste bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1346E:50a-5: 132 /'od zer can ni ko lpags mkhan mar rab 'gyur khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma dag de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:50a-6: dpal ldan tsu nd'a 'breg mkhan ma ste sa yi srid pa la gnas lcags sgrog ma ni smyug ma mkhan //
T02TD1346E:50a-7: drag spyan ma ni khron pa byed mar 'gyur te bcu pa 'od ma'i gar ma shin tu sngon mo'o //
T02TD1346E:50a-8: khro bo'i cha shas khro bo las skyes bud med bcu po rnams ni rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya /
T02TD1346E:50a-9: 133 / dpal ldan khyi gdong ma ni kla klo mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po phag gdong ma ni 'phyag pa mo //
T02TD1346E:50a-10: ce spyang gdong ma gtum mo dag dang sa yi gzhi yi gnas la stag gdong ma ni stag gzig ma //
T02TD1346E:50a-11: bya rog gdong ma bsnyon thabs ma ste rab tu gsal zhing [?] nges par bya rgod gdong ma ro sreg ma //
T02TD1346E:50a-12: mkha' lding gdong ma dpal ldan bhi ll'ir 'gyur te brgyad pa 'ug pa'i gdong ma dag kyang ri khrod ma /
T02TD1346E:50a-13: 134 / sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa gzhi'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs rnams te //
T02TD1346E:50a-14: zhing dang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yul dang grong mchog dpal ldan nags su yang dag gnas pa ni //
T02TD1346E:50a-15: rmongs rnams 'ching bar byed cing rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la dngos grub ster //
T02TD1346E:50a-16: bzhi dang drug dang de bzhin brgyad dang bcu dang bcas pa'i nor dang gcig pu gcig ni rim pas so /
T02TD1346E:50a-17: 135 / bzhi ni sangs rgyas dbye ba rnams te slar yang dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i rag tu dbye ba rnams //
T02TD1346E:50a-18: khro [?] bo rnams ni phyogs kyi rab dbye sa steng gnas su yi dags dbye ba rnams ni de bzhin brgyad //
T02TD1346E:50a-19: lha min dag kyang brgyad kyi dbye ba gdengs can srid par gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:50b-0: gcig pu gcig ni sna tshogs gtso bo srid gsum gnas su dpal ldan rigs rnams @50b dag gi khyab byed do /
T02TD1346E:50b-1: 136 / sa 'og rnams su gtum mo brgyad de mi yi 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la ni khro skyes gnas //
T02TD1346E:50b-2: yi dags zhes bya yi dags 'jig rten du ste lha mchog gnas su sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug / tshangs pa'i yul sar dpal ldan bzhi ste rab mchog zhi ba'i grong du khams gsum dag gi yum gcig ma //
T02TD1346E:50b-3: rab tu khros pa'i zhal rnams sna tshogs yang dag sdud byed dgyes pa rnams ni skyong bar byed pa nyid /
T02TD1346E:50b-4: 137 / bu mo rgan mo dar ma rnams dang lus ni dri ma dang bcas bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs mo //
T02TD1346E:50b-5: rje'u mo dmangs mo mthar skyes rnams sam mig dang lag pa dang bral rnam [?] chu sna ni chad ma rnams //
T02TD1346E:50b-6: mtha' dag byang chub rgyu ru shes rab thabs kyis mchod par bya ste rgyal po slob dpon snying rje dang //
T02TD1346E:50b-7: bcas pa'i thugs ldan dri ma dag dang rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su zhon pas so /
T02TD1346E:50b-8: 138 / dang por bud med gsang ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te dam tshig la ni dpal ldan skyes pa mchog phyag rgya //
T02TD1346E:50b-9: rtsed mo'i yan lag las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te dbang po gnyis kyi bde mnyam dag gis chos phyag rgya //
T02TD1346E:50b-10: pho nya mo rnams dag gi dri lnga lus dang padma la gnas de dag rnams kyi rigs lnga ste //
T02TD1346E:50b-11: rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis gla rtsi dang ni padma gcin dang sha dang rul pa'i dri rnams so /
T02TD1346E:50b-12: 139 / dpal ldan bzang mo padma can du nges 'gyur chu la rgyu ma sna tshogs ma dang glang chen ma //
T02TD1346E:50b-13: dpal ldan sgrol ma gos dkar zhes byar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis m'a ma k'i dang spyan ma yang //
T02TD1346E:50b-14: rnal 'byor pa ni seng ge ri dags rta ru 'gyur te khyu mchog glang po rigs kyi dbye ba las //
T02TD1346E:50b-15: mi bskyod pa dang don yod grub pa dri med nor bu'i phyag dang phyag na padma 'khor lo can /
T02TD1346E:50b-16: 140 / yan lag phra ldan skra rnams phra zhing rkang lag 'jam la mnyes gshin dpal ldan shin tu bzang mo'o //
T02TD1346E:50b-17: cung zad phra ba dang ldan ring zhing mig ni g-yo ba med la skra ni 'khyog pa padma can //
T02TD1346E:50b-18: ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa drag la rtsod mang la dga' skra ni shin tu chung ba dung can ma //
T02TD1346E:50b-19: ring zhing yan lag thams cad rdzogs la nges par yang ba'i yul dang skra ni ring ba sna tshogs ma /
T02TD1346E:51a-0: 141 / sbom zhing thung la yan lag @51a * //
T02TD1346E:51a-1: brtan ldan shin tu sra ba'i yul dang skra ni sbom pa glang chen ma //
T02TD1346E:51a-2: pho nya mo rnams dag pa'i rigs ni 'ga' zhig dag tu 'dir 'gyur dus kun tu ni 'dres pa'i rigs //
T02TD1346E:51a-3: seng ge dag kyang 'brog na gnas shing yul dang rnam bral 'jigs pa med la gtong ba'i ngang tshul can //
T02TD1346E:51a-4: ri dags mgyogs 'gro dang ldan 'gyur zhing yang pa'i yul dang skrag pa'i sems te shin tu 'jigs pa'o /
T02TD1346E:51a-5: 142 / rta ni nges par 'dod la sred par 'gyur te gzhan dbang gcin gyi dri dang gzhan don gnyer ba'o //
T02TD1346E:51a-6: khyu mchog rengs pa'i mig dang dman par 'gro ldan rang bzhin yon tan blun po nya yi dri ru 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:51a-7: glang chen 'dod ldan nges par dal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te rul pa'i dri dang shin tu rmongs pa'o //
T02TD1346E:51a-8: sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba sa yi steng gi gnas su rigs kyi dri yi rang bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:51a-9: 143 / mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:51a-10: shin tu dga' ba byas kyang rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma yis ma tshim dngos grub sbyin mi 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:51a-11: mdzes ma lha mo dang ni sha za mo dang mi mo dang ni srin mo klu mo dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:51a-12: mdzes ma dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha mo sgra yi rdo rje ma /
T02TD1346E:51a-13: 144 / sha za mo ni dri yi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi mo dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje mi yi dbang //
T02TD1346E:51a-14: gdug pa srin mo gang yin de ni nges par ro yi rdo rje klu mo reg bya rdo rje ma //
T02TD1346E:51a-15: mdzes ma sems can phan pa byed ma brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' sdom dang bsam gtan ngang tshul can ;
T02TD1346E:51a-16: / lha mo longs spyod la ni rjes chags 'gyur te dri ma ldan zhing lhag ma la chags sha za mo /
T02TD1346E:51a-17: 145 / mi mo 'dod la rjes su chags ma srin mo mi yi khrag la dga' zhing gsod pa'i sems ma ste //
T02TD1346E:51a-18: klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya //
T02TD1346E:51a-19: de bzhin gzhan du rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:51a-20: sa yi steng gi gnas su mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba'o /
T02TD1346E:51b-0: 146 / chang ni shes rab rang bzhin sbrang rtsi dang bcas bu ram las skyes 'bras las skyes sam shing @51b skyes te //
T02TD1346E:51b-1: phyag rgya dang bral gang zhig 'thung byed de ni yul can du 'gyur bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
T02TD1346E:51b-2: de phyir shes rab lhag ldan sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing sngags pa rnams la dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:51b-3: phyag rgya gang su rung ba 'dir ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba btung ba'i slad du rab tu bya /
T02TD1346E:51b-4: 147 / rgyal po ri bong mtshan ma gcig pu thams cad dus su bsten pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog byed na //
T02TD1346E:51b-5: shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa dang bcas rnal 'byor ldan pa dag ni smos ci dgos //
T02TD1346E:51b-6: mi bskyod don yod grub pa rgyal ba mchog bcas khyi dang rta dang ba lang glang po dang ldan pa //
T02TD1346E:51b-7: nyon mongs rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs sbyin brgyad pa gzhan ni shin tu drag 148 / khyi rta ba lang glang po lug dang ra dang ri dags bong bu phag dang rnga mo 'di dag phyogs //
T02TD1346E:51b-8: kum bh'i ra dang 'gron bu ku l'i ra dang nya dang ma ka ra dang sbal pa rus sbal dung //
T02TD1346E:51b-9: bse dang stag dang dom dang ne'u le dang bcas 'bri dang ce spyang dang ni sram dang byi la dang //
T02TD1346E:51b-10: 'brog dgon khyi dang seng ge dang bcas nor dang bcu ste 'di ni 'byung po skyes dang khro bo skyes /
T02TD1346E:51b-11: 149 / go dh'a byi ba sh'a li dz'a ta spre'u dang ni ri bong gzungs mo ai shu rtsangs pa brgyad //
T02TD1346E:51b-12: khengs ldan 'dab chags dang ni ne tsho khu byug dag dang ri skyegs rab tu gsal bar chu yi gter //
T02TD1346E:51b-13: l'a ba phug ron gzhan ni bya dkar zhes bya tsa ta ka dang dur pa dang ni ngang pa dang //
T02TD1346E:51b-14: dpal ldan khrung khrung khu byug mig dang ra dza ki dang bha ga ba t'i ti ti ri dang bzhad /
T02TD1346E:51b-15: 150 / chu la 'jug pa dang ni chu skyar ro dang bcas pa'i nor rnams rim pa yis ni rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:51b-16: bya rog bya rgod 'ug pa ri dags dgra dang gtsug phud can dang bya gag bhe tr'a gh'a ra dang //
T02TD1346E:51b-17: hor pa ljon shing dgra ni gzhan te bcu po khro bo las skyes khro bo yi ni rigs su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:51b-18: mig sngon dpal ldan tsa ko ra dang aa n'i la dang gu da mu kha bug ki rkang steng nyal /
T02TD1346E:51b-19: 151 / bhe ru nda dang aom ba r'i ka brgyad pa mchog gi 'dab chags su 'gyur mi yi bdag po kye //
T02TD1346E:51b-20: sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa la gnas sa spyod mkha' la spyod rnams kyi //
T02TD1346E:52a-1: dam tshig mtha' dag rnams ni mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya //
T02TD1346E:52a-2: rmongs pas gti mug dag las gal te spangs na mi yi bdag po myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:52a-3: 152 / so dang skra dang pags pa la sogs sha bcas chu rgyas dang bcas rus pa snying dang padma dang //
T02TD1346E:52a-4: shig dang ba spu srin bu dag dang rab mchog mi yi bdag po glo ba rgyu mchu so dag / bad kan mkhris pa chu dang rnag dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa khrag dang rdul dang tshil bu dang //
T02TD1346E:52a-5: mchi ma dag dang mchil ma snabs dang dri chu chu ser zhag dang kha dog dri dang bshang ba dang /
T02TD1346E:52a-7: 153 / lce dang mig dang rna ba sna dang ri bong can bcas nyin byed rnams kyis lha rnams mchod par bya //
T02TD1346E:52a-8: sum cu rtsa drug yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang //
T02TD1346E:52a-9: sum cu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i rigs dang mtshan ma phyag rgya dang //
T02TD1346E:52a-10: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni sa gzhi dag la gnas rnams 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi /
T02TD1346E:52a-11: 154 / chu dang mchod yon dri dang spos dang me tog dang ni 'bras bu ma nyams pa dang mar me dang //
T02TD1346E:52a-12: lha bshos dag dang 'dir ni na bzar 'gyur te bcu po rnams ni 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang //
T02TD1346E:52a-13: khu ba gcin dang rkang dang bshang ba dag dang sha dang mchin pa dag dang mkhris pa khrag dang ni //
T02TD1346E:52a-14: rgyu ma pags pa rnams ni rgyal po rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang /
T02TD1346E:52a-15: 155 / rdo rje dang ni ral gri mda' dang padma 'dab ma brgya pa lnga pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ste //
T02TD1346E:52a-16: rgyud mangs dang ni me long snod du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po me tog phreng ba dag dang gos //
T02TD1346E:52a-17: drug pa chos 'byung nges par lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur te sgra yi rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1346E:52a-18: de bzhin gri gug la sogs bum pa zhes dang de bzhin du ni bcu gzar gos ni ser po dang /
T02TD1346E:52a-19: 156 / khab bam yang na tho ba [?] rab tu gsal zhing [?] nges pa dag tu nya yi rgya dang rtse gsum ste //
T02TD1346E:52a-20: dpal mo'i mtshan ma brgyad pa rdo bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1346E:52b-0: rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyi dmar snod nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs @52b dar gyi srin bu ku sha dang //
T02TD1346E:52b-1: chu gri dang ni mthil lham dag dang spu gri zhes bya de bzhin shing lham dag dang gdugs dang ni /
T02TD1346E:52b-2: 157 / tog tse dang ni 'od ma'i dbyug pa khro skyes rnams kyi rang gi mtshan ma bcu ru rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:52b-3: ba lang rva dang kham phor rgyud ldan 'phang dang sha yi gsal shing lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:52b-4: rgyud mangs nye ba'i yan lag dang ni mda' dang gtsug phud can gyi mjug ma 'dir ni brgyad par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:52b-5: sum cu rtsa drug mtshan ma'i dbye ba rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya /
T02TD1346E:52b-6: 158 / slar yang dmangs rigs la sogs mtshan mar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis autpala'am thong gshol lo //
T02TD1346E:52b-7: rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dar dpyangs su 'gyur mi yi bdag po smyu gu rin chen phreng ba ni //
T02TD1346E:52b-8: rje rigs ma yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin chu na rgyu ba dang bcas zangs snod gnyis skyes ma'i //
T02TD1346E:52b-9: yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi ste da ma ru dang rnga chen cod pan nyid dang bgrang phreng ngo /
T02TD1346E:52b-10: 159 / bshang ba gci ba dang ni khrag dang sha dang bcas pa lha mo rnams ni bzhi por 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:52b-11: rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dang ni bha ga sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug / rnag dang bad kan dang ni shig dang srin bu chu ser zhag dang ba spu skra dang brgyad po yang //
T02TD1346E:52b-12: rgyu ma mkhris pa rus pa rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa mchin pa dang ni glo ba dang /
T02TD1346E:52b-13: 160 / rtsa dang pags pa rnams dang snying dang tshil bu ldan pa dag ni bcu ru 'gyur ro mi yi dbang //
T02TD1346E:52b-14: rna ba dang ni sna dang mig dang kha dang bshang lam dbus dang bha ga dag dang mchan khung sogs //
T02TD1346E:52b-15: lus kyi yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i dri ma mi yi bdag po lha min mo rnams brgyad du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:52b-16: sen mo dang bcas so dang yan lag bcu gnyis thod pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:52b-18: 161 / bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni sna tshogs lus la gnas pa gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi //
T02TD1346E:52b-19: rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dag dang bha ga zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug / rnag la sogs pa skra yi bar ni sa yi steng gi gnas su tshan do ha yi dbye ba brgyad //
T02TD1346E:53a-1: tshil gyi bar ni phyogs zhes bya ba mi bdag 'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams /
T02TD1346E:53a-2: 162 / rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la nges par rnam mang dri ma dur khrod rab dbye rnams //
T02TD1346E:53a-3: dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal zhing nges par gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi //
T02TD1346E:53a-4: sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa pa sangs spen pa gdengs can rnams ni zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa skyes chu skyes me skyes rlung las skyes pa dag 163 / brgyad ni tshan do ha yi dbye ba rnams te slar yang de bzhin ro drug dri dang kha dog dang //
T02TD1346E:53a-5: reg bya sgra ni de bzhin nyid du rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye ba rnams //
T02TD1346E:53a-6: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ni zad pa dag kyang mdun dang g-yon dang g-yas dang rgyab tu ste //
T02TD1346E:53a-7: kha dog la sogs bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye ba rnams /
T02TD1346E:53a-8: 164 / gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs khyim ste gsal bar sgra yi rdo rje la sogs de bzhin zhing du brjod //
T02TD1346E:53a-9: tshan do ha ni tsa rtsi k'a la sogs par rab tu 'gyur te mi bdag 'dus pa rmugs byed sogs //
T02TD1346E:53a-10: dur khrod khyi gdong ma la sogs pa mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni //
T02TD1346E:53a-11: yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis te de dag rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma /
T02TD1346E:53a-12: 165 / gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i padmar rab 'gyur dam tshig dag la rdo rje nyid ni nye ba'i gnas //
T02TD1346E:53a-13: zhing dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa dag dang dur khrod sa gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go //
T02TD1346E:53a-14: gnas ni g-yon gyi yan lag dag dang mdun te gzhan dang de bzhin g-yas pa dag kyang nye ba'i gnas //
T02TD1346E:53a-15: de ltar zhing la sogs pa thams cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo'i mtha' yi mtshams su'o /
T02TD1346E:53a-16: 166 / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang lha mo chu gter du 'gyur dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:53a-17: shes rab byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan pa dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug / chu gter yang dag spong ba rnams dang gzhan pa chu gter rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:53b-0: khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste rab tu gsal zhing @53b nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do /
T02TD1346E:53b-1: 167 / yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:53b-2: sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te //
T02TD1346E:53b-3: de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:53b-4: de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang ni de bzhin 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:53b-5: 168 / sangs rgyas pa dang zhi ba pa'am gcer bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin gtsang gnas bram ze'am //
T02TD1346E:53b-6: thod pa can dang skra 'bal dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub pa dang //
T02TD1346E:53b-7: smyon pa'i gzugs can dag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa dang ni grags pa nyid 'gyur te //
T02TD1346E:53b-8: rnal 'byor pa ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gter te de nyid thob pa mi yi dbang /
T02TD1346E:53b-9: 169 / mthe bo dang ni mdzub mo dag dang slar yang de bzhin du ni gung mo dang ni ming med dang //
T02TD1346E:53b-10: de yi mthar ni nges par mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gter du rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:53b-11: phyag rgya'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sor mo rnams kyi rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:53b-12: bcing ba brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba la yang de bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:53b-13: 170 / khu tshur brla yi steng du rdo rje gdan la gnas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:53b-14: skyil krung la ni lag pa g-yon par 'gyur te g-yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa la son gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:53b-15: sa la reg pa mi bskyod phyag rgya slar yang lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin phyag na rin chen gyi //
T02TD1346E:53b-16: g-yon gyi steng du lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal mnyam par gnas pa phyag na padma dag gir 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:53b-17: 171 / g-yon pa skyil krung steng du gzhan pa lag pa'i mthil na 'jigs pa med pa phyag na ral gri yi //
T02TD1346E:53b-18: g-yas kyi khu tshur g-yas min la ste nges par slar yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu tshur bcings pa la //
T02TD1346E:53b-19: gsal bar snying gar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1346E:54a-1: ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur pa dang ni gung mo la sogs brkyang pa'o /
T02TD1346E:54a-2: 172 / lag pa g-yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri med ri bong 'dzin pa g-yas la rdo rje nyi ma ste //
T02TD1346E:54a-3: nyi ma zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khro bo las skyes rtse mo lnga pa ni //
T02TD1346E:54a-4: bsgoms nas yan lag la ni reg bya cod pa na dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mtha' nyid du'o //
T02TD1346E:54a-5: 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag rgya sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'o /
T02TD1346E:54a-6: 173 / gang zhig cung zad gzung bar bya ba'i dngos po sa skyes chu skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang //
T02TD1346E:54a-7: bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg par bya //
T02TD1346E:54a-8: gang gang bya ba nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur ba yon tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1346E:54a-9: sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor don dang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis bsnun par bya ;
T02TD1346E:54a-10: 174 / lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings pa yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon bo chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:54a-11: mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yi //
T02TD1346E:54a-12: mtshan ma'i rnam pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1346E:54a-13: lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings la g-yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:54a-14: 175 / mthe bo dag dang mthe'u chung sbyar ba padma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs gung mo dag ni brkyang ba dang //
T02TD1346E:54a-15: mdzub mo gnyis ni zla ba phyed pa ming med 'og tu bskum pa rang gi lag mthil son gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:54a-16: phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje can gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par bya ba'o //
