T02TD1346E:54a-17: rtsibs kyi rnam pa sor mo rnams te lag pa gnyi ga'i mthil du mthe bo la sogs mtha' dag rnams /
T02TD1346E:54a-18: 176 / lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings pa rdo rjer 'gyur te rdo rje khu tshur dag gis dril bur bcas //
T02TD1346E:54a-19: khu tshur phyed pa mdzub mo dang ni gung mo mda' dang mtshungs pa dag kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:54a-20: mdzub mo la sogs rtse gsum slar yang bkram pa dag ste khu tshur phyed pa yis ni rtse gsum la //
T02TD1346E:54b-0: dpal ldan gri gug khu tshur bcings shing @54b dpal ldan mthe'u chung zla ba phyed pa 'jigs pa byed par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:54b-1: 177 / rna ba'i steng du khu tshur bcings shing mthe bong gung mo'i steng du 'gyur te mda' yi mchog la'o //
T02TD1346E:54b-2: khu tshur bcings shing mdzub mo shin tu 'khyog por 'gyur ro mi bdag de bzhin nyid du lcags kyu la'o //
T02TD1346E:54b-3: rtsa bar mdzub mo ming med du 'gyur mda' dang mtshungs pa'i steng du gung mo yang ni mdung la ste //
T02TD1346E:54b-4: thad kar khu tshur dbyug pa la'o lag mthil shin tu mnyam la mthe bo brkyang ba dgra sta la /
T02TD1346E:54b-5: 178 / steng du khu tshur gnyis dang mdzub mor 'gyur te lha min bdag po glang chen pags pa dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:54b-6: mche ba la ni lag pa gnyi ga'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe'u chung zla ba phyed pa'o //
T02TD1346E:54b-7: khe ta ka la dpung pa g-yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du son par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:54b-8: kha tv'am ga la khu tshur bug par 'gyur te nges pa nyid du phrag par mthe'u chung brkyang ba'o /
T02TD1346E:54b-10: 179 / sor mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad 'dab lta bu steng du byas pa dpal ldan thod pa la //
T02TD1346E:54b-11: gzhu la lag pa gan rkyal khu tshur du 'gyur nges par dpung pa g-yon pa rab tu brkyang ba'o //
T02TD1346E:54b-12: gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po kun du brten par 'gyur te nges par rdo rje zhags pa la //
T02TD1346E:54b-13: rin chen la ni sbyar ba'i sor mor 'gyur te mi bdag de dag rnam par phye ba padma la /
T02TD1346E:54b-14: 180 / chu na rgyu ba la ni mdzub mo mthe bo sbyar bar 'gyur te mthe bo'i 'og tu khu tshur ro //
T02TD1346E:54b-15: me long la ni shin tu mnyam pa'i lag mthil sor mo bug med dang bcas mngon du phyogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:54b-16: mthe bo la ni mdzub mo la sogs steng du 'khyog po rim par yongs su bkod pa lcags sgrog la'o //
T02TD1346E:54b-17: mgo po la ni mthe bo la sogs bzhi po gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og tu mthe'u chung bskum pa'o /
T02TD1346E:54b-18: 181 / cod pan la ni lag pa dag gis dung gi phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar ba nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:54b-19: lag mthil dag gi rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni gcig tu sbyar ba dag kyang rna rgyan la //
T02TD1346E:54b-20: lag pa'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams ni rim par yongs su bkod cing bcings pa mgul ba'i rgyan la ste //
T02TD1346E:55a-0: lag pa gnyi ga'i sor mo gsum ni phan tshun sbyar cing thog @55a * //
T02TD1346E:55a-1: mtha' bskum pa dag ni ska rags la /
T02TD1346E:55a-2: 182 / khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong dag dang gung mo gnyis po zlum skor lta bur byas pa rkang gdub la //
T02TD1346E:55a-3: de bzhin du ni dpung rgyan zung dang gdu bu la yang mdzub mo phan tshun sbyar ba dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:55a-4: mthe bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gi mchog gi rigs su 'gyur te mdzub mo gsang ba pa rnams kyi //
T02TD1346E:55a-5: dri za rnams dang gdengs can rnams kyi gung mo ming med dag ni rim par yongs su bkod pa'o /
T02TD1346E:55a-6: 183 /'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe'u chung rab mchog lag pa'i mthil ni srin po rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:55a-7: grub pa rnams kyi khu tshur bcings pa mchog gi rigs te tshigs kyi mchams [?] ni lha rnams [?] ngag gi'o //
T02TD1346E:55a-8: lag pa gnyi ga'i mthil du sor mo lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi phyag rgya sder mo can rnams kyi //
T02TD1346E:55a-9: khu tshur bcings las mdzub mo gnyis po phyed 'khyog nges par mgo bor son pa rva can rnams kyi'o /
T02TD1346E:55a-10: 184 / mi mnyam lag pa'i mthil la mthe'u chung phan tshun bcings shing gshog pa sbyar ba sgong skyes rnams kyi ste //
T02TD1346E:55a-11: sor mo lnga po rtse mo 'khyog pa gdengs can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya khyad par 'phags par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:55a-12: nyin zhag so so'i gtor ma la ni mdzub mo'i mtha' rnams rab brkyang gzhan pa 'og tu sbyar byas pa //
T02TD1346E:55a-13: 'bar ba dag la mthe bo sbyar te mchog gi lag mthil dag gi mdzub mo brkyang ba gzhan pa'o /
T02TD1346E:55a-14: 185 / mdzub mo bstan na legs par 'ongs sam dag kyang nges par brjod par 'gyur te rnal 'byor pa la yang //
T02TD1346E:55a-15: gnyis kyis shin tu legs par 'ongs dang skal [?] bzangs dge ba mthe bo bcings pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:55a-16: sor mo'i se gol rdebs pa khyod ni 'di ru sngags pa mchog ces nges par brjod par 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:55a-17: mthe bo dang ni ming med dag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyod ni tshim par byed pa'o /
T02TD1346E:55a-18: 186 / sor mo thams cad rtse mo brkyang bas skal [?] bzangs legs par 'ongs pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la yang //
T02TD1346E:55a-19: g-yon gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khyod ni bdag gi gnyen gcig pu dag rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02TD1346E:55b-0: skye gnas @55b dag la reg pas gtso bo mchu dang nu ma zung dang nges par sen mo 'debs pas kyang //
T02TD1346E:55b-1: sor mo phan tshun bcings shing gung mo dang ni mthe bo brkyang bas dam tshig rjod par byed pa yin /
T02TD1346E:55b-2: 187 / mchu dang smin ma mig dag yo zhing mgo la 'phrug par byed na shin tu rmongs pa brjod par byed ;
T02TD1346E:55b-3: / mche ba'i dbus su mthe chung dang ni snying ga kha ru mdzub mo 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02TD1346E:55b-4: mthe bo khu tshur bcings pa dang ni lag pa rkang pa sa la rdebs na nga yis bza' bar bya //
T02TD1346E:55b-5: lce la reg na zos pa dang ni lto dang so la bsnun pa dag gis ma zos pa nyid do /
T02TD1346E:55b-6: 188 / lag pa'i rgyab kyis sod cig nges par rab tu brjod de mngon du phyogs pas 'dug cig 'dug cig go //
T02TD1346E:55b-7: byin pa brla la nyed [?] na skal [?] bzangs khyod ni de ring kho na ngal so nges par rjod par byed //
T02TD1346E:55b-8: rkang pa rab tu rkyong bas gnyid dang pus mo zung dag rkyong ba bdag la shin tu dga' [?] ba gyis //
T02TD1346E:55b-9: yan lag kun la reg par byed cing kha ru lag pa gnas pa bdag la 'dus pa med pa'o //
T02TD1346E:55b-10: 189 / phan tshun lag pa bcings pas bdag gi khyim du de ring 'khor lo 'dus pa dag ni rjod par byed //
T02TD1346E:55b-11: mthe bo ming med rtse mo dag gis rnam mang dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya /
T02TD1346E:55b-12: rkang pa la ni 'phrug par byed na de bzhin du ni phyi rol 'dus pa dag la 'gro ba yang //
T02TD1346E:55b-13: mdzub mo phan tshun bcings na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod ni [?] di ring 'jigs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o /
T02TD1346E:55b-14: 190 / skra ni rang gi so yis gcod na mi yi phyugs khyod 'dir ni ltung bar bya ba rjod par byed //
T02TD1346E:55b-15: so ni phan tshun 'dar bar byed na khyod kyi sha ni 'di dag bdag gis [?] di ring bza' bar bya //
T02TD1346E:55b-16: lce mchu g-yo bar byed na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni btung bar bya'o nges par rjod par byed //
T02TD1346E:55b-17: mchu la so ni 'debs par byed na khyod kyi rgyu ma lto bar gnas 'di bdag gis bza' bar bya /
T02TD1346E:55b-18: 191 / sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis ni sgeg par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bzhad pa'i sbyor bas bzhad pa'o //
T02TD1346E:55b-19: gar gyi sbyor ba yis ni gar du 'gyur te rnam pa mang po'i rol mo'i sbyor bas rol mo'o //
T02TD1346E:56a-0: glu yi sbyor ba yis ni @56a * //
T02TD1346E:56a-1: glu ste mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dri yi sbyor ba dag gis dri //
T02TD1346E:56a-2: phreng ba'i sbyor ba yis ni phreng bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis spos kyi sbyor bdag gis spos /
T02TD1346E:56a-3: 192 / mar me'i rnam pas mar me nges par mun pa bcom pa dang ni snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsir 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:56a-4: zhes pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cad slar yang de nas lnga yi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste //
T02TD1346E:56a-5: gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:56a-6: gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur sa yi steng du de yi rang bzhin dag kyang phyag rgya rnams /
T02TD1346E:56a-7: 193 / pho nya mo ni 'phred la lta bas khyod ni gang zhig nas 'ongs skal pa bzang la rjod par byed //
T02TD1346E:56a-8: mgo bor lag bzhag de yi phyogs su nges par bltas pa rnal 'byor pa yis lan ni smras par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:56a-9: steng du lta bas khyod ni dge 'am sa yi steng du gnas pas khyod ni 'dug la ngal so cig / yon por lta bas khyod song chags pa'i lta bas pho nya mo ni shin tu dga' ba rjod par byed /
T02TD1346E:56a-10: 194 / zhi ba'i lta bas bdag gi grogs po khro gnyer khro bo'i lta bas 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02TD1346E:56a-11: [?] skra la lta bas bdag ni ma rungs par brjod skal [?] bzangs la ni rang gi rang bzhin zur gyis so //
T02TD1346E:56a-12: mdzod spur lta bas bdag mchog rnal 'byor ma ni sna la lta bas yon tan rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02TD1346E:56a-13: mchu la lta bas skal pa bzang ste nu ma zung la lta na bdag ni phyag rgya bzang mor brjod /
T02TD1346E:56a-14: 195 / snying gar lta bas bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid lag pa zung la lta na bdag ni rab tu gtum mor brjod //
T02TD1346E:56a-15: phrag par lta bas bdag ni nus ma sen mo dang bcas lag pa'i mthil la lta na srin mo'o //
T02TD1346E:56a-16: rgyab tu lta na lag 'gro ma ste lte bar lta bas mi yi dbang po bdag ni dam tshig can //
T02TD1346E:56a-17: gsang bar lta bas bdag ni dag pa brla la lta bas bdag ni shin tu dga' la gdul bar dka'/
T02TD1346E:56a-18: 196 / pus mor lta bas bdag ni grub pa nges par rjod byed rkang par lta bas rdzu 'phrul sbyin pa mo //
T02TD1346E:56a-19: rkang pa'i mthe bo nges par lta na bdag ni srid par rdo rje'i sku ste dpa' mo gcig pu dang //
T02TD1346E:56b-0: sor mo @56b kun gyi rtse mor lta bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su kun tu 'gro ma sna tshogs yum //
T02TD1346E:56b-1: pho nya mo rnams lta stangs nyid ni sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:56b-2: 197 / drug cha lus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang pa lus dag gi ni yan lag mchog kyang sbyin pa ste /
T02TD1346E:56b-3: las kyi dbang po rnams kyi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang na yon tan dang bcas yid dag kyang //
T02TD1346E:56b-4: khams kyi cha shas khams kyi nang na rkang gnyis pa dang phyugs kyi tshogs kyi de nyid cha yis gzhan //
T02TD1346E:56b-5: mchog gi phyag rgya rjes su rig pa slob dpon la ni rab tu phul na bde ba'i gnas su 'gro /
T02TD1346E:56b-6: 198 / sems can gang dag rnam gsum srid par gnas rnams 'jig rten khams las ye shes rdo rje lcags kyu yis //
T02TD1346E:56b-7: bkug ste de dag mtha' dag mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje yi //
T02TD1346E:56b-8: bdud rtsi mngon par dbang bskur nas ni dri med ri bong can lus rdo rje can gyi lam thob pa //
T02TD1346E:56b-9: dri ma rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas rnams rang gi gnas su gtang bar bya /
T02TD1346E:56b-10: 199 / rdzas rnams med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1346E:56b-11: de bzhin du bal sogs lam dang mtha' dag yon tan gter ni rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pa ste //
T02TD1346E:56b-12: bstan pa'i don du lag pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gi dbang son skyon rnams kun las rnam par grol //
T02TD1346E:56b-13: gzhan rnams la ni rgyal ba mchog gi snying po yum gyi mchod pa rnam dman sbyin pa nyid mi bya ;
T02TD1346E:56b-14: 200 / dbang gi mthar ni dpal ldan bum pa rnams kyi 'jam zhing lus la bde ster stod kor gos zung dag / dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la sbyin bya gzhan yang de bzhin stod kor dang ni gos zung dag / sgo na gnas pa rnams la rab sbyin mtha' dag yon tan rigs la bdag nyid nus pas de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD1346E:56b-15: mthar ni sbyin sreg byas nas rang gi snying ga'i padmar ye shes sems dpa' rab tu gzhug bya ste /
T02TD1346E:56b-16: 201 /'jig rten pa rnams rang gi gnas su mtha' dag rdul tshon dag kyang dag pa'i klung la spyan drang bya //
T02TD1346E:57a-1: spos me tog 'bras bur bcas dang ras yug dag ni gzhon nu ma rnams la //
T02TD1346E:57a-2: byin nas slob dpon slob mar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni ji ltar 'dod par mchod byas te //
T02TD1346E:57a-3: slob ma la ni gnang ba rab byin rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol /
T02TD1346E:57a-4: 202 / dgra dang seng ge glang chen dbang po me dang lto 'phye'i bdag po chom rkun zhags pas 'ching ba dang //
T02TD1346E:57a-5: chu gter 'khrugs pa dang ni sha za 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed nang dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang //
T02TD1346E:57a-6: dbul dang bud med bral dang mi bdag 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa dang ni rdo rje ltung dang don nyams pa //
T02TD1346E:57a-7: gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni nyin zhag so sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:57a-8: 203 / dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las mngon par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o /
T02TD1346E:57a-10: // / rgyal ba skyed mdzad bdag gis dbang bskur bdun po rnams dang bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang dag dang //
T02TD1346E:57a-11: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya bzhi pa thob //
T02TD1346E:57a-12: slar yang rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs yang dag par ni bdag zhu'o //
T02TD1346E:57a-13: zla ba bzang po'i tshig gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos rdo rje can dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs /
T02TD1346E:57a-14: 1 / zla ba'i sku dang zung gi zhabs te me yi mgrin pa chu gter dpal ldan zhal ni sna tshogs mdog / phrag pa drug dang nyi ma'i dpung pa rgyal ba'i phyag gi padma stong pa drug dang me yi tshigs //
T02TD1346E:57a-15: zhabs dag gis ni zla ba nyi ma bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor dag la bdud dang drag po skrag bzhin pa //
T02TD1346E:57a-16: rol pas mnan pa'i srid med srid pa mnyam pa dus kyi 'khor lo gcig pu de ni bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:57a-17: 2 / skyed mos tshal lam ri bo dang ni rgyal ba mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas ni stong pa dang //
T02TD1346E:57a-18: grub pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang ni mtsho dang bzang po'i gnas dang de bzhin nyid du sbas pa'i sa //
T02TD1346E:57b-0: gang du sems ni rab tu tshim par 'gyur ba der ni bsgrub par @57b bya'o mi yi bdag po kye //
T02TD1346E:57b-1: nges par 'jam pa'i mal stan dag dang gdan la nye bar 'dug nas sngar brjod bsrung ba byas nas ni /
T02TD1346E:57b-2: 3 / dang por snying gar zla ba'i dbus su de nyid 'od zer sna tshogs rnams ni phyogs bcur bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:57b-3: kha la sogs pa dag pa byas nas slar yang nam mkha' dag la spros pa'i rgyal ba rnams la ni //
T02TD1346E:57b-4: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas sdig pa rnam pa mang po bsags pa dag ni bshags byas te //
T02TD1346E:57b-5: sgrub pa po yis lus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa yis ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bya /
T02TD1346E:57b-6: 4 / rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas pa //
T02TD1346E:57b-7: de dag mtha' dag la ni sdig pa rnam grol byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas pas rjes yi rang //
T02TD1346E:57b-8: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1346E:57b-9: rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag gyur cig ces 'dir ni smon lam sems can don gyi slad du bdag bgyid do /
T02TD1346E:57b-10: 5 / stong pa dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro ba mtha' dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman //
T02TD1346E:57b-11: de las sangs rgyas byang chub med cing gzhan phan snying rje dag dang mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste //
T02TD1346E:57b-12: mtha' dag de ltar shes nas de lta na yang mi yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
T02TD1346E:57b-13: dpag med yon tan dkyil 'khor dbang po dkyil 'khor la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:57b-14: 6 / chu yis me ni rnam par nyams pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su sdom brtson dag gis bya //
T02TD1346E:57b-15: phyi nas 'dzin ma dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan tshva bzhin du chu yi dbus su rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1346E:57b-16: rlung ni chu bo de dag bskams nas nam mkha' la ni snang ba min par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:57b-17: sems ni me dang mun pa'i mtha' ma yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyis la gzhag par bya /
T02TD1346E:57b-18: 7 / stong pa rlung me chu dang sa dang lha yi ri bo chu skyes zla ba nyi ma me rnams ni //
T02TD1346E:57b-19: khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba 'am ni rdo rje las skyes gur dag go //
T02TD1346E:58a-0: de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sa la nor bu'i 'od @58a * //
T02TD1346E:58a-1: zer tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba ste //
T02TD1346E:58a-2: aom yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi padma zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag gi gdan /
T02TD1346E:58a-3: 8 / phyi rol du ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor nor bu padma 'di ni zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman //
T02TD1346E:58a-4: phyi rol phyogs dang zur gyi char ni nyin mor byed pa'i padma sgo yi dbus su shing rta rnams //
T02TD1346E:58a-5: nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ni rgyal po nor bu gser gyi rang bzhin rta babs rnams dang dur khrod dang //
T02TD1346E:58a-6: snying por brgyad gnyis ka ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin shin tu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rgyal ba yi /
T02TD1346E:58a-7: 9 / zla ba nyi ma la yang aa sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas me long la sogs lnga rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:58a-8: 'od zer lnga rnams 'gyed par byed cing dri ma med pa'i zer 'phro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:58a-9: rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i lus dang rgyal ba'i phyag gi padma nyi ma'i dpung pa dus kyi zhal //
T02TD1346E:58a-10: mgrin pa gsum dang nyi ma'i spyan te rnam par rgyas pa'i zhal yang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa'o /
T02TD1346E:58a-11: 10 / dpal ldan aom yig las skyes rgyal ba'i bdag po'i padmar zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du ni //
T02TD1346E:58a-12: drag po lus med gnyis kyi snying gar rgyal ba'i dbang po shin tu rol pa'i zhabs ni g-yas brkyang stabs //
T02TD1346E:58a-13: g-yas pa dmar po'i mchog gi zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud de dkar po g-yon par yang ni drag po'o //
T02TD1346E:58a-14: dbus dang g-yas dang g-yas min mgrin pa dag kyang bung ba nyi ma dang mtshungs zla ba dag gi mdog 11 / phrag pa sngon po dang ni dmar dang ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar g-yas pa dang ni g-yon du yang //
T02TD1346E:58a-15: g-yas dang g-yas min dpung pa gnyis gnyis dag ni gnag dang nyi ma'i lus dang zla ba'i mdog rnams te //
T02TD1346E:58a-16: de bzhin nges par mtshon cha dag dang bcas pa'i phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum gyis ni rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:58a-17: phyag gi padma ri bong can la tshigs gsum sor mo lnga po rnams ni kha dog lnga rnams 'phro /
T02TD1346E:58a-18: 12 / gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i rab mchog phyag gi mthil du mtshon cha'i tshogs ni yang dag gnas pa yang /
T02TD1346E:58a-19: rdo rje ral gri dag dang rtse gsum pa dang srid pa 'jigs byed gri gug dang ni me yi mda' //
T02TD1346E:58b-0: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu @58b nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i da ma ru dang tho ba 'khor lo nyid //
T02TD1346E:58b-1: mdung dang dbyug pa dgra sta rnams ni rdo rje can gyi nyi ma'i phyag gi padma g-yas la'o /
T02TD1346E:58b-2: 13 / dril bu phub dang kha tv'am ga ni rnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang //
T02TD1346E:58b-3: gzhu dang zhags pa rin chen padma chun rgyu ba dag dang me long dang ni lcags sgrog dang //
T02TD1346E:58b-4: tshangs pa'i mgo bo padmas brgyan pa rig byed gdong ldan gang yin rgyal ba'i g-yon gyi phyag na'o //
T02TD1346E:58b-5: bdud dang drag po'i lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin cing gdong ni dman pa dag tu byed /
T02TD1346E:58b-6: 14 / gser mdog rig byed zhal ldan nor gyi phyag gi padmas 'khyud pa dag ni sna tshogs yum yin te //
T02TD1346E:58b-7: g-yas na gri gug lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i da ma ru dang bgrang phreng rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:58b-8: g-yon na thod pa zhags pa dang ni 'dab ma brgya pa'i padma mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:58b-9: g-yon brkyang nyi ma'i spyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams kyis rgya yis btab pa'o /
T02TD1346E:58b-10: 15 /'dab brgyad la ni lha mo brgyad rnams nor gyi phyag gi padma rig byed zhal dang nyi ma'i spyan //
T02TD1346E:58b-11: de dag rnams las bzhi ni sprul gyi rnga yab 'dzin te zur du rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye bas so ;
T02TD1346E:58b-12: / dbang ldan bden bral dang ni rtse mo can dang rlung gi zur du chos kyi dung dang ga nd'i dang //
T02TD1346E:58b-13: de bzhin yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur te nges par de bzhin du ni dpag bsam shing du rim pas 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:58b-14: 16 / nag mo yis ni dang po'i phyag gi mthil na spos kyi snod dang gnyis pa dag na bsil ba'i snod //
T02TD1346E:58b-15: dmar po sbyar ba gsum pa na ste myos byed dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa g-yas kyi phyag bzhi na //
T02TD1346E:58b-16: g-yon na dril bu padma lha yi shing gi me tog dang ni me tog phreng ba rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:58b-17: dmar mo'i g-yas na mar me do shal dag dang cod pan dang bcas gdu bu rnams te phyag g-yon na /
T02TD1346E:58b-18: 17 / gos dang ska rags dang ni dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub bo //
T02TD1346E:58b-19: ser mo'i g-yas kyi phyag na dung dang gling bu nor bu dang bcas da ma ru ni rim pas te //
T02TD1346E:59a-0: g-yon na rgyud mangs dang ni rnga dang sil sil rab tu @59a * //
T02TD1346E:59a-1: sgrogs pa'i 'khar ba dag dang zangs dung ngo //
T02TD1346E:59a-2: 'o ma chu dang sman dang chang dang bdud rtsi ro dang 'bras bu zan gyi snod ni dkar mo yi /
T02TD1346E:59a-3: 18 / phyogs kyi padmar chu gter sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par spyan dgu me yi zhal dang dus kyi phyag / zur du sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang slar yang de dag mtshams brgyad du ni bum pa brgyad //
T02TD1346E:59a-4: lha dang lha mo gnag dang dmar dang ser ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba ste //
T02TD1346E:59a-5: nag po dkar po zla ba'i steng du yang na phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser po nyi ma'i ste /
T02TD1346E:59a-6: 19 / mkha' snying la sogs rtsig pa la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas reg bya rdo rje ma la sogs //
T02TD1346E:59a-7: shar dang phyogs gzhan gyi ni g-yas dang g-yas min padma dag la kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:59a-8: dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje nges par sgra yi rdo rje ma dang chos kyi dbyings ni rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:59a-9: rmugs byed rengs byed khengs byed dag ste shin tu stobs shes gang yin sgo skyong de ni shar du'o /
T02TD1346E:59a-10: 20 / shes rab phang bar thabs ni ri bong 'dzin pa'i padma la ste lha rnams kyi yang lha mo'o //
T02TD1346E:59a-11: gnyis po dag ni rang gi phyag gi chu skyes rang rang mtshan mas mtshan pa dag gis phan tshun 'khyud //
T02TD1346E:59a-12: mtshan ma gang zhig gang gi g-yas kyi dang po'i phyag mthil na ste de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman //
T02TD1346E:59a-13: shes rab thabs kyis 'khor lo mchog gi bde bar gnas pa padma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs /
T02TD1346E:59a-14: 21 / nag po rnams kyi g-yas kyi phyag na ral gri gri gug dag dang srid pa 'jigs byed rtse gsum ste //
T02TD1346E:59a-15: g-yon pa'i phyag gi mthil du phub dang thod pa dag dang kha tv'am ga ni dkar po nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:59a-16: mda' dang rdo rje lcags kyu sgra dang bcas pa'i da ma ru ni g-yas kyi phyag na rim pa yis //
T02TD1346E:59a-17: gzhu dang zhags pa dag dang dri med 'phro ba'i nor bu dmar po rnams kyi g-yon na de bzhin nyid /
T02TD1346E:59a-18: 22 / ser po rnams kyi g-yas kyi phyag na 'khor lo dbyug pa dang ni 'jigs byed rdo rje rim pas te //
T02TD1346E:59a-19: g-yon du dpal ldan dung dang lcags sgrog dang ni nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bur 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:59b-0: ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba rnams kyi g-yas na dpal @59b ldan tho ba mdung dang rtse gsum ste //
T02TD1346E:59b-1: g-yon na padma dkar po 'dab ma brgya dang ldan pa dag dang me long dang ni bgrang phreng ngo /
T02TD1346E:59b-2: 23 / ljang gu rnams kyi g-yas su rdo rje gri gug dang ni dgra star rim pas rab tu 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:59b-3: g-yon du dril bu dang ni thod pa mtha' dag yon tan gter dang tshangs pa'i gdong pa de nyid do //
T02TD1346E:59b-4: lha mo sngon mo rnams dag gi yang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de bzhin du ni rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:59b-5: gnag dang dmar dang dkar dang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa shar gyi sa la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams /
T02TD1346E:59b-6: 24 / du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po dor nas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i padma dag la res 'ga' ni //
T02TD1346E:59b-7: dpal ldan 'khor lo snying po'i dbus su mi yi bdag po nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid du yang 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:59b-8: rang gi sems kyi nus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'di yang rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gis bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:59b-9: dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi 'khor lo rab tu dman par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:59b-10: 25 / phyi rol du ni brgyad pa brgyad kyis pad 'dab brgyad po rnams la phyogs brgyad lha mo rnams dang ni //
T02TD1346E:59b-11: tsa rtsi k'a sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma dang bral rig byed phyag dang spyan gsum ma //
T02TD1346E:59b-12: shar gyi padmar tsa rtsi k'a ste mer ni mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro ma phag mo gdong drug ma //
T02TD1346E:59b-13: gshin rje bden bral zur dag tu ste chu bcas rlung du rdo rje lag dang chu gter gdong ma'o /
T02TD1346E:59b-14: 26 / drag mo dpal mo byang dang dbang ldan du ste mtshon cha dang bcas thabs kyi sku la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1346E:59b-15: brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma gang padma'i 'dab ma la gnas gtso mo'i kha dog zhal rnams so //
T02TD1346E:59b-16: shar la sogs par dang po'i phyag gi mthil na gri gug dang ni rtse gsum 'khor lo be con dang //
T02TD1346E:59b-17: dbyug pa ral gri dang ni mdung thung lcags kyu dag ni g-yas kyi phyag gi padma zung la'o /
T02TD1346E:59b-18: 27 / rdo rje mda' dang padma dang ni dri med glog mtshungs tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dag dang rtse gsum dang //
T02TD1346E:59b-19: sna tshogs rin chen gyis bcings sgra dang bcas pa'i da ma ru dang padma nyid dang bgrang phreng ste //
T02TD1346E:60a-0: g-yon na thod pa dang ni kha tv'am ga dang padma dung dang lcags @60a * //
T02TD1346E:60a-1: sgrog dag dang phub dang ni //
T02TD1346E:60a-2: nges par rin po che dang zhags pa sgra ni rab tu sgrogs pa'i rdo rje dril bu gzhu dag dang /
T02TD1346E:60a-3: 28 / spyi blugs snod dang kha tv'am ga dang sprul dang de nas chu las skyes dang rin po che nyid de //
T02TD1346E:60a-4: padma nor 'dab la ni brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma yi phyag gi mtshon cha de bzhin no //
T02TD1346E:60a-5: 'jigs ma drag mo dus kyi mche ba me 'bar gdong ma rlung gi shugs ma dang ni rab gtum ma //
T02TD1346E:60a-6: drag spyan ma dang sna chen ma rnams tsi rtsi k'a yi padma nor 'dab la ni phyogs rnams su /
T02TD1346E:60a-7: 29 / g-yang mo sgyu ma grags dpal rab mchog rnam par rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal byed ma //
T02TD1346E:60a-8: brgyad pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma nor 'dab padma la ni khyab 'jug ma yi phyogs kyi char //
T02TD1346E:60a-9: keng rus ma dang dus kyi mtshan mo rab tu khros pa'i gdong ma dus kyi lce dang gtsigs ma dang //
T02TD1346E:60a-10: nag mo 'jigs rung gzugs ngan ma rnams nor 'dab padma la ste phag mo'i 'dab ma'i lha mo la'o /
T02TD1346E:60a-11: 30 / padma lus med gzhon nu ma dang ri dags bdag pos 'gro ma rin chen phreng ba mig bzang ma //
T02TD1346E:60a-12: rul ma bzang mo gang na gtso mo mchog gi rma byas 'gro ma'i chu skyes 'dab la rgyal po kye //
T02TD1346E:60a-13: rdo rje 'od dang rdo rje lus dang mchog gi gser ldan au rba s'i dang bkra ba'i ri mo dang //
T02TD1346E:60a-14: ra mbha zug med shin tu sgrol ma padma nor 'dab rdo rje lag ma lhag pa'i lha can la'o /
T02TD1346E:60a-15: 31 / s'a bi tr'i dang padma'i mig dang nges par chu skyes can ma blo dang ngag gi dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1346E:60a-16: g'a ya tr'i dang glog nyid dran ma dag kyang padma rig byed gdong ni lhag pa'i lha can la //
T02TD1346E:60a-17: goo r'i gang+g'a dang ni rtag ma shin tu mchog tu myur ma to ta l'a dang mtshon byed ma //
T02TD1346E:60a-18: dmar ser nag mo brgyad ni de bzhin gang na drag mo gtso mo'i padma nor gyi 'dab ma la'o /
T02TD1346E:60a-19: 32 / dpal ldan dkar mo zla ba'i ri mo ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong ma [?] dang ba'i mdog dang 'dzin ma dang //
T02TD1346E:60a-20: padma'i dbang mo skar mig dri med ri bong 'dzin ma dbang ldan padma dag la mtshan mar bcas //
T02TD1346E:60a-21: de yi phyi rol nyi ma'i padma la ni lha min g-yo dang gshin rje me dang gdong drug dang //
T02TD1346E:60b-0: gnod sbyin brgya byin chu gter gdong dang phyugs bdag rgya mtsho dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang po @60b khyab 'jug go /
T02TD1346E:60b-1: 33 / ral gri gri gug ljon shing dbang po lha yi shing gi me tog dbyug pa ral gri shakti dang //
T02TD1346E:60b-2: dbyug pa shakti dag dang mdung dang nor bu dang ni be con rdo rje nyid dang me yi mda' //
T02TD1346E:60b-3: khab dang bgrang phreng dag ni phyag gi mthil du 'gyur te rtse gsum pa dang mda' dang zhags pa dang //
T02TD1346E:60b-4: rin chen dgra sta rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dbyug pa 'phrog byed dag gi g-yas kyi phyag tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:60b-5: 34 / g-yon du phub dang thod pa dkar po min pa'i nor bu dang ni autpala dang lcags sgrog dang //
T02TD1346E:60b-6: zhags pa chu skyes spyi blugs dag ni nges par g-yon gyi phyag tu rim pas 'gyur ro mi yi bdag / rin chen me long dang ni de bzhin ne'u le dang bcas chu skyes rdo rje dril bu gzhu dang ni //
T02TD1346E:60b-7: padma dang ni spyi blugs sprul dang gzhu dang de bzhin klu yi zhags pa dag dang rin chen dang /
T02TD1346E:60b-8: 35 / zhags pa rin po che dang padma skye ba lnga pa'i dung ni lha min dgra bo dag gir 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:60b-9: padma'i 'dab ma dag la nag pa sogs kyi nor lag tshes rnams lte ba la ni rdzogs pa gnyis //
T02TD1346E:60b-10: mchog gi zla ba'i cha rnams thams cad stong dus 'jig rten dag tu lo yi sbyor bas rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:60b-11: sgor ni lha mo shing rta la gnas ral gri rdo rje 'dzin dang lcags kyu dang bcas mda' yi phyag 36 / dpal ldan 'khor lo [?] dbyug pa'i phyag dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tho ba dang ni mdung gi phyag / dpal ldan gri gug rdo rje'i phyag dang nges par phyag na dgra sta phyag na rtse gsum g-yas na ste //
T02TD1346E:60b-12: g-yon gyi phyag na phub dang sbrul te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhags pa dang ni gzhu yi phyag / dpal ldan dung dang rin chen phyag dang padma ri bong 'dzin pa me long phyag kyang de bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:60b-13: 37 / dpal ldan dril bu thod pa'i phyag dang nges par phyag na lag 'gro nyid dang kha tv'am ga yi phyag /'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig dus kyi phyag gi padma rnams ni rim pas rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:60b-14: ka ba'i 'og tu klu brgyad rnams kyang bum pa rdo rje'i phyag dang padma nor bu dag gi phyag / rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni padma ka rko ta sogs dus kyi phyag gi padma rnams /
T02TD1346E:61a-0: 38 / khyi gdong phag gdong ma dang ce spyang gdong ma nges par g-yo @61a * //
T02TD1346E:61a-1: ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs rnams su //
T02TD1346E:61a-2: stag gdong ma ni byang du gnas te dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas gri gug dang ni thod pa'i phyag / bya rog gdong dang bya rgod gdong dang mkha' 'gro bdag po'i gdong dang 'ug gdong ma ni zur du'o //
T02TD1346E:61a-3: rdo rje mig dang shin tu sngon mos 'og nam mkha' la gnas 'byung po'i skye gnas g-yo ba'i mthar /
T02TD1346E:61a-4: 39 / yi dags dmar dang mkha' 'gro'i dbang po ma he rma bya glang po dang ba glang dang gdong lnga pa //
T02TD1346E:61a-5: rim pas ts'a mu nd'a la sogs pa'i padma'i gdan du rab 'gyur phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su'o //
T02TD1346E:61a-6: lha min la sogs rnams kyi de bzhin nor bdag rtse mo can dang chu gter rlung dang tshogs kyi ni //
T02TD1346E:61a-7: glang po'i dbang po dang ni lug dang chu srin zhes dang ri dags dang ni byi ba rim pas so /
T02TD1346E:61a-8: 40 / bhe ru [?] nda dang khrung khrung mig sngon bshang lam gdong ni bya rog gdong la sogs pa'i zur du ste /
T02TD1346E:61a-9: bse dang dom dang seng ge g-yag ni khyi gdong ma la sogs pa yi ste phyogs su rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:61a-10: rdo rje mig gi rkang pa brgyad pas yi shing rta la gnas mkha' la sngon mo'i shing rta yi //
T02TD1346E:61a-11: mkhar bgrod khro ba dang bcas kha dog lnga pa lus rgyas mig gsum ldan pa aa ni la zhes pa /
T02TD1346E:61a-12: 41 /'od zer can dang tsu nd'a lcags sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can gyi shing rta rnams la phag dang ni //
T02TD1346E:61a-13: rta dang glang po seng ge bdun gyi grangs su 'gyur te lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang du'o //
T02TD1346E:61a-14: shar du dri dang phreng ba ma ste gshin rje chu la gnas pa spros ma mar me sgeg mo dang //
T02TD1346E:61a-15: bzhad ma'o gar ma rol mo ma ni nor sbyin sa gzhi la ste mkha' la glu ma 'dod ma'o /
T02TD1346E:61a-16: 42 / snying por brgyad ni kha khyer la ste mkha' dang 'og na gnas pa rta babs 'og tu nges par sbyar //
T02TD1346E:61a-17: gzungs ma rnams ni snam bu la ste gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod ma rnams kha khyer la //
T02TD1346E:61a-18: dbye ba dang ni bskyod pa 'dod mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin rgyas dang rengs 'dod ma //
T02TD1346E:61a-19: lha mo sgrol ma la sogs dag pa yis te srid gsum skyed ma gsod pa dang ni skyed 'dod ma /
T02TD1346E:61a-20: 43 / rol mo 'dod ma dang ni rgyan 'dod mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po zas 'dod ma dang de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:61b-0: dri 'dod ma dang @61b gos ni 'dod mar 'gyur te nges par 'khrig pa 'dod ma dag ni drug pa'o //
T02TD1346E:61b-1: lus la 'phrug 'dod ma dang kha na gnas pa'i mchil ma 'dor dang lus kyi dri ma 'dod ma dang //
T02TD1346E:61b-2: gar 'dod ma dang stan 'dod ma dang chu dang mal stan dag la rkyal dang bsnyes par 'dod ma dang /
T02TD1346E:61b-3: 44 / ts'a mu nd'a sogs brgyad kyi bya ba rnams te de bzhin sa la khro skyes rnams kyi 'dod ma yang //
T02TD1346E:61b-4: kun tu gdung dang 'ching 'dod ma dang nges par 'jam por smra ba dang ni skems dang skrod 'dod ma //
T02TD1346E:61b-5: reg dang dgug pa dag dang 'ching dang mi yi bdag po phur bu 'debs dang rgyug pa 'dod mar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:61b-6: yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod ma rab tu gsal zhing nges par bshang gci zag par 'dod ma dang /
T02TD1346E:61b-7: 45 / sems can rnams la slu 'dod ma dang nges par rtsod pa mang po lnga pa lhag ma za ba dang //
T02TD1346E:61b-8: g-yul 'dod ma dang sbrul 'ching ma dang byis pa khro bar 'dod ma rnams ni lha min rigs la 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:61b-9: sum cu rtsa bdun phyir 'dod ma rnams slar yang de nas phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag gi kha khyer la //
T02TD1346E:61b-10: nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig cung zad sems can bya ba rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba 'dir /
T02TD1346E:61b-11: 46 / zhes pa de ltar rdo rje can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang dkyil 'khor rnam par gsungs //
T02TD1346E:61b-12: phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ni spro dang sdud pa dag la dngos po'i skye ba yang dag gnas //
T02TD1346E:61b-13: de la rtag pa mkha' yi rdo rje rnam gsum srid pa la gnas mi rtag nyid du 'gyur ma yin //
T02TD1346E:61b-14: 'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa min par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mig 'phrul ji bzhin nyid du'o /
T02TD1346E:61b-15: 47 / rtag dang mi rtag mthong ste de lta na yang blun po'i blo can sems ni dag pa'i don slad du //
T02TD1346E:61b-16: sgrub thabs dag ni brjod par bya ste snying por gyur pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba med //
T02TD1346E:61b-17: gang zhig bsgrub bya sgrub pa po de 'khrul pa zhes pa rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang //
T02TD1346E:61b-18: de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag ni dkyil 'khor dbang por rab tu bya /
T02TD1346E:61b-19: 48 / dpal ldan rdo rje can ni thugs kyi rdo rje 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor sku yi rdo rje'o //
T02TD1346E:62a-0: lha rnams 'khor lo a'a li k'a li'i rigs skyes gsung @62a * //
T02TD1346E:62a-1: gi rdo rje zla ba nyi ma'i steng du'o //
T02TD1346E:62a-2: rtsa ba sdong bu dag ni aa yig 'dab ma dang ni de bzhin ge sar rnams kyang au yig go //
T02TD1346E:62a-3: dbus su dpal ldan lte ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rnam gnyis rkang pa'i gnas dag ma yig go /
T02TD1346E:62a-4: 49 / ho yig thog ma tha ma'i snying po bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
T02TD1346E:62a-5: de ni shes rab chags pas zhu ba khyab bdag rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa bzhin bltas nas //
T02TD1346E:62a-6: lha mo rnams kyis glu dag mdzad de bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po //
T02TD1346E:62a-7: bdag cag srungs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod /
T02TD1346E:62a-8: 50 / rdo rje can des glu dag gsan nas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur ni //
T02TD1346E:62a-9: gzigs nas skyed pa mdzad de dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rang gi mtshan ma spros byas nas //
T02TD1346E:62a-11: zhing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur pa yang //
T02TD1346E:62a-12: shes rab thabs kyis rgyal po slar yang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa ni rab tu spro ba dag kyang ngo /
T02TD1346E:62a-13: 51 /'od zer sngon po 'jigs pa'i sku ste rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal dang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa dang //
T02TD1346E:62a-14: sgra drag sgrogs byed nyi ma'i spyan dang gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa //
T02TD1346E:62a-15: shes rab thabs la rab byung mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta dag la gnas //
T02TD1346E:62a-16: rgyal ba'i dgra ni 'joms par byed pa rdo rje shugs te ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du bskul bar bya /
T02TD1346E:62a-17: 52 / dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dag ni lte bar lcags kyus bsnun byas shing //
T02TD1346E:62a-18: phyag rnams rang gi rdo rje gdengs can dag gis de bzhin rab bcings mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te //
T02TD1346E:62a-19: mtha' dag bsgrub byar byas shing 'khor lo bzang po bskyod par byas nas 'di ni slar yang 'gro ba ste //
T02TD1346E:62a-20: gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes pa dang ni ro mnyam byed pa dag ni rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyis byed /
T02TD1346E:62a-21: 53 / rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dag la sems ni nam mkha' dang bcas snying po'i padmar me yi steng du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:62b-0: shar du @62b dpal ldan nag mo 'bar ma mchog gi pad 'dab la ni lho ru dmar mo 'bar ma ste //
T02TD1346E:62b-1: byang du dpal ldan dkar mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o //
T02TD1346E:62b-2: mer ni du ba da nu'i bu yi phyogs su smig rgyu ma dang dbang ldan phyogs su mkha' snang ma /
T02TD1346E:62b-4: 54 / rlung du dpal ldan mar me ma ste nor bu dang ni shing dang chos kyi ga nd'i dag dang dung //
T02TD1346E:62b-5: me dang rlung dang lha min dang ni 'phrog byed phyogs su de bzhin bar gyi zur gyi cha la'o //
T02TD1346E:62b-6: shar du 'du byed dang ni sa dag nges par padma la gnas lho ru tshor ba chu dag go //
T02TD1346E:62b-7: byang du 'du shes dang ni me ru 'gyur te nub tu yang ni rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs nyid do /
T02TD1346E:62b-8: 55 / me yi phyogs su rlung dang gzugs su 'gyur te lha min bdag por me dang 'du shes gnyis po'o //
T02TD1346E:62b-9: dbang ldan du ni chu dang tshor ba dag ste rlung du 'dzin ma 'du byed phung por ldan pa'o //
T02TD1346E:62b-10: lha mo sangs rgyas par rnams su ni le tshe brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro yi bum pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:62b-11: slar yang 'phar ma phyi ma la ni shar du sna dang dri ste lho ru mig dang gzugs dag go /
T02TD1346E:62b-12: 56 / byang [?] du lce dang ro ru 'gyur te chur ni de bzhin nyid du lus dang reg bya dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:62b-13: sa 'og tu ni rna ba sgra ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lho yi sgo yi g-yon du'o //
T02TD1346E:62b-14: nam mkha' la ni nges par sems dang chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te shar gyi sgo yi g-yon du'o //
T02TD1346E:62b-15: dang por thabs ni drug po dag kyang rgyal ba'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:62b-16: 57 / phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ni rab tu gsal bar bdag po rang rang padma'i gdan la'o //
T02TD1346E:62b-17: shar gyi sgor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te de yi phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o //
T02TD1346E:62b-18: g-yas su rmugs byed dang ni nga rgyal mar 'gyur nor sbyin du yang khengs byed dang ni rmugs byed ma //
T02TD1346E:62b-19: chu ru rengs byed dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur sgo yi dbus na gnas pa padma la'o /
T02TD1346E:62b-20: 58 / dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g-yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma //
T02TD1346E:62b-21: 'dod pa tsu nd'a shing rta la gnas lha dang nor sbyin gzhan dang lho yi sgo yi dbus su ste //
T02TD1346E:63a-1: spyan ma ni 'og tu 'gyur zhing mkha' la gtsug tor dang ni shin tu sngon mo nyid //
T02TD1346E:63a-2: shar gyi sgo yi steng dang gzhan du yang ni nges par 'gyur te gnyis pa dag gi shing rta yang /
T02TD1346E:63a-3: 59 / gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi phyogs su 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:63a-4: shar du ts'a mu nd'a dang dbang por 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong //
T02TD1346E:63a-5: gshin rjer phag mo drag por 'gyur te lha min bdag por gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon po'o //
T02TD1346E:63a-6: nub tu dbang mo bden bral du 'gyur rlung du nges par dus kyi gdong ma dang ni khyab 'jug nyid /
T02TD1346E:63a-7: 60 / gnod sbyin du ni drag mo gshin rjer 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por dpal mo nyid dang gdong drug pa //
T02TD1346E:63a-8: phyi rol gyi ni dbang po'i sgo yi g-yas su lha min bdag dang de yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:63a-9: me ni rlung dang rab gtum ma ste me dang chu lha mo yang lho yi sgo yi g-yas su'o //
T02TD1346E:63a-10: lha min bdag por dpal ldan gdong drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha mo /
T02TD1346E:63a-11: 61 / rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te nor sbyin du yang rgya mtsho dang ni phag mo'o //
T02TD1346E:63a-12: dbang ldan du ni tshogs kyi dbang po gzhon nu ma ste nor sbyin gshin rje'i sgo yi g-yon gyi char //
T02TD1346E:63a-13: drag po dus te khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub kyi sgo yi g-yon du'o //
T02TD1346E:63a-14: de dag rnams kyi phyag rgyar rab grags ri sras gshin rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:63a-15: 62 / phyi rol du ni lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste //
T02TD1346E:63a-16: padma dang ni stobs kyi rgyu dag g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni //
T02TD1346E:63a-17: me la gnas pa dag ste chu yi steng du rigs ldan mtha' yas klur ni rab tu grags par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:63a-18: de bzhin sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs kyi dbang gis 'jog po dang ni padma chen por 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:63a-19: 63 / de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrod sa la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste //
T02TD1346E:63a-20: de rnams thabs ni padma la sogs gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:63b-0: shar gyi 'khor lor @63b rtse mos 'bigs pa'i dur khrod du ni g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas khyi gdong ma //
T02TD1346E:63b-1: gshin rje dag tu nges par ro ni bsreg par phag gi gdong ma byang du rul pa dang bcas par /
T02TD1346E:63b-2: 64 / stag gdong ma ste chu ru rnag gi drir ni de bzhin nyid du ce spyang dag gi gdong mar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:63b-3: me dang lha min bdag por lhag ma dang ni mi bzad g-yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas //
T02TD1346E:63b-4: rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma dbang ldan du yang byis pa shi bar ni //
T02TD1346E:63b-5: 'khor lo la [?] gnas 'ug gdong ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya ;
T02TD1346E:63b-6: 65 / g-yon brkyang ba ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stabs ni 'dab ma dag gi lha mo'i tshogs kyi'o //
T02TD1346E:63b-7: bcu dang nor gyi tshogs dag gi ni g-yon brkyangs ga lha min mo rnams kyi yang zlum po'o //
T02TD1346E:63b-8: g-yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g-yas brkyang stabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:63b-9: sa ga la ni sa [?] gnyid ces bya bar 'gyur zhing nges par zlum po la yang zlum po'o /
T02TD1346E:63b-10: 66 / dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges par rdo rje gdan gyis gnas pa ste //
T02TD1346E:63b-11: rang rigs phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni rang rang padma zla ba'i steng du padma'i gdan gyis gnas //
T02TD1346E:63b-12: gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa rang rang phyogs kyi bzhon par gnas pa'i lha rnams rdo rje gdan gyis gnas //
T02TD1346E:63b-13: lha rnams 'dab mar lha mo rnams ni rol pa'i stabs te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid /
T02TD1346E:63b-15: 67 / g-yas ba bskum pa dag kyang sa gzhi la ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g-yon pa brkyang ba dag / phyed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis pa ste mi yi bdag po de ni g-yon pa brkyang ba'i stabs su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:63b-16: g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis ni g-yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyam pa dag kyang mnyam pa'i stabs //
T02TD1346E:63b-17: yon tan dbang gis pus mo zung ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las sa ga dang ni zlum por 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:63b-18: 68 / cung zad pus mo phyed ni 'khyog pa rol par 'gyur te lhag ma dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:64a-0: slar yang rnal 'byor pa yis bha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar gyi @64a * //
T02TD1346E:64a-2: cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rje yi ni rdo rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnams re 'ga' na //
T02TD1346E:64a-3: gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste gsal bar padma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:64a-4: 69 / rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin dang don yod grub pa'i cod pan la ni rab mchog nor bu'i phyag / drug gi cod pan ral pa zhes byar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khor lo yi yang gzhan //
T02TD1346E:64a-5: sa las 'khor lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te chu las padma dang ni me las nor bu'o //
T02TD1346E:64a-6: rlung las ral gri dang ni stong pa dag las rdo rjer 'gyur te 'gyur med las ni gri gug go /
T02TD1346E:64a-7: 70 / gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du 'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas phreng ba dang ni rgyud mangs dang //
T02TD1346E:64a-8: drug pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha'i zhi ba dag las so //
T02TD1346E:64a-9: phub dang mdung dang mda' dang dgra sta dang ni da ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du //
T02TD1346E:64a-10: dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges par de bzhin tho ba [?] dang ni rtse gsum dag tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:64a-11: 71 / gzhu dang au tpa la dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha tv'am ga dang dril bu dang //
T02TD1346E:64a-12: de bzhin lcags sgrog la sogs chu na rgyu ba thod pa stag lpags dang ni glang po'i pags pa ste //
T02TD1346E:64a-13: 'dir ni lhag ma nye ba'i mtshan ma sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa //
T02TD1346E:64a-14: de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gi sa shes par bya ba nyid de lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o /
T02TD1346E:64a-15: 72 / gang zhig li la sogs pa sum cu'i dbyangs ni sa chu bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa //
T02TD1346E:64a-16: thung ngu ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyis rim par yongs bkod nges par padma la gnas zla ba dang //
T02TD1346E:64a-17: nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa de dag mtha' dag 'khor lo la sogs mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi sngags //
T02TD1346E:64a-18: gang zhig kho nar mtshan ma drug par gyur pa der ni yon tan dbang gis gzhom du med par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:64a-19: 73 / n'a da dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje aa yig go //
T02TD1346E:64b-0: ai yig thung ngu ral gri ldan par 'gyur te slar yang ri yig @64b dag ni phyag na rin chen no //
T02TD1346E:64b-1: au yig thung ngu snang ba mtha' yas su 'gyur slar yang 'dir ni li yig rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1346E:64b-2: bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pas so /
T02TD1346E:64b-3: 74 / dpal ldan yum ni gzhom du med pa zhes par 'gyur te de bzhin a'a yig las skyes nam mkha'i khams //
T02TD1346E:64b-4: rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams la ni a'i r'i a'u l'i thams cad rim pas gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:64b-5: mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs yum ni bde ba'i don du phan tshun lus dang bsam pa ste //
T02TD1346E:64b-6: mi bskyod stong pa'i khams dang phyag gi padma ral gri dang ni spyan ma lus dang bsam pa'o //
T02TD1346E:64b-7: 75 / rin chen dbang po m'a ma k'i dang gsal bar pad 'dzin gos dkar mo ni lus dang bsam pa ste //
T02TD1346E:64b-8: de bzhin 'khor lo can dang sgrol ma rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis thung dang ring ba'i dbyangs kyis so //
T02TD1346E:64b-9: aam yig kun tu bzang por 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis aa yig dag kyang phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD1346E:64b-10: ae yig thung [?] ngu nam mkha'i snying po aar yig dag kyang de bzhin yang dag sa yi snying por 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:64b-11: 76 / ao yig 'jig rten mgon po aa la yang de bzhin 'dir ni rnam par sel bar 'gyur te lus la'o //
T02TD1346E:64b-12: a'a yig chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te nges par de bzhin a'a: yig yas skyes sgra yi rdo rje ma //
T02TD1346E:64b-13: aee yig reg bya rdo rje ma ste lus kyi dbye bas a'a ra yig las skyes ro yi rdo rje ma //
T02TD1346E:64b-14: aoo yig gzugs kyi rdo rje mar 'gyur nges par de bzhin a'a la yig las skyes dri yi rdo rje ma /
T02TD1346E:64b-15: 77 / dpal ldan bzang po chos kyi dbyings dang phyag na rdo rje dang ni sgra yi rdo rje ma dag zung //
T02TD1346E:64b-16: nam mkha' snying po dri yi rdo rje ma dang 'jig rten mgon po ro yi rdo rje ma dag zung //
T02TD1346E:64b-17: sa yi snying po gzugs kyi rdo rje ma dang reg bya rnam par sel ba dag ni zung du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:64b-18: de ltar rigs ni drug po rnam dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis yang dag par ni rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:64b-19: 78 / ham yig gtsug tor 'khor lo can 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis 'dir ni ha: yig shin tu sngon mo'o //
T02TD1346E:64b-20: ha yig thung [?] ngu gnod mdzes su 'gyur nges par de bzhin ring po las skyes drag po'i mig ma'o //
T02TD1346E:65a-1: rab tu gsal bar shin tu stobs dang rengs byed ma ste gnyis po dag kyang zung //
T02TD1346E:65a-2: ram w'am: rmugs byed nga rgyal ma ste wam dang r'a: zhes pa ni khengs byed rmugs byed mar 'gyur ro /
T02TD1346E:65a-3: 79 / lam y'a: rengs byed shin tu brtson 'grus mar 'gyur ya wa ra la dbyug pa sngon po mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1346E:65a-4: 'dod pa dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus su 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi ring po ste //
T02TD1346E:65a-5: y'a w'a r'a l'a de bzhin glang po rta dang seng ge dang ni phag gi shing rta dag la 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:65a-6: dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g-yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma /
T02TD1346E:65a-7: 80 /'dod pa tsu nd'a zung du 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1346E:65a-8: aa yig dag dang aom dang rnam par bcad pa ham dang ha: dang ha h'a las skyes nus ma brgyad //
T02TD1346E:65a-9: bum pa rnams la de bzhin ha yig rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs kyis phye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:65a-10: aom h'um ho a'a: dung dang dri med yon tan nor bu dang ni rkang 'thung chos kyi ga nd'i'o /
T02TD1346E:65a-11: 81 / ha yig ts'a mu nd'a ste ham dang ha: zhes bya ba 'dir ni dbang phyug ma dang phag mo'o //
T02TD1346E:65a-12: h'a dang ksha ksham ksham ksha: dbang mo mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro ma tshangs ma dpal mo gzhon nu ma //
T02TD1346E:65a-13: h'i hr'i h'u hr'i rgyab tu padma mchog gi 'dab ma la ste thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams mdun du'o //
T02TD1346E:65a-14: ksh'i ksh'i ksh'u ksh'i de bzhin nyid de rab tu gsal zhing nges par thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams de bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:65a-15: 82 / shar dang g-yas dang g-yas min chu dang me dang lha min dbang ldan dang ni rlung gi padma la //
T02TD1346E:65a-16: 'dab ma drug la ya sogs dbyangs drug gis phye thung ngu ring po rnams ni rim par yongs bkod pa //
T02TD1346E:65a-17: hi kshi la sogs la mtha' thams cad nor ni gdengs can gyis bsgyur lha mo rnams kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD1346E:65a-18: rigs kyi dbang gis mngon phyogs ts'a mu nd'a la sogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye bas so /
T02TD1346E:65a-19: 83 / tam na: brgya byin chu gter gdong ste pam ma: zhes pa rgya mtsho dang ni dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang //
T02TD1346E:65a-20: tam na: mo dang gzhon nu dag ste cam dang nya: zhes bya ba srin po'i dbang po dag dang rlung //
T02TD1346E:65a-21: kam da: khyab 'jug dus te 'phrog byed ces dang nor sbyin dag kyang sam dang 'dir ni thka: nyid do //
T02TD1346E:65b-0: tsa @65b sogs sre pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams ni lha yi padma'i 'dab mar lha mo rnams kyir 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:65b-1: 84 / nag pa'i zla ba sogs kyi tshes rnams dus kyi nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang me yi grangs //
T02TD1346E:65b-2: de nyid la zhon ha yig rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyi //
T02TD1346E:65b-3: sde bdun brtsegs pa la gnas ksha ya ra wa lar ldan dur khrod du ni lha min mo rnams kyi //
T02TD1346E:65b-4: shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pas rigs kyi dbang las 'dir ni gang zhig dbus su mngon phyogs 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:65b-5: 85 / dpal ldan rdo rje can dang kun [?] bzangs [?] rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:65b-6: don yod grub dang nam mkha'i snying po dri med nor bu'i phyag dang sa yi snying po yang dag go //
T02TD1346E:65b-7: phyag na 'khor lo rnam par sel bar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'od dpag med dang 'jig rten mgon //
T02TD1346E:65b-8: dpal ldan yum dang chos kyi dbyings te sgra yi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma /
T02TD1346E:65b-9: 86 / dpal ldan sgrol ma reg bya rdo rje ma ste rigs kyi dbye bas gos dkar ro yi rdo rje ma //
T02TD1346E:65b-10: m'a ma k'i dang gzugs zhes grags par 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis spyan ma dri yi rdo rje ma //
T02TD1346E:65b-11: khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun tu bzang po de nyid do //
T02TD1346E:65b-12: gtsug tor mi bskyod pa nyid 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs dang don yod grub par rab tu grags /
T02TD1346E:65b-13: 87 / rmugs byed dang ni phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byed dang ni 'od dpag med //
T02TD1346E:65b-14: rengs byed dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur stobs ldan phyag na rdo rje dag dang gnod mdzes so //
T02TD1346E:65b-15: mkha' snying dang ni dbyug pa sngon po rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sa yi snying po 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1346E:65b-16: rnam par sel dang shin tu brtson 'grus su 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis 'jig rten mgon po mi g-yo ba /
T02TD1346E:65b-17: 88 / yum dang khro bo'i dbang po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:65b-18: stong par grags pa shin tu sngon mo rlung me chu dang sa la sogs pa mtha' yas brtson 'grus dang //
T02TD1346E:65b-19: rmugs byed ma dang khengs ma rengs byed mar ni rim pas rab tu gsal zhing nges par rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:66a-0: @66a * // drag spyan sgra yi rdo rje mar 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis lcags sgrog ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma /
T02TD1346E:66a-1: 89 /'od zer can dang dri yi rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur te khro gnyer can dang tsu nd'a ra rab grags pa //
T02TD1346E:66a-2: rigs kyi dbye bas nges par ro yi rdo rje ma dang gzugs kyi rdo rjer rim pas shes par bya ;
T02TD1346E:66a-3: /'dir ni rengs byed dus mthar byed pa nyid de slar yang shin tu stobs dang bgegs dgrar rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:66a-4: rmugs byed shes rab mthar byed dag tu rab tu 'gyur te de bzhin khengs byed dang ni padma'i dgra /
T02TD1346E:66a-5: 90 / rlung me chu sa ts'a mu nd'a dang phag mo dbang phyug ma dang de bzhin dbang mo bzhi pa ste //
T02TD1346E:66a-6: dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya zhes pa g-yo ba 'phrog byed lha min mer ni gnas pa yang //
T02TD1346E:66a-7: tshangs pa dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis rgya mtsho dag dang 'od dpag med //
T02TD1346E:66a-8: me dang dpal ldan phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rlung dang don yod grub pa dag ni de bzhin nyid /
T02TD1346E:66a-9: 91 / mi bskyod pa dang lha min dgra bor 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni bde byed rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:66a-10: rnam par sel ba gang de brgya byin du 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:66a-11: sa yi snying po gdong drug par 'gyur dpal ldan mkha' snying da nu'i bdag por rab tu grags pa yin //
T02TD1346E:66a-12: dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dus su 'gyur te drug pa kun tu bzang po nor gyi bdag po'o /
T02TD1346E:66a-13: 92 / rig ma drug dang phyag rgya drug ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de rnams rang rang phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1346E:66a-14: phyag rgya rig ma la sogs nyi ma lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams dkar po nag po rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1346E:66a-15: de dag rnams kyi pad 'dab la ni nor lag tshes te mchu yi zla ba la sogs gang de rnams //
T02TD1346E:66a-16: zla ba drug ni snga ma drug tu 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi phyi ma yang /
T02TD1346E:66a-17: 93 / klu brgyad gang de bum pa rnams te khyab bdag padma'i 'dab la nus ma de rnams rab gtum ma //
T02TD1346E:66a-18: dpal ldan du ba bya rog gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis bya rgod gdong ma smig rgyu ma //
T02TD1346E:66a-19: mkha' snang ma ni 'ug pa'i gdong ma dpal ldan mar me mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong mar rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:66b-0: nag mo 'bar ma khyi gdong ma ste dmar mo 'bar @66b ma shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan phag gdong ma /
T02TD1346E:66b-1: 94 / dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis ser mo 'bar ma ce spyang ma //
T02TD1346E:66b-2: de bzhin sgeg mo la sogs thams cad rab tu gsal ba rnam bcu sna tshogs yum ni lhag ma'o //
T02TD1346E:66b-3: lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:66b-4: khro bo'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa' nges par ro yi rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku de nyid /
T02TD1346E:66b-5: 95 / rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog shing rta la gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags pa //
T02TD1346E:66b-6: klu ni brgyad po rnams dang rab gtum ma rnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:66b-7: de bzhin slar yang rgyal ba'i sku ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gyur te phyi rol dag dang nang na yang //
T02TD1346E:66b-8: mngal nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de bzhin kho na dkyil 'khor la ni nges par rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:66b-9: 96 / ston pa lha mo sogs dang bum pa lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus su'o //
T02TD1346E:66b-10: sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku ste nges par ro yi rdo rje ma sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:66b-11: khro bo sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni snying por yang dag gnas //
T02TD1346E:66b-12: phyi rol du ni ts'a mu nd'a la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang bcas pa dag pa'i sku /
T02TD1346E:66b-13: 97 / lha la sogs pa chos kyi sku ste mtha' dag gdengs can rigs kyang 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:66b-14: gtum mo rnams ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o //
T02TD1346E:66b-15: sku yi rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni zung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i slad du'o //
T02TD1346E:66b-16: gsung gi rdo rje dang ni chos kyi sku yang zung du 'gyur te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o /
T02TD1346E:66b-17: 98 / thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang zung du 'gyur te sems can kun gyi don ni byed pa po //
T02TD1346E:66b-18: ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku dag zung du 'gyur te srog chags rnams la thar pa ster ba nyid //
T02TD1346E:66b-19: shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni nyi zla ka sogs aa sogs dang //
T02TD1346E:67a-0: rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes rnam shes dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig @67a * //
T02TD1346E:67a-2: 99 / rdo rje sv'a h'a'i mtha' ldan dag gis mgo dang mgrin pa snying ga lte ba gsang ba spyi bor te //
T02TD1346E:67a-3: 'di dag gis ni byin brlabs yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lha mo rnams kyis bkru bar bya //
T02TD1346E:67a-4: stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum gyi dus dang ye shes mchod pa rjes su chags pa la //
T02TD1346E:67a-5: skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nas sgrub pa po yis ta ta sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko nya ham brjod par bya /
T02TD1346E:67a-6: 100 / bum pa rnams dang du ba la sogs brgyad po rnams kyis snying gar chos kyi 'khor lor rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:67a-7: rig ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid kyis mgo bor rtsibs bcu drug pa lhan cig skyes par rab tu grags //
T02TD1346E:67a-8: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur mi bdag rnams kyis mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:67a-9: 'jigs pa la sogs nor ni gdengs can dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyis lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:67a-10: 101 / lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la lha rnams kyi ni las kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis bsnun pa ste //
T02TD1346E:67a-11: klu dang gtum mo mi yi bdag po rnams kyis sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:67a-12: dus kyi dag pas dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag lo dang zla ba la sogs dbye bas so //
T02TD1346E:67a-13: thugs kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma yin nyin zhag so so'i dbang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par dag 102 / rlung gi dag pas du ba la sogs rang gi snying ga'i padmar rtsa yi 'khor lo la gnas rnams //
T02TD1346E:67a-14: nyon mongs rnams kyis drag po chung mar bcas pa khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyi bdud //
T02TD1346E:67a-15: dung dang ga nd'i ma ni ljon pa zhes pa dag kyang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis //
T02TD1346E:67a-16: bum pa brgyad ni bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis te rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang chub sems sogs kyis /
T02TD1346E:67a-17: 103 /'du byed don yod grub pa tshor ba dri med nor bu'i phyag dang 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te //
T02TD1346E:67a-18: gzugs ni 'khor lo can no ri bong can dang stobs khrag bshang ba gci ba rnam par dag pa'o /
T02TD1346E:67a-19: lha mo drug ni khams rnams kyis te yul dang yul can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas //
T02TD1346E:67b-0: khro bo @67b lnga ni stobs rnams kyis te nges par slar yang gzhan pa lnga ni dbang po gzhan rnams kyis /
T02TD1346E:67b-1: 104 / ts'a mu nd'a sogs thun brgyad kyis te padma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams nyi ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod kyis //
T02TD1346E:67b-2: lha min la sogs nyi ma'i zla bas padma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs kyis so //
T02TD1346E:67b-3: gsang bar mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams kyis klu rnams dang ni gtum mo rnams kyang rnam par dag / de bzhin 'dod ma la sogs de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi bya bas rnam par dag 105 / skra rnams kyis ni grub pa mtha' dag ba spu rnams kyis dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs //
T02TD1346E:67b-4: de nyid rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon cha rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyis phyi yi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1346E:67b-5: rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du yang dag gnas pa'o //
T02TD1346E:67b-6: dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum ni rnam gsum srid gnas 'gyur med ye shes dbye ba las /
T02TD1346E:67b-7: 106 / dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang po'o //
T02TD1346E:67b-8: longs spyod las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po //
T02TD1346E:67b-9: bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin tu gnyid log nges par slar yang gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sad pa ste //
T02TD1346E:67b-10: de ltar lus kyi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas /
T02TD1346E:67b-11: 107 / sprul par yid ni longs spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngag gi dbang pos so //
T02TD1346E:67b-12: longs spyod rdzogs lam mthong sems par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang ngo //
T02TD1346E:67b-13: dag pa la ni bde bar rab 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le grol ba gsum gyi mthar //
T02TD1346E:67b-14: de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya ste 'gyur med don du'o /
T02TD1346E:67b-15: 108 / g-yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni g-yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa //
T02TD1346E:67b-16: de ni g-yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan pa g-yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las //
T02TD1346E:68a-0: sa ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang @68a * //
T02TD1346E:68a-1: mchog gi rol pa'i stabs dang padma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan //
T02TD1346E:68a-2: nam mkha' sogs la rab tu rgyu ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga /
T02TD1346E:68a-3: 109 / gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsa rtsi k'a sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan /
T02TD1346E:68a-4: ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa //
T02TD1346E:68a-5: lte bar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs bsreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:68a-6: thams cad bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni 'dzag pa gang de rdo rje can ;
T02TD1346E:68a-7: 110 / shes rab chos 'byung dag la gnas pa mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis //
T02TD1346E:68a-8: sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long dag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba //
T02TD1346E:68a-9: 'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te //
T02TD1346E:68a-10: phyi nas ye shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig tu ni dgug par bya /
T02TD1346E:68a-11: 111 / zla ba nyi ma aa sogs ka sogs rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa //
T02TD1346E:68a-12: so sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang padma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te //
T02TD1346E:68a-13: dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas bsgom pa rdo rje gsum //
T02TD1346E:68a-14: shes rab padmar sems kyi thig le dag la lhan skyes bde ba'i dbang gis bsgom pa gzhom med 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:68a-15: 112 / bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste //
T02TD1346E:68a-16: so sor sdud pa sogs dang rdo rje padma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:68a-17: dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa bsgom pa sgrub par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:68a-18: shes rab sbyar la gang tshe 'pho med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:68a-19: 113 / dang por stong nyid byang chub nges par slar yang de nas zla ba thig le dag ni yang dag 'dzin //
T02TD1346E:68a-20: de nas gzugs dag bskyed cing rab mchog ro yi rigs rnams dag gis yi ge dgod pa nyid yin te //
T02TD1346E:68b-0: 'di @68b ni spyi yi bsnyen pa chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni 'bring po yang //
T02TD1346E:68b-1: 'di la thabs ni rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan pa bsgrub pa'i yan lag dag la de bzhin nyid /
T02TD1346E:68b-2: 114 / so sor sdud pa rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtan mi bskyod pa nyid do //
T02TD1346E:68b-3: srog rtsol dag kyang ral gri can no slar yang rnam pa bcu ste 'dzin pa phyag na rin chen no //
T02TD1346E:68b-4: gdol pa mo la rjes su dran pa padma 'dzin par 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can //
T02TD1346E:68b-5: re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te slar yang gang las aa sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o /
T02TD1346E:68b-6: 115 / so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o //
T02TD1346E:68b-7: bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dga' dang g-yo med bde ba rtse gcig sems pa'o //
T02TD1346E:68b-8: srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam ni gnyis po [?] bskyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:68b-9: thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o /
T02TD1346E:68b-10: 116 / gtum mo'i snang bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:68b-11: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD1346E:68b-12: 'di dag dman pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:68b-13: phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs gsum ni rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gi las dang kun rtog mchog rnams so /
T02TD1346E:68b-14: 117 / so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob //
T02TD1346E:68b-15: mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o //
T02TD1346E:68b-16: srog gi rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod //
T02TD1346E:68b-17: bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so /
T02TD1346E:68b-18: 118 / rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so //
T02TD1346E:69a-1: nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:69a-2: so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na //
T02TD1346E:69a-3: n'a da goms pas btsan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje nor bur thig le bkag nas bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:69a-4: 119 / bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can gyi khro bo'i lta bas so //
T02TD1346E:69a-5: bgegs mthar byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam du son pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lag drug / shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la //
T02TD1346E:69a-6: bde ba ma nyams gcig pu zhi ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'dir ni sgrub pa chen po la /
T02TD1346E:69a-7: 120 / srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba ji srid mgo yi bar du 'dod pa ste //
T02TD1346E:69a-8: de las steng du 'dod pa ma yin 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa phung po nges par 'jig pa'i rgyu //
T02TD1346E:69a-9: gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la nges par sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1346E:69a-10: phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa min /
T02TD1346E:69a-11: 121 / dbus su srog ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam par [?] bral ba'i 'khyud pa ste //
T02TD1346E:69a-12: padmar zhugs pa'i rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab zhugs pa //
T02TD1346E:69a-13: bde ba sa bon ma lhung ba la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor 'di //
T02TD1346E:69a-14: phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu gsang ba'o /
T02TD1346E:69a-15: 122 / gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo dag ni nyis 'gyur gyi //
T02TD1346E:69a-16: rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lor 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan ma dang ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan //
T02TD1346E:69a-17: de yi yang ni nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes longs spyod rdzogs dang sbrul pa'i 'khor lor ro //
T02TD1346E:69a-18: de yi snying por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i padma'i khongs su gnas pa'o /
T02TD1346E:69b-0: 123 / rnal 'byor pa yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod pa dag bya ba de ni srog nyams @69b par gsungs te //
T02TD1346E:69b-1: sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang snying la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid //
T02TD1346E:69b-2: gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis brku bar gsungs //
T02TD1346E:69b-3: thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o /
T02TD1346E:69b-4: 124 / srog gi rtsol ba'i me yis ri bong can ni zhu ba dag kyang btung ba chang ni 'thung ba'o //
T02TD1346E:69b-5: mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems 'gro ste tshes kyi dbang gis so //
T02TD1346E:69b-6: gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnams su slar yang 'di nyid 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o //
T02TD1346E:69b-7: rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba /
T02TD1346E:69b-8: 125 / bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog padma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang //
T02TD1346E:69b-9: 'dar dang smyo dang rab tu rmongs par 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal ba dag / rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du //
T02TD1346E:69b-10: rab tu gsal zhing nges pa de rnams yid srubs gnas skabs su zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su ;
T02TD1346E:69b-11: 126 / nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig m'a ma k'i ste chang ma yin //
T02TD1346E:69b-12: go ku la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' dag kyang min //
T02TD1346E:69b-13: rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste //
T02TD1346E:69b-14: stong par sems ni rab tu zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin /
T02TD1346E:69b-15: 127 / nor ni gtong ba sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul khrims te //
T02TD1346E:69b-16: bzod pa sgra la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyi ga'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson 'grus nyid //
T02TD1346E:69b-17: bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skad //
T02TD1346E:69b-18: de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar byed mi skye 'thob ste gzhan pa bzhi rnams so /
T02TD1346E:70a-0: 128 / @70a * // gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa //
T02TD1346E:70a-1: bsgoms na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnams su nges par nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis yang dag 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:70a-2: rengs pa dang ni zhi dang dbang dang srid pa 'jig pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis byed //
T02TD1346E:70a-3: 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgoms pa yis ni bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:70a-4: 129 / dkar po yis ni zhi dang rgyas pa byed de rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni dgug dang dbang //
T02TD1346E:70a-5: ser pos rengs dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas gsad pa dang ni bskrad pa'o //
T02TD1346E:70a-6: bsgom dang bzlas pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la byed de sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje ni //
T02TD1346E:70a-7: 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag las kyi dbye bas bsgrub bar bya /
T02TD1346E:70a-9: 130 / phyogs ni lhag pa las byung bung ba dang ni gser dang mtshungs pa g-yas dang cig shos dag gis ni //
T02TD1346E:70a-10: phung po'i bdud la glang chen pags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin //
T02TD1346E:70a-11: lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thod pa rab mchog phyag mthil na ste 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyag / nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyis bsgyel ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ni gzhan gyi don du bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:70a-12: 131 / de la yum ni zhal gcig zung gi phyag gi padma dag la gri gug dpal ldan thod pa ste //
T02TD1346E:70a-13: nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu bgrod pa'i dbang gis so //
T02TD1346E:70a-14: de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te sna tshogs yum ni de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:70a-15: shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas so /
T02TD1346E:70a-17: 132 / gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog mun pa dag gi mthar //
T02TD1346E:70a-18: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te rtsa ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las //
T02TD1346E:70a-19: sa la sogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong pa gcig pu ste //
T02TD1346E:70b-0: thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus @70b kyang med la yul med yul ni bsgrubs pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o /
T02TD1346E:70b-1: 133 / khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa //
T02TD1346E:70b-2: dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste //
T02TD1346E:70b-3: sbrul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin du mtshon cha'i phyag / spyi bor mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi thod pa kha dog lnga rnams dag gis phreng ba nges par bcings /
T02TD1346E:70b-4: 134 / dri med 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni //
T02TD1346E:70b-5: zhabs gnyis dag gis 'byung po'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g-yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02TD1346E:70b-6: 'byung po rnams dang lha min gdengs can lha rnams skrag par byed cing ye shes sems dpa' gcig gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:70b-7: bsgoms na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:70b-8: 135 / klu rnams chu skyes 'dab brgyad la ste rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du bsgyel byas nas //
T02TD1346E:70b-9: zhabs dag gis ni gdengs can bdag po zung dang padma'i 'dab mar gnas pa rnams kyis mjug ma yi //
T02TD1346E:70b-10: rtse mo thams cad mnan nas sprin gyi rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun tu spro byed pa //
T02TD1346E:70b-11: de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms pas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:70b-12: 136 / zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag po lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru //
T02TD1346E:70b-13: dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:70b-14: rengs dang zhi [?] ba dag dang dbang dang gzhan nor 'phrog dang gsad pa dang ni bskrad pa dag la yang //
T02TD1346E:70b-15: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gi sa bon gyis /
T02TD1346E:70b-16: 137 / zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni zhi ba'i gzugs //
T02TD1346E:70b-17: drag po la yang bsam gtan drag po dang ni sprin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyid kyi gzugs //
T02TD1346E:71a-1: du bya la bsam gtan chags pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste lhan chags pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1346E:71a-2: rengs pa la ni bsam gtan rmongs pa dang bcas mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i lha rnams rengs pa'i gzugs /
T02TD1346E:71a-3: 138 / zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rigs dang rgyal po lha mo rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:71a-4: dbye dang bskrad pa dag kyang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khro bo las skyes rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:71a-5: dbang sogs 'byung skyes rnams kyis rab gsal lha min rigs la phur bus gdab pa'ang lha min mo rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:71a-6: yum dag gis ni las rnams thams cad gnyi ga'i rdo rje'i rigs la gsad pa dang ni gso ba yang /
T02TD1346E:71a-7: 139 / dang por dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo dang ni srid gsum skyed ma 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:71a-8: de nas sa gzhi'i gnas dag tu ni gang zhig zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag kyang bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:71a-9: pha dang ma yis rnam par dman pa'i bu ni yod pa min par dus kun tu ni 'jig rten grags //
T02TD1346E:71a-10: de phyir bde mnyam 'bras ster gnyis po bsgrub par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du las ni 'grub pa min /
T02TD1346E:71a-11: 140 / gtso bo'i thugs khar padma'i dbus su ri bong can dang nyi ma me yi steng du rdo rje ni //
T02TD1346E:71a-12: h'um yig ye shes las skyes 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rtse lnga 'od zer dang bcas dgod par bya //
T02TD1346E:71a-13: de yi dbus su dza: yi lcags kyu'i 'od zer rnams kyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag bkang byas nas //
T02TD1346E:71a-14: rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas rdo rje'i lam du rab tu gzhug bya ste /
T02TD1346E:71a-15: 141 / thams cad zla ba zhu ba dang mtshungs rang gi rdo rje'i kha nas yum gyi padmar spro bar bya //
T02TD1346E:71a-16: de ni nyi mar rab tu zhugs pa ro mnyam dag tu 'gyur te aa sogs ka sogs rab ldan pa //
T02TD1346E:71a-17: de yi dbus su zhi ba la sogs las kyi ye shes sa bon du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis so //
T02TD1346E:71a-18: de yis rdzogs pa'i lha mo 'am ni lha yang rnal 'byor pa la 'bras bu ster ba nyid du 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:71a-19: 142 / dza: h'um bam ho: rim pas lcags kyu zhes dang rdo rje dang ni rdo rje zhags pa dril bu ste //
T02TD1346E:71b-0: aom a'a: h'um ho: de bzhin du @71b gsungs zla ba nyi ma rdo rje de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med do //
T02TD1346E:71b-1: a'i r'i a'u l'i de bzhin nyid du rab gsal ya ra wa la rlung me chu dang sa rnams so //
T02TD1346E:71b-2: ha: h'um ham phrem nyi ma dang ni rdo rje zla ba dag dang gri gug tu yang de bzhin gsungs /
T02TD1346E:71b-3: 143 / zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su a'a li k'a li dang bcas chu yi sa bon bdag nyid chu skyes te //
T02TD1346E:71b-4: de las rdzogs pa'i lha mo zla ba'i mdog can zhal gcig ma ste zung gi phyag gi padma can //
T02TD1346E:71b-5: glang chen dkar po la zhon phyag na chu skyes dkar dang mi 'jigs pa dang gos ni dkar po dang //
T02TD1346E:71b-6: dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal ni bsgoms nas bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya /
T02TD1346E:71b-7: 144 / de nas bsgrub bya bzung nas slar yang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1346E:71b-8: gtso bo'i bka' ni rab tu thob nas spyan ma la sogs rab dgyes rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa yis //
T02TD1346E:71b-9: bsgrub bya de ni bkru bar byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi nus ma rnams kyis mchod par byed //
