T02TD1346E:71b-10: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis gso bar byed cing rab gsal sgeg mo la sogs bcu yis tshim par byed /
T02TD1346E:71b-11: 145 /'byung por grags pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa med byed rab mchog rnam bcu khro skyes rnams kyis skyong bar byed //
T02TD1346E:71b-12: klu mo rnams kyis 'o dag byed cing 'chi med na chung bcu gnyis rnams kyis 'khyud pa dag tu byed //
T02TD1346E:71b-13: gtum mo rnams kyis bsrung ba byed de mtha' dag sa gzhi dag la zhi rgyas don gyi slad du'o //
T02TD1346E:71b-14: de ltar bsgrub bya yi ni mchog gi bde ba byed pa thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:71b-15: 146 / zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su hr'i: ste autpala kha ma bye ba'i mda' nyid dang ni ai kshu'i gzhu //
T02TD1346E:71b-16: de las rdzogs pa nyi ma ltar gsal phyag ni gnyi gas gzhu dang mda' ni rna ba'i bar du bkang //
T02TD1346E:71b-17: padma dang ni ri bong 'dzin par g-yon brkyang rta la zhon pa bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya //
T02TD1346E:71b-18: bsgrub bya yi ni snying ga lte ba gsang ba dag dang mgo dang kha la mda' yis bsnun byas shing /
T02TD1346E:72a-0: 147 / mgrin par gzhu yis bcings nas de yis bskyod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor du ni khrid @72a * //
T02TD1346E:72a-2: gtum mo rnams kyis gos dang bral ba byas shing klu mo rnams kyis kyang ni nges par bkri ba byas //
T02TD1346E:72a-3: lha mo rnams kyis spyo bar byed cing khro skyes rnams kyis gtun shing dbyug par bcas pa dag gis bsnun //
T02TD1346E:72a-4: 'byung po rnams kyis 'jigs par byed cing sgeg mo la sogs rnams kyis kyang ni sen mo rnon po 'debs /
T02TD1346E:72a-5: 148 / rdo rje ma rnams kyis ni blo gros nyams byas sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung rnams dag gis bcings //
T02TD1346E:72a-6: nus ma rnams kyis gos bral rgyags pa mtha' dag bcom zhing gtso bo yin zhabs la ltung bar byas //
T02TD1346E:72a-7: de ltar dbang du byas nas slar yang khyab bdag dag gis tshim par byas te der ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:72a-8: de bzhin zhags pa lcags kyu dag gis khams gsum po nas dgug pa'i las ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:72a-9: 149 / nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su sprin nag dang mtshungs h'um yig ring po las skyes ral gri bsgoms byas nas /
T02TD1346E:72a-10: de las byung ba bung ba'i mdog can phyag gi padma ral gri dang ni sdigs mdzub zhags pa'i phyag / rnga mo'i steng du g-yon pa brkyang zhing rab tu khros pa'i zhal ni bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya //
T02TD1346E:72a-11: bsgrub bya zhags pas bcing ba byas nas khros pa'i zhal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo ru khrid byas te /
T02TD1346E:72a-12: 150 / ya: yig las skyes rnga mo mgyogs pa rlung ltar bgrod pa de la gtso bo'i gsung gis bsgrub bya ni //
T02TD1346E:72a-13: zhon pa rtse mo can dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid nyid du rang bzhin gyis ni bskul bar bya //
T02TD1346E:72a-14: de ltar lha yi bdag po dag kyang nges par bskrad par 'gyur na mi rnams dag ni smos ci dgos //
T02TD1346E:72a-15: dbye ba la yang rnga mos dman zhing rtsod mang byas pa dag ni g-yas dang g-yon du bkri bar bya /
T02TD1346E:72a-16: 151 / nyi zla'i dbus su la: zhes bya ba yongs gyur 'khor lo bzang po kha dog ser po bsgoms byas nas //
T02TD1346E:72a-17: de las byung ba zhal gcig pa ste mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa phyag na lcags sgrog 'khor lo can //
T02TD1346E:72a-18: rus sbal la ni lha min gdan gyis gnas shing shin tu dal 'gro bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya //
T02TD1346E:72b-0: bsgrub bya 'khor los 'jigs par byas nas sa la rab tu bsgyel te lcags @72b sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcings /
T02TD1346E:72b-1: 152 / dkyil 'khor du ni kun tu khrid cing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis 'dzin ma la ni bsgyel byas nas //
T02TD1346E:72b-2: de yi steng du bsgrub bya'i lus la lhun po mchog gi gser gyi rang bzhin dgod bya rengs la ste //
T02TD1346E:72b-3: phur bus gdab pa'i don du tshigs drug la ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin phur bu rnams kyis gdab par bya //
T02TD1346E:72b-4: rmongs pa la yang sbrul rnams kyis ni kun tu za bar byed cing sa la 'gyel bar bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:72b-5: 153 / nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i gri gug phrem gyi rang bzhin bsgoms byas nas //
T02TD1346E:72b-6: de las byung ba'i rab tu gtum mo 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa phyag na gri gug thod pa can //
T02TD1346E:72b-7: rta yid gra yi steng du g-yon pa brkyang zhing gos dang bral bar bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya //
T02TD1346E:72b-8: bsgrub bya'i skra rnams dag las myur [?] du bzung zhing de yis dkyil 'khor du ni gos kyis dman pa yang /
T02TD1346E:72b-10: 154 / kun tu khrid de dpal ldan dur khrod dag tu rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis bya rgod bya rog dang //
T02TD1346E:72b-11: ce spyang rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun las khrag 'thungs sha dang de bzhin du ni khams kun zos //
T02TD1346E:72b-12: de ltar ma lus pa ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la bsgom par bya ste gsad pa dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:72b-13: bsam gtan 'di yis brgya byin dag kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro na mngal nas skyes pa smos ci dgos /
T02TD1346E:72b-14: 155 / zhi dang rgyas pa la yang rigs kyi dbang gis chu yi sa bon las ni bsam gtan dkar por 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:72b-15: dbang dang dgug pa la yang dmar po lus ni sreg par byed pa me yi sa bon bdag nyid do //
T02TD1346E:72b-16: dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa la yang 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid do //
T02TD1346E:72b-17: rengs pa rnams ni phur bus gdab ba sogs la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa yi sa bon rang bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:72b-18: 156 / stong pa'i sa bon las ni sngon po'i mdog dang ljang gur 'gyur te gsad dang gso ba dag la'o //
T02TD1346E:72b-19: sa yi zad par kun nas chu yi gter du 'gro ba la ste rlung gi zad par char pa ni //
T02TD1346E:72b-20: nyams pa'i don te me yi zad par dag kyang sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don te me dag kyang //
T02TD1346E:73a-0: nyams pa'i don du chu yi zad par du 'gyur stong pa'i @73a * //
T02TD1346E:73a-1: zad par mkha' la 'gro dang snang min la /
T02TD1346E:73a-2: 157 / glang po'i bdag po gzhom pa la ni me yi sa bon nyid las gdong lnga pa yi bsam gtan 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:73a-3: klu yi dbang po gzhom pa la ni mkha' lding dkar po chu yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:73a-4: bse dang seng ge dag la rkang brgyad 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid can //
T02TD1346E:73a-5: rta yi dgra la bse zhes grags pa sa yi rigs kyi dbang gis lha min gzhom la khro bo skyes /
T02TD1346E:73a-6: 158 / khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan sngags dang sangs rgyas gzugs kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:73a-7: phyi nas nyi ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis gnas pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:73a-8: sngags dang gzugs brnyan ma grub par ni srid gsum gnas su ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin //
T02TD1346E:73a-9: de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag la sngags dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:73a-10: 159 / dpa' bo g-yul gyi dus su lhung bar gyur pa zhes pa 'am ni de bzhin chom rkun dbyangs pa dag / brgyad dang 'byung po'i mtshan mo mi yi bdag po ro bsreg sar ni bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya //
T02TD1346E:73a-11: dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni rnam mang kha zas me tog dmar po rnams kyis rab mchod nas //
T02TD1346E:73a-12: mgo dang snying ga dang ni spyi bo lte ba la sogs su yang rdo rje dgod pa rab byas te /
T02TD1346E:73a-13: 160 / thab khung zur gsum du ni rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i padma gang zhig mtshan mar bcas pa dang //
T02TD1346E:73a-14: 'dab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma phyogs su phyogs bral du ni de bzhin lha mo rnams kyi rang mtshan ma //
T02TD1346E:73a-15: phyi rol re kh'a gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams byas nas //
T02TD1346E:73a-16: de yi g-yas min du ni yi dags lag pad ral gri dkyil 'khor las ni g-yas su rkang pa'o /
T02TD1346E:73a-18: 161 / sngar brjod ma mo'i skyon las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba rab byas nas //
T02TD1346E:73a-19: sngags pas thab kyi g-yas su khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams dag gis sbyin sreg nyid ni rab byed pa //
T02TD1346E:73b-0: de yi sngags ni aom hr'im phrem h'um phat kyi mtha' ste bcu yis bsgyur ba'i brgyar @73b ni sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1346E:73b-1: rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas 'chi med ri bo bzhin du g-yo ba med pa nyid du mtshan mo phyed /
T02TD1346E:73b-2: 162 / sbyin sreg rdzogs na ri 'dzin ral gri lta bur 'khyug cing 'bar la mche ba rnon po mig gsum pa //
T02TD1346E:73b-3: gang zhig sgra sgrogs sa yang rkang pas rnam par 'gems shing sgrub pa po ni 'jigs par byed pa de //
T02TD1346E:73b-4: thab kyi mtha' ru gnas nas ka ha ka ha dgod par byed cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gar byed de //
T02TD1346E:73b-5: de mthong nas ni 'jigs pa'i sngags pa sems nyams skad cig gis ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:73b-6: 163 / ro bsreg gnas su sngags pas dngos grub rgyur ni lha min dbang po las kyang 'jigs par mi bya ste //
T02TD1346E:73b-7: g-yo ba med pa'i sems mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrubs pa'i 'byung po'i mgon po 'di skad smra bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:73b-8: dpa' bo bzang po khyod kyis bdag ni grub bo mtha' dag smros shig da ni bdag gis ci zhig bgyi //
T02TD1346E:73b-9: de skad brjod na sgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang yid la 'dod don du gnyer bar bya /
T02TD1346E:73b-10: 164 / ral gri reg pa bcud kyi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ril bu ro tsa na dang mig sman dang //
T02TD1346E:73b-11: rkang pa byug dang shing lham dag dang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po khyod kyis bdag la stsol //
T02TD1346E:73b-12: dbye dang bskrad pa dang ni srid pa gzhom pa nyid dang rengs pa dang ni dgug pa dag dang dbang //
T02TD1346E:73b-13: bdag gi dngos grub thams cad mdzod cig de yis slar yang 'di dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o smra /
T02TD1346E:73b-14: 165 /'byung po'i dbang po bsgrubs nas mi yi bdag po sgrub pa po ni sa 'og dag dang bar snang dang //
T02TD1346E:73b-15: lha yi mchog gi khang pa dang ni lhun po'i rtse dang rgya mtsho'i pha rol gang yin der 'gro ste //
T02TD1346E:73b-16: de la zhon pa phyag na ral gri thogs pas sa yi steng gi gnas su 'jig rten bya ba byed //
T02TD1346E:73b-17: de phyir sems can don gyi slad du mchog gi snying rje yis ni lha min dbang po bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:73b-18: 166 / ming gi dang po thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1346E:73b-19: gsung gi rdo rje ming gi yi ge thams cad de las lhag pa dag kyang sku yi rdo rje ste //
T02TD1346E:73b-20: de las yan lag so so'i sngags ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te bklags pas grub pa brgya lam na //
T02TD1346E:74a-0: bsgom bya mchod bya bzlas bya rang @74a * //
T02TD1346E:74a-1: gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so /
T02TD1346E:74a-2: 167 / so sor sngags kyi rigs ni nges par bye ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur te rab tu grags pa'o //
T02TD1346E:74a-3: sbyin sreg de las bcu yi cha shas rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis grub par 'gyur ba ji srid nyid //
T02TD1346E:74a-4: phyi nas zhi ba la sogs rnams la 'bras bu ster bar rab 'gyur rnam pa gzhan du 'grub mi 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:74a-5: bsam gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul zhugs nges ldan rnams kyi sngags kyi skye gnas sgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:74a-6: 168 / grub pa lcags gsum gyis bcings mkha' la 'gro ba'i sha yi ril bus mkha' la spyod pa nyid dag ster //
T02TD1346E:74a-7: khyi dang rta la sogs pa'i sgron ma rnams kyis lus la bkres skom la sogs nad rnams 'phrog par byed //
T02TD1346E:74a-8: de dag rnams kyi mig dang mkhris pa rnams kyis mi mchog rnams kyi mig sman sa ni rab 'byed dang //
T02TD1346E:74a-9: mi snang ba dang dbang du bya ba na chung yid 'phrog dpal ldan dur khrod du ni bsgrubs pa'o /
T02TD1346E:74a-10: 169 / nag po'i brgyad kyi mtshan mo dag gam yang na ma nu'i nyin zhag la ni dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas //
T02TD1346E:74a-11: bsrung ba dag kyang kun nas byas te de yi dbus su sha yi ril bu dag gam mig sman ni //
T02TD1346E:74a-12: byas nas shin tu dri [?] bzangs [?] me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod de sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1346E:74a-13: ji srid mkha' la nyi ma bzhin du 'od zer 'phro ba'i bar te de nas blangs la gzung bar bya /
T02TD1346E:74a-14: 170 /'tsho bar pho nya de ni 'tsho la nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas na sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:74a-15: pho nya'i dri ba mi mnyam pa gang nges par bde ba'i 'bras ster mnyam pa 'chi ba ster bar brjod //
T02TD1346E:74a-16: pho nya sbrul la sogs pa'i ming dag rab tu brjod na de las sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:74a-17: gal te srog ni rab tu 'jug la dris na dge bar 'gyur te 'byung ba la ni dge min 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:74a-19: 171 / pho nya'i rkang pa g-yon pa mdun na na chung mar brjod g-yas pa mdun du yin na skyes pa'o //
T02TD1346E:74a-20: lag pas rang gi yan lag dag la gang du reg pa'i phyogs 'dir mi de so yis zin pa ste //
T02TD1346E:74b-0: mig dang kha ni rab tu gdangs pa dag dang rna ba'i rtsa bar nag po yang ni 'chi bar @74b brjod ;
T02TD1346E:74b-1: / gal te snying ga'i padma dkar por sgra ni cung zad gyur na de ni rab tu bsdu bar bya /
T02TD1346E:74b-2: 172 / dang por bsrung ba'i cho ga so yis zin pa dang ni bdag nyid la yang bde ba byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:74b-3: sa chu me rlung de bzhin nam mkha' dag kyang mthe bo la sogs la ni nges par sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1346E:74b-4: la la sogs pa ha yi mtha' rnams rim pas brla dang lto ba snying ga kha nang dpral ba la //
T02TD1346E:74b-5: h'um ksh'um hya hy'a la sogs klu bcu mi mnyam mnyam pa thung ngu ring po'i rab tu dbye ba yis /
T02TD1346E:74b-6: 173 / g-yon gyi lus la sa bon thung ngu rna ba mgrin pa la gnas mchan khung dku dang brla phyogs la //
T02TD1346E:74b-7: g-yas kyi lus la gdengs can rnams kyi ring po nyid du rab 'gyur spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye bas so //
T02TD1346E:74b-8: rgyal ba zhes grags sor mo shin tu mnyam pa'i 'dam bu sbrul gyi sa bon ldan pas bsrung byas nas //
T02TD1346E:74b-9: h'um ksh'um ldan pas snying gar shin tu bsnun na myur du so yis zin pa bskyod par byed par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:74b-10: 174 / sa yi sa bon dpral ba la ste mkha' skyes rkang par gnas pas myur du rengs par byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:74b-11: spyi bor chu dang rtse mo can ni lto bar rab tu bcug na dug ni med pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:74b-12: dpral bar rlung gi sa bon dang ni snying gar rtse mo can gyis nges par dug ni 'pho ba ste ;
T02TD1346E:74b-13: / spyi bor stong pa rab tu zhugs zhing sa ni rkang par gnas pas nges par dug ni gcod par byed /
T02TD1346E:74b-14: 175 / dpral par thig le dkar po yis ni rnam pa gsum gyi dug kyang nges par dug ni med par byed //
T02TD1346E:74b-15: dmar pos bskyod cing nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas 'jug pa dang ni kha dog ser pos rengs par byed //
T02TD1346E:74b-16: tsha ba gsum po sbyar ba'i sdong bu srog ni rab tu 'bab par dug med byed la sbyar byas te //
T02TD1346E:74b-17: yang na kha ni rnam par phye ba'i lce'u chung la sor mo yis ni tam ga na sbyar bya /
T02TD1346E:74b-18: 176 / dz'a t'i badzr'i gzhon nu tsha ba gsum dang lan tshva lang+ga l'i dang de ba d'a li dang //
T02TD1346E:74b-19: bra hm'i ksh'a ro aa shva ga ndha nyin mor byed pa dang bcas ban dha ka rko ta ki dang //
T02TD1346E:74b-20: bshang ba sha dang khu ba khrag ni mnyam pa dag kyang mi bskyod pas btags ril bu byas pa ni //
T02TD1346E:74b-21: sna ru bkod pas 'byung po 'am ni 'byung po rims dang brtan dang ltos 'gro'i dug ni nges par 'joms /
T02TD1346E:75a-0: 177 / nyi ma la sogs gza' bdun dag ni nyin @75a * //
T02TD1346E:75a-1: dang mtshan mo'i dus te bdun gyi cha yi mtha' ru ni //
T02TD1346E:75a-2: spen pa nyi ma'i dbus su stong pa rigs ldan ma dag 'chi gzugs chu tshod phyed ni rab tu rgyu //
T02TD1346E:75a-3: de la klu dang rtse bar mi bya rnam pa gsum po dag gi dug kyang bza' bar mi bya ste //
T02TD1346E:75a-4: de nyid la ni sbrul gyi sos zin 'byung pos btab dang mtshon gyis phug pa gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro /
T02TD1346E:75a-5: 178 / nyi ma gung dang mtshan mo phyed la nyin mtshan dus su rtag tu rgyu ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang //
T02TD1346E:75a-6: tho rangs dag dang nyi ma nub pa la yang de bzhin du ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi chu tshod de //
T02TD1346E:75a-7: thun mtshams dbus su stong pa chu gter dag la rigs ldan dus kyis sos zin chu tshod gcig rab rgyu //
T02TD1346E:75a-8: 'di dag sgra gcan gdong pa rnams su nyin zhag so so'i dus su yang dag par ni rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:75a-9: 179 / nyi ma la ni mtha' yas longs spyod nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyin mo'i dang po'i cha la'o //
T02TD1346E:75a-10: phyi nas lhag ma can te 'dir ni lto 'phye rnams dag gza' bdun rab tu dbye bas 'char bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:75a-11: mkha' dus mkha' dang bug pa mkha' mda' mkha' dus mkha' nor mkha' ri mkha' me dag gi chu tshod rnams //
T02TD1346E:75a-12: nyi ma la sogs las kyang gdengs can nor rnams dag gi longs spyod longs spyod dbye bas dug tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:75a-13: 180 / mtha' yas rigs ldan zhes pa bram ze kha ba'i mdog ste nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong rgyal rigs dmar //
T02TD1346E:75a-14: padma chen po dang ni de bzhin nyid du 'jog po rje rigs mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD1346E:75a-15: stobs kyi rgyu dang padma dmangs rigs sprin nag dang mtshungs mthar skyes dag ni kha dog sna tshogs so //
T02TD1346E:75a-16: de dag rnams kyi skye gnas dag kyang chu dang rtse mo can dang 'dzin ma rlung dang nam mkha'i khams /
T02TD1346E:75a-17: 181 / mkha' lding zhes pa rkang pa nas ni dpyi mthar ser po de bzhin lte ba'i mtshams su kha ba'i mdog / mgrin pa'i bar du kha dog dmar po sprin nag dang mtshungs smin ma'i 'khri shing ji srid nyid du ste //
T02TD1346E:75a-18: de phyir nges par kha dog sna tshogs gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa de nyid lnga yis rgyas btab pa //
T02TD1346E:75b-0: bsgoms na de yi phyag rgyas gdengs can dug dang 'byung po'i nad la sogs pa dag kyang nges par 'phrog 182 / rang gi snying ga'i padma dag la nyi ma'i steng du kshim gyi yi ge 'dab chags @75b mgon po ni //
T02TD1346E:75b-1: klu yi rgyan dang ldan zhing mtha' dag rigs kyi dbang gis kha dog lnga rnams 'phro ba bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:75b-2: de nas 'dab chags mgon po'i sngags ni dang por aom yig dag dang pa kshi sv'a h'a'i mtha' can te //
T02TD1346E:75b-3: de ni bye ba phrag gcig bzlas nas gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i 'dab chags mgon po bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:75b-4: 183 / mkha' lding grub na gdengs can dbang po rnams dang gdengs can bdag po'i bu rnams mngag gzhug nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:75b-5: rab mchog sa yi steng du 'byung po gnod sbyin gdon rnams dag dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo rnams //
T02TD1346E:75b-6: sngags kyis dgug par rab tu 'gyur te gdon gyi tshogs pa mtha' dag dus kyi sos zin rjod par byed //
T02TD1346E:75b-7: de phyir sems can don gyi slad du dang por mi rnams kyis ni mkha' lding dbang po bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:75b-8: 184 / rig byed dang ni 'dab brgyad nyid dang mi yi bdag po so dang chu gter drug dang gnyis skyes la //
T02TD1346E:75b-9: snying por bsgrub bya rang gi phyogs su dang por aom aa zung ste ai la sogs pa 'dab brgyad la //
T02TD1346E:75b-10: ae ya la sogs bcu drug la ste ka sogs gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu dang ha ksha gnyis skyes la //
T02TD1346E:75b-11: thun mtshams 'dab ma rnams la bsgrub bya tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dus la la mtha' dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams /
T02TD1346E:75b-13: 185 / aa sogs dbyangs ni re re dag gis chu srin bum pa'i dbang las ring po thung ngu dag kyang lnga //
T02TD1346E:75b-14: phyi rol 'dab ma sum cu gnyis la bdag gi snying po badzra t'i kshna la sogs yi ge rnams //
T02TD1346E:75b-15: de dag rnams kyi phyi rol du yang zhi sogs las la wa ya ra la dkyil 'khor rnams nyid do //
T02TD1346E:75b-16: snying por yi ge yan lag mchog dang rtse mo can dang g-yo bar rkang pa dbang dang dgug pa la /
T02TD1346E:75b-17: 186 / zhi ba sogs la snying por rkang pa dang ni me dang rlung du mgo bo sngags pas bri bar bya //
T02TD1346E:75b-18: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa srid pa gzhom pa dag dang bskrad dang dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang //
T02TD1346E:75b-19: rengs pa dang bcas rmongs pa dag kyang srid pa gsum gyi gnas su 'khor lo 'di ni byed de 'dir //
T02TD1346E:75b-20: sngags brjod bzlas pa sbyin sreg rnams kyis dang por badzra t'i kshna la sogs sngags chen bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:75b-21: 187 / rtsibs brgyad la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas bcu gnyis rtsibs dang bcu drug rtsibs la bar du yang //
T02TD1346E:76a-1: zur rnams su ste dbus su rab 'gyur ya ma r'a dza sa do me ru na las yo //
T02TD1346E:76a-2: de nas snying po'i rtsibs kyi dbus nas da ni ra ya kshe tstsha de nas mthar ni ni ru 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:76a-3: de yi phyi rol aom hr'im sht'im dang bi kri t'a na na las rnam gnyis h'um dang phat du 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:76a-4: 188 / re mig nas ni re mig bar la 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsgrub bya'i ming dang sngags 'di'o //
T02TD1346E:76a-5: dbye dang gsad dang dbang la ya ma r'a ni rab tu 'gyur te kshe da me do sa tsa sogs //
T02TD1346E:76a-6: rengs dang dgug dang rmongs pa dang ni stobs ni byed pa dag dang zhi ba dang ni bskrad pa la //
T02TD1346E:76a-7: der ni snying po ngag nas ya yig 'gro ste yon tan dbang gis phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin /
T02TD1346E:76a-8: 189 / yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog las mdun du dbyangs kyis 'khyud pa dag ni ma ru rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:76a-9: yi ge rnams kyis sde mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gis lnga pa ham dang sam du gsungs //
T02TD1346E:76a-10: thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di yang bdag gis shes rab yi ge au ru 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:76a-11: mam mu: ham hum: sam su: ma nydzu: nyid ni padma nor 'dab la ste nyi ma'i 'dab ma la /
T02TD1346E:76a-12: 190 / phyi rol du shr'i badzra gho sha: sa dang ldan pa'i ma nta bha dra h'um dang phat du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:76a-13: bsgrub bya 'dir ni lte ba la ste che ge mo yang mdzod cig dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul //
T02TD1346E:76a-14: de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnams dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri bar bya bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:76a-15: 'di dag thams cad bdag gis drin las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis mi rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:76a-16: 191 / sgra ni gang zhig snying ga'i phyogs na yod pa mi mchog rnams kyi rna ba'i bu gas thos gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:76a-17: de la mi yis sems ni gcig tu gyur par sbyar ba dag kyang ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:76a-18: 'jig rten kun du sgra ni gang zhig srid par skyes pas brjod pa de dang de ni de bzhin thos //
T02TD1346E:76a-19: khyab bdag gi ni rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:76a-20: 192 / skyil krung bcing ba byas nas phan tshun so dag reg pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis //
T02TD1346E:76a-21: phyi rol rlung dag bkug ste de dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su rab tu bcug pa yis //
T02TD1346E:76b-0: kun tu gdung ba dang ni bkres dang @76b skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la dug kyang yang dag 'gog / dpral bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa yis kyang ngo /
T02TD1346E:76b-1: 193 / kha yang bkab ste sna yi bug pa gnyis ka dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung ni ma lus pa //
T02TD1346E:76b-2: srog gi shugs kyis bkug ste dri ma med pa'i glog dang mtshungs pa thur sel rlung dang sbyar byas pa //
T02TD1346E:76b-3: dus kyis goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me yi dbus su ro ni mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:76b-4: lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster /
T02TD1346E:76b-5: 194 / nyi ma las ni gzhan du phyogs te nyi 'od la gnas rang gi grib ma brtan pa'i mig gis blta //
T02TD1346E:76b-6: phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mngon par brtags na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i kha dog mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:76b-7: zla ba drug tu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong //
T02TD1346E:76b-8: yang na shing gi grib mar rab tu zhugs te nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i phreng ba bsgoms pas so /
T02TD1346E:76b-9: 195 / nus ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus nas gzhan gyi gnas su bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba //
T02TD1346E:76b-10: de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med glog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs can langs pa yang //
T02TD1346E:76b-11: 'khor lo nas ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par dman zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsa la bskyod //
T02TD1346E:76b-12: ji srid gtsug tor bug par btsan thabs nyid kyis phyi rol gyi ni pags pa dag la khab bzhin reg 196 / de yi dus su thur du sel ba mchog gi btsan thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya //
T02TD1346E:76b-13: zung gi rlung dag 'gags pa na ni gtsug tor phug nas mchog gi grong khyer dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:76b-14: de ltar yid la rdo rje rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:76b-15: mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin du 'gyur slar yang 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sna tshogs yum /
T02TD1346E:76b-16: 197 / phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te //
T02TD1346E:76b-17: 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed //
T02TD1346E:77a-0: phyi dang lus la dbyer med yul @77a * //
T02TD1346E:77a-1: dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1346E:77a-2: sems dang sems byung la ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i gzugs kyis de ni gcig pu'o /
T02TD1346E:77a-3: 198 / snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya gtang bya ste //
T02TD1346E:77a-4: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub slad du rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med //
T02TD1346E:77a-5: rnam par 'gyur ba med cing mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya brtsegs par gnas //
T02TD1346E:77a-6: ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:77a-7: 199 / srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes ba de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de //
T02TD1346E:77a-8: sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:77a-9: gang gis 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stong par lta byed pa //
T02TD1346E:77a-10: des na gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan /
T02TD1346E:77a-11: 200 / ba lang bse rta glang po'i mgon song mchod sbyin dus su lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni //
T02TD1346E:77a-12: bde bar bzung bgyi gang de yul dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'gog pa ste //
T02TD1346E:77a-13: bslab ldan rnams kyi ba lang pags par so ma ba lli'i btung ba khrag dang bcas par gyur pa gang //
T02TD1346E:77a-14: de ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi bha ga'i rdul la gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dga' ba'i gzugs /
T02TD1346E:77a-16: 201 / tshangs pa srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog byed ngag ste khyab 'jug kyang yid de dag rig byed gsum //
T02TD1346E:77a-17: aom yig de dag yi ge gsum ste zla nyi bsreg za de dag rnams dang yon tan rtsa gsum mo //
T02TD1346E:77a-18: rigs can lus kyi rigs la gzhan pa yul dang yon tan la gnas srid srung n'a da'i gzugs can te //
T02TD1346E:77a-19: de yi dbus su gzhom med gang de yul dang rnam par bral zhing yon tan med pa'i 'gyur med do /
T02TD1346E:77a-20: 202 / rig byed mtha' las gsang ba 'di dag tshangs pa yis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la sngon brjod de //
T02TD1346E:77b-0: dus kyi shes pa rab nyams thub pa rnams kyis 'dir @77b ni srog chags rnams la gsod pa dag kyang bstan //
T02TD1346E:77b-1: mi rnams mtho ris don du de la rab tu 'jug ste dmyal ba ngan pa'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:77b-2: sol ba 'o ma'i rgyun gyis mngon par bkrus pa 'dir ni zla ba'i mdog tu 'gar yang 'gyur ma yin /
T02TD1346E:77b-3: 203 / sbyor ba med pa'i rig byed tshig ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba dag gis bslus pa'i mi rnams gang //
T02TD1346E:77b-4: de rnams gzhan gyi bu ni mi skyed don du nyin mtshan dus su rang gi bud med bsrung byas nas //
T02TD1346E:77b-5: bu yis byin pa dag kyang yi dags kyi ni 'jig rten du song [?] pha yi sbyin par 'gyur ro lo //
T02TD1346E:77b-6: des na bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba 'dod pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni gdug pa'i bram ze rnams kyis sbas /
T02TD1346E:77b-7: 204 / gal te rigs kyi rta yis rgod ma bzang mo la ni rta mchog skyes bu gzhan du gyur pa na //
T02TD1346E:77b-8: dpal yang 'di yi mthu las slar yang 'gyur te bdag po yi ni rnyed pa dag kyang cis ma yin //
T02TD1346E:77b-9: gang gis chags pa can rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang rang bud med dag ni srung bar byed //
T02TD1346E:77b-10: shi bar gyur na khyod su khyod kyi rang gi bud med su ste kye ma mi dge'i las kyis bcings /
T02TD1346E:77b-11: 205 / ba lang sbyin dang sa gzhi sbyin pa de bzhin gzhan yang mi yi 'jig rten du ni longs spyod ster //
T02TD1346E:77b-12: sman dang kha zas sbyin pa dag ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog bkres pa dag ni skom pa dag kyang 'phrog /'dod pa'i sbyin pa thams cad du ni bde mnyam 'bras ster 'khor lo'i dus su smos kyang ci zhig dgos //
T02TD1346E:77b-13: yid 'ong chung ma sring mo skal [?] bzangs bu mo rnams kyang gsang ba sbyin pa la ni rab sbyin bya /
T02TD1346E:77b-14: 206 / smad 'tshong dam pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur zhing gsang ba'i mi mo gzhan gyi bud med dam tshig ste //
T02TD1346E:77b-15: rang dbang chos kyi phyag rgya yul ni mang po la dga' rang gi chung ma ye shes phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1346E:77b-16: smad 'tshong dam pa bcu gnyis lo lon mchog gi bde ba la dga' gzhan gyi bud med bcu drug lo //
T02TD1346E:77b-17: rang dbang lo ni nyi shu lon pa bu mo dang bcas rang gi chung ma sum cu'i lo ru 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:77b-18: 207 / sngon tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dzin ma dang ni glang chen rta dang shing rta du ma gser gyi khur //
T02TD1346E:77b-19: sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad du byin zhing slar yang mgo dang khrag dang sha rnams dag kyang rab tu byin //
T02TD1346E:78a-0: 'di rnams kyis ni bzhed pa'i sangs @78a * //
T02TD1346E:78a-1: rgyas nyid du ma gyur de nas 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rab tu byin //
T02TD1346E:78a-2: gsang ba'i sbyin pa de yis skyes bu rnams ni rgyal ba skyed byed rigs la sangs rgyas nyid du 'khrungs /
T02TD1346E:78a-3: 208 / zangs ma yis ni gser dang mtshungs shing mching bu dum bus lha yi cod pan nor bu dag dang mtshungs //
T02TD1346E:78a-4: smad 'tshong dam pa'i 'dod pa'i sbyin pas 'chi med rigs kyi bu mo pags pa dum bu gla rtsi ste //
T02TD1346E:78a-5: bong bu yis ni rigs kyi rta dang ra yis rab mchog glang chen bdag po gal te rnyed pa na //
T02TD1346E:78a-6: chung ma'i sbyin pas rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la lha mo de la 'di ni rnyed pa cis ma yin /
T02TD1346E:78a-7: 209 / byams pa'i gnas la sbyin pa dag ni bde mnyam 'bras ster ma yin sems can mtshungs pa'i mthu las te //
T02TD1346E:78a-8: ltos pa dang bcas gnas la de bzhin rab mchog rgyal ba'i rigs la sems can bdud kyi rang bzhin phyir //
T02TD1346E:78a-9: snying rje dga' dang bcas pa'i gnas ni zung la gzhan gyi don du bde bar gshegs pa pa rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:78a-10: rab tu byin na dman pa nyid dang mchog nyid phyir na tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs mi zad bde 'bras ster /
T02TD1346E:78a-11: 210 / gang la rigs ni tshad mar gyur pa de la mi yi bdag po rig byed dag ni tshad mar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:78a-12: gang la rig byed tshad mar gyur pa de la nges par sa gzhi'i gnas su mchod sbyin tshad ma ste //
T02TD1346E:78a-13: gang la mchod sbyin tshad ma de la rnam mang phyugs dang mi rnams dag la 'tshe ba tshad mar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:78a-14: gang la 'tshe ba tshad mar gyur pa de la dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i sdig pa tshad ma'o /
T02TD1346E:78a-15: 211 / gnas ni 'dzin pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan gtsug lag khang gi rab gnas bzhed par gsungs //
T02TD1346E:78a-16: de la sman dang kha zas sbyin pa nad [?] ni zhi bar byed pa sbyin pa po yis sbyin no zer //
T02TD1346E:78a-17: sbyin pa med na gtsug lag khang 'di sa yi steng gi gnas su dud 'gro rnams kyi gnas sa ste //
T02TD1346E:78a-18: gang du dge 'dun gcig ni 'dzin par gyur pa der ni mi yi bdag po chos dang sangs rgyas kyang /
T02TD1346E:78a-19: 212 / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la ni mi rnams thar pa'i slad du skyabs su nye bar 'gro ba ste //
T02TD1346E:78a-20: 'dir ni sangs rgyas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa 'di dang yi ge bris pa'i glegs bam chos nyid dang //
T02TD1346E:78b-0: dge 'dun dur smrig 'dzin pa mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba skye ba @78b 'bum phrag rnams kyis ster ba min //
T02TD1346E:78b-1: slob dpon dag ni sangs rgyas nyid de rab mchog sa yi gzhi la chos ni de yi bstan pa'o /
T02TD1346E:78b-2: 213 / dge 'dun gang zhig der gnas rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang sems can kun la rjes su brtse ba ste //
T02TD1346E:78b-3: de 'dir rnam bzhi rnam pa gnyis gsungs 'dir ni slar yang nyan thos pa dang bla na med pa'o //
T02TD1346E:78b-4: dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma dang slar yang 'dir ni dge bsnyen chen po dag dang dge bsnyen ma //
T02TD1346E:78b-5: rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa rnams lhan skyes bde ba la dga' dge bsnyen ma dang dge bsnyen yang /
T02TD1346E:78b-6: 214 / bsod nams ye shes don gyi slad du rtag par mchog tu 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //
T02TD1346E:78b-7: nyan thos rnams la mchod ston la sogs rnal 'byor pa la mchog gi bde byed 'dod pa'i sbyin pa yang //
T02TD1346E:78b-8: sbyin pa po gang rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang dus kun du ni chags pa'i sems kyis sbyin byed pa //
T02TD1346E:78b-9: de dag bsod nams ye shes rdzogs te mchog gi bde ba'i gnas su skye ba 'di la 'gro bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:78b-10: 215 / slob dpon dang ni rgyal ba la yang mkhas pa min pa'i nyan thos gang dag gsal bar smod byed pa //
T02TD1346E:78b-11: de dag bgegs kyi mgon pos bsad de mchog tu 'jigs pa byed pa'i mnar med du ni myur du 'gro //
T02TD1346E:78b-12: gang la rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag pos sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis ni rang nyid byin gyis brlab pa mdzad //
T02TD1346E:78b-13: mi rnams dag las dge slong su zhig brtul zhugs nges pa'i gnas la de dang tshangs par spyod pa mtshungs /
T02TD1346E:78b-14: 216 / mchog gi bde ba la dga' dge slong dag gam kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu mgo zlum ral pa can //
T02TD1346E:78b-15: thos dang klog pa la dga' mkhas pa lam nyams thams cad byed po dang ni bdag tu zhen pa dang //
T02TD1346E:78b-16: 'dir ni rtag tu rang gzhan bu dang chung mar zhen dang bza' dang bza' ba min par zhen pa dang //
T02TD1346E:78b-17: rigs dang rigs ni min pa la dga' snod dang snod min dag tu zhen pas dka' ba byed pa'o /
T02TD1346E:78b-18: 217 / sangs rgyas zhing ni sangs rgyas dang bcas bde mnyam 'bras ster lus dang ngag dang yid dang chags pa ste //
T02TD1346E:78b-19: 'di dag kun tu bor nas sdig pa'i blo yis khyab bdag gzhan pa dag kyang yang dag tshol byed de //
T02TD1346E:79a-1: dag tu brtul zhugs nges pa brgya dang bsnyung gnas ri las mchong ba dang //
T02TD1346E:79a-2: g-yul dang nyi ma gza' yis zin la yul gyi bde 'dod du ma'i mtshon dang me la mchong bas so /
T02TD1346E:79a-3: 218 / bdud rnams dag gis khrag ni btung ba'i slad du 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang bkod pa ste //
T02TD1346E:79a-4: 'jug ngogs bsnyung gnas dag gis shi bar gyur dang g-yul du bsnun pa nyid dang ba lang nyi ma ni //
T02TD1346E:79a-5: grol ba'i don dang khyim dang nor gyi yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la shi ba mtho ris so //
T02TD1346E:79a-6: de yi phyir na rang dang gzhan gyi lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin /
T02TD1346E:79a-7: 219 / gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po las ni rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa thos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang //
T02TD1346E:79a-8: slar yang phrag dog byed na de ni dmyal ba brgyad pa ji srid nyid du rab tu 'jug 'gyur te //
T02TD1346E:79a-9: gang la khab rtse'i sa la mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun du rgyu bar byed ;
T02TD1346E:79a-10: / de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog yod kyi bar du dbang ni blang bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro /
T02TD1346E:79a-11: 220 / rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD1346E:79a-12: bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang stobs dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi //
T02TD1346E:79a-13: sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste //
T02TD1346E:79a-14: gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'ching ba byas nas dmyal bar nye bar 'gro /
T02TD1346E:79a-15: 221 / sa dang dpal 'byor slad du shin tu g-yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag / bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo pa yis dkrigs pa'i yan lag bzhi ldan g-yul du rab tu zhugs pa na //
T02TD1346E:79a-16: glang chen tshogs pa mthong nas 'jigs pa de yi lag pa'i mthil nas ral gri dag ni lhung gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:79a-17: de la ral gri'i skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin ji lta de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o /
T02TD1346E:79a-18: 222 / sngags dang dpa' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams drag po'i sa la bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:79a-19: rang byin brlab pas lha mo dam tshig rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa sbyin sreg dag gis kyang //
T02TD1346E:79b-0: dag pa'i rim pas @79b dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis so //
T02TD1346E:79b-1: ye shes yid bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam 'di'o /
T02TD1346E:79b-2: 223 / me ni dngul chu'i dgra nyid yin te ma dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching ba med //
T02TD1346E:79b-3: ma bcings na ni gser byed med de gser dang bral na smra po rnams la longs spyod med pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:79b-4: de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag gi sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:79b-5: bcings pa med na lus 'bigs med de ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min /
T02TD1346E:79b-6: 224 / skyed mos tshal lam re bo dag ni skye bo ri dags bral bar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:79b-7: drag po rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gnas su rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang //
T02TD1346E:79b-8: dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog gi sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la //
T02TD1346E:79b-9: gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:79b-10: 225 / khyim dang grong du bgrang phreng dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni //
T02TD1346E:79b-11: ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa rjod par byed //
T02TD1346E:79b-12: gnas dang stong pa dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang dag par ni shes pa min pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:79b-13: rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin /
T02TD1346E:79b-14: 226 / bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang gdan rnams dang //
T02TD1346E:79b-15: sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drangs bskul ba med par yang //
T02TD1346E:79b-16: bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos grub ster bar byed //
T02TD1346E:79b-17: de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor ba yis thar pa'i slad du bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:79b-18: 227 / rang gi sems ni brgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi yi bdag po rang bzhin med par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:80a-0: sad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams @80a * //
T02TD1346E:80a-1: kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin //
T02TD1346E:80a-2: dngos dang dngos med kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la bde mnyam ster ba min //
T02TD1346E:80a-3: gang zhig mkha' yi shes rab la 'khyud lhan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang sems de ni thar pa ster /
T02TD1346E:80a-4: 228 / aom a'a: h'um ho rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag tu chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs par bya //
T02TD1346E:80a-5: rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgom par byas nas ni //
T02TD1346E:80a-6: snod de nas ni thig le dag gis lag pad ri bong can gyi ming med rtse mos sa dag la //
T02TD1346E:80a-7: phyi rol tu ni zur gsum byas nas de yi dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o /
T02TD1346E:80a-8: 229 / de yi dbus su 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas bsgoms byas nas //
T02TD1346E:80a-9: mthe bo dang ni ming med dag gis nyin zhag so so'i dus su tshim par byed pa la sogs bya //
T02TD1346E:80a-10: yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thog mar 'dir ni gtor ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming gis te //
T02TD1346E:80a-11: 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang slar yang sngags pas khro bo'i rgyal po la ni gtor ma'o /
T02TD1346E:80a-12: 230 / pho nya mo rnams dag la zas kyi phung ni sa steng rnams su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyis sbyin //
T02TD1346E:80a-13: 'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bklag go //
T02TD1346E:80a-14: mgo dang mgrin pa snying ga lte gsang gtsug tor du ni rang gi rdo rje rnams kyis yan lag dgod //
T02TD1346E:80a-15: gnyi ga'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrigs pa la /
T02TD1346E:80a-17: 231 / lha yi dmigs pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:80a-18: mngon sum dag ni de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:80a-19: mngon sum min na rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang //
T02TD1346E:80a-20: de ni ri mo sogs la blta bya yongs su ma smin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi bsgom pa'i don /
T02TD1346E:80a-21: 232 / gzugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la ni de nyid min pas bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:80b-0: nam mkha' la ni de nyid sbyor ba dag gis rang sems mtshang med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur @80b ba ;
T02TD1346E:80b-1: / lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis ji srid nyid du brtan par 'gyur gyi bar //
T02TD1346E:80b-2: de nas phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:80b-3: 233 / rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la gsungs //
T02TD1346E:80b-4: byis pa rnams ni smin par byed pa'i don du mchog gi snying rje dag gis sna tshogs gtso bos sbas //
T02TD1346E:80b-5: de phyir de ni dbye ba byas nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:80b-6: phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o /
T02TD1346E:80b-7: 234 / dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las /
T02TD1346E:80b-8: sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1346E:80b-10: // / gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa gang zhig khyod kyis gsungs pa dag ni cung zad shes //
T02TD1346E:80b-11: slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lo lha mi'i bla ma khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD1346E:80b-12: sangs rgyas rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs drug a'a li k'a li dag la gnas pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:80b-13: zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor la sogs gsungs /
T02TD1346E:80b-14: 1 / ka ba rnams dang rdo rje phreng ba sa yi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod //
T02TD1346E:80b-15: sha khrag chu dang bshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab pa ste //
T02TD1346E:80b-16: mkhris pa bad kan gyis ni nyi ma ri bong can yang de bzhin chu rgyus rnams kyis chu skyes rnams //
T02TD1346E:80b-17: ra ba lnga yi re kh'a sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes rnams kyis so /
T02TD1346E:80b-18: 2 / dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes g-yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs pags pa la sogs kyis //
T02TD1346E:80b-19: nyi ma'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin bkod pa so yi phreng bas de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:80b-20: dur khrod brgyad du 'khor lo g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni sor mo rnams kyi sen mo yis //
T02TD1346E:80b-21: ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la gnas /
T02TD1346E:81a-0: 3 / de ltar nges par sku yi rdo @81a * //
T02TD1346E:81a-1: rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs //
T02TD1346E:81a-2: gsung gi rdo rje aa sogs ka sogs lha yi rnam pa nyid ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:81a-3: stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyi srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:81a-4: de bzhin du ni ye shes rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:81a-5: 4 / sde pa ka la sogs pa drug po rim pas yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa yis //
T02TD1346E:81a-6: rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste //
T02TD1346E:81a-7: slar yang sde pa re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams dag gis dbye //
T02TD1346E:81a-8: so sor yi ge'i dbye bas dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po dag las so /
T02TD1346E:81a-9: 5 / dang por stong pa'i rab tu dbye ba dag kyang nga nya na ma na dang [?] thka dang dang po'i dbyangs //
T02TD1346E:81a-10: rlung gi dbye ba ai yig gha dzha dha bha dha sha rnams te me yi dbye ba ri la sogs //
T02TD1346E:81a-11: chu yi dbye bas au yig wa kha tsha tha pha tha wa ste sa yi dbye ba li la sogs //
T02TD1346E:81a-12: de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i rigs ni rnam pa lnga yi ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams rnam par phye /
T02TD1346E:81a-13: 6 / gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD1346E:81a-14: aa sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dag rnams //
T02TD1346E:81a-15: 'jig rten snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o //
T02TD1346E:81a-16: rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mtha' dag tu 'gyur ka sogs sde pa brtsegs pa la gnas brgyad rnams so /
T02TD1346E:81a-17: 7 / ka sogs yi ge sum cu ha ya ra wa lar ldan ksha dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa drug nyid //
T02TD1346E:81a-18: dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:81a-19: sku ni gcig pa nges par gcig gi 'khor dang bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:81a-20: lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i mgon po dgu bdag nyid /
T02TD1346E:81a-21: 8 / dbyangs kyi grangs kyi bdag nyid bcu gsum dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa drug bdag nyid de //
T02TD1346E:81b-0: ya la sogs @81b pa rnams kyis sgo skyong mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so //
T02TD1346E:81b-1: khro bo drug tu ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs su gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis //
T02TD1346E:81b-2: so sor yi ge'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud /
T02TD1346E:81b-3: 9 / de bzhin yi ge so so ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste //
T02TD1346E:81b-4: phung po 'byung ba dbang po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1346E:81b-5: stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams brgya yis gdab pa ste //
T02TD1346E:81b-6: gtsug tor nas ni chu skyes mtha' ru mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gdan la'o /
T02TD1346E:81b-7: 10 / rdo rje rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1346E:81b-8: de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis //
T02TD1346E:81b-9: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can //
T02TD1346E:81b-10: yi ge so so'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo dang ni lha rnams dag gi'o /
T02TD1346E:81b-11: 11 / sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pa rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:81b-12: phung po rnams kyis lnga yi bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dgu pa yang //
T02TD1346E:81b-13: bshang lam la sogs dang ni mig la sogs pas yongs bskor 'di ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyang //
T02TD1346E:81b-14: de bzhin so ni rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams dag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can /
T02TD1346E:81b-15: 12 / dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar padma'i mtshan ma 'od dpag med //
T02TD1346E:81b-16: nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas 'gro ma m'a ma k'i dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma ;
T02TD1346E:81b-17: / drag mo chu gter tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyes gdengs can dang ni stag gdong ma dang 'ug par bcas //
T02TD1346E:81b-18: 'di dag dpal ldan g-yon gyi zhal nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o /
T02TD1346E:82a-0: 13 / chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi padma ral gri don yod grub pa sgrol @82a * //
T02TD1346E:82a-2: mkha' yi snying po reg bya rdo rje ma dang shin tu stobs bcas tsa rtsi k'a dang lcags sgrog ma //
T02TD1346E:82a-3: bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyi gdong ma dang bya rog bcas //
T02TD1346E:82a-4: de dag nges par byams pa'i thugs kyis srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o /
T02TD1346E:82a-5: 14 / longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs rin chen 'dzin dang gos dkar mo //
T02TD1346E:82a-6: sa yi snying po rmugs byed dang ni ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong drug me yi lha //
T02TD1346E:82a-7: gdengs can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer can dang phag gdong ma dang bya rgod bcas //
T02TD1346E:82a-8: 'di dag dpal ldan g-yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yis ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o /
T02TD1346E:82a-9: 15 / lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i thub pa phyag na 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1346E:82a-10: spyan ma dang ni rnam par sel ba rab mchog mi yi bdag po rengs byed dri yi rdo rje ma //
T02TD1346E:82a-11: 'od zer can dang dbang mo brgya byin dus kyi gdong pa dang bcas rje rigs klu la sogs pa kun //
T02TD1346E:82a-12: gtso bo yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rnams spros pa'o /
T02TD1346E:82a-13: 16 / gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1346E:82a-14: gtsug tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te nam mkha'i yon tan dbang gis phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzhan //
T02TD1346E:82a-15: gsang bar dag pa las ni mtha' dag bde mnyam ster rnams sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang //
T02TD1346E:82a-16: steng dang 'og tu yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru spros pa'o /
T02TD1346E:82a-17: 17 / phyogs kyi 'dab mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste //
T02TD1346E:82a-18: nyi ma'i steng du g-yon brkyang au ma dang bcas dbang phyug mnan zhing 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin dang mtshungs //
T02TD1346E:82a-19: thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba bcings shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang nyi ma'i phyag ldan he ru ka //
T02TD1346E:82a-20: phyag rgya sbrul dang stag gi pags pa mi bzad glang po'i bdag po'i pags pa rlon pa bshus pa 'dzin /
T02TD1346E:82b-0: 18 / gnag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyi phyi @82b rol du ni 'khor lo gsum //
T02TD1346E:82b-1: rdo rje drug ni khro bo las skyes phyag gnyis zla zhal rnams dang de bzhin 'byung po skyes rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:82b-2: sgor ni gtum mo ro la gnas shing phyag na gri gug thod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro //
T02TD1346E:82b-3: dpa' bo rnams kyis rig byed phyag na rdo rje da ma du dang dril bu rdo rje kha tv'am ga /
T02TD1346E:82b-4: 19 / dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun te //
T02TD1346E:82b-5: zhing dang tshan [?] po ha dang 'dus pa can dang dur khrod sa ni me dang rlung gi dbus su yang //
T02TD1346E:82b-6: de bzhin yul dang grong khyer la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba ste //
T02TD1346E:82b-7: shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsum gyi bla mas shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o /
T02TD1346E:82b-8: 20 / snying por 'khor lo cha dgu pa ste dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha shas zla nyi padma la //
T02TD1346E:82b-9: rdo rje ka ba'i phreng ba dag gis spras pa yang ni phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po //
T02TD1346E:82b-10: phyi rol du ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la yul dang yul can zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la gnas //
T02TD1346E:82b-11: sgo skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni kha khyer dag la kun nas so /
T02TD1346E:82b-12: 21 /'di la sogs pa la ni de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa ste //
T02TD1346E:82b-13: zur du khro bo rnams dang logs su yul dang yul can jam bha la ni phyag na so ba bsnams //
T02TD1346E:82b-14: ngag dang rkang lag bshang lam bha ga nyi ma ri bong can rnams dus kyi rtsa yi rang bzhin te //
T02TD1346E:82b-15: shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g-yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o /
T02TD1346E:82b-16: 22 / snying por 'khor lo chu gter zung du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor las ni gsum gyi cha //
T02TD1346E:82b-17: phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'phar ma gzhan la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad //
T02TD1346E:82b-18: phyi rol du gnas dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs bcur bkod pa nyi ma la gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te //
T02TD1346E:82b-19: der ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la chu gter gyis bsnun byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag rnams /
T02TD1346E:82b-20: 23 / sgyu 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum ste zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni lha yi sku yi dbye ba las //
T02TD1346E:83a-1: yin mtha' dag blun po'i snying gi dbang gis g-yon gyi zhal nas spros pa'o //
T02TD1346E:83a-2: rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir ni nyis 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi //
T02TD1346E:83a-3: 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug mi bdag dur khrod sa rnams kyis ni nub kyi zhal nas spros pa'o /
T02TD1346E:83a-4: 24 / thig ni drug dang bug pa'i cha shas g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thig btab nas //
T02TD1346E:83a-5: snying po las ni drug drug cha rnams kyis te padma'i 'dab ma phyed kyis lte bar ldan pa yang //
T02TD1346E:83a-6: gri gug 'khor lo chu skyes rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:83a-7: nyi ma rnams kyis sgo dang sgo khyud dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang ni do shal sa /
T02TD1346E:83a-8: 25 / gsum gyis kyang ni ra ba lnga yi re kh'a rtse mo can gyis do shal rtsa bar snam bu'o //
T02TD1346E:83a-9: nyi ma rnams kyis logs dang 'gram ste sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du rta babs so //
T02TD1346E:83a-10: phyogs dang phyogs bral [?] dag tu sgo ni brgyad rnams bya ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum po'o //
T02TD1346E:83a-11: dbus su chu skyes sna tshogs mdog ste lte ba la ni nyi ma ri bong can dag sbyar ba'i gdan /
T02TD1346E:83a-12: 26 /'khor lo dang ni phreng ba sngon po [?] sa ni ljang gu dag dang sa gzhi nag po 'khor lo ser //
T02TD1346E:83a-13: sa gzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dang sa ni dkar po phreng bar bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang //
T02TD1346E:83a-14: sa ni ser po sngon po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang gu'i mdog tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:83a-15: cha drug gis ni mtshon gyi sa ste skyed byed zhal gyi dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:83a-16: 27 / phyi rol du ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad //
T02TD1346E:83a-17: 'dab ma la ni thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyad de 'dab ma brgyad la lha mo rnams //
T02TD1346E:83a-18: phyir ni sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas de bzhin /
T02TD1346E:83a-20: de yi phyi rol du ni sa chu me dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'o /
T02TD1346E:83a-21: 28 / ring po thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta pa ta tsa ka la sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams //
T02TD1346E:83b-0: rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis ring po sa sogs khams @83b kyi rang bzhin rnams //
T02TD1346E:83b-1: steng sogs rtsibs la zla ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis thung ngu rang rang 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi steng du'o //
T02TD1346E:83b-2: sgo dang sgo yi bar du ha ksha dang ldan nam mkha'i mthil na gnas pa'i sde par bcas pa rnams /
T02TD1346E:83b-3: 29 / mkha' 'gro ma rnams thung ba'i dngos po ri bong 'dzin pa'i zhal dang phyag ni gri gug thod pa can //
T02TD1346E:83b-4: g-yas pa brkyang zhing rang rang snod rnams kyis ni lha min khrag 'thung skra grol gos dang bral ba ste //
T02TD1346E:83b-5: rkang pa rked pa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag par g-yer ka sogs dang rus pa'i rgya //
T02TD1346E:83b-6: mgo dang rked pa'i ngos la thod pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog lnga yi phreng ba'o /
T02TD1346E:83b-7: 30 / mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje mchog dang da ma ru dang rdo rje kha tv'am ga dril bu //
T02TD1346E:83b-8: mgrin pa dpal ldan mgo phreng mgo bor cod pan la yang rdo rje dar dbyangs dang ni nor bu'o //
T02TD1346E:83b-9: dpal ldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdub phyag la phyag gdub dang ni ska rags dag dang rna rgyan te //
T02TD1346E:83b-10: rdzogs pa'i thod pa rnams kyi phreng ba mche ba can gyi mtha' dag lus la gnas dang thal ba'i rgya /
T02TD1346E:83b-11: 31 / gtso bo'i dbu la thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgya rnams kyis mgo yi phreng ba'o //
T02TD1346E:83b-12: zla phyed rdo rje'i cod pan la ste rang gi rked dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i pags pa'o //
T02TD1346E:83b-13: zla nyi bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang ldan lus la thal ba ste //
T02TD1346E:83b-14: phyag rgya klu yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma la 'o dag byed /
T02TD1346E:83b-15: 32 / phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pa da ma ru dang rdo rje kha tv'am ga nyid de //
T02TD1346E:83b-16: bshang gci khrag dang mi sha rnams kyis phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang phyag na'o //
T02TD1346E:83b-17: de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyi ga bde la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1346E:83b-18: ser dang dkar po dmar po'i mdog dang nag po ljang gu'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang phyogs su /
T02TD1346E:83b-19: 33 / rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtshan ma rnams ni sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi tshogs //
T02TD1346E:83b-20: phan tshun du ni 'khyud pa dag kyang rang gzhan rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste kun nas so //
T02TD1346E:84a-1: phung po 'byung ba yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang bo lnga la sogs pa dang //
T02TD1346E:84a-2: phyogs sa phyogs kyi stobs dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar bya /
T02TD1346E:84a-3: 34 / lhun po'i phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyi phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang //
T02TD1346E:84a-4: zhing dang tshan [?] do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi phyed kyi mtshams su ste //
T02TD1346E:84a-5: 'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang //
T02TD1346E:84a-6: nus dang gtso bo nyin gcig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las /
T02TD1346E:84a-7: 35 / rgyab tu lha mo dbang byed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te //
T02TD1346E:84a-8: rlung dang dbang ldan lha min me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gnod sbyin nub tu yang //
T02TD1346E:84a-9: gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la //
T02TD1346E:84a-10: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'og dang steng du nyin zhag so so'i chu srin nas ni dus sbyor gnyis gnyis bar /
T02TD1346E:84a-11: 36 / gtso bo'i chu skyes rdo rje kun dang 'gyur med thig le rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu la gnas pa //
T02TD1346E:84a-12: kun nas dga' ba thams cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas te dus ni thams cad do //
T02TD1346E:84a-13: zla ba zhu ba bla ma'i zhal de ru ni gang zhig zhugs pa dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid de //
T02TD1346E:84a-14: bdud rnams kyi ni dus su gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'di dag go /
T02TD1346E:84a-15: 37 / shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag gis gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro'i ming //
T02TD1346E:84a-16: rdo rje gsum po rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thog ma dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba bzlas bya ste //
T02TD1346E:84a-17: srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang rang las kyi rjes mthun pa'o //
T02TD1346E:84a-18: ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:84a-19: 38 / dbugs rnams gang dag skye ba'i dus su dbu ma la ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mngar gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:84a-20: de brgyad rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha' yi dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams //
T02TD1346E:84b-0: @84b rkang pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag na gri gug dang ni thod pa can //
T02TD1346E:84b-1: bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du g-yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o /
T02TD1346E:84b-2: 39 / lnga gsum me lce yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gter rkang pa las //
T02TD1346E:84b-3: gza' bdun dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:84b-4: nag po dkar po'i rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan rnams dang //
T02TD1346E:84b-5: 'di nyid la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnams so /
T02TD1346E:84b-6: 40 / zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ni padma'i 'dab ma sgo bzhi zur gyi ro rnams te //
T02TD1346E:84b-7: slar yang rkang pa nyis 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan rnams nyid //
T02TD1346E:84b-8: rdzogs pa gza' dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la chu gter rkang pa gdan rnams te //
T02TD1346E:84b-9: nyi ma'am ni gang ba'i zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yang na kha sbyor la /
T02TD1346E:84b-10: 41 / rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni yon tan gzhan gyis dbang gis rgyas gdab zhal ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1346E:84b-11: rtse mo can la gzugs dang reg bya'i zhal ni gnyis su 'gyur te rgyas gdab zhal ni gsum pa'o //
T02TD1346E:84b-12: chu la zhal yang reg bya dang ni gzugs dang ro yi zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1346E:84b-13: sa la dri la sogs pa reg bya'i mtha' yi yon tan zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni lnga pa'o /
T02TD1346E:84b-14: 42 / nam mkha' la ni zhal yang stong pa rnam pa lnga ste rgya yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o //
T02TD1346E:84b-15: de bzhin du ni ye shes khams la 'gyur te yon tan dbang las stong pa drug gi zhal rnams so //
T02TD1346E:84b-16: gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsres pa lnga //
T02TD1346E:84b-17: shes rab thabs ni zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa bzhi /
T02TD1346E:84b-18: 43 / thun mtshams dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ste rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbye bas kha dog gsum //
T02TD1346E:84b-19: dus sbyor phyed pa phyag gi dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni //
T02TD1346E:85a-0: thun mtshams cha shas snga phyi las te @85a * //
T02TD1346E:85a-1: zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni 'khyud pa dbu ma'i cha shas la //
T02TD1346E:85a-2: shes rab sbyor dang snyoms par zhugs pa dag kyang dgod pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtshams la'o /
T02TD1346E:85a-3: 44 / shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po la ni nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug / rdo rje can gyi g-yon mdun yan lag dkar dang sprin nag mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsam pa'o //
T02TD1346E:85a-4: mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas phye ba g-yon dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:85a-5: drag po g-yas dang rgyab kyi yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas phye ba de bzhin nyid /
T02TD1346E:85a-6: 45 / shes rab kyis phye rgyal ba dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:85a-7: shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs nyid de //
T02TD1346E:85a-8: g-yas dang g-yas min nyi ma dang ni ri bong can gyi sku dag zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang //
T02TD1346E:85a-9: nag po ser po dag ste sngon po ljang gu dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa 'og yang dag gnas /
T02TD1346E:85a-10: 46 / dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar mo dmar po rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:85a-11: ser po rnams kyi kha dog cag mo dkar min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD1346E:85a-12: sngon po rnams kyi kha dog sna tshogs slar yang ljang gu rnams kyi sngon mo rnams su de bzhin gsungs //
T02TD1346E:85a-13: de bzhin [?] des par lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:85a-14: 47 / shes rab rgyud ni shar nas slar yang rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal nas so //
T02TD1346E:85a-15: g-yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g-yon gyi zhal nas bya ba la sogs so //
T02TD1346E:85a-16: shar nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas nges par dbu ma mtha' dag go //
T02TD1346E:85a-17: mdo sde pa ni g-yas kyi zhal nas gsungs te dkar po'i zhal nas dag pa'i bye brag smra ba'o /
T02TD1346E:85a-18: 48 / nub kyi zhal nas nges brjod rig byed dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang pos g-yon gyi zhal nas mchod sbyin gsungs //
T02TD1346E:85b-0: g-yas kyi zhal nas snyan tshig rig byed mchog gi bsreg bya'i rigs la srid srung @85b shar gyi zhal nas so //
T02TD1346E:85b-1: shar gyi zhal nas rigs can rgyud de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas mkha' lding dang ni 'byung po'i rgyud //
T02TD1346E:85b-2: g-yon gyi zhal nas zhi ba'i mtha' ste nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs g-yas pa nas ni khyab 'jug chos /
T02TD1346E:85b-3: 49 / rgyab nas 'phral la ldog pa mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas g-yon gyi lha dang rab tu gnas pa ste //
T02TD1346E:85b-4: g-yas nas rig pa drag po min dang slar yang rlung gi zhal nas rlung skyes tshangs pa zhi ba dag / stong pa'i zhal nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spros //
T02TD1346E:85b-5: rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan pa rtsod dus rgyab kyi zhal la sogs pa'i dbye ba las /
T02TD1346E:85b-6: 50 / de bzhin dpa' bo'i rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis thun mtshams bzhi po nyid dag dang //
T02TD1346E:85b-7: kha zas dag ni g-yas kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang rgyab kyi zhal nas spros pa ste //
T02TD1346E:85b-8: mdun gyi zhal nas 'khrig pa nyid do mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po rmi lam dag dang gnyid //
T02TD1346E:85b-9: rgyab nas rje rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin dmangs rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:85b-10: 51 / rgyal ba'i bdag pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te g-yas nas mang pos bkur ba'o //
T02TD1346E:85b-11: rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan pa ste slar yang dge 'dun phal chen pa ni g-yon gyi zhal nas so //
T02TD1346E:85b-12: mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams dang ni slar yang rgyab kyi zhal nas dud 'gro rnams ni nges par spros //
T02TD1346E:85b-13: g-yas kyi zhal nas 'byung po lha rnams mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas dmyal ba rnams dang lha min rnams /
T02TD1346E:85b-14: 52 / mdun gyi zhal nas spros pa dag kyang snying ga'i 'khor lo nas 'gyur rgyab zhal lte ba'i 'khor lo nas //
T02TD1346E:85b-15: g-yas kyi zhal nas longs spyod rdzogs pa nas 'gyur kun tu g-yon gyi zhal nas lhan cig skyes pa nas //
T02TD1346E:85b-16: 'khor lo rnams kyi zhal gyi dbus nas lus la dngos po spro ba dang mi sdud pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:85b-17: 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang rgyal ba skyed byed zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis yang dag go /
T02TD1346E:85b-18: 53 / dpal ldan zla ba zla ba chu shel rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin las ni chu 'byung ba //
T02TD1346E:86a-0: @86a * // de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po la brten thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos 'dzag ste //
T02TD1346E:86a-1: chu ni sa bon khams la kun tu brten nas ro mnyam 'gyur ba ji bzhin nyid du chos dag ni //
T02TD1346E:86a-2: sems can rnams kyi dag pa'i sems kyis rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu las so /
T02TD1346E:86a-3: 54 / srid gsum gnas na sems can don gyi byed po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu la yang bsam pa med //
T02TD1346E:86a-4: sems la gnas te mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste //
T02TD1346E:86a-5: yid bzhin nor bu'i skyon min mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad rab tu spyod //
T02TD1346E:86a-6: sems ni dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
T02TD1346E:86a-7: 55 / gang gis myu gu 'di skyed skyed par byed pa de ni dngos po skyes nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:86a-8: nyams pa de yis skyes par rab tu 'gyur te slar yang sa bon rgyal po dag gi skyed byed do //
T02TD1346E:86a-9: snga ma gang de gzhan gyi dngos las shi ba zhes pa'i tshig ste rang gi ngo bos skyes pa min //
T02TD1346E:86a-10: gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcu 'gro bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:86a-11: 56 / bde nas bde la rjes chags skad cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po gzhan la rjes su chags pa min //
T02TD1346E:86a-12: phung po gang dag de yis bskyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig de yis skyed par byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:86a-13: dag pa las chos de las gzhan te slar yang de las gzhan dang de las rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1346E:86a-14: dag pa'i sa la sa bon btab pa las ni rtsa ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin /
T02TD1346E:86a-15: 57 / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro ste phra rab dag ni rnam pa drug / dri la sogs pa re res dman zhing yul dang rnam par bral ba mtha' ma ye shes blta bya rnams //
T02TD1346E:86a-16: 'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang zung dang ri bong can te mtha' ma chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD1346E:86a-17: rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas rtag tu 'pho med bde ba lhan skyes rten du gyur pa'o /
T02TD1346E:86a-18: 58 / slar yang sa sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos po dag la chung pa'i dngos rnams gnas //
T02TD1346E:86b-0: phan tshun phung po 'byung ba @86b dang ni yul dang yul can rnams dang phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa //
T02TD1346E:86b-1: phan tshun rjes chags lnga ni ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gi //
T02TD1346E:86b-2: rnam pa thams cad pa rnams kun nas gzhan gyi yon tan mi dga' mi phyed rdo rje yang dag gnas /
T02TD1346E:86b-3: 59 / de dag rnams kyi dus kyi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul rab tu gsal byed chen po du ma sprul pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:86b-4: rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa lha min dang ni mi rnams dang //
T02TD1346E:86b-5: longs spyod rdzogs pas gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis //
T02TD1346E:86b-6: stong pa'i cha yis srid gsum mtha' dag stong pa'i zad par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad par te /
T02TD1346E:86b-7: 60 / me yi cha shas rnams kyis me yi zad par chu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi cha rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:86b-8: 'dzin ma'i cha shas rnams kyis sa yi zad par tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kun //
T02TD1346E:86b-9: kun nas nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa la ston par byed //
T02TD1346E:86b-10: de ltar sangs rgyas skur 'gyur bde ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyir na 'chi bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro /
T02TD1346E:86b-11: 61 / de gcig pu las rnam pa lnga ste mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis ni mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di //
T02TD1346E:86b-12: rnam pa nyi shu'i rang bzhin dang ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul du ma'i rang gi ngo bo'o //
T02TD1346E:86b-13: de yi skad cig gcig ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te las gzhan gyi ni rang bzhin min //
T02TD1346E:86b-14: 'dir thabs 'pho med skad cig gang yin 'dir ni lhan skyes chos kyi dbyings su rab tu zhugs pa la'o /
T02TD1346E:86b-15: 62 / mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med yon tan rnams dang nam mkha' la sogs khams rnams dang //
T02TD1346E:86b-16: gnas dang skye dang nyams pa rnam gsum zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug tu sems can kun //
T02TD1346E:86b-17: sangs rgyas khro bo lha sogs rnams dang snying rje'i thugs ldan byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams te //
T02TD1346E:86b-18: 'di dag rnams ni srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba bde 'byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin no /
T02TD1346E:87a-0: 63 / spu dang pags pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin rus pa dang @87a * //
T02TD1346E:87a-2: de dag rnams la srog sogs rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'o //
T02TD1346E:87a-3: zla ba'i dbus su dri med nor bu bzhin du dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa ste //
T02TD1346E:87a-4: de ni dngos dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i go 'phang khyab byed gzhom med do /
T02TD1346E:87a-5: 64 / spu la sogs pa zla ba'i mtha' ni mtha' dag lus la gnas rnams gang zhig sa bcur gsungs pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:87a-6: sde pa drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams de dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster //
T02TD1346E:87a-7: de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni thar pa'i slad du btsal bar bya //
T02TD1346E:87a-8: lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min /
T02TD1346E:87a-9: 65 / sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po gzhan 'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin //
T02TD1346E:87a-10: de rnams mnyes par byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod par byed de rnam par mi rtog pa las so //
T02TD1346E:87a-11: rnal 'byor pa ni 'khu bar byed na dmyal ba du 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' ru 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:87a-12: de phyir sems ni dag pa na yang mkhas dang mi mkhas skye bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o /
T02TD1346E:87a-13: 66 / sems can dag dang 'grogs pa thob nas mi yi bdag po dag pa'i byams pa la sogs sems su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:87a-14: mi dge'i yon tan dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drug po rnams kyi zhe sdang chags sogs sems su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:87a-15: dus kun tu ni byang chub sems kyang 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:87a-16: thar par 'jug pas dman zhing smod pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni thams cad dus su bdud kyi sems /
T02TD1346E:87a-17: 67 / srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams zhi ba min pa dang ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba byed //
T02TD1346E:87a-18: bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog tu 'jigs byed yin te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan //
T02TD1346E:87b-0: bdud rnams kyi ni bdud kyi blo dang skyob pa rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gros gzhan gyi snying la 'jug / de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni srid pa gsum po mtha' dag mtha' yas dus su 'jug @87b par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:87b-1: 68 / rgyal ba rnams kyis 'jig rten khams la tshad gsungs gang yin de yang mi rnams ye shes nyid ma yin //
T02TD1346E:87b-2: sangs rgyas rnams la lhan skyes lus kyi dbang gis khru ni gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad med de //
T02TD1346E:87b-3: las kyi sar ni srog chags rnams la sems can rjes mthun tshad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02TD1346E:87b-4: gal te tshad 'di bdag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams kyis 'di med pa pa zhes brjod par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:87b-5: 69 / gang gi rgyal ba'i dbang po skyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis mngal nas nges par 'byung //
T02TD1346E:87b-6: skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam par bral ba grub cing g-yo ba g-yo ba med gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:87b-7: sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa gzhan dag gang zhig sgom byed pa //
T02TD1346E:87b-8: de yi bskal pa bye ba du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan skyes bde ba dag kyang ring /
T02TD1346E:87b-10: 70 / nim pa'i shing las rgun 'brum min te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pa'i shing las 'dam skyes dang //
T02TD1346E:87b-11: stong pa las ni myang 'das bde ba mi dge'i dbang las dge ba srog chags gsod las grub pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:87b-12: mchod sbyin dag las phyugs rnams mtho ris mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang dbang po rnams ni 'gog las min //
T02TD1346E:87b-13: rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba g-yo med 'gyur ba ma dag sems las min /
T02TD1346E:87b-14: 71 / sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni mi yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:87b-15: bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1346E:87b-16: gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshig dbang gis bdud dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed pa //
T02TD1346E:87b-17: de phyir bdud rnams nyi ma so so'i dus su de dag rnams la du ma yis ni bgegs rnams byed /
T02TD1346E:87b-18: 72 / rgyal ba'i lhan skyes bde ba 'di ni 'phel ba'i don slad dang por las kyi phyag rgya bsten par bya //
T02TD1346E:87b-19: de nas nyi ma'i gzugs ni lus dang gdong dang rkang pa gtsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ste //
T02TD1346E:88a-0: glog gi dbyug pa'i rjes mthun 'pho med bde ba skyed par byed ma @88a * //
T02TD1346E:88a-1: mtshan nyid yan lag rab tu rdzogs //
T02TD1346E:88a-2: rdo rje rnams kyis rab ru snang bar byed ma srid gsum gnas lus chos kyi dbyings ni de nas 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:88a-3: 73 /'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster phyag rgya bzhi po 'di rnams grong dang 'brog dgon dur khrod dang //
T02TD1346E:88a-4: mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yi khang pa thams cad du ni dus kun tu //
T02TD1346E:88a-5: shin tu dga' ba'i dga' ba la gnas 'jig rten lam las rab grol rigs dang rigs min mngon spyod cing //
T02TD1346E:88a-6: lus stobs bde ster bza' ba btung ba la sogs longs spyod dang ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:88a-7: 74 / rlung ni yang dag phrad pa rnams kyis glog gi me yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu bar byed //
T02TD1346E:88a-8: thig le gang gang zhu ba 'di las mgrin pa snying ga la son lte ba gsang ba dag la 'gog / thig le las ni g-yo ba'i khu ba rdo rje nor bu la gnas rgyal mtshan rtse la 'gog pa gang //
T02TD1346E:88a-9: de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig gal te thig le'i phreng ba 'pho ba med pas bde ster na'o /
T02TD1346E:88a-10: 75 / de phyir g-yo med bde ba'i skad cig lhan cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyis ster byed do //
T02TD1346E:88a-11: srog gis ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas ;
T02TD1346E:88a-12: / rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen sa dang srid gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba 'di las te //
T02TD1346E:88a-13: gal te lam du rab zhugs shi bar 'gyur na de tshe de yi 'dzin pas skye ba gzhan la'o /
T02TD1346E:88a-14: 76 / gang zhig yon tan med cing dngos chung yul dang rnam bral de ni sku yi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis /
T02TD1346E:88a-15: de nas chags pa rjes chags dang ni yon tan gter gzhan dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis //
T02TD1346E:88a-16: gnag dang dkar la rjes chags yul gyi yon tan la dga' thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te //
T02TD1346E:88a-17: brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar mkha' dus dang ni stong pa rig byed dag gi lo /
T02TD1346E:88a-18: 77 / rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du rgyal ba mchog skyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1346E:88a-19: rin chen dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su mtha' dag yon tan gter gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas //
T02TD1346E:88b-0: sangs rgyas byin brlabs sngags rnams @88b kyis ni gsang ba'i padmar bde mnyam sngags dang bcas pa spro bya ste //
T02TD1346E:88b-1: gsang bar bsrung ba rab tu byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang bar bya /
T02TD1346E:88b-2: 78 / de la gang zhig bu ru gyur pa rgyal ba skyed byed sras po de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1346E:88b-3: shes rab lhag pa las ni 'ga' zhig tshe na bu mor 'gyur te nges par sangs rgyas yum du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:88b-4: de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyi padma dkar 'dzin dzam bha la dang phyag na rdo rje ste //
T02TD1346E:88b-5: me tog brgyad kyis gzhan brgyad phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas rdzu 'phrul tshad ldan khro bo'i rgyal po rnams /
T02TD1346E:88b-6: 79 / zla ba de la rdul gang rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu skyed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:88b-7: lo ni nyi shu dag gi bar du so so'i rdul la byang chub sems dpa' snying stobs chen po ste //
T02TD1346E:88b-8: de nas stong pa dang ni rig byed bar du cung zad snying stobs cha shas dman par rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:88b-9: slar yang lo ni nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus chung ba'o /
T02TD1346E:88b-10: 80 / de nas skye gnas la ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'o de nyams pa las dbang ma yin //
T02TD1346E:88b-11: 'on kyang sa bon nyams pa la ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i dbang po'i gsung gis sbyin par bya //
T02TD1346E:88b-12: de dag rnams kyi sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gis btsal bar bya //
T02TD1346E:88b-13: byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras bu mang por 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:88b-14: 81 / gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste //
