T02TD1346E:88b-15: skyugs pa snying ga gsang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes nang du rab zhugs min //
T02TD1346E:88b-16: bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyugs pa'i dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste //
T02TD1346E:88b-17: 'di dag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsi srid pa gsum gyi bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun tu bstan /
T02TD1346E:88b-18: 82 / shes rab chos 'byung la ni gang zhig lhung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1346E:88b-19: de yis sems can gang dag su zhig byung ba de ni rgyal ba'i rigs la byang chub sems dpa' nyid //
T02TD1346E:89a-0: de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su bdud kyi pho nya srin po rnams kyis za ru 'jug / shes rab me tog dang ldan zos pa zhi ba @89a * //
T02TD1346E:89a-1: bde ba'i 'bras bu ster bar ston du 'jug par byed /
T02TD1346E:89a-2: 83 / mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma 'khums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya //
T02TD1346E:89a-3: gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe [?] na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:89a-4: rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying gar ye shes 'khor lo rab bcug ste //
T02TD1346E:89a-5: 'di yis 'od zer rnams kyis gnyi ga'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed /
T02TD1346E:89a-6: 84 / gal te 'di ni grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor bu la ni yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya //
T02TD1346E:89a-7: shes rab kyi ni chos 'byung gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya //
T02TD1346E:89a-8: shes rab ldan pa la'o de nas gcig pu la ste slar yang gsung ni rab gsungs sangs rgyas sku //
T02TD1346E:89a-9: gang su 'di ni nyams la mngon par dga' byed g-yon can de ni rdo rje can gyis gsod par byed /
T02TD1346E:89a-10: 85 / srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang //
T02TD1346E:89a-11: de dag thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa skyed byed srog chags rnams la nam yang ma yin no //
T02TD1346E:89a-12: gang zhig dran pa rnams kyi byed po g-yul gyi yul la dga' zhing gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa //
T02TD1346E:89a-13: de rnams la ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung ba'i don du de dag sbyar bar bya /
T02TD1346E:89a-14: 86 / mkha' 'gro rdo rje sngon rnams phyugs kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas pa yis gsol ba gdab mi bya //
T02TD1346E:89a-15: sems can rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas 'jig rten khams su spros pa ste //
T02TD1346E:89a-16: de phyir de rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su srung bar byed cing sgrub pa po la sdang bar byed //
T02TD1346E:89a-17: bsgrub bya dag ni las kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yin no /
T02TD1346E:89a-18: 87 / skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis phran tshegs rig pa la rjes chags //
T02TD1346E:89a-19: rig pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o //
T02TD1346E:89a-20: zhes pa'i bsam pa brkam chags sems kyi ye shes sbyin pa rnam par spangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug / rgyab tu rdzas dang rang gi khyim thab gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur kye [?] ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug 88 /
T02TD1346E:89b-0: @89b shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:89b-1: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba las //
T02TD1346E:89b-2: 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan lta bu sems can du ma'i don ni byed pa po //
T02TD1346E:89b-3: sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:89b-4: 89 / rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa he ru kar [?] ni byung bar gyur //
T02TD1346E:89b-5: gdug pa rnams ni smin pa'i don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don //
T02TD1346E:89b-6: rin chen dbang po sdug bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de yang pad 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad //
T02TD1346E:89b-7: bgegs rnams dag ni gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi padma ral gri don yod grub par byung bar gyur /
T02TD1346E:89b-8: 90 / zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum gang dus mtha'i rtse mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' 'go mar byung gyur //
T02TD1346E:89b-9: gti mug dag las spyan ma zhes bya mchog gi snying rje m'a ma k'i ni nga rgyal rgyu las so //
T02TD1346E:89b-10: chags las de ni gos dkar zhes bya mtha' dag yon tan gter te sgrol ma yang ni phrag dog las //
T02TD1346E:89b-11: sna tshogs gzugs can gnyis po 'di dag g-yul dang yul can gzhan rnams thams cad du yang byung bar gyur /
T02TD1346E:89b-12: 91 / phung po lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga rnams la bzhugs pa brtse ba yis //
T02TD1346E:89b-13: nges pa rnam par ma bsgrubs bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni smin pa'i don du ste //
T02TD1346E:89b-14: gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slad du'o //
T02TD1346E:89b-15: gang zhig ae wam yi ge la gnas mchog gi nges pa can rnams mchog la dgod pa'i don du'o /
T02TD1346E:89b-16: 92 / sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun tu //
T02TD1346E:89b-17: nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang gzhan du yang ni rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:89b-18: phyi rol sna tshogs phyogs su 'gyur te mchog gi lus la srog gi rlung ni rab tu rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1346E:89b-19: khyab bdag gi ni sa sogs dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la /
T02TD1346E:90a-1: gang zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med pa yang zhan ni de bzhin kho na'o //
T02TD1346E:90a-2: gang zhig ae wam yi ge la gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1346E:90a-3: gcig pu rdo rje can ni dbye ba gsum ste yul dang yul can khams rnams kyis kyang bskor ba'o //
T02TD1346E:90a-4: dus gsum gnas gsum du bzhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi slad du'o /
T02TD1346E:90a-5: 94 / rgyud rnams dag las 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste //
T02TD1346E:90a-6: rdo rje can ni zla ba zhu las rdo rje gang zhig spyi mgrin snying ga'i chu skyes lte gsang dang //
T02TD1346E:90a-7: bud med rnams kyi bha gar de ni thig le grol ba gsum gyis mchog gi padma la gnas pa //
T02TD1346E:90a-8: de 'dir sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:90a-9: 95 / skye ba snga mar rang gi snying gis bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni //
T02TD1346E:90a-10: bag chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig ni du mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang gis so //
T02TD1346E:90a-11: don gcig du ma'i skad ni rang rang dngos po rnams kyi [?] sa srog chags rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug / gnas can rnams kyi bsod nams slad du 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms la ni rnam par rgyu ru gshegs /
T02TD1346E:90a-12: 96 / dud 'gro yi dags lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la //
T02TD1346E:90a-13: byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden pa'i chos ni gsung byed cing //
T02TD1346E:90a-14: rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po mtshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa //
T02TD1346E:90a-15: 'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin no /
T02TD1346E:90a-16: 97 / sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni //
T02TD1346E:90a-17: srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed de brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o //
T02TD1346E:90a-18: sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab zhugs pa //
T02TD1346E:90a-19: 'di ni ma skyes chos te chu la nam mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o /
T02TD1346E:90b-0: 98 / @90b rgyal ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyi bgrod bya min pa rnam pa thams cad pa //
T02TD1346E:90b-1: gsung gi rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1346E:90b-2: rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag sa la gnas //
T02TD1346E:90b-3: dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o /
T02TD1346E:90b-4: 99 / sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs //
T02TD1346E:90b-5: de dag rnams kyi thabs ni dag pa mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams //
T02TD1346E:90b-6: bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams //
T02TD1346E:90b-7: phyag rgya drug rnams stong pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o /
T02TD1346E:90b-8: 100 /'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang ba zhes pa bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni //
T02TD1346E:90b-9: padma'o nyon mongs zad pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o //
T02TD1346E:90b-10: mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa //
T02TD1346E:90b-11: phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:90b-12: 101 / gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs //
T02TD1346E:90b-13: gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste //
T02TD1346E:90b-14: gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o //
T02TD1346E:90b-15: gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na'o /
T02TD1346E:90b-16: 102 / gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs //
T02TD1346E:90b-17: gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid //
T02TD1346E:90b-18: 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams //
T02TD1346E:90b-19: gzhan gyi khams drug dbye ba rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams /
T02TD1346E:91a-0: 103 / gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa @91a * //
T02TD1346E:91a-1: nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o //
T02TD1346E:91a-2: gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa m'a ma k'i ste de ni chu nyid do //
T02TD1346E:91a-3: gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa gos dkar mo ste de ni me yin no //
T02TD1346E:91a-4: gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma yin te de ni rlung yang ngo /
T02TD1346E:91a-5: 104 / gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha' //
T02TD1346E:91a-6: gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do //
T02TD1346E:91a-7: mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig / ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o /
T02TD1346E:91a-8: 105 / mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po //
T02TD1346E:91a-9: rang gis zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni lce //
T02TD1346E:91a-10: rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste //
T02TD1346E:91a-11: thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di yi chos /
T02TD1346E:91a-12: 106 / dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:91a-13: gzugs la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni //
T02TD1346E:91a-14: dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste //
T02TD1346E:91a-15: khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min /
T02TD1346E:91a-17: 107 / ye shes dgug par byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis //
T02TD1346E:91a-18: rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang //
T02TD1346E:91a-19: ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo ro ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:91a-20: de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o /
T02TD1346E:91a-21: 108 / srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:91b-0: bcing ba khro bo mi g-yo dus @91b mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab //
T02TD1346E:91b-1: 'dod pas de yis brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so //
T02TD1346E:91b-2: gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ;
T02TD1346E:91b-3: 109 / yi dags rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsa rtsi k'a la sogs pa spros par gyur pa ste //
T02TD1346E:91b-4: skye bo rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du //
T02TD1346E:91b-5: klu rnams smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros //
T02TD1346E:91b-6: lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spros /
T02TD1346E:91b-7: 110 / gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar //
T02TD1346E:91b-8: sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:91b-9: de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste //
T02TD1346E:91b-10: 'di ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o /
T02TD1346E:91b-11: 111 / gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang //
T02TD1346E:91b-12: shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang //
T02TD1346E:91b-13: de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan //
T02TD1346E:91b-14: 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o /
T02TD1346E:91b-15: 112 / sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid //
T02TD1346E:91b-16: gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste //
T02TD1346E:91b-17: ye shes me lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing //
T02TD1346E:91b-18: lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed /
T02TD1346E:91b-19: 113 / shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:92a-1: ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa //
T02TD1346E:92a-2: de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste //
T02TD1346E:92a-3: sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o /
T02TD1346E:92a-4: 114 / nam mkha' kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzums rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis //
T02TD1346E:92a-5: stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang //
T02TD1346E:92a-6: 'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:92a-7: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
T02TD1346E:92a-8: 115 / nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste //
T02TD1346E:92a-9: re kh'a nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsa la mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o //
T02TD1346E:92a-10: de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni chu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te //
T02TD1346E:92a-11: rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rnam par bral ba dag go sems ni gzhan pa min pa nyid /
T02TD1346E:92a-12: 116 / gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'gog par rab bya ste //
T02TD1346E:92a-13: 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongs su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o //
T02TD1346E:92a-14: zla ba drug gi sdom brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:92a-15: chags dang chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo /
T02TD1346E:92a-16: 117 / ao tt'a 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes rnam shes dag gi dbus //
T02TD1346E:92a-17: gnyid dang gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje padma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang //
T02TD1346E:92a-18: de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med //
T02TD1346E:92a-19: nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o /
T02TD1346E:92a-20: 118 / sa yis rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir //
T02TD1346E:92b-0: me yi rnam pa me min g-yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g-yo @92b ba min pas rlung ma yin //
T02TD1346E:92b-1: stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min //
T02TD1346E:92b-2: rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so /
T02TD1346E:92b-3: 119 / n'a da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas su son pa lu gu rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa //
T02TD1346E:92b-4: srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pa padma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:92b-5: rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste //
T02TD1346E:92b-6: du ba la sogs rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya /
T02TD1346E:92b-7: 120 / dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g-yas dang g-yon la bcing //
T02TD1346E:92b-8: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang //
T02TD1346E:92b-9: padmar rdo rje'i sgra'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor [?] ba bde ba'i slad du ste //
T02TD1346E:92b-10: sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal /
T02TD1346E:92b-11: 121 / sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o //
T02TD1346E:92b-12: rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1346E:92b-13: rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku //
T02TD1346E:92b-14: ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o /
T02TD1346E:92b-15: 122 /'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do //
T02TD1346E:92b-16: 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni ao tt'a nyid //
T02TD1346E:92b-17: dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni //
T02TD1346E:92b-18: gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:92b-19: 123 /'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:92b-20: gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o //
T02TD1346E:93a-0: yi ge nyid ni dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs @93a * //
T02TD1346E:93a-1: dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le n'a da rim pa yis //
T02TD1346E:93a-2: bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o /
T02TD1346E:93a-3: 124 / sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T02TD1346E:93a-4: lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par dpyod cing g-yo med sems la zhen pa ste //
T02TD1346E:93a-5: ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:93a-6: sprul pa la sogs dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:93a-7: 125 / de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su ste //
T02TD1346E:93a-8: rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyi bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1346E:93a-9: thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang //
T02TD1346E:93a-10: de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya /
T02TD1346E:93a-11: 126 / gang phyir aa sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdan min zhing //
T02TD1346E:93a-12: h'um yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de //
T02TD1346E:93a-13: 'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni //
T02TD1346E:93a-14: rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o /
T02TD1346E:93a-15: 127 / li sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du 'gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:93a-16: phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste //
T02TD1346E:93a-17: dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams //
T02TD1346E:93a-18: slar yang thun mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab /
T02TD1346E:93a-19: 128 / de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs //
T02TD1346E:93b-0: ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya @93b nyid ;
T02TD1346E:93b-1: / dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
T02TD1346E:93b-2: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phyi rnams phyi ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la /
T02TD1346E:93b-3: 129 / slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
T02TD1346E:93b-4: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
T02TD1346E:93b-5: nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab //
T02TD1346E:93b-6: snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya /
T02TD1346E:93b-7: 130 / phyi rol du ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas //
T02TD1346E:93b-8: de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste //
T02TD1346E:93b-9: snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o //
T02TD1346E:93b-10: de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug 131 / zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste //
T02TD1346E:93b-11: thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis //
T02TD1346E:93b-12: sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la //
T02TD1346E:93b-13: gza' rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o /
T02TD1346E:93b-14: 132 / rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyed par mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs //
T02TD1346E:93b-15: zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:93b-16: gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mang [?] thun tshod longs spyod mtha' //
T02TD1346E:93b-17: lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o /
T02TD1346E:94a-0: 133 / spen par bug pa mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yi bla ma'i phyed bcas @94a * //
T02TD1346E:94a-2: phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes //
T02TD1346E:94a-3: sa skyes stong pa sprul zla nyi ma gza' lhag pa sangs mjug rings la yang stong pa sprul mkha' gcig / mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung /
T02TD1346E:94a-4: 134 / gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung //
T02TD1346E:94a-5: mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sprul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshod de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:94a-6: mkha' 'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma //
T02TD1346E:94a-7: de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag par byas nas de rnams bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:94a-8: 135 / ji srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las //
T02TD1346E:94a-9: de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci //
T02TD1346E:94a-10: pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la //
T02TD1346E:94a-11: sdig bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyi ma yin no /
T02TD1346E:94a-12: 136 / nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:94a-13: yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug rings za //
T02TD1346E:94a-14: thun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams //
T02TD1346E:94a-15: dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab par yan lag gsungs /
T02TD1346E:94a-16: 137 / yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par //
T02TD1346E:94a-17: de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar gzhan gang yin de rnams so //
T02TD1346E:94a-18: de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis gnyis dag las 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:94b-0: gang @94b du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o /
T02TD1346E:94b-1: 138 / zla ba drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel pa yan lag bcu gnyis kyis //
T02TD1346E:94b-2: drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1346E:94b-3: reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gi rkang pa de 'dzin no //
T02TD1346E:94b-4: nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster /
T02TD1346E:94b-5: 139 / sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes spen //
T02TD1346E:94b-6: sngags pa lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu //
T02TD1346E:94b-7: zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang //
T02TD1346E:94b-8: dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang gsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o /
T02TD1346E:94b-9: 140 / zhi la dkar po'i zhal te dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang ser mtshungs thun tshod lag pa las //
T02TD1346E:94b-10: rengs pa ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la //
T02TD1346E:94b-11: dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o //
T02TD1346E:94b-12: gsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bo la'o bskrad la gnag dang dkar 'dir sprul la mtshan mo'i mthar /
T02TD1346E:94b-13: 141 / sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min //
T02TD1346E:94b-14: 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni longs spyod sems par byed //
T02TD1346E:94b-15: sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed //
T02TD1346E:94b-16: gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no /
T02TD1346E:94b-17: 142 / dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gis de yang gsum grangs 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:94b-18: de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis chos zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang su ma 'gyur ni //
T02TD1346E:95a-1: 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams //
T02TD1346E:95a-2: chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs rnams so /
T02TD1346E:95a-3: 143 / gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste //
T02TD1346E:95a-4: de nas sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum //
T02TD1346E:95a-5: kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las //
T02TD1346E:95a-6: ji srid rig byed sprul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:95a-7: 144 /'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis //
T02TD1346E:95a-8: gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so //
T02TD1346E:95a-9: de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs //
T02TD1346E:95a-10: lha mo sangs rgyas mchi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o /
T02TD1346E:95a-11: 145 / gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang //
T02TD1346E:95a-12: de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
T02TD1346E:95a-13: gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
T02TD1346E:95a-14: de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shis la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so /
T02TD1346E:95a-15: 146 / gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni //
T02TD1346E:95a-16: snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra gcan gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste //
T02TD1346E:95a-17: de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di //
T02TD1346E:95a-18: brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul /
T02TD1346E:95a-19: 147 / dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa //
T02TD1346E:95b-0: mkha' 'gro @95b ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyam ste 'gro ba drug tu gnas //
T02TD1346E:95b-1: de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku //
T02TD1346E:95b-2: gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus kyi 'khor lo'o /
T02TD1346E:95b-3: 148 / dbugs ni bcad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te //
T02TD1346E:95b-4: thig le bkab par gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:95b-5: 'khor ba dag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
T02TD1346E:95b-6: spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa ma yin no /
T02TD1346E:95b-7: 149 / gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim 'gyur te //
T02TD1346E:95b-8: dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed //
T02TD1346E:95b-9: lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol du ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la //
T02TD1346E:95b-10: rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya /
T02TD1346E:95b-11: 150 / stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te //
T02TD1346E:95b-12: stong pa nam mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lhag ma rnams kyis nam gru'o //
T02TD1346E:95b-13: rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mtsho mig gis der ni sgra gcan 'jug / rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' dus dus kyi lha yi blon po 'jug 151 / nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sprul dang mig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste //
T02TD1346E:96a-0: mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug / mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der @96a * //
T02TD1346E:96a-2: de yi dus su rgyal po'i 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:96a-3: 152 / de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:96a-4: gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mda' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsa //
T02TD1346E:96a-5: bug pa zhes bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o //
T02TD1346E:96a-6: de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams dag tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:96a-7: 153 / gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa'i phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang //
T02TD1346E:96a-8: lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsa ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams //
T02TD1346E:96a-9: zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyi rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dad //
T02TD1346E:96a-10: brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams /
T02TD1346E:96a-11: 154 / gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams //
T02TD1346E:96a-12: brgyad cu rtsa gcig mtha' ma rab gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te //
T02TD1346E:96a-13: de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing //
T02TD1346E:96a-14: gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi skyed ma rdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis longs spyod do /
T02TD1346E:96a-16: 155 / dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:96a-17: khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste //
T02TD1346E:96a-18: sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab zhugs pa //
T02TD1346E:96a-19: rig ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor ba yis btsal bar bya /
T02TD1346E:96a-20: 156 / gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:96b-0: de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa @96b shes par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:96b-1: shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:96b-2: shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:96b-3: 157 / shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:96b-4: lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong ba dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:96b-5: lha yi rna ba dag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:96b-6: de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:96b-7: 158 / rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshang ba khu ba 'bab pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:96b-8: srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha' ma sangs rgyas zhal //
T02TD1346E:96b-9: rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang //
T02TD1346E:96b-10: thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes pa min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang /
T02TD1346E:96b-11: 159 / srog dang thur sel 'gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:96b-12: rdo rje padmas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed //
T02TD1346E:96b-13: rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:96b-14: de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin /
T02TD1346E:96b-15: 160 / zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa nyid //
T02TD1346E:96b-16: thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1346E:96b-17: phyogs zad zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar //
T02TD1346E:96b-18: srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go /
T02TD1346E:97a-0: 161 / zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po @97a * //
T02TD1346E:97a-1: 'gag / chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1346E:97a-2: dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid pa la gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:97a-3: de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro /
T02TD1346E:97a-4: 162 / khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs //
T02TD1346E:97a-5: rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:97a-6: de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:97a-7: rin po che'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyis sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:97a-8: 163 / lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:97a-9: sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang //
T02TD1346E:97a-10: skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste //
T02TD1346E:97a-11: sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang zhig mi g-yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o /
T02TD1346E:97a-12: 164 / sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed //
T02TD1346E:97a-13: chu las sa me rlung phye rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste //
T02TD1346E:97a-14: rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la //
T02TD1346E:97a-15: rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis gang zhig las kyi rlung gis bsnun pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro /
T02TD1346E:97a-16: 165 / sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus las can min par srid gsum skyed par mdzad pas rnam par gzigs nas ni //
T02TD1346E:97a-17: gnyi ga ro mnyam dag pa'i rdul la sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste //
T02TD1346E:97a-18: so sor re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor //
T02TD1346E:97b-0: sa la sogs pa'i rdul la ma lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mi g-yo sogs la rab @97b zhugs rnams /
T02TD1346E:97b-1: 166 / de dag rnams dang thabs cig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi bar du mkha' la rnam par bzhugs //
T02TD1346E:97b-2: yang dag 'dzin par byed pas sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin rdul phran 'dzin //
T02TD1346E:97b-3: srub par byed pas tha dad rdul phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur gyi bar du srub par byed pa ste //
T02TD1346E:97b-4: slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnams so /
T02TD1346E:97b-5: 167 / dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed //
T02TD1346E:97b-6: 'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang khor yug ri bo chen po dag ni kun nas so //
T02TD1346E:97b-7: de yi dbus su las kyi sa ni chen po dag gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khams su rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:97b-8: lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang ba rnams /
T02TD1346E:97b-9: 168 / mtha' dag ri yi bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i aindra n'i la lho ni padma r'a ga ste //
T02TD1346E:97b-10: nub ni ka rke ta na ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla ba chu shel lo //
T02TD1346E:97b-11: dbus ni ljang gu de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po ste //
T02TD1346E:97b-12: dang por thugs kyi rang bzhin de nas dbus ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:97b-13: 169 / de nas gzhan ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mda' la bcu yis bsgyur bar gyur pa'i dpag tshad stong phrag go //
T02TD1346E:97b-14: de yi phyi rol dus rnams dag gis 'khor lo'i ngo bo de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1346E:97b-15: 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug gis te rig byed 'bum gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1346E:97b-16: brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skye gnas gzugs /
T02TD1346E:97b-17: 170 / rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:97b-18: de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying ga dang ni de nas lte gsang chu skyes de bzhin no //
T02TD1346E:97b-19: zhabs kyi 'og dang rje ngar brla dang dpyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te //
T02TD1346E:98a-1: mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po nyi ma'i tshad kyis so /
T02TD1346E:98a-2: 171 / nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten tshad //
T02TD1346E:98a-3: rig byed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gter phyed dang bcas pa'i rig byed rig byed kyis //
T02TD1346E:98a-4: gtsug tor mgo bo 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni //
T02TD1346E:98a-5: shangs kyi 'og tu ko sko'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa dag ste mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i chu skyes dbus /
T02TD1346E:98a-6: 172 / de nas snying ga lte ba gsang bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:98a-7: gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yis ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid //
T02TD1346E:98a-8: mdzod spu gsang ba'i chu skyes dbus su khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde ba skyed byed gnas pa gang //
T02TD1346E:98a-9: dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o /
T02TD1346E:98a-10: 173 / phyed bcas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste //
T02TD1346E:98a-11: thugs kyi phyed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying ga la gnas lhan skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1346E:98a-12: gsum po dag las sgo rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha'o //
T02TD1346E:98a-13: 'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo nyis 'gyur dag tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:98a-14: 174 / lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:98a-15: de bzhin lha yi ri bo dag ni lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi tshad yin no //
T02TD1346E:98a-16: de yi steng du rdo rje rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni phyed du 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:98a-17: de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin ma chu dang me dang rlung dang mi lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o /
T02TD1346E:98a-19: 175 / phyed bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs kyi 'khor lor 'gyur te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus //
T02TD1346E:98a-20: gsung gi 'khor lo sku yi 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod spu phyed kyi mtshams //
T02TD1346E:98b-0: sgo khyud mthar ni dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur te mi bdag dpral ba'i @98b steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams //
T02TD1346E:98b-1: phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o /
T02TD1346E:98b-2: 176 / steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1346E:98b-3: kun nas rlung gis bgrod pa'i dbang gis thad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:98b-4: rtsibs brgyad mtshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis 'khor lor 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:98b-5: sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod brtag par bya /
T02TD1346E:98b-6: 177 / steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:98b-7: padma phyed la snying po'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug / sgo la sogs pa dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis nges par rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:98b-8: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shes rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no /
T02TD1346E:98b-9: 178 / lhun po'i phyi rol du ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad po yang dag gnas pa ste ;
T02TD1346E:98b-10: / shar du ral grir 'gyur te ro yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ril bu mig sman ro tsa na //
T02TD1346E:98b-11: lho ru dpal ldan rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du'o //
T02TD1346E:98b-12: dbus su mchod phyir thogs pa dag ste lha dang mi yi bla ma'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do /
T02TD1346E:98b-13: 179 / nor bu gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni //
T02TD1346E:98b-14: gcig gnyis chu gter mda' dang klu yi dbang po dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams dag gis rim pas so //
T02TD1346E:98b-15: dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam par gyes pa zhi dang drag po la //
T02TD1346E:98b-16: dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs ba lang kha dang padma'i gzugs /
T02TD1346E:98b-17: 180 / khyon ni de yi sum cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba 'dab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las //
T02TD1346E:99a-0: rva ni khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du @99a * //
T02TD1346E:99a-1: ste rva yi zlum po dag ni bzhi cha'o //
T02TD1346E:99a-2: phyi rol rva yi sum cha 'og ste steng du ba da r'i yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1346E:99a-3: dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin 'dab ma rdo rje yang ngo ba lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin nyid /
T02TD1346E:99a-4: 181 / gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad //
T02TD1346E:99a-5: de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin shin tu nyams pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams //
T02TD1346E:99a-6: phyed dang gnyis mthar phyir byung chu skyes snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o //
T02TD1346E:99a-7: padma'i mtha' las cha dman gzhi dang mnyam pa brang ste de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o /
T02TD1346E:99a-9: 182 / gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu ma nyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams //
T02TD1346E:99a-10: gsang ba'i chu skyes dag las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu mnyam pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te //
T02TD1346E:99a-11: gdan nas padma'i mngon mtshams snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o //
T02TD1346E:99a-12: de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter dus dang phyed bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum /
T02TD1346E:99a-13: 183 / gdan las rig byed dag gis padma snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te //
T02TD1346E:99a-14: phyed bcas brgyad kyis gdong pa'i tshad dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang //
T02TD1346E:99a-15: mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral bdag dang mgo bo de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di //
T02TD1346E:99a-16: de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:99a-17: 184 / gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul ni chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no //
T02TD1346E:99a-18: lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dag dang 'dres pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no ;
T02TD1346E:99a-19: / rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te //
T02TD1346E:99a-20: nag po rlung ngo sngon po dang ni ljang gu de yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las byung ba'o /
T02TD1346E:99a-21: 185 / lan tshva sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba me dang kha ba rlung yin te //
T02TD1346E:99b-0: skyur dang @99b bska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go slar yang zhing gi [?] rngo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang //
T02TD1346E:99b-1: sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams //
T02TD1346E:99b-2: sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go /
T02TD1346E:99b-3: 186 / sa yis zug gzer 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de me yis ni //
T02TD1346E:99b-4: 'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed //
T02TD1346E:99b-5: ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang //
T02TD1346E:99b-6: chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags dang sman rnams dag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab /
T02TD1346E:99b-7: 187 / bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1346E:99b-8: slar yang thams cad tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:99b-9: rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir //
T02TD1346E:99b-10: mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro /
T02TD1346E:99b-11: 188 / phyi rol du ni rgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa la sa gzhi la gnas mi rnams so //
T02TD1346E:99b-12: longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:99b-13: rva la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha min chu gter rlung //
T02TD1346E:99b-14: gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng du 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong /
T02TD1346E:99b-15: 189 /'dir ni chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung //
T02TD1346E:99b-16: nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni //
T02TD1346E:99b-17: gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med dag dang lhan cig skyes pa ka rka ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so //
T02TD1346E:99b-18: 'dir rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa ta pa ta sa ring po thung ngu lhag pa'i lha /
T02TD1346E:100a-1: ka rka tar ni zla ba dkar po nyi ma seng ge bu mo srang rnams so //
T02TD1346E:100a-2: sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro //
T02TD1346E:100a-3: de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun nas phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye //
T02TD1346E:100a-4: 'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang /
T02TD1346E:100a-5: 191 / gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan //
T02TD1346E:100a-6: mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste //
T02TD1346E:100a-7: gang zhig phal pa'i rtsa dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:100a-8: yi dags rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams dag gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so /
T02TD1346E:100a-10: 192 / 'di rnams sgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te //
T02TD1346E:100a-11: mngal ni rab tu bzung ba mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni //
T02TD1346E:100a-12: nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te //
T02TD1346E:100a-13: sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o //
T02TD1346E:100a-14: 193 / de phyir rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sku ni skyes shing [?] ma nyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste //
T02TD1346E:100a-15: bcom ldan de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis bcings pa ma yin no //
T02TD1346E:100a-16: de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su las kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye //
T02TD1346E:100a-17: sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'phrog lha gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no /
T02TD1346E:100a-18: 194 / gang dag chos la mngon 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes su chags //
T02TD1346E:100a-19: shi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te //
T02TD1346E:100b-0: mchod sbyin la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g-yul du shi bar gyur na mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu @100b 'jug //
T02TD1346E:100b-1: 'jug ngogs lus po lhung las mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ba de rnams thar pa ster ba'i chos ma yin /
T02TD1346E:100b-2: 195 / de nyid lam ni rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod kyi ma gang pa ni gang //
T02TD1346E:100b-3: mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun zla chung ma sring mo rnams dang rje bo gnyen gyi sde ni gang //
T02TD1346E:100b-4: bdag gis byin gyis brlab pa'i drang srong 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir gang gis thar par 'gro 'gyur ba //
T02TD1346E:100b-5: de yis nyi ma khyod kyis thub pa rnams ni bdag gi tshig las rigs gcig dag la 'jug par mdzod /
T02TD1346E:100b-6: 196 / gal te lus la dbyug pa bsnun pas sdug bsngal 'gyur na de la dbyug pa dag ni nyes pa can //
T02TD1346E:100b-7: dbyug pa 'di ni ma yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi //
T02TD1346E:100b-8: 'di ni ma yin sems kyis bskul te sems kyang 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro ba'i me yis so //
T02TD1346E:100b-9: de phyir khro bo'i me 'di 'gro ba'i dgra bo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsod par 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:100b-10: 197 / chags las sdang sogs skyon te rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang 'grogs las so //
T02TD1346E:100b-11: de ni rtsa nas dbyung slad mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i sbyin la rab tu byin //
T02TD1346E:100b-12: de phyir sbyin la rjes su chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster pa bsod nams dag gi tshogs 'di ni //
T02TD1346E:100b-13: 'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du gyur cing thams cad dus su skye bo rnams kyi dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog 198 /
T02TD1346E:100b-14: chags pa gang gis sems can rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis skyob pa rnams ni grol ba ste //
T02TD1346E:100b-15: sems can rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig srung byed de ni skyob rnams ster bar byed //
T02TD1346E:100b-16: sems can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad //
T02TD1346E:100b-17: des na rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di ni lha klu lha min rnams kyis bya ba dka' bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:100b-18: 199 / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin srog dang ni //
T02TD1346E:101a-1: la sogs pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams te //
T02TD1346E:101a-2: phyugs dang bcas pa mi yi lus la khyab byed 'di rnams dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhon nu gang //
T02TD1346E:101a-3: mi bdag dang bcas mi yi bla ma rigs dregs nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs ni thu bo yin /
T02TD1346E:101a-4: 200 / bsreg bya sa dang dri ma med pa chu ru rab tu 'gyur te tu ttha ka ni me nyid do //
T02TD1346E:101a-5: rlung dang nam mkha' 'dres pa'i khams ni g-yo ba dang bcas ri bong can dang mtshal ni bdun pa yang //
T02TD1346E:101a-6: k'a kshi k'a shi sa dang mu zi mnyam dang mkha' rlung me dang chu ni ldong ros pa bla ste //
T02TD1346E:101a-7: btsag ni sa'o lan tshva gang zhig ze tsha rgya mtsho skyes dang rgyam tsha nag po thab kyi tsha /
T02TD1346E:101a-8: 201 /'di rnams sa sogs khams te slar yang 'dir ni n'a ba s'a ra ya ba ksha ra [?] sangdza dang //
T02TD1346E:101a-9: tshal k'a tsa las skyes de rnams mkha' dang rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag gi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1346E:101a-10: rdo yi chu ni sa ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu ni chu dang me yi chu ni me //
T02TD1346E:101a-11: rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin dag gi dug gi chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhin no /
T02TD1346E:101a-12: 202 / gla sgang ser po sa yi khams te sha ktu ka dang rva can nag po chu dang me dang rlung //
T02TD1346E:101a-13: nag po brtsegs pa stong pa zhes bya gzhan pa nye ba'i dug ni rnam pa lnga po rig par bya //
T02TD1346E:101a-14: rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang mtshungs mgo dang dung la sogs pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1346E:101a-15: de dag rnams kyi lcags ni rnam drug lhang tsher skyes dang de bzhin lha dang khab len rnam pa bzhi /
T02TD1346E:101a-16: 203 / ro ni grub dang grub pa ma yin rnam pa gnyis su 'dir 'gyur 'bugs byed dang ni 'bugs byed min //
T02TD1346E:101a-17: grub pa lcags ni 'bugs par byed de slar yang de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bugs par byed pa'o //
T02TD1346E:101a-18: gang zhig 'bugs byed min pa'i dngul chu ro de bskol pa dang ni bsgyur bar gyur pa dag gis kyang //
T02TD1346E:101a-19: lcags ni 'bugs shing rjes su 'bugs te mtha' dag nad 'phrog rus pa'i lcags ni rnam par spangs nas so /
T02TD1346E:101a-20: 204 / dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis 'gro ste me la gnas shing bskol ba de ni rim pa yis //
T02TD1346E:101b-0: sgra dang rab tu 'phar ba yis @101b te da yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:101b-1: sgra ldan 'phar ldan 'bugs par byed pa ma yin de yang 'dab ma 'bugs byed 'dar dang bcas pa ste //
T02TD1346E:101b-2: 'dar ba med pa mdung gis 'bugs byed rnam gsum 'dir yang sgyur byed rnams kyis bsgyur bar gyur pa'o /
T02TD1346E:101b-3: 205 / mchog gi sman gyi stobs kyis stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur te lcags rnams thams cad bzhu ba'o //
T02TD1346E:101b-4: su zhig de rnams med na sa yi steng gi gnas su 'di yi bcing ba dag ni gang zhig byed //
T02TD1346E:101b-5: bcings nas mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur zhing de bzhin zos na 'chi ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:101b-6: ye shes med na sa bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:101b-7: 206 / de dag rnams kyi rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol mo'i mngon par sbyor ba la yang 'god par 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:101b-8: gang zhig chud zos de ni mi bdag ro yi yul la ma bsregs chos kyi bya ba la ma byin //
T02TD1346E:101b-9: gang zhig rdzas ni sdig pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de yis de ni sdig pa dag gis bcings //
T02TD1346E:101b-10: de phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can dag gi don gyi slad du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad /
T02TD1346E:101b-11: 207 / gang zhig byugs pas 'phral la zangs kyi 'dab ma'i dri ma 'phrog par byed pa dag ni sman yin te //
T02TD1346E:101b-12: mtha' dag nad 'phrog lcags rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal ldan rnams kyis la mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:101b-13: gzhan dag rnams kyis 'di yi bcing bar rab tu 'gyur ba gang de nges par lo dus par dang ni //
T02TD1346E:101b-14: bdug dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig 'bugs dag las lhag par mi 'gyur ro /
T02TD1346E:101b-15: 208 / sman rnams thams cad shin tu tsha ba'i ro rnams dag dang 'gyur byed sde dang skyur ba'i sde rnams dang //
T02TD1346E:101b-16: bslang bar gyur pa'i rtsab mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang bdug par yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1346E:101b-17: dngul chu rnams ni dngul du bya ba la yang me tog btab pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o //
T02TD1346E:102a-0: @102a * // gnyis sbyor tsha [?] la mching bu byi ba rta sen dug rnams kyis so snum gyis bran pas 'jam pa nyid /
T02TD1346E:102a-1: 209 / glang po mi yi chu ni lan bdun blugs pa dag gis chu shing tsi tra la sogs thal ba dang //
T02TD1346E:102a-2: 'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ro ni [?] sbyings pa de rnams sbru bar bya //
T02TD1346E:102a-3: yang nas yang du me yi tsha ba dag gis slar yang lan brgyar sbru bar bya zhing bskam par bya //
T02TD1346E:102a-4: de bzhin dung gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyur pa 'di ni mu zi dag gis bsres pa yang /
T02TD1346E:102a-6: 210 / lcags rnams zhu bar byed pa'i don du bi da 'di ni dngul chu dag gi brgyad kyi cha shas 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:102a-7: khyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgyad de ro yi snying gar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid //
T02TD1346E:102a-8: drag por bskol bas dri ma med pa 'di ni mnyes shing bzhus pas stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:102a-9: lcags gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi ma ri bong can gyi lus kyis lcags rnams thams cad kha sgyur byed /
T02TD1346E:102a-10: 211 / khyab byed sgyur ba de yang chen po dang bcas zha nye gsha' tshe spra tshil bcas pas 'jug pa ste //
T02TD1346E:102a-11: de ltar gang zhig dngul chu'i las ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin zhag so sor byed pa na //
T02TD1346E:102a-12: dus gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lci zhing sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu grol //
T02TD1346E:102a-13: de yi mchog gi lus la nad dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrogs par byed /
T02TD1346E:102a-14: 212 / khru phyed gser gyi padma nor gyi 'dab ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje ste //
T02TD1346E:102a-15: lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin dag tu dag pa'i aindra n'i la padma r'a ga chu shel lo //
T02TD1346E:102a-16: nub tu rin chen ka rke ta ste mi [?] dang lha min 'phrog byed du ni rnon po zangs dang dngul //
T02TD1346E:102a-17: rlung gi 'dab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag las skyes pa'i gdan ni lte ba la /
T02TD1346E:102a-18: 213 / snying por de steng gser las skyes pa'i ji bha la ni phyag gnyis ne'u le dang bcas mchog sbyin pa //
T02TD1346E:102b-0: 'dab ma rnams la gser las skyes pa'am dngul las skyes pa'i lha mo brgyad de chu skyes mchog sbyin phyag / cod pan sangs @102b rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog sbyin phyag ste gnod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:102b-1: ha sogs thung ngu ring po phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab ma rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams rim pas so /
T02TD1346E:102b-2: 214 / dri dang me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su thun gsum zla ba'i snod du mchod byas nas //
T02TD1346E:102b-3: aom dzam sv'a h'a'i mthar ste dbus su bha la dang bcas dza le ndr'a ya zhes pa sngags 'di yis //
T02TD1346E:102b-4: rgyal po rab dga'i yid kyis gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gis srung ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin bya //
T02TD1346E:102b-5: de ltar bsrung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'i mgon dang klu yi mgon pos ro ni 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro /
T02TD1346E:102b-6: 215 / so phag 'gyur byed skyur ba'i sde rnams dag gis nyi ma bcu ru ro ni mnye zhing bdug par bya //
T02TD1346E:102b-7: de nas slar yang snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phye nas bsre bar bya ste thams cad dus su'o //
T02TD1346E:102b-8: slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni ma phyed ro ni 'chi ste de yang de la bzhu bar bya //
T02TD1346E:102b-9: dngul chu rang gi skye gnas za na de ni slar yang gzhan gyi skye gnas thams cad rab tu za /
T02TD1346E:102b-10: 216 / zha nye rnon por gan zangs dang lhad tsher skyes sam gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa rnam dag pa ;
T02TD1346E:102b-11: / mnyam pa gcig tu bsres pa'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni lhang tsher dkar po las skyes gsha' tshe mnyam //
T02TD1346E:102b-12: dang por drug cu'i cha shas zas ni 'ju bar 'gyur zhing de nas cha shas zas ni 'ju bar 'gyur zhing de nas cha re bskyed pas 'phel bar bya //
T02TD1346E:102b-13: rkang pa'i cha shas ji srid nyid du rab tu 'gyur te de las lhag par rab tu sbyin mi bya /
T02TD1346E:102b-14: 217 / phyogs gcig gis ni nyis 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang 'di ni de bzhin sa bon rnam par dag / de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang zhu ba 'di ni bi da mchog rnams kyis //
T02TD1346E:102b-15: ma zhu na ni ro la ji srid mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i dugs su rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:102b-16: reg pa mchog gi sman rnams dag gis me la gnas pa lhang tsher lcags ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:103a-0: 218 / lhang tsher dag las lcags ni brgyad 'gyur stobs su 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na @103a * //
T02TD1346E:103a-2: de yis sa bon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin te slar yang de las rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur ro //
T02TD1346E:103a-3: de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i ro dang ro rnams ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar //
T02TD1346E:103a-4: me yi nang du bskol bar bya ste de nas de ni 'bum phrag du ma 'bugs par rab tu 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:103a-5: 219 / reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bi da mnye ba dag dang dug rnams kyis kyang 'ju bar 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:103a-6: 'dar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgyur byed gser ni mnyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:103a-7: slar yang gzhan ni gnyis dang sum 'gyur gser bzhu'i khu ba 'bru mar dngul chu dag la blugs pas so //
T02TD1346E:103a-8: rdzas kyi don du zha nye brgyad cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu 'bad nas blugs par bya /
T02TD1346E:103a-9: 220 / gser dngul bya ba dag la gser rnon [?] sprul zangs zha nye mtshal dang ldong ros mu zi dag gis dang //
T02TD1346E:103a-10: gsha' tshe zla ba de bzhin lhang tsher skyes kyang ba bla dang ni bsreg bya dag gis bsad byas nas //
T02TD1346E:103a-11: mnyam pa'i 'gyur byed dug dang lan tshva nye ba'i ro rnams dag dang lcags dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni //
T02TD1346E:103a-12: mkhris pa skyur po dag gis nyin zhag bcu ru mnyes nas de ni rngo ba'i dbus su blugs byas te /
T02TD1346E:103a-13: 221 / sa yi nang du zla ba drug tu steng du me dang bcas pas thams cad dus su bdugs gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:103a-14: dngul chu de ni bcu drug cha yis dbyangs kyis drangs pa 'bugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur te slar //
T02TD1346E:103a-15: zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge ba'i gser 'di gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste //
T02TD1346E:103a-16: dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shas byin na dag pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin /
T02TD1346E:103a-17: 222 /'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1346E:103a-18: de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya //
T02TD1346E:103b-0: de nas slar yang btags pa dang @103b ni tsha la 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni //
T02TD1346E:103b-1: lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes nas nyis 'gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya /
T02TD1346E:103b-2: 223 / nyin zhag bdun du snod ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras bu gsum po ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni //
T02TD1346E:103b-3: sman gyis bsad pa'i lcags kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag dang bcas pa dngul chu dang bcas dang //
T02TD1346E:103b-4: ba yi 'o ma gsar pa rnying pa s'a li zan ni lo ma skyur pos dman zhing lan tshva dang //
T02TD1346E:103b-5: rnam bral nya dang 'bru mar sogs las grol ba zos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o /
T02TD1346E:103b-6: 224 / stong phrag 'bugs pa brgya yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid par yang shes byas nas //
T02TD1346E:103b-7: nyin zhag so so'i dus su bza' bar bya ste yungs kar cha las mtha' ma skye tshe cha shas so //
T02TD1346E:103b-8: khang [?] bzangs dang ni sa yi khang pa grang ba rlung dang tshad pa dag dang bral bar rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:103b-9: 'bring po 'di ni zla ba drug gis lha yi lus po skra dkar gnyer ma dag dang bral bar byed /
T02TD1346E:103b-10: 225 / ka rko t'i dang de ba d'a l'i tsha gsum bri ha t'i dang nim pa ki r'a ta tig ta //
T02TD1346E:103b-11: bskol ba 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba la nyin zhag gsum du bsnyung bar gnas pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1346E:103b-12: de bzhin zla ba'i chu la sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang bha ll'a ta yi chu //
T02TD1346E:103b-13: ngan pa'i dri dang sa dang rdo ba dug gi sha dang brtags pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags pas so /
T02TD1346E:103b-14: 226 / gang zhig zos na drag tu rgyal ba ster byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag sman yin te //
T02TD1346E:103b-15: phye mar byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1346E:103b-16: gsal bar mi phyugs sems can rnams kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni grub ster sman ma yin //
T02TD1346E:103b-17: de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:104a-0: 227 / da ndo tpa la s'a li pa rn'i chu skyes s'a ri dag gi rang lus @104a * //
T02TD1346E:104a-2: ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len snod du lcags kyis nyin zhag gsum dag tu yang mnyes byas nas //
T02TD1346E:104a-3: gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyin zhag so so'i dus su tam ka'i rkang pa'i tshad ni za byed pa //
T02TD1346E:104a-4: de ni mdze la sogs pa'i nad las grol zhing skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad gnyis lo lon dbyibs /
T02TD1346E:104a-5: 228 / po kk'a na dang bar snang sha ktu k'i ra'i mchu yis rab g-yo dngul chu dag kyang gsad par bya //
T02TD1346E:104a-6: sman gzhan dag gis gsad pa la ni dmar ring lhang tsher skyes dang gser dang khab len mnyam pa dag / gcig tu byas nas srog bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste //
T02TD1346E:104a-7: sngar brjod khab len snod du chur khu dag gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar 'phrog 229 / zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag dang bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag bdun zhag gsum dang //
T02TD1346E:104a-8: zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu dag las ni lus la dngos grub tu yang rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1346E:104a-9: thun mong ba dang 'bring po 'jigs pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog ni ye shes grub pa ste //
T02TD1346E:104a-10: mchog dman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skye ba gcig gi rjes 'bugs dag las min /
T02TD1346E:104a-12: 230 / gang la 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyin zhag so so'i dus su dud 'gro rnam par rtsod //
T02TD1346E:104a-13: ral gri dag la padma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes gter ni gsal bar byed //
T02TD1346E:104a-14: der ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung po'i bdag po dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1346E:104a-15: ji srid brko ba'i mtshan mar gyur gyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la rdzas kyi dngos grub bo /
T02TD1346E:104a-16: 231 / dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa skye gnas drug gi sngags rnams bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:104a-17: gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi la ni zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya ;
T02TD1346E:104a-18: / klu mo rnams ni bsgrub pa byas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro dang sman de rnams ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:104a-19: mkha' 'gro ma rnams bsgrub pa byas nas mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:104b-0: 232 / klu la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnams rnal 'byor @104b pa yis bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:104b-1: du ba la sogs bsgrub pa byas nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:104b-2: srog la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1346E:104b-3: dam pa'i bde ba bsgrubs nas lhan cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ni kun du 'gro ba bsgrub par bya /
T02TD1346E:104b-4: 233 / sems can rnams la 'chi ster gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste //
T02TD1346E:104b-5: 'dod pa'i dngos grub gang zhig bgrod bya min pa de yang srid gsum gnas su bsam gtan bgrod bya'o //
T02TD1346E:104b-6: ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' dag kyang rdo rje padmar bde bas byin brlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid //
T02TD1346E:104b-7: de lta de ltar rdo rje can te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bde mnyam ster gyur cig 234 / sgra gcan me dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod de sa chu bsreg za rlung dang stong pa gang //
T02TD1346E:104b-8: lnga po dag go gza' yi tshogs pa cig shos dag ni drug po lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnams su //
T02TD1346E:104b-9: gling rnams dag ni bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga por phyi rol dag tu gsungs //
T02TD1346E:104b-10: snying stobs la sogs yon tan rnams ni gsum po gzhan pa 'di'o lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid /
T02TD1346E:104b-11: 235 / padmar rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag go de las ni //
T02TD1346E:104b-12: gang zhig rus pa la sogs mtha' dag rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste //
T02TD1346E:104b-13: lag pa rkang pa dag ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga po'o //
T02TD1346E:104b-14: de rnams tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya /
T02TD1346E:104b-15: 236 / sa 'dzin de nyid rab dbye rnams dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang //
T02TD1346E:104b-16: dbye ba drug cu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bug pa drug dang zla ba'i grangs //
T02TD1346E:104b-17: de dag thams cad bsdus pa sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyu ba dang //
T02TD1346E:104b-18: gza' rnams dag gi rgyu ba gang de slar yang cig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma yi rgyu bar brjod /
T02TD1346E:104b-19: 237 / ye shes nam mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog gsum po yang //
T02TD1346E:105a-0: nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dang ni @105a * //
T02TD1346E:105a-1: slar yang nges par rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams dag dang //
T02TD1346E:105a-2: mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par //
T02TD1346E:105a-3: bsdu ba bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya /
T02TD1346E:105a-5: 238 / mngon shes lnga dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang //
T02TD1346E:105a-6: de bzhin phung po dbang po dran pa zhes pa drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni //
T02TD1346E:105a-7: bdun te lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnams so sor legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang //
T02TD1346E:105a-8: bug pa zhes bya yan lag dgu ni gsung rab mchog ste sa rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no /
T02TD1346E:105a-9: 239 / sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel dag / skye ba ni 'gog pa dag go de bzhin nyis 'gyur dgu ni ma 'dres pa yi sangs rgyas chos //
T02TD1346E:105a-10: rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpe byad rnams kyang brgyad cu ste //
T02TD1346E:105a-11: khyab bdag mchog gi go 'phang 'di dag mtha' dag sngags pa yis ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin /
T02TD1346E:105a-12: 240 / zla ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig dang 'khrig pa phyogs dang bgrod pa dag ni gnyis //
T02TD1346E:105a-13: 'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsum mo chu gter dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru brjod //
T02TD1346E:105a-14: mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni drug / gza' dang ri bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgyad yin no /
T02TD1346E:105a-15: 241 / rtsa dang bug pa gza' dang gter yang dgu ste phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag ni bcu gcig go //
T02TD1346E:105a-16: nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshes dang mi bdag bcu gnyis nas ni re re 'phel //
T02TD1346E:105a-17: nyes pa 'di dag bco brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog ni ma lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD1346E:105a-18: de nyid ces grags nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes zhes pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid du 'gyur /
T02TD1346E:105a-19: 242 / rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshigs ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste //
T02TD1346E:105b-0: dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du ma lus pa yang mngon @105b sum gsungs //
T02TD1346E:105b-1: de phyir 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag [?] mtshang med pa'i rgyu ni bla ma ste //
T02TD1346E:105b-2: dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par brjod pa zla ba bzang /
T02TD1346E:105b-3: 243 / gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang //
T02TD1346E:105b-4: reg bya gzugs dang sems med rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing 'ching grol dang byed po med //
T02TD1346E:105b-5: sa bon dang ni gsal ba'i dus med mtha' dag srid par sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med //
T02TD1346E:105b-6: mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med cing byed pa rnam gral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo /
T02TD1346E:105b-7: 244 / dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje skyes bu dpe zla med cing thams cad du 'gro spros pa med //
T02TD1346E:105b-8: brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba sna dang kha dang mig dang mgo ste thams cad nas ni phyag dang zhabs //
T02TD1346E:105b-9: 'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po srid pa gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag gi rgyur gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:105b-10: rig pa la sogs rnal 'byor dag gi bgrod bya mchog bde'i go 'phang dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal /
T02TD1346E:105b-11: 245 / spro byed nus pa'i ngo bo glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcu gnyis dag gi gzi brjid can //
T02TD1346E:105b-12: ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phang bgrod byed rnam par bcad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1346E:105b-13: dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon bo ri bong 'dzin pa las 'jig 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag gnas //
T02TD1346E:105b-14: bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing sred pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo /
T02TD1346E:105b-15: 246 / sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha yis yongs su bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD1346E:105b-16: dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi zad rnams la mi bzad pa //
T02TD1346E:105b-17: gang gis las gang rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de skyed pa //
T02TD1346E:105b-18: 'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshal lo /
T02TD1346E:105b-19: 247 / gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g-yas dang g-yon dang mdun dang rgyab //
T02TD1346E:106a-0: steng 'og kun nas dkar ljang sna tshogs kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs te thung ngu @106a * //
T02TD1346E:106a-2: shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas bud med skyes pa'ang skyes pa bud med min //
T02TD1346E:106a-3: gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig bha ga bzang mo mchog gi bha ga khyod la 'dud de khyod la 'dud /
T02TD1346E:106a-4: 248 / gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag ste //
T02TD1346E:106a-5: de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med //
T02TD1346E:106a-6: de mnyes pa yis bdag ni mgu ste de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes pa chen po'o //
T02TD1346E:106a-7: de nyid sems can rnams la thar pa bde mnyam 'bras ster bu rnams dag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so /
T02TD1346E:106a-8: 249 / sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs pad bzang po dag la dus gsum phyag mi byed //
T02TD1346E:106a-9: mi shes gang yin gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni mandala mi byed pa //
T02TD1346E:106a-10: myur du mnar med 'gro ba gang yin gang zhig bde mnyam ster byed bla ma skyo ba skyed pa po //
T02TD1346E:106a-11: shes rab ye shes thob pa gang yin ma nyams gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs ni mi spong ba /
T02TD1346E:106a-12: 250 / nyams pa gang yin gang zhig rtsa gsum dag la gnas pa'i rlung ni mtha' yas dus su bsad pa'o //
T02TD1346E:106a-13: dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi mnyam lam la srog dang thung sel rlung ni gsod byed pa'o //
T02TD1346E:106a-14: sbyin bdag gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs thams cad ster //
T02TD1346E:106a-15: ma rabs gang yin gang zhig slu byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i sems dang g-yo sgyu can /
T02TD1346E:106a-16: 251 / dpal ldan dpal gyi chos kyi 'khor lo lha yi mchog gis btud pa'i gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1346E:106a-17: de la sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar bzhugs pas zla ba'i zhu ba rtogs pa na //
T02TD1346E:106a-18: sems can don gyi slad du mi yi bdag po rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa gang //
T02TD1346E:106a-19: de yang da lta bdag gis de rnams a'a li k'a li nyung ngu'i rgyud du bkod do nyi ma kye /
T02TD1346E:106a-20: 252 / sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis phreng 'dzin sdeb sbyor bcings pas brjod //
T02TD1346E:106a-21: padma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan pa nyid du mdzod //
