T02TD1346E:106b-0: ji ltar nyi ma dang bcas thub pa'i rigs ni shes rab ye shes @106b thob pa 'di las byung gyur pa //
T02TD1346E:106b-1: rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin las de bzhin 'gyur bar shog 253 / nyi ma khyod dam mi dbang phyi mar gyur pa'i srid par dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gcig las ni //
T02TD1346E:106b-2: tshangs pa'i rigs 'di las skyes mi yi bdag po grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs bdag gi dga' ma ni //
T02TD1346E:106b-3: dpal ldan sgrol ma pad dkar can ni yon tan kun ster 'jig rten mgon po chu skyes mtshan ma can //
T02TD1346E:106b-4: autpala sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos /
T02TD1346E:106b-5: 254 / autpala sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin mthong nas //
T02TD1346E:106b-6: thub pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang lag pa dag gis ni //
T02TD1346E:106b-7: rigs ldan zhabs kyi padmar phyag dag 'tshal nas smras pa ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thugs rje yis //
T02TD1346E:106b-8: thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las phyung nas ye shes lam la gzhag par mdzod /
T02TD1346E:106b-9: 255 / khyod ni rgan yang gzhon nu mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po yin yang thog mar dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod //
T02TD1346E:106b-10: bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spyod ldan mchog gi thugs rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te gshin rje'i dgra //
T02TD1346E:106b-11: khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud //
T02TD1346E:106b-12: khyod ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug 256 / tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btud par gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung //
T02TD1346E:106b-13: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar byas //
T02TD1346E:106b-14: rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi ma sa bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka l'a par //
T02TD1346E:106b-15: khyod kyi zhabs kyi padma dag la 'jigs rung 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni skyabs su lhag par mchi /
T02TD1346E:106b-16: 257 / sa ga'i zla ba'i nya la mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la //
T02TD1346E:106b-17: thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob //
T02TD1346E:106b-18: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la gnas pa bzhin //
T02TD1346E:106b-19: dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur cig 258 /
T02TD1346E:107a-0: @107a * // sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gi thugs rje dag gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas //
T02TD1346E:107a-1: sras po padma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter la gnang ba stsal ba nges par ni //
T02TD1346E:107a-2: dang por khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag mtshang med pa glegs bam dag la gnas pa dang ;
T02TD1346E:107a-3: / de nas rang gi 'dod pas 'grel bshad byas nas gzhan gyi gnas su bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen /
T02TD1346E:107a-4: 259 / gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD1346E:107a-5: mi yi 'jig rten dag na phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i rgyal po btsun mor bcas pa rnams //
T02TD1346E:107a-6: gang dag sa 'og dag na gdengs can dbang po gdon tshogs mi dge thams cad dus su 'ching byed pa //
T02TD1346E:107a-7: de dag thams cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su mi shes 'jig rten kun nas skyong bar byed gyur cig 260 / rgyud ni dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo shin tu bsdus pa ma lus rdo rje sems dpa' lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1346E:107a-8: thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal pa'i bdag po'i rdo rje dag gis de nyid rnam pa bcu drug pa //
T02TD1346E:107a-9: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs shing bdag gis kyang ni bstan pa gang //
T02TD1346E:107a-10: bsod nams de yis sems can thams cad 'gyur med mchog gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud gyur cig 261 / dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las ye shes kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o /
T02TD1346E:107a-12: // / mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba /
T02TD1346E:107a-13: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD1346E:107a-15: // / kha che'i pa ndi ta so ma n'a tha dang ;
T02TD1346E:107a-16: bod kyi lo ts'a ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las /
T02TD1346E:107a-17: dus phyis yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang /
T02TD1346E:107a-18: dpon chen sh'akya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du /
T02TD1346E:107a-19: mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang /
T02TD1346E:107a-20: dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi cha la legs par dpyad cing bskul te /
T02TD1346E:107a-21: legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slong shong ston gyis /
T02TD1346E:107a-22: dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o /
